name: Council AI
description: Make better decisions using the wisdom of the AI crowd. Eliminate AI bias and detect hallucinations by seeing answers from the world's best AI (Google, OpenAI, Anthropic, Perplexity, and xAI) in a summary table.

node.body:
Hi Product Hunt community,


I built this app to let users make better decisions with the world's best AI. AI is great, when it doesn't hallucinate. But it often does (even the newest models still have a 20% hallucination rate) and it's hard to detect because it's so convincing. This app lets you see answers from five of the best AI companies, summarizes their answers for you, and provides a summary table. This process allows you to easily spot hallucinations in certain AI models and companies. And lets you make better decisions. Demo.


There is Debater that can debate any topic. Demo.


Then the app has a list of interesting questions to get you started with (think Quora). Demo.


There is also a social network where users can post questions and follow each other (think Twitter). Demo.


In addition to this, it has several interesting councils (groups of AI assistants) that give you perspectives from "across the aisle". For example there is a "Politics" council that has three opinions from a Democrat, Libertarian, and Republican. This way you can hear opinions from across the whole political spectrum. Or a "Parenting" council that has three opinions from a Permissive, Authoritative, and Authoritarian parent. This way you can see parenting advice from the whole parenting spectrum. Demo.


Please give it a try and let me know what you think. I'd greatly appreciate your honest feedback!

Thanks,
Alin Jula

Founder of Council AI.



https://councilai.app/

LinkedIn

YouTube

X

Instagram

name: Profolio
description: Profolio uses AI to transform your static resume into a dynamic, interactive portfolio. Showcase your skills, impress recruiters, and land your dream job faster. Get noticed!

node.body:
Hey everyone!

I built Profolio out of personal necessity. Being mostly self-taught with a mix of freelance work and personal projects, my actual skills never really came across on my traditional resume.

The jobs I've landed as a systems developer came through people who already knew my work, but I got completely stuck when trying to find better opportunities through normal job applications. My resume was completely ignored by recruiters.

I got really frustrated by the thought of how different my chances would be if recruiters could actually see my projects instead of just reading about them.

So I built a simple tool to transform my plain text resume into something that showcased my actual work. Some positive feedback from friends in similar situations, and a few rabbit holes later, Profolio was born.

It's currently in beta with a free tier that lets anyone try the AI enhancements. While it's still evolving, I've got a roadmap of features that will make it even more powerful for job seekers.

If you've ever been overlooked because your resume couldn't capture what you can actually do, I'd love for you to try it out. Your feedback will help shape something that gives talented people a fighting chance, regardless of how their experience looks on paper.

I'm excited to keep building this alongside the community that needs it most. Hope it helps you stand out in your next job search!

name: MYNDIFY™
description: Introducing MYNDIFY : Your pocket-sized second brain! Store your insights, your hacks, your "aha moments" as they occur and access them EXACTLY when you need it. No need to remember...to remember.

node.body:
Hello everyone 👋 Anggie here, founder of MYNDIFY.


I've been working on MYNDIFY and it is great to be able to finally share how great it is and how it came to be.


The story is a bit personal. It started after the birth of my second daughter, Athena, when I was trying to find a way to effectively remember all the hacks and insights I learned each day. I needed a system that both kept me organized with as little work possible, but more importantly, one that reminded me of the information when I needed it.


Yes, I tried my phone's note-taking app (along with some others). We can all agree that the note-taking apps out there are messy, overly complicated, and cannot make the data actionable. There was no way they would help me remember to order a different meal next time I come back to this restaurant.🤦‍♀️


So I decided to build an all-in-one solution...an app that functions like a second brain.


MYNDIFY has:

✅ A pre-built infrastructure to organize your mental notes. Entries are connected as they are created so I don't have to spend time "making folders".

EG: my "don't order this meal again" entry will be tied to the Bob's Bistro record it pertains to (along with other entries like "there's better parking in the back" or "remember you have a coupon")

✅ Features allowing for each entry to become actionable. So when I go back to Bob's Bistro, MYNDIFY can remind me (automatically) not to order that meal again.

✅ AI generated answers to our questions. With MYNDIFY's Inky chatbot, you can get answers to questions like "What was the name of the place I took the kids apple picking?" or "Which of my friends is vegan?".


These are just some of the many features MYNDIFY has!


I, along with some of the other early adopters, are obsessed with how useful it is. I absolutely LOVE getting reminders like what to ask the doctor about during our pediatric visits. What about you? How useful is your notes app? What would you love to get reminders for?

Hey Product Hunt community! 👋

I'm Ryan G. Cox, the founder of SELECTY, and am thrilled to introduce the DB-agnostic sidecar query assistant that's set to transform your data querying experience.

As data professionals, we often grapple with:

- Time-consuming query writing and debugging.
- Adapting to unfamiliar database schemas.

Selecty addresses these challenges head-on by providing an intuitive Workspace where you can:

- Generate queries from simple English prompts.
- Explain and understand complex queries effortlessly.
- Optimize and iterate as your use cases change.
- Format for consistency.

name: Amazon Nova Act
description: Amazon Nova Act is an AI model enabling agents to control browsers reliably. Build automations via the SDK using atomic commands, Python, & APIs.

node.body:
Hi everyone!

Amazon joins the agent competition! 

Sharing Amazon Nova Act, a new AI model (currently in research preview) from Amazon's AGI lab. This model is designed to power agents that can reliably take actions inside a web browser.

While many AI agents struggle with complex web tasks, Nova Act focuses on reliable building blocks. Developers can use the associated Nova Act SDK to leverage the model, breaking down workflows into dependable "atomic" commands (like filling forms or picking dates). The SDK also allows combining these AI-driven commands with custom Python code, API calls, or direct Playwright manipulation for more control.

Key aspects:

🤖 Powers Browser Agents: The underlying AI model for web automation.
✅ Focus on Reliability: Designed for accurate execution of individual web interaction steps (claims >90% on internal tests).
💻 SDK for Developers: The primary way to build with Nova Act right now, offering fine-grained control.
📊 Strong Benchmarks: Amazon reports strong performance on UI interaction benchmarks like ScreenSpot and GroundUI Web.
🔬 Research Preview: This is an early release for experimentation.

Amazon sees this focus on reliable building blocks as key for future agent capabilities.

Congrats on the launch guys!
Looks very interesting - we'll be testing to see if we can run this on top of Webfuse! You can then basically automate actions on any website - without the need for user to install anything.

name: Webfuse
description: Instantly extend, automate & share any web session. Create a Virtual Web Session to instantly embed new features into any web app. Integrate AI-driven automation and real-time collaboration all without changing the original application.

node.body: like the idea! Can the URL be whitelabelled so it isn't webfuse but a custom URL? I'm assuming arbitrary JS can be executed in the session (just like in a browser extejsion)? ... btw your doc link is broken.

👋 Hey Product Hunt!

I’m the founder of Surfly, where we’ve been building co-browsing technology since 2012. Over the last decade, we’ve helped companies enable real-time collaboration on the web. As part of co-browsing, you need to be able to share any web session. To do that, we built a technology that can take any existing web application and turn it into a virtual session — one that’s shareable, customizable, and collaborative. That underlying capability ended up being our biggest breakthrough.


Why we’re launching Webfuse


Over the years, we’ve seen a few of our most creative customers build incredible tools on top of our tech. They used it to translate legacy applications in real time, sandbox existing web application for privacy, inject new UI into legacy tools, and even power AI-driven assistants that run inside existing web apps.


We always wanted to explore this potential further — but we weren’t ready. the technology wasn’t mature enough to open up broadly. So we focused on a small group of customers, iterated quietly… and now, we’re finally ready to share what we’ve built with the world. Introducing Webfuse — world's first Web Augmentation Platform.



Why nobody else has done this


Until now, your options for modifying existing web apps were limited to:

  • 🔌 Browser extensions (local, requires installation)

    • eg: @Plasmo @ExtensionPay @Sider: AI Research Agent & Extension @Cloaked @Merlin - ChatGPT powered chrome extension (Cmd+M) @Frase @Monica @Subtly @Factory Confirm by Sourcify , ...

  • 🌐 Remote browsers (lower quality as you are streaming pixels)

  • 🛠️ CDN/Edge code injection (requires infrastructure control)

But Webfuse is different. We rewrite the application in real-time and run it in a controlled environment — one where we can change, monitor, and extend it as needed. It’s a technically complex problem, especially with how fast the web evolves — but after 10+ years of experience building in this space, we’ve finally cracked it.



How it works


Webfuse wraps any existing web application in a thin virtualization layer — a “virtual session” — where everything can be customized without touching the original source. Once you sign up, you can create a SPACE, which is essentially a smart, shareable link that opens a set of virtualized web apps. From there, you can:

  • Modify the UI

  • Add security/authentication

  • Inject automation

  • Record & monitor sessions

  • Share with others (like multiplayer mode for any app)

All without needing source code access.



Features

  • 🔐 Security Layers – Add auth, HTTP-only cookie isolation, audit logs

  • 📹 Session Recording – Full video streams of interactions

  • 📈 Monitoring & Logs – Real-time JSON-based session audit trail

  • 🤖 Automation – Remote control API for bots and agents

  • 🤝 Collaboration – Share sessions with multiple users in real-time

  • 🎥 Video Chat – Add video calls to any web app

  • 🧩 Custom Extensions – Build and inject your own logic using a browser-extension-like API

Why Webfuse is unique


Webfuse enables a new category: Web Augmentation. Instead of building a new app from scratch or waiting for vendors to release features, you can build on top of what already exists — instantly. You can even turn browser extensions into managed SaaS tools without client-side installs. Whether you're a developer, founder, automator, or hacker — this is your canvas to remix the web.



Our roadmap

We’re just getting started. Right now, Webfuse supports the basics of the browser extension API. Based on your feedback, we’ll expand the capabilities, improve performance, and build a full ecosystem around this idea — including:

  • Extension marketplace

  • No-code UI builder

  • AI assistants integration

  • Private cloud deployment

Join us early — let’s build together


We’re offering $100 in credits for Product Hunt users. Just sign up with this link: https://webfuse.com/studio/?utm_campaign=PH100CREDITS


We’d love to hear what you’ll build with Webfuse!


👉 https://www.webfuse.com

📚 Docs: https://docs.webfuse.com/webfuse/introduction/


I’ll be hanging out in the comments all day — AMA 🙌

I wish I had found something like this months ago when I was struggling with all those browser extensions that kept breaking after updates lol. Compared to Plasmo and other extension frameworks I have tried, Webfuse seems more intelligent and flexible. Also, the virtual session approach is brilliant. Super excited to use this!


Congratulations on the launch!

name: Marauder Bot
description: Marauder Bot is a stealth Chrome extension that tackles online technical questions instantly, empowering you to save time on interview prep and focus on solving real-world problems.

node.body: Marauder Bot is a Chrome extension that functions on most webpages. When you click the Marauder Bot icon, a Chrome side panel opens and lists all currently open webpages, including those from the same browser window as the side panel and from different browser windows. You can select the webpage you want to analyze, choose the question type (multiple choice or algorithm), and Marauder Bot will show you the answers.

Hey Product Hunt!


I'm excited to launch Marauder Bot - a Chrome extension that solves online technical questions instantly.


What it does

  • Marauder Bot extracts algorithm and multiple choice questions from webpages, and solves them with AI.

  • It handles image-based questions automatically by OCR.

  • It operates stealthily on side panel or separate window, and remains invisible even during screen sharing.

Why we built it

Technical interviews often test arbitrary skills rather than real engineering talent. Engineers spend tens or even hundreds of hours on coding platforms practicing and memorizing algorithm puzzles that rarely appear in real work. The name Marauder Bot is inspired by the Marauder's Map from Harry Potter, a tool created by four rebellious students to secretly navigate Hogwarts. Just like the Map, Marauder Bot helps you break free from the nonsense of meaningless, outdated technical assessments. In the age of AI, there is no point in grinding useless algorithms. Marauder Bot is here to level the playing field and empower you to focus on what truly matters: getting the job and solving real-world problems.


Extra features

  • Custom shortcut. Trigger analysis by customizable hotkeys, zero click needed.

  • Advanced AI models. Choose among GPT-4o, Claude 3.7 Sonnet, and Gemini 2.5 Pro.

  • Comprehensive analysis. Marauder Bot provides not only the solution, but detailed comments in the code, unit test cases, as well as time and space complexity analyses.

name: blissio.ai
description: Blissio.ai is a mobile app that uses AI to help you reclaim your time and build a mindful relationship with your phone. Block distracting apps, reduce screen time, and enjoy offline alternatives tailored to your goals. Live beyond the screen with blissio.ai!

node.body:
9 months ago, I quit my 6-year role at a startup. I felt lost and didn’t know what I was going to do with my life. One evening, I realized I had no time left in my day anymore, and something had changed. I was holding my iPhone 15 Pro Max, and I couldn’t understand why I was spending so much more time on it compared to my old slow Android phone. This phone was different. The shimmering colors on the screen invited me to keep using it, and everything was buttery smooth. Apps on the main screens were all bright and colorful, making it so easy to engage with.

I started thinking about how things were when I had my old Samsung my battery would die every 3-4 hours. Yet now, with this iPhone, I found myself constantly plugged in. It dawned on me that I didn’t even know screen time existed. On the iPhone, it’s buried somewhere hard to find, almost as if they were hiding it. It looked like something from the 1990s an old graph, nothing like the sleek and beautiful health app graphs they charge for.

That’s when I began digging deeper into how social media uses behavioral psychology to manipulate us. I learned how they employed thousands of psychologists to make their platforms as addictive as possible. One simple example? The little circles at the end of a story showing who viewed it. Suddenly, you're in the middle of doing something, but you want to check who saw your story. The pressure mounts, especially when you're somewhere expensive like traveling and you feel like you have to post about it. You’re not posting for you; you’re posting to be the mule for your friends who can’t live the life you’re living.

As someone who got into coding to build the life I wanted, I started noticing how the addiction to these platforms was making everyone else miss out on the real world. On a train, I saw 9 out of 10 people doomscrolling. Kids waking up, stuck on their phones all weekend. It hit me: I hated everything about social media.

I decided the next product I needed to create had to be about data science and AI, combining both passions to create something that could help people regain control of their time. That’s how Blissio.ai was born.

Blissio.ai is a personalized digital wellness tool. It asks simple questions like your age, profession, and hobbies, and based on those, it creates focus sessions tailored specifically for you. We block apps based on what you need, whether for work, your hobbies, or age group. This way, we’re not arbitrarily blocking things, but helping you focus on what matters most.

I’m so excited to share this with you all! How do you manage your screen time? Would love to hear your thoughts below! 👇

I’ve been using Blissio.ai for a few weeks now, and I’m really impressed with how it helps me manage my phone usage and boost productivity. The personalized focus sessions are amazing, and I love that I can block distracting apps when I need to concentrate. It’s the perfect tool for anyone looking to take back control of their time and reduce phone addiction.

The app is super easy to use, and the AI-driven features are a great touch. I’ve noticed significant improvements in my ability to stay focused and balance my digital habits. Highly recommend it to anyone struggling with screen time and productivity!

Keep up the great work, Blissio.ai team

Not from repairs or apps but from lost opportunities. The 1,152 hours I spent mindlessly scrolling? That was billable time as a freelance designer. The 3am doom scrolling sessions? They became client delays with penalty fees.

Then blissio.ai showed me the receipts:

  • "You spent 11 hours last week just reopening Instagram"

  • "These 23 late-night TikTok sessions shortened your sleep by 14%"

  • "Your 'quick checks' add up to 19 full workdays per year"

Suddenly, blocking apps wasn’t about willpower – it was a financial survival tactic.

Now I’ve reclaimed 31 productive hours/month, landed two new clients, and finally took that photography course (with my phone helping instead of hijacking me).

blissio.ai isn’t just another blocker it’s the forensic accountant of your screen time, exposing the hidden costs of distraction so you can invest your attention wisely.

name: llms-txt.io
description: Generate LLMS.txt files for your websites, for FREE. Help AI systems better understand your content with the new standard for LLM-friendly documentation.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt! I'm excited to introduce llms-txt.io today.

❓ WHAT IS LLMS.TXT?

AI systems like Claude and ChatGPT are becoming more and more important for retrieving information from websites, and bringing traffic to YOUR website.

But, these systems often struggle to understand website structure and content due to limited context windows.

llms.txt solves this by providing a standardized way for websites to present their content in an AI-friendly format — think of it as robots.txt but specifically designed for large language models.

🔑 LLMS-TXT.IO

Our free generator makes it easy (and free) to create these files for any website.

Just enter your URL, and we'll generate both the basic navigation structure (llms.txt) and full content version (llms-full.txt).

❤️ YOU

We would love your support, feedback and questions!
AI is being used more and more instead of search engines so optimizing your websites for it is vital. Congrats on the launch, it's very easy to use.

Hello Product Hunt 👋

I’m Gaurav, founder of Purple Leaf, and I’m excited to introduce you to our platform! Purple Leaf is designed to make social media content creation easier and more efficient. Instead of spending hours brainstorming and writing posts, you can simply let our AI pull content directly from your website and create high-quality posts for you. Whether you’re a SaaS company, an e-commerce business, or a content creator, Purple Leaf does the heavy lifting when it comes to crafting social media posts that engage your audience.


I started Purple Leaf to solve a common problem: the time-consuming and repetitive process of generating social media content. As someone who has worked with different websites, I realized that content creation could be automated, saving hours of manual work. Purple Leaf automatically analyzes your website’s content and transforms it into compelling social media posts tailored to each platform. Plus, we offer an easy-to-use content calendar to help you plan your posts seamlessly.


Our core belief is simple: If the intent of social media marketing is to bring more traffic to your website, why look for inspiration elsewhere? Why not leverage the content that is already there? Purple Leaf taps into your existing content to generate posts that drive traffic back to your website, making the process both efficient and impactful.


Our goal is straightforward—help you spend less time creating content and more time growing your brand. If you're ready to take the guesswork out of social media and start creating impactful posts effortlessly, give Purple Leaf a try!

name: Abstractify
description: Abstractify is a Chrome extension for academics. Ask questions, extract citations, and organize insights instantly. It also detects biases, visualises topic trends, and composes interactive citation networks, making research faster and more intuitive.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt,

I’m excited to introduce Abstractify—a Chrome extension designed to make academic research faster, clearer, and more structured.


Most research tools are either too complex or too generic. AI-powered assistants often misinterpret academic content, and managing citations, summaries, and deep analysis across multiple tools is frustrating. Abstractify brings everything together in one place, right in your browser.

🔎 What Makes Abstractify Different?

Tailored for Academia 
Unlike general-purpose tools, Abstractify is built with academic research in mind, offering task-specific configurations that provide more nuanced and relevant insights.

10+ Research-Specific Tasks 
A focused set of tools for common research challenges: 

✔️ Visualising topic and citation trends
✔️ Mapping connected papers via semantic and citation relationships
✔️ Crafting deep research reports informed by real web sources
✔️ Summarizing complex papers 
✔️ Paraphrasing tricky sections 
✔️ Extracting citations 
✔️ Comparing documents side-by-side 
✔️ Identifying biases and limitations 
✔️ Generating research ideas and highlighting key conclusions 
✔️ Proposing further reading suggestions

Browser Context Awareness 
Abstractify works directly in your browser, analyzing content in real-time so you don’t have to copy-paste or switch tabs constantly.

Extended Input Capacity
Handles up to 60k tokens, so it can process long and complex research papers without hitting token limits.

Direct Academic Database Integration 
Integrated access to resources like OpenAlex makes sourcing references and citations easier than ever.

🚀 Coming Soon: More Personalization – Abstractify will adapt to your field and interests, surfacing the most relevant insights for your work.

Abstractify is designed to be a streamlined yet powerful research tool—no clutter, no unnecessary complexity, just the core features you need to make research more efficient. It’s a personal project driven by my own experience with academic work, and I’m excited to keep improving it.

Would love to hear your thoughts; what works, what doesn’t, and what you’d like to see next!

Cheers, 
Carolina

node.body: Hey Product Hunt, I'm Aditya, founder of Limeblock! 👋 For the past few months, I've been building multiple startups with completely different goals, users, and purposes --- but I always had a 𝒄𝒐𝒎𝒎𝒐𝒏 𝒑𝒓𝒐𝒃𝒍𝒆𝒎 across all of these startups... 🫠 The Problem SaaS, websites, blogs, apps, games, and other tech include so many features and components that make them great. However, instead of empowering their users, most of these modern, high-powered apps cause users to become confused and lost. The average user, especially a new one, has a low attention span, isn't an expert with your app, and doesn't care about it—causing them to click away or leave your app as soon as they can't figure something out. ✨ What is Limeblock A common solution to this problem is a chatbot widget - there's one on ProductHunt too! But Limeblock does something more than just direct users to what they should be doing; Limeblock does that action for them. Whether it be something tedious like writing this post or as simple as changing emails in settings, Limeblock allows users to commit any in-app action, page navigation, or API fetch in just a click using AI-generated schemas to send to your backend endpoints. name: purposewrite
description: Write quality content that truly resonates with your target audience. Guides you through strategic content creation: generating fresh ideas while maintaining your brand's voice, ensuring every piece you create is impactful and aligned with your goals.

node.body:
Frustrated by Generic AI Content? So was I.


Hey everyone! I'm thrilled to finally share purposewrite with you all.

As someone who runs a content production company, I was getting increasingly frustrated by the flood of generic AI content out there. You know, the kind that adds no real value to the reader or the poster. I wanted something different—something that helps you come up with genuinely good content ideas and guides you to write in a strategic way that brings true value to your audience. That's how purposewrite was born.


Why purposewrite?

I wanted a tool that doesn't just churn out text but actually helps you think. purposewrite is your intelligent writing companion. It guides you through the strategic questions that turn good writing into great content. Whether you're building your personal brand or writing for a corporate one, purposewrite ensures every piece you write hits the mark.


Key Features You'll Love

  • Strategic Guidance: Helps you generate fresh content ideas that resonate with your audience.

  • Brand Voice Alignment: Ensures every piece aligns with your unique brand voice.

  • Custom Templates: Create templates for regular tasks and build brand voice guides.

  • AI-Driven Insights: Analyze successful content for insights and maintain consistent quality.



Exciting Times Ahead


I'm genuinely excited about what purposewrite can do for content creators like you. It's not just about writing; it's about writing with purpose. So, dive in, explore, and let me know what you think.


Thanks for being part of this journey. Let's make content creation smarter and more meaningful together! 😊 



Let's Build This Together


purposewrite is just getting started. We're planning to add more Guides (the mini apps inside purposewrite) and new features. And here's where you come in—I’d love to hear your thoughts, questions, or suggestions. 


What Guides or features would you like to see? Your feedback will help shape the future of purposewrite.

Hey PH fam 👋


Super excited to introduce purposewrite to the community today - a radically different and better copy tool for anyone frustrated by the flood of generic AI content out there!


Why does so much AI content feel like slop? Simple:

→ Zero strategic thinking behind the writing

→ Tools that don't ask curiosity-driven questions

→ Obsession with speed over substance - publishing quickly even if it sounds generic


purposewrite flips the script completely! Its Guides (mini-apps inside the platform) are a HUGE differentiator, offering interesting questions that help you understand your true motivation behind each content piece and providing necessary guardrails for the LLMs.


I've been testing this tool for weeks, and it's completely transformed how I approach content creation. Instead of just churning out text, purposewrite actually helps you think strategically about what you're writing. 🧠✨


Here's what purposewrite delivers (that’s quite unique):


→ Strategic Guidance: Content that CONVERTS because it actually resonates with real humans

→ Brand Voice Protection: Never sound like everyone else again (unless being forgettable is your strategy)

→ Custom Templates: Cut your production time in HALF while DOUBLING your quality (do the math on that ROI)

As someone who creates content regularly, I love how purposewrite focuses on purpose over production. It's not just about writing; it's about writing with purpose!


The founder @petter_magnusson built this out of genuine frustration with the current state of AI writing tools. They wanted something that enhances your creative process while keeping your authentic voice intact - and they've absolutely delivered! 💯

node.body:
👋 Hey Product Hunt Fam!

I’m Gaurav — co-founder of Infographics.so, and today I’m super excited to launch our AI-powered infographic maker with this amazing community.


🧠 Why we built Infographics.so

As a growth marketer and founder working across multiple startups, I constantly found myself needing to turn complex information into simple, shareable visuals. But every time I opened a design tool, I either:

  • spent hours tweaking layouts manually, or

  • gave up and used a bland template that didn’t quite fit the story.

So… we decided to fix that.


🎯 Introducing Infographics AI
The fastest way to turn your raw ideas into clean, professional infographics — without ever opening a design file or spending hours editing a pre-defined template.


Unlike other tools that rely heavily on rigid templates, Infographics.so understands your content and suggests the best-suited visual for it — fully customizable to your brand.

You can tweak layouts, icons, fonts, and colors, and even build your own custom design styles — all without starting from scratch.


And yes — it’s fully mobile optimized so you can create, edit, and share your infographics on the go.


✨ Key Highlights:

  • 🧠 From Text to Visual in Seconds – Paste your content and let our AI suggest a beautifully structured layout instantly.

  • 🎨 Custom Design Freedom – Not stuck with fixed templates. Build your unique visual style through our flexible canvas editor.

  • 📦 Export in SVG & PNG – High-quality exports for LinkedIn, X, decks, reports, blogs — wherever your audience is.

  • 🧩 Chrome Extension + Plugins (Coming Soon) – Turn anything you find online into an infographic without leaving your browser. More plugins for tools like Notion, Google Docs, and others coming soon!

👥 Who is it for?

  • Marketers creating scroll-stopping carousels

  • Founders designing pitch decks & product explainers

  • Educators simplifying complex concepts visually

  • Writers & bloggers breaking the text wall with strong visuals

🙏 Your feedback means the world
We’re building this in public — and would love to hear from you: → What types of visuals do you create most often?

name: Marketplace for Claude
description: Securely connect Claude Desktop to your favorite apps (Notion, Slack, Airtable, etc.) in under 90 seconds. Empower LLM to take action on your behalf, automate routine tasks, and streamline workflows. Unlock AI's full potential and boost your productivity.

node.body:
Hey, Product Hunt!


I'm pumped to launch Marketplace for Claude today! There’s been a lot of excitement surrounding MCPs recently, along with several notable launches. Despite all the progress and collaboration, MCPs still primarily cater to geeks and engineers. Regular, non-technical users cannot handle the complexity of discovering, installing, and managing a single MCP server.


As a heavy user of AI and a big fan of agentic coding tools like Cline, Cursor, and WindSurf, I believe that everyday users (typical information workers) should have the same capabilities but with regular LLM apps like Claude acting as their agents and their everyday apps serving as tools.


Eliminating all the complexity and developing a secure, effortless solution for connecting Claude to various productivity apps took some time, but here it is. Meet WayStation and Marketplace for Claude powered by it!


I've seen businesses struggle to unlock AI’s full potential—stuck in walled gardens, facing hard-to-use integrations, and dealing with vendor lock-in. I created WayStation to solve this: a no-code hub that seamlessly links powerful AI (ChatGPT, Claude) to your daily productivity apps, making automation simple, secure, and truly accessible.


I'd love to hear your thoughts, feedback, or any questions—I'll be here all day!


Let's make AI work for everyone! 🚀
Exactly what we need! Thank you, folks🙏

name: MappingSpace ALM
description: MappingSpace ALM provides an AI-powered solution that meets the V-model R&D process requirements for manufacturing while integrating the best practices of agile development. It satisfies the quality regulatory standards such as ASPICE, IEC61508, DO178C, etc.

node.body: I have found that MappingSpace ALM has many AIGC capabilities, such as AI-generated system requirement management documents and design diagrams in requirement management, and AI-generated test documentation and test cases in test management. Can MappingSpace ALM completely replace Polarion and codebeamer?

MappingSpace, as an AI-powered automotive R&D management platform, strikes a balance between Agile efficiency and ASPICE compliance. Its core strengths lie in three dimensions: First, AI-driven generation of requirements, test cases, and architectural designs liberates engineers from repetitive tasks. Second, the mind map-based V-Model traceability ensures atomic-level alignment across requirements, design, and testing, meeting ASPICE’s rigorous standards. Third, deep integrations with GitLab CI/CD and eolink API testing close the loop from code review to automated validation. With toolchain consolidation and localization capabilities (e.g., domestic ecosystem certifications), it offers a lightweight solution for mid-sized automakers navigating digital transformation under cost and regulatory pressures.

MappingSpace revolutionizes ALM by integrating AI-driven agility, precision, and cost efficiency, particularly in automotive, semiconductor, and robotics industries. It replaces static tools like Polarion with a dynamic mind-mapping interface for visualizing requirement interdependencies, enabling real-time collaboration.


AI validates requirements, resolves ambiguities, and auto-generates test cases/architecture diagrams, boosting test coverage from 67% to 92%. Its NLP-powered traceability matrix dynamically aligns requirements with test scripts, reducing ASPICE review cycles by 80% despite frequent changes.


The platform enables granular workflow customization, automated triggers for task assignments/baseline locks, and coverage detection to ensure ASPICE compliance without manual intervention. Multi-dimensional dashboards visualize metrics (bug severity, task completion) and support root-cause analysis via node-specific filters, while state duration reports benchmark timelines for process optimization. AI tools include a Smart Compliance Assistant for audit-ready documentation, knowledge graphs to reduce redundancy by 60% via reusable requirements, and self-healing traceability for auto-updated test mappings.


Built for scalability, its cloud-native architecture handles large datasets with minimal latency, integrates with Feishu/DingTalk for real-time collaboration, and disrupts costs via perpetual free licenses for strategic industries.


By addressing legacy ALM limitations—rigid workflows, poor traceability, high costs—MappingSpace empowers ASPICE compliance, accelerates software-defined innovation, and optimizes resource allocation, positioning it as a strategic enabler for digital transformation.

name: Second Brain
description: Second Brain is a powerful knowledge management system that helps you organize, track, and analyze your conversations and meetings with AI-powered insights.

node.body:
Meetings and calls are a vital part of my everyday journey. On average, I have around 2-6 calls per day. Alongside that, I take up other tasks and meet a lot of people. And sometimes, my brain just can’t handle it all together - it explodes, giving me a headache.

To keep track of meeting notes and activities that need my future attention, I started using Google Keep. At some point, it felt overwhelming, so I switched to Notion. But I hit my breakpoint when I had too much to sift through while searching for something important, and Notion’s pricing plans didn’t help either.

𝗦𝗼, 𝗜 𝗳𝗶𝗻𝗮𝗹𝗹𝘆 𝗯𝘂𝗶𝗹𝘁 𝗺𝘆 𝗦𝗲𝗰𝗼𝗻𝗱 𝗕𝗿𝗮𝗶𝗻.

A place where I can store notes and organize them exactly the way I want. And even better - I can chat with my notes to clear my queries.

It follows a Master - Daughter - Entry format: 

Let’s say you're a Startup Founder using this tool. You can create Master Threads as major categories for your activities - like Sales & Partnerships, Marketing Team, User Feedback & Insights, etc.

Under each Master Thread, you can create Daughter Threads to categorize information further. For example, under User Feedback & Insights, I have subcategories like Customizable Dashboard Requested, Early User Feedback, and more.

Within each Daughter Thread, I add entries. For instance, under the user feedback category "Request for Mobile App," I log all feedback related to that request.

This architecture not only helps me stay organized but also allows me to chat with my notes using AI. Before a call, I just hit the ‘Get Synopsis’ button, and it gives me a summary of all relevant entries.

Until last week, in the application, I was using GPT-3.5 Turbo and Gemini 2.0 for personal AI purposes. And then, I decided to turn this tool into something everyone can use - allowing users to enter their Gemini API Key and unlock AI features.

This is such a relatable problem, and I love how you’ve approached it. The Master–Daughter–Entry structure feels like a smart way to manage context without things getting buried, which happens way too easily in tools like Notion.

The ability to chat with your notes and get a quick synopsis before a call is a game changer, especially for people juggling multiple teams or projects each day. Also really cool that you're giving users the option to plug in their own API keys for Gemini.


Congrats on turning something personal into a product others can benefit from. Wishing you lots of traction and great feedback ahead!

node.body: Howdy! 🤠 As far as we're concerned, the whole job market is severely lacking at the moment. Recruiters have helped to alleviate this problem for the hiring side, but recruiters are **expensive** and **slow** and nowadays most of what they do can be automated. As a hiring manager, all you need to do is chat with Savvy and wait for final interviews with highly qualified and interested to role in. If this is a problem you can relate to, if you want to directly help revolutionize the recruitment industry, or if you just want to support us in our journey, please leave a comment, upvote, and share this product! We really appreciate it! Feel free to shoot me an email at ben@trysavvy.co if you have any other questions or feedback! I look forward to what's next! 🤠

name: LLM Model Explorer & Recommender
description: Comparing LLM models is hard—so we built an interactive table and AI chat agent to simplify finding the right one. Filter by capabilities, cost, and more, or let our Model Recommender guide you to the perfect match. Built for us, shared with everyone.

node.body:
Comparing LLM models is tricky. Prices shift, models update, and deprecations occur constantly—our spreadsheet solution quickly became unmanageable.

To simplify, we built a straightforward tool which we are making available today to all. It has two components:

1. Interactive Model Explorer Table: Easily filter and search to identify the right models based on cost and capabilities. It has the following data about each model and hosting platform: vendor, hosting platform, model name, description, input price, output price, max context window, max response length, thinking support, text in support, image in support, audio in support, text out support, image out support, audio out support, training cutoff date, last checked date (by us), supported languages


2. LLM Model Recommender AI Chat Agent: Leveraging our experience, it asks targeted questions to recommend models suitable to your use case. We use our data, combined with our decision making process for model suitability and selection.


We know you can download the data in the table; but be aware how dynamic this data is, so use care. In fact, its so dynamic with pricing changes and new models that we suggest use this tool for guidance and narrowing options. We do our best though, and use and maintain it daily.

And we sure would appreciate any feedback or comments you have to make it more useful (there is a "contact us" button on the bottom right of the page), and if you would share it with others you think could benefit.

Troy and Chris

name: OWL
description: 🦉 OWL from CAMEL-AI, is the open-source multi-agent framework for automating real-world tasks. Features dynamic collaboration, 30+ toolkits & ranks #1 among open-source frameworks on GAIA.

node.body:
Hi everyone!

Sharing OWL from the CAMEL-AI team – an impressive open-source framework for building multi-agent AI systems that collaborate to automate real-world tasks.

Unlike single autonomous agents, OWL focuses on dynamic interaction between multiple specialized agents to tackle complex workflows. This means specialized AI agents can work together dynamically to handle complex processes. It's positioned as a powerful open answer to some of the closed agent systems generating buzz lately.

Key aspects:

🤝 Multi-Agent Collaboration is the core focus, enabling AI agents to work together effectively.
🧰 Over 30 extensive toolkits are included, covering web search, browser automation, multimodal processing, code execution, MCP, and many more.
🤖 Flexible model support allows using various models (GPT-4o, Claude, Qwen, DeepSeek) and local deployment via Ollama, vLLM, etc.
🏆 It ranks #1 among open-source general agent frameworks on the GAIA benchmark, demonstrating strong capabilities.
🌐 A Gradio web interface and easy Docker setup are included for accessibility.
🔓 The codebase is fully open source under the Apache 2.0 license for use and contribution.

Built on the CAMEL-AI framework, OWL offers a powerful and accessible way to start building sophisticated multi-agent applications.
OWL sounds like a bold step toward more collaborative and capable AI ecosystems. Love that it’s open-source and focused on real-world workflows rather than just isolated tasks.

name: vkncy
description: vkncy is an AI-powered CV screening tool that ranks applicants using an Elo-style system. Every new CV competes against others in head-to-head battles, dynamically adjusting rankings to surface top candidates automatically.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt community! 👋

I'm Shamil, and this is my first-ever launch on Product Hunt!

As someone who’s been on both sides of the hiring table—job seeker and recruiter—I’ve always felt there’s a smarter, fairer way to handle the hiring process. That’s what inspired me to build vkncy.

I have a big vision for vkncy:
An AI-powered hiring assistant that handles everything — from screening to scheduling the final interview with top candidates.

Today, I’m excited to share the first step toward that vision.

🚀 CV Battle is an AI-driven screening tool where CVs compete in head-to-head "battles" using an Elo-style ranking system ♟️.

Here’s how it works:

  1. Every CV is first analyzed and given an initial score.

  2. Then it’s compared in 1v1 “battles” with randomly selected candidates who already applied.

  3. If it “wins,” it gets an Elo boost. If it loses, the score drops.


This creates a dynamic, constantly evolving ranking of applicants for each job — no manual sorting needed.

Right now, you can try it out for free with 1 job post and see how it works.

Would love to hear your thoughts — on both the product and the vision! 🙏


Find me on Twitter/X if you want to connect 💬

name: Vibe Draw
description: Vibe Draw is an open-source Sketch-to-3D tool. AI refines your drawings, turns them into 3D models, lets you build scenes, and exports asglTF.

node.body:
Hi everyone!

Sharing Vibe Draw, a cool open-source tool (AGPL license) that makes 3D creation feel more intuitive. It basically lets you sketch out ideas in 2D and then uses AI to turn them into 3D models and build entire worlds.

The workflow is really straightforward: you start with a rough sketch, hit an "Improve Drawing" button for the AI to clean it up, and then click "Make 3D." You can build scenes by adding multiple models, tweak them further with more sketches or even text prompts, and finally export the result as a standard .glTF file. The whole process seems designed to be quite fast.

It aims to lower the barrier for 3D creation, focusing more on getting your ideas out there than on complex technical skills. Keep in mind you'll need your own API keys for the underlying AI models (like Claude, Gemini, etc.) to run it locally.

name: Science Search
description: Select any text or video and get an AI-curated research summary with the most relevant academic papers that best match your query.

node.body:
Science Search is your free AI research companion that instantly connects everyday reading and video content to academic knowledge. Whether you're exploring an article, watching YouTube videos, checking facts, or diving deep into research, Science Search helps you discover relevant scientific papers and insights with just one click.

Key Features:
🔍 Instant Access to Science
Select any text while browsing to get AI-curated research from relevant academic papers, powered by Semantic Scholar's vast database of over 200 million publications from leading publishers like arXiv, Springer Nature, Wiley, PubMed, and IEEE.

🎬 Video Transcript Research
Extract valuable knowledge from YouTube videos by selecting specific segments directly on the progress bar. Simply click and drag across any portion of a video to instantly access the transcript content for academic citations and research purposes.

🤖 AI Knowledge Assistant
Ask questions about any topic and get research-backed answers drawn from peer-reviewed academic sources. Science Search analyzes your queries using advanced Machine Learning to deliver the most relevant scientific insights.

📚 Smart Research Management (coming soon)
Build your personal knowledge base by saving papers and insights as you explore, creating an organized collection of scientific discoveries for future reference.

Seamless Accessibility:
• Works instantly on any webpage, PDF, or YouTube video
• Customizable site preferences and domain filters
• Compatible with all chromium-based browsers

Perfect for:
• Casual readers seeking scientific context
• Students verifying information or citing video content
• Researchers streamlining literature reviews
• Anyone curious about the science behind what they read or watch

🌍 Science Search is and will always remain free, counting on collective contributions to ensure curiosity will never be limited by access to knowledge.

Hi everyone,


I recently developed a browser extension that I think might be useful for both casual science enthusiasts and academic researchers. It helps you explore scientific literature behind any text you're reading or Youtube video you're watching.


The extension gives you a distilled summary of the key findings and links to the papers, making it easier to dig deeper into topics that interest you or verify claims with academic sources. Just select a text or a segment of a YouTube video, and it finds relevant academic papers from Semantic Scholar's database (covering arXiv, Springer Nature, PubMed, IEEE, etc.).


If this sounds like something that could benefit the way you consume online content or your research workflow, feel free to check it out. I'd love to hear any feedback or suggestions you might have to improve it further.


Thanks!

name: Ai2 Paper Finder
description: Ai2 Paper Finder is the LLM-powered literature search that mimics the human research process. Uses iterative search and reasoning to find hard-to-find papers beyond keywords.

node.body:
Hi everyone!

Sharing Ai2 Paper Finder, a new LLM-powered tool from the Allen Institute for AI (Ai2) for academic literature search. What's interesting is its approach: it tries to mimic how a human researcher actually finds papers, going beyond simple keyword matching.

Instead of just returning results, Paper Finder:

  1. Analyzes your natural language query.

  2. Plans a search strategy.

  3. Iteratively Searches: Runs queries, follows citations, evaluates results.

  4. Refines: Uses findings to run follow-up queries.

  5. Summarizes: Presents relevant papers with explanations of why they match your specific need.

The goal is to surface those hard-to-find, niche papers that basic search often misses, especially when you have a complex research question. It uses LLMs throughout the process for analysis, planning, and judging relevance.  

See what insightful stuff you can find with Ai2 Paper Finder!

Ai2 Paper Finder sounds like a thoughtful leap forward for academic search, bringing nuance and context to a space that’s often too rigid. Excited to see how it improves discovery for researchers digging deep into complex topics.

After some market research and talking to podcast hosts, I figured out that there's no app out there helping them save this effort. One podcast host said that she managed to reduce 4 hours to 30 minutes with ChatGPT. Better! 😐

Now, imagine using these time savings for making more episodes. You could easily double the number of episodes produced annually! Don't believe my words? Use the savings calculator I built.


With PodcastPrepper you can do exactly that! All you have to do is pick your next guest with a little bit of context (e.g., their job title and location) and let PodcastPrepper handle the research so you can focus on creating engaging episodes!


During beta, reports are delivered within 24 hours into your email inbox, but they're actually generated in just 3 minutes! In the future, instant delivery will be available. Still, even with 24-hour delivery, how much effort do you need to put in? Zero! 👌


You might ask, what exactly do I get in each report? Each report covers the following areas:

  • Guest's background

  • Guest's current projects

  • Guest's notable contributions

name: AI Code Prep GUI
description: aicodeprep speeds up coding with AI! Right-click in Windows/Mac folders to auto-select code files, refine the list, and copy everything for ChatGPT, Claude & more. Saves time, reduces tokens, and keeps AI prompts clean. Available for Mac, Windows & Electron.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt! 🚀

I built aicodeprep to make working with AI coding assistants way smoother. Instead of copy-pasting code file by file, this tool auto-selects relevant files, lets you tweak the list, and copies everything in one click—saving time and reducing token waste and improves accuracy.

💡 Why use it?
✅ Right-click in Windows/Mac to instantly gather code whenever you need to ask an AI about your project
✅ Auto-skips unnecessary files (git, node_modules, minified CSS, etc.)
✅ Saves you money by reducing token usage in AI chats
✅ Works with ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and any other AI chat interface

We all use tools that try to automatically give the AI context but sometimes, they just don't work that well and you have to do it yourself to get better quality output. I built this for myself, and the "smart" auto-checkbox'ing of likely needed code files is to save time. Lots of other tools do a similar thing but all of them are command line only, and I love GUIs.

Would love your feedback! Let me know if you have any feature ideas or questions. 🚀🔥 
I have some new features in mind and am working on a better GUI experience but want some feedback :)

name: SCDA Facility Allocator
description: The SCDA Facility Allocator allows for optimal sales store and service facility allocation, taking into consideration spatial distribution of market demand, CAPEX and OPEX, and market reach by service facilitiy. Deployable on MS Windows.

node.body:
In its current version, the SCDA Facility Allocator takes into consideration the following user input:
- spatial market forecast, i.e. market demand by address (location, e.g. neighbourhood or city)
- candidate facilitiy list with investment need and operating expenses (rent), as well as capacity constraints
- average consumer tolerance with regards to distance to service facilitator

The SCDA Facility Allocator visualizes spatial demand distribution using maps and heatmaps, displaying results int he browser. Based on the available budget for facilitiy investments and operating expenses, the facility allocator furthermore decides on which facilities should be used - maximizing potential revenue subject to budgetary constraints.

Future version updates and upgrades are planned, including the following features:
- multi-tier networks, with supplier, distribution, and sales store facilities
- transport flow optimization
- deployment in the cloud

Currently, the app is deployable on MS Windows.

name: Project G-Assist
description: Project G-Assist is an AI assistant powered by your GeForce RTX PC that helps you tune and optimize your system.

node.body:
Hi everyone!

Sharing Project G-Assist from NVIDIA, an experimental AI assistant that runs locally on your GeForce RTX PC! Think of it as a co-pilot specifically for managing and optimizing your system, especially for gaming.

With simple voice or text commands, G-Assist can:

⚙️ Optimize System: Adjust performance and power settings.
🎮 Tweak Game Settings: Get help finding the best settings for your games.
📊 Monitor Performance: Chart FPS, latency, temps, and other stats in real-time.

💡 Control Peripherals: Change lighting on supported Logitech, Corsair, MSI, and Nanoleaf devices.  
❓ Answer PC Questions: Get info about your hardware or NVIDIA software.

It uses a Llama-based SLM (8B parameters) running on your own GPU, making it responsive, free, and offline-capable. It's not meant to be a general chatbot like ChatGPT, but focused specifically on PC control and info.

What's particularly interesting is the plugin architecture. NVIDIA has released tools on GitHub for the community to build and share new functionalities for G-Assist (using Python or C++). They even provide a ChatGPT-powered "Plugin Builder" to help create them!  

It's available now as an experimental feature via the NVIDIA App (initially for desktop RTX GPUs).
More dyslexia-friendly fonts and an improved Dyslexia Ruler show a real commitment to accessibility. Reading should be easy for everyone.
Optimizing my PC with AI? Count me in! 😄

name: TxGemma
description: TxGemma is the open model based on Google's Gemma 2, specialized for therapeutics development. Predict molecule properties, analyze data, or chat about results. Available on HF & Vertex AI.

node.body:
Hi everyone!

Sharing TxGemma, a new family of open models from Google DeepMind, built on Gemma 2 and specifically designed to accelerate therapeutics development. This aims to tackle the slow, expensive drug discovery process using specialized AI.  

TxGemma comes in two flavors and multiple sizes (2B, 9B, 27B):

  1. TxGemma-Predic focuses on tasks like predicting molecule properties (toxicity, binding affinity, etc.) based on Therapeutic Data Commons benchmarks. The 27B version shows impressive performance, rivaling specialized models.

  2. TxGemma-Chat, on the other hand, adds conversational abilities, allowing you to ask why it made a prediction or discuss complex therapeutic data.  

Key aspects:

💊 Therapeutics Focus: Tailored for drug discovery and related biological tasks.
🧬 Gemma 2 Base: Leverages the efficient Gemma 2 architecture.
🧪 Fine-Tunable: Includes a Colab notebook showing how to adapt it to specific therapeutic data or tasks.

🤖 Agent Ready: Can be integrated as a tool within larger AI agent systems (demonstrated with Agentic-Tx).  
⚖️ Open Weights (Gemma License): Available on Hugging Face and Vertex AI, allowing broad research and development (check license terms).  

This will be a powerful and accessible toolkit for researchers and developers in biotech, pharma, and computational biology.
Tried opening the website on my phone, and a few elements didn’t load properly. Might be worth checking if it’s a general issue or just on my end.
This will speed up drug development! 😄

name: Teamsaver
description: A shared space to appreciate your team for their hard work. Recognize achievements—big or small—as team members share updates, receive public appreciation, and earn trait-based badges they can carry throughout their careers.

node.body:
Hello Product Hunt! 👋 Hope everyone is feeling great today. I’m excited to share something personal, Teamsaver.co.

Over the years, I’ve realized something simple. Teams don’t thrive because of better dashboards or tighter KPIs. They thrive when people feel seen, appreciated, and recognized for their efforts.

That’s the heart of Teamsaver.

It helps managers collect weekly updates from their team and turn them into public appreciation. These moments don’t just lift spirits, they live on in the team member’s profile and follow them through their career.

It’s amazing what a little appreciation in public can do. Happiness goes up. Trust builds.
And somewhere along the way, productivity finds its own rhythm.

We built Teamsaver to be light, joyful, and honest. A space where recognition isn’t a checkbox, but a culture that flows week by week.

If you manage a team, I hope you’ll give it a try. Appreciate one person this week and see what it creates.

I’d love to hear your thoughts. And if you use it today, I hope it makes someone’s day a little brighter. 🟡
How do you want to market this? (Besides PH?) – do you have a plant to reach out to B2B?
Team recognition is so crucial, great idea! 👍

node.body:
🚀 Hey Product Hunt!

I’m excited to share TrustedBy.ai with you — a curated directory of AI tools that are actually used and trusted by professionals (mostly at enterprises), not just random listings from the latest AI hype cycle.

We built TrustedBy because we were constantly overwhelmed by endless AI directories filled with 1,000s of tools — most of which are either half-baked, abandoned, or irrelevant for real business needs. We realized: people don’t need more tools — they need the right tools.

So at TrustedBy.ai, we do the vetting for you. Every tool we list is:

✅ Used by real professionals in fields like HR, sales, marketing, compliance, law, and engineering
✅ Backed by strong teams or top-tier VC firms & raised Series A or B round (with real business/enterprise customers)
✅ Categorized by actual business use cases — no fluff

If you’re tired of wasting time digging through noise, TrustedBy helps you cut straight to what’s working in the real world.

We’d love your thoughts, feedback, and suggestions — and if you’ve used a great AI tool in your workflow, let us know. We’re always on the lookout to expand the directory with high-signal picks.

Thanks for checking it out 🙌
— TrustedBy team

name: TalkToSales
description: TalkToSales puts an AI assistant on your website that talks to users about your offerings, gives them live tours of your website or app, and shows dynamic content as it becomes relevant. It also qualifies visitors as leads and books conversions as appropriate.

node.body:
Hi folks, Alex here! I'm an alum of the Stanford AI Lab and Y Combinator, and now the CEO of TalkToSales.

Today, I’m proud to announce the launch of TalkToSales, which pioneers a new way people can interact with computers.

TalkToSales adds AI assistants to websites: they can answer visitors' questions, give them live tours of the website or app, and even help them book follow-up calls and buy things right in the conversation.

Unlike traditional websites, which are the same for everyone who visits them, the TalkToSales assistant customizes the conversation and content shown to every visitor, whether the content is dynamic slides, a website/app tour, or both.

TalkToSales also lets the people behind a website offer to "drop in" in place of the AI assistant and talk with visitors directly, when visitors accept. Shopkeepers in physical stores have always been able to talk to customers as they browse, but it hasn't been possible to do this on the web until now. We think this could be quite useful for companies that do business online to have more personal engagement with web visitors.

We think TalkToSales assistants can be helpful for a number of use cases:

Software sales: the website itself can become the first sales call, answering visitors' questions, qualifying their good fit and intent, and booking follow-up calls for good leads.

Software onboarding and support: Imagine a Clippy that actually worked, talking to you over voice and actually taking actions in a web app for you as you ask it for how to do things.

E-commerce: Imagine having a personal shopper on e.g. the Home Depot website, where a virtual man in an orange apron could show you different dishwasher models and help you pick between them.

Real estate: Imagine going to an apartment building's website and having a virtual real estate agent answer your questions, give you virtual tours of apartments, and book you for a real-world tour.

(Any other ideas? We're all ears!)

We think TalkToSales assistants can also be very helpful from an analytics point of view - instead of just seeing who visits your page and for how long, imagine being able to see which questions people have, what objections prevent them from engaging deeper, etc. TalkToSales logs transcripts of conversations and the AI can surface patterns from those conversations from you.

Please try it out and let us know what you think! And if you know anyone else who'd be interested in this, I'd appreciate you sharing it with them.

name: BrowserAI
description: BrowserAI is an open-source JavaScript SDK that lets developers run powerful local LLMs like Llama, DeepSeek-Distill, and Kokoro directly in the browser with minimal code. It eliminates the need for complex backends while providing privacy.

node.body:
Hey, Product Hunt! I'm Saurav, creator of BrowserAI. We built this open-source SDK to democratize access to powerful AI capabilities by allowing developers to run LLMs directly in the browser with just 3 lines of code.

After seeing teams struggle with complex backend infrastructure just to implement basic AI features, we decided to create a solution that eliminates these barriers. BrowserAI handles everything from model loading to optimization while maintaining privacy since everything runs locally in the user's browser.

I'd love to hear your feedback and answer any questions about our implementation approach or future roadmap. Thanks for checking us out!
This could be useful for anyone looking to integrate LLMs in their web apps without dealing with server costs. Definitely something I’ll be sharing

name: Faye - Free Privacy-first Period Tracker
description: Track your menstrual cycle with complete privacy using Faye, the #1 FREE offline-first period tracker. Get accurate cycle predictions, symptom tracking, and detailed menstrual health insights for free. No hidden paywalls, NO ADS, no subscription nagging.

node.body:
Hey everyone, I don't expect this to get much engagement here. But I have to share Faye with the few who care about big corporations commoditising women's health.

No woman should have to break the bank just to monitor her menstrual cycle. And I'm tired of seeing period-tracking apps charge premiums for something as natural and as basic as this.

✨ Meet Faye - The privacy-first period tracker that actually understands you.

While others sell your data, Faye focuses on giving you the fastest most seamless cycle tracking experience for FREE. You can install Faye on your mobile device and use the app even when offline.

- Snappy One-Tap Logging: Log periods faster than sending a text (seriously, try it!)
- Real-time Predictions: Everything in the app happens offline. Every action and every result is instant.
- Symptom Trends: Spot trends in moods, cramps, cravings with Faye's smart analysis.
- Cycle Science: Understand follicular phases, ovulation windows, and more in plain English
- Your Rules: From Light mode to dark mode to discreet mode, you can customize everything
- AI analysis: Get optional scarily accurate AI analysis that adapt to YOUR unique patterns
- Password lock: Optional password lock to prevent unauthorised access
- Stealth Features: Use discreet mode to completely change the app UI and hide sensitive data behind a pseudo project management app
- Stress-Free Backups: One-tap JSON exports that even your grandma could use
- Live Cycle Syncing: Watch predictions update as you log in in real time.
- All data is stored on your device. Nothing on the server.

Faye is FREE. Not "free-to-start" - No hidden paywalls, NO ADS, no subscription nagging, no "premium features" bait-and-switch. Just exceptional privacy-first cycle tracking.

I built this primarily for my wife. I hope you can all benefit, too.

node.body:
Hi Product Hunt makers!

I’m Arpit Singhal, the founder of Pitch N Hire, an AI-powered business suite that’s designed to simplify and streamline key business functions like recruitment, HR, marketing, and sales.

Today, we’re launching our all-in-one platform, and I’m excited to share how it can transform your business operations with ease and affordability.

Pitch N Hire is built to solve the problem many businesses face: managing multiple tools and paying separate subscriptions for each function. With our platform, you get everything you need in one place, for a fraction of the cost:

1) ATS: Automate recruitment and hire the best talent with ease.
2) Interview Solutions: Streamline assessments to save time and reduce bias.
3) Job Board Access: Expand your reach and hire faster.

Coming Soon, in next launches:--

1) HRMS: Simplify employee management and HR workflows.
2) WhatsApp & Email Marketing : Engage your audience and boost lead conversions.
3) Sales CRM : Drive sales and conversions seamlessly.

Our core belief is that businesses shouldn’t have to juggle between multiple tools or break the bank to get powerful solutions. That’s why Pitch N Hire provides all these premium tools at a competitive price—with no price hikes and locked-in deals for the first year!

We’re seeing early-stage startups, growing teams, and even established companies using our suite to save valuable time, reduce costs, and drive business growth. And, with all future upgrades included, you’ll always be ahead of the curve without the extra cost.

Here’s what you can do with Pitch N Hire:

If you’re looking for an all-in-one platform that can handle your hiring, HR, and marketing needs, Pitch N Hire is your go-to tool.

PS: We’re offering a 75% discount as part of our limited-time holiday and Product Hunt launch offer, so now’s the perfect time to give it a try!

PS2: Have questions? Drop them below—I’m here to help!

Thank you for checking us out, and please spread the word to help others save time and money with Pitch N Hire!

node.body:
​Hey makers!

I present to you AICurriculums. A platform that aims to facilitate learning new things.

Embarking on a new learning journey can be daunting, especially with generic, one-size-fits-all approaches. AICurriculums harnesses the power of LLMs to craft personalized learning plans tailored to your unique goals, skill level, and schedule. Whether you're aiming to master the guitar, delve into coding, or explore any new skill, our intuitive platform provides structured guidance to keep you motivated and on track.

- Learn smarter, not harder – AI creates a curriculum based on your goals and schedule.
- No more guesswork – Get a step-by-step plan so you always know what to do next.
- Stay on track – Set goals, follow a structured path, and actually make progress.
- Track your growth – Keep up the momentum with streaks and progress tracking.
- Adapts as you improve – Your curriculum evolves with you, so you're always challenged.
- Learn anything – From coding to languages to business, pick a skill and get a plan.

Try it for free! Everyone starts with 25 free credits to create any learning plan they want.

I had made this tool a while back (back during the GPT 3.5 days), then started using it a lot for myself, especially for learning new languages! I then thought this could be helpful for others trying to learn new things, so here we are, the first app I launch commercially.

Kindly leave me suggestions, critiques, anything else you think might me pertinent.

Thank you!

name: RAGBOT
description: This project provides a real-time chat interface with a custom RAG pipeline, featuring a React frontend and FastAPI backend. It supports file uploads, document chunking, and semantic search, while storing data in an SQLite database.

node.body:
This project provides a real-time Chat Interface powered by a custom-built Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) pipeline, developed from scratch. It incorporates both frontend (React) and backend (FastAPI) components, supporting file uploads, document chunking, embedding generation, and semantic search for efficient document retrieval.

The system enables plugging any LLM for document retrieval and allows efficient search through a collection of documents. The project includes functionality for document processing and chunk management, stored in an SQLite database.

name: Kataba (كَتَبَ)
description: Introducing Kataba (كَتَبَ) – A faith-conscious AI companion for self-reflection and emotional well-being. Based off Islamic principles, Kataba offers a private, compassionate space to process emotions and strengthen your connections through Islamic guidance.

node.body:
Excited to introduce Kataba on Product Hunt!

Kataba is a small project I’ve humbly built, inspired by my own experiences and personal reflections. The name ‘Kataba’ (كَتَبَ) comes from the Arabic root meaning ‘to write,’ symbolizing the act of reflection and recording one’s thoughts. Slowly, many of us have turned to AI into personal interactions, I wanted to create a space that’s not only private but also aligned with our Deen. Whether reflecting on sabr, tawakkul, or seeking tazkiyah, Kataba offers a compassionate and faith-conscious space for self-reflection.

It is still in Beta, and there may be bugs. Voice mode has not been released yet but will be soon. 

Couple roadmap items:
- Supporting Real time voice interactions.
- Supporting additional languages including Spanish, Arabic, Indonesian, Hindi and more.
- References to Quran and authentic Hadith.

I’d love to hear your thoughts! How do you see AI supporting emotional and spiritual well-being, let me know!

name: Airial Travel
description: Just imagine your trip and Airial it! Simply describe your trip to Airial, or drop in your favourite TikToks / IG and see your dream trip come to life instantly. Airial's one-of-a-kind AI picks out every last detail so that you can start packing, stress-free!

node.body:
Hello Product Hunt 👋


Today is a big day for us. We're excited to share Airial Travel with the Product Hunt community. Airial is the personal travel agent with AI superpowers. Simply describe your trip to Airial or drop in your favorite travel TikToks or IG reels and watch your dream trip come to life, fully planned and ready to book!


Sanjeev @sanjeev_shenoy1 and I co-founded Airial Travel a year ago to solve a problem we faced repeatedly. Being avid travelers, we were traveling for several months a year and spending multiple days planning and booking each trip. Hours and hours of research, browsing, watching videos, form-filling, spreadsheets, refinements etc. As we dug deeper, we realized that the scale and the intensity of this problem is stunning - hundreds of millions of trips are booked online every year and planning each of them takes over five hours on average.


Our vision “Just imagine your trip, and Airial it!” stems from our ultimate wish as travelers - AI that can figure out all the intricacies of trip planning for you - hotels, activities, flights, trains, transits, deals, date options, restaurants, interests, research, travel videos and everything else.


Airial is the only travel planner out there today which creates plans crafted to the last detail, like a a travel agent truly would. We pick flights, hotels, transportation and plan every single day of your trip in detail around these choices and your preferences. The defining features that set us apart from competition originate from the core beliefs that Airial is built on:

  • 📅 Detailed intricately crafted plans: Attention to detail makes trip plans incredible. Airial plans trips in a level of detail that is simply unmatched, taking care of hundreds of common sense constraints across thousands of variables in seconds.

  • 🚀 From Reels to Itineraries: TikTok / IG reels to Trips is work that millions do manually. We now enable all this in a click. This is the intersection of the two big trends in travel - AI and Socials.

  • 🏖️ Personalized Planning: Travel portals today are one-size-fits-all. We plan trips tailored to your specific interests - architecture tours, scenic hikes or samurai sword fighting lessons!

  • 👆 Actionable Itineraries: Just having a chatbot pick out one combination for you isn’t practically useful. Which was the last trip you planned that didn’t need any refinement? Every decision Airial makes for you is changeable via chat or UI controls.

  • 🌎 Discovery in context: As you plan your trip, Airial gives you the tools to discover incredible ideas and expert advice specific to your itinerary and interests which can be instantly imported into your trip.


Vacations are for relaxation. Planning them shouldn’t be an added burden. With Airial, planning trips is as easy as dreaming them up!
Congratulations on launch! Very interesting concept, will sure make travel choices funnier
Cool, such a great idea, it's truly all in one solution that will save a lot of time! The design is very lovely, I will be using your product to plan my next trip! Thank you, keep up the good work!

name: Alice 3.0
description: AI Automation Assistant that works with Make Zapier and your APIs ✔︎ Connect your apps to LLM via no-code ✔︎ All models in one app ✔︎ Fast, secure, privacy focused (offline models) ✔︎ Developer friendly; connect your back-end ✔︎ Assistant Library Try free 🆓

node.body:
Hello Fam! 😻

What a year it's been!

We're so happy to announce the newest version of Alice, built from the ground up. It's been quite a journey for us - from an AI sidekick and side project, working for us and our teams, to app that is now being used by thousands of creators, founders, builders.

Alice is UNLIKE any other AI assistant app. It's designed to work with your apps and APIs - currently with automation software like Make, Zapier, n8n, soon with MCP servers ⚡

Just try it out and see for yourself, how fast, responsive and reliable LLM client can be!

With Alice, you can also:
・Chat to multiple LLMs at once
・Create an army of assistants with unique skills
・Browse our Library of readymade ai agents
And much more!

Alice is ⚡ fast 🔐 secure and 👀 private - working with offline models and keeping all conversations only on your device.

Are you a developer?

Great news - you can connect any custom back-end to Alice, such as a company database / RAG, even with offline models. Or you can make Alice work with your API! And you can publish the app on our marketplace, too.

Alice is free to try, and after you use free credits, you can bring your own API keys, or buy our Unlimited AI plan with access to newest models.

Check out Alice - it's completely free 😃 on heyalice.app

And if it proves useful to you, here's the link valid only for the launch, with discount applied: https://easl.ink/jyEKu

I HIGHLY recommend it and I’m actually encouraging a friend to buy it. I’ve had a reeeealy great experience using and seeing the app develop. It’s some of the best money I’ve ever spent, especially considering the ridiculously low price for the quality I got. Just get it, no need to think twice!

I've been using Alice for several years, and it has become my daily companion at work. Thanks to the integration of the most popular LLM models, I can easily switch between them at any moment and test different response variants. Alice allows me to create assistants and quickly select from a list of my previously defined prompts, which means I don't have to type them every time - saving considerable time and offering great convenience. The possibility of integrating Alice with Make significantly expands our work capabilities, increasing productivity. Alice ranks in my top 10 most frequently used applications. 👍
