name: Mureka O1
description: Meet Mureka O1, it uses Chain-of-Thought (CoT) for structured AI music, claiming superior quality to Suno. Offers 10 languages, voice cloning, API & unique model fine-tuning.

node.body:
Hi everyone!


Sharing Mureka O1, their latest AI music generation model. It's truly impressive and promising!


The really interesting part of O1 is, it's the music reasoning model using Chain-of-Thought ("MusiCoT"). It plans the song structure first, leading to impressively coherent and musical results. It seems O1 surpasses Suno V4 in quality and has lower latency.


Honestly, the O1 model's ability to structure music beforehand makes a noticeable difference in quality. It feels less random and more intentional.

Beyond that, Mureka packs some standout customization features:

🎤 Vocal Cloning: Train the AI on your voice! They claim to be the first platform offering this custom timbre control.
🎼 Model Fine-tuning: Uniquely, you can fine-tune the V6 model on your private music library for custom styles.
🔌 API Access: For music generation, TTS, and voice cloning.
🔗 Song Reference: Use audio/YouTube links as prompts.
✂️ Editing Tools: Includes "Region Edit" and "Extend".

I am a big fan of Suno, but I do feel like this time Mureka is achieving something phenomenal.

Wow, 🔥 this is just next level! I made a Kygo track about vibe coding in 3 seconds. And its not half bad. Im sure If spent a bit more time, It would surely rotate on the radio. https://www.mureka.ai/song-detail/MH8hMRjWDSXkCLeFJcPQ8f?is_from_share=1
Congrats on your launch! The Mureka 01 model has a clearer and more touching sound than the SUNO v4. Good job. Look forward to trying it more.

name: MeshifAI
description: Transform text into 3D models instantly with MeshifAI. Our advanced AI technology helps developers integrate high-quality 3D generation into apps, games, and websites.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt community!

I'm excited to share MeshifAI with you today - a tool that makes creating 3D models with AI accessible to everyone, regardless of technical background.

What is MeshifAI?
A platform that transforms text prompts into high-quality 3D models in seconds. No more struggling with complex 3D modeling software or waiting days for a designer.

Key features:
- Text-to-3D: Simply describe what you want, and our AI generates it
- Real-time viewer: View and interact with your models instantly
- Adjustable variance: Control how closely the output follows your prompt
- Easy export: Download your models for use in any 3D software or game engine

Why I built it:

Hi everyone!

Researcher tackles deep, multi-source research. It pulls info from your work data (emails, files, etc.) and the web to put together comprehensive reports, saving significant time on tasks like market analysis or strategy prep.

Analyst acts like a data scientist in your pocket. It takes raw data from spreadsheets and other sources, analyzes it (even using Python), and helps you find insights, create forecasts, or visualize patterns.

The idea is to have this specialized expertise readily available while you work, all integrated securely within M365.

These are rolling out starting in April via a new "Frontier" program for users with an M365 Copilot license.

name: AI Health Camera
description: Use AI to lose bodyfat and improve your health. With Food XRAY 8, get instant and accurate insights for your meals—powered automatically by just a photo. One more thing: the world’s most accurate food tracker is now available for free.

node.body:
Hey everyone! We’re so excited to bring the next generation of Gyroscope to everyone.

This version makes our signature trackers even better — letting people easily track food, places, calories and much more — and also upgrades our AI coaching system to be about 100x more intelligent than the first version we released a few years ago.

The most common goal people have when signing up is losing bodyfat, so we’ve optimized the entire experience around that. With the new protocol (and free course), you’ll have everything needed to ensure that the weight loss comes from bodyfat rather than valuable muscle mass. Whether on GLP1 meds where this is essential, or just wanting to lose a few pounds after the holidays, we think this protocol can change the world if everyone follows it.

We just put the app up in the app store, so give it a try and let us know what you think!

PS: Since this is a common question: The app does require an iPhone right now, the android platform currently isn’t quite polished enough to meet the our quality bar—but hopefully one day in the future that will change

Gyroscope: A Long-Time User's Perspective on its AI-Powered Evolution


I've been a Gyroscope user since pretty much the beginning, and it's been fascinating to watch it evolve. Back when I started, the term "AI" wasn't even part of the health tracking conversation!


For those who don't know, Gyroscope is an app that aims to be your comprehensive health guardian, pulling in data from various sources to give you a holistic view of your well-being. It tracks everything from your steps and sleep to your heart rate and even your mood.


Initially, Gyroscope was great for data aggregation and visualization. It neatly presented your health metrics, but it was largely up to you to interpret the data and draw conclusions.


The real game-changer has been the integration of AI. Now, Gyroscope isn't just passively collecting data; it's actively analyzing it, identifying patterns, and offering personalized insights. It's like having a personal health coach in your pocket!


Pros:

  • Comprehensive Tracking: Integrates with a wide range of apps and devices for a complete picture of your health.

  • AI-Powered Insights: The AI algorithms provide actionable recommendations based on your data.

  • Beautiful Visualizations: Gyroscope presents your data in a clear, engaging, and easy-to-understand way.

  • Personalized: The app learns your habits and preferences over time, making the insights even more relevant.

  • Long-term Tracking: Great for identifying trends and patterns over months and years.

Cons:

  • Subscription Cost: Gyroscope does have a subscription fee, which may be a barrier for some users. However, I believe the value it provides in terms of insights and motivation is well worth the cost.

Final Thoughts:


Gyroscope has come a long way since its early days. The addition of AI has transformed it from a simple data aggregator into a powerful tool for improving your health and well-being. If you're serious about tracking your health and want actionable insights, I highly recommend giving Gyroscope a try. To connect, my profile is: https://gyrosco.pe/andreapessotto/ :)
Gyroscope’s new focus on bodyfat-specific tracking and AI coaching sounds incredibly thoughtful. How personalized does the protocol get when adapting to different lifestyles or fitness levels?

name: Taskra
description: Taskra transforms your ideas into a structured project plan in seconds! Whether you're a startup, freelancer, or enterprise, Taskra simplifies project management with AI-driven insights.

node.body: Hey Product Hunt, I'm Aliyan 👋 I am thrilled to finally launch Taskra! 🚀 Over the last month, I been working to eliminate the hassle of project planning—because let's be real, planning shouldn't take longer than executing. 🫠 The Problem Project planning today is a time-consuming mess—endless spreadsheets, scattered notes, manual timeline tracking, and way too much guessing. AI can help, but most tools just add more complexity instead of simplifying the process. We wanted to change that. Taskra generates structured project plans in seconds, so you can focus on execution instead of getting lost in planning chaos. ✨ What is Taskra? Taskra is an AI-powered project management tool that instantly creates timelines, milestones, tasks, and risk assessments based on your input. It's designed for startups, freelancers, and teams who need to plan fast and execute even faster. Here are three core features that make Taskra unique: 1️⃣ AI-Generated Project Plans Just enter your project details, and Taskra instantly builds a structured plan—complete with milestones, tasks, priorities, and potential risks. Drop them in the comments. 🙏

Hi everyone!

Super excited to introduce PixPal to the Product Hunt community!

The idea behind PixPal came from a simple thought: What if interacting with images was as easy as chatting? I wanted to create an AI tool that lets you ask questions about images, analyze them, remix them, and even generate new ones, all in a fun and effortless way. But why stop there? PixPal can also generate full blog articles - complete with images and code! Need a blog post? It can also turn screenshots into functional code - Love a website or UI? Just upload a screenshot, and PixPal will generate the code to recreate it, with a live preview!

name: HighlightMe
description: HighlightMe is an intelligent teleprompter & speech assistant app. With our innovative "Smart Progression" technology, words automatically highlight as you speak, creating a seamless reading experience that keeps you on track and looking professional.

node.body:
Hello everyone!


Quick details on who I am: A software engineer at heart, since I was 14 years old (now 34).

This is my first iOS app that I am selling on the market. I have been in the tech business since 2014 helping clients with their app and web development. I are striving to provide products that people can love using and make their life easier.

I absolutely love hearing all the good and bad feedback. Please take a look and if you have any questions let us know.



Below is a list of the key features, with more on the way:

• Smart Progression - Words automatically highlight as you read, with intelligent tracking that ensures smooth progression even if you skip words.
• Auto-Scrolling - Content scrolls automatically as you speak, eliminating manual scrolling.
• Note AI - Create or edit your notes using AI. Tasks such as fixing grammar errors or summarizing a note have never been easier.
• Note Text Scanner - Scan text using your camera and automatically create a new note or edit an existing note.
• Note Card Mode - Organize your presentations into folders and seamlessly transition between notes for flawless delivery.
• Organizational Tools - Create folders, add titles, and keep all your presentations organized.
• Speech & Video Capturing - Record yourself while reading highlighted text for professional-looking presentations and practice sessions.
• Customizable Experience - Personalize highlight colors, text appearance, font size, and style to match your preferences.
• Voice Playback - Choose from multiple voices to hear your notes read aloud and highlighted at adjustable speeds and volumes.
• Biometric Authentication - Secure your notes using Face ID and Touch ID.


Want to know what is coming next? Here are a few on the list. If you have any suggestions, please let us know!


Future Features:

• Cloud sync notes and folders.

• More AI features, such as text scanning, preset voices that sound more human-like and importing text from multiple file formats like Word Docs & PDFs.

• Real time collaboration.

• Save photos when using text scanner.



Note: If anyone wants full access for one month for free, please let me know! I can get you a promo code.

name: DelinkedIn
description: DelinkedIn decodes corporate jargon, reveals hidden expectations, and exposes red flags in job postings - with just the right amount of sarcasm and wit.

node.body:
Can we all just admit it? Job listings suck.

They’re stuffed with words—'team player,' 'self-starter,' 'dynamic environment'—but say absolutely nothing useful. It’s like reading a corporate buzzword bingo card. How did we let it get this bad?

Searching for a job on sites like LinkedIn feels like wading through a swamp of doublespeak, hoping for a shred of truth. That’s why I built DeLinkedIn: a Chrome extension that cuts the crap and rewrites job posts with the brutal honesty you deserve.

‘Fast-paced environment’? Now it’s ‘You’ll never catch your breath.’
‘Wearing many hats’? That’s ‘One salary, five jobs.’
‘Collaborative culture’? Say hello to ‘Endless meetings, no decisions.’

Download it, try it, and share the translations that made you laugh out loud!

name: AIHubMatrix
description: AIHubMatrix: Universal chat for OpenAI, Claude, Gemini & more. Switch models mid-conversation, organize chats in folders, exclude messages, and get vision support for any model via Google Vision integration. Your all-in-one AI command center.

node.body: Hey Product Hunt community! 👋 Excited to share AIHubMatrix, a project born from my own frustration juggling multiple AI chat interfaces and losing context when switching between models like GPT, Claude, Gemini, and local LLMs. AIHubMatrix solves this by providing a single, powerful, and organized interface to interact with virtually *any* AI model seamlessly. ✨ **What makes AIHubMatrix special?** * 🔄 **Dynamic Model Switching:** The killer feature! Change models *mid-conversation* without losing your flow. Compare AI responses directly. * 🎛️ **Granular Message Control:** Don't just delete – *exclude* messages from the AI's context to experiment, then include them back if needed. * 📁 **Folder Organization:** Structure your chats hierarchically, just like your file system. Drag & drop supported! * 👁️ **Universal Vision:** Get image analysis even from text-only models, thanks to automatic Google Vision integration. * 🔌 **Broad Provider Support:** Works with OpenAI (incl. Assistants), Anthropic, Google Gemini, DeepSeek, Grok, local models (Ollama, etc.), and more are planned. Configure any compatible API! * 💾 **Conversation Cache:** Pre-load specific context or reference files into a conversation. * 🛠️ **Developer Tools:** Includes request preview, debug panel, and more. 🚀 **Demo Info:** This is a public demo hosted for you to try out! * **Available Models (No Key Needed):** DeepSeek R1, Gemini 2.0/2.5 Pro Experimental. * **Other Models:** Pre-configured templates are available, but require your *own* API keys via the "Configure Models" section. * The project is **open source**! 🔗 **Links:** * Try the Demo: https://www.aihubmatrix.com/ [O tu URL de demo pública] * GitHub Repo: https://github.com/cescanue/aihu... I'd love for you to give AIHubMatrix a try and share your feedback! What features are crucial for you? Which AI providers should be prioritized next? Thanks for checking it out! 🙏 - Carlos

name: Flowhop AI
description: Killer AI-generated lofi hip-hop beats to help you focus, flow, and get more done. Built for deep work, studying, coding, and creative sessions.

node.body:
Can AI Make Good Music?

My answer is an unequivocal yes- and that’s why I co-founded Flowhop AI, where we’re using the latest generative tech to create killer lofi hip-hop beats.

If the words “AI” and “hip-hop” in the same sentence are enough to pique your interest, feel free to check it out now. But if you like a good origin story, read on.

The Blissful Years

I was fortunate to grow up in a musical household and started playing music at a young age. I stayed active in bands from high school through my thirties.

Despite my love for music, I realized early on that it wasn’t an ideal way to make a living. For that, I turned to coding.

The thing about coding is it demands long stretches of uninterrupted screen time. And like many developers, I needed a soundtrack.

For years, that soundtrack could be just about anything: bebop jazz, thrash metal, gritty hip-hop, hardcore punk—even some country. The genre didn’t matter. I could listen to whatever I liked and still stay focused, productive, and incrementally happier.

The Turning Point

Then, a few years ago- though I’m not sure exactly when- something strange happened.

After a lifetime of voracious and wonderfully promiscuous music consumption, I found I could no longer listen to most music while working. It had become a distraction. Especially hip-hop, with its vivid imagery and clever wordplay, pulled my attention away from the work.

This was a bummer, to say the least, but it led to my discovery of lofi hip-hop.

The instrumental, often chilled-out, beats were perfect. It became my go-to music whenever I needed to lock in at the keyboard for a few hours.

The Problem

Chances are, some of you are also fans of lofi hip-hop. A quick search on YouTube will confirm its popularity. But after a couple of years listening to the top channels, I started to get bored.

I heard the same tracks a bit too often, and many of the beats shared a bit too much of the same sound palette.

I wanted more: more variety, more diversity, and more music that sounded like the golden era of sample-based hip-hop I grew up loving.

AI Changes the Game

A few months ago, I started playing around with the new wave of AI music-generation tools. I wasn’t trying to start anything- I was just curious.

The early results? Pretty incredible.

Soon I found myself wondering, "Can this thing make lofi hip-hop?"

After more focused experimentation, I got my answer. Not only could it make lofi beats- some of them were really, really good. It could even make tracks that echoed the soulful, sample-heavy vibe of golden-era hip-hop.

That’s when the lightbulb went off.

Flowhop AI

Once the vision became clear, I started generating songs like a madman—and recruited one of my best friends (a fellow musician and technologist) to help polish the results for release.

At Flowhop, we’re building the biggest and best catalog of lofi hip-hop beats on the planet- music for focus, study, creativity, and flow.

Whether you’re coding, cramming, writing, or slaying monsters in your favorite game, we want to be your soundtrack.

Enjoy!

As someone who's been deeply involved in the AI space, I've watched countless companies struggle with the exact problem SimplAI solves: the frustrating patchwork of narrow GenAI tools that creates endless complexity. One tool for open-source models, another for APIs, and separate frameworks for orchestrating agents - it's a nightmare!


What makes SimplAI special is how they've unified everything into a single platform that works ANYWHERE - cloud, on-prem, or hybrid. The standout features that impressed me:

→ Enterprise-ready with SOC 2 Type II and ISO 27001 compliance

→ 300+ pre-built connectors to ground AI in your actual business data

→ Cloud-agnostic deployment options (finally, no more vendor lock-in!)


I recently spent time using the SimplAI product and was blown away by how quickly you can go from concept to production. The platform feels like it was built by people who've actually felt the pain of enterprise AI implementation - because it was!


@sandeep_dinodiya (founder & CEO) brings deep expertise from both enterprise software and cutting-edge AI research. Their vision of AI that doesn't just think but ACTS is exactly what businesses need to move beyond the chatbot era.


Whether you're just starting your AI journey or ready to scale production-grade AI systems, SimplAI deserves your attention. The team is here today answering questions, so drop your thoughts below! 💬


Check it out and let me know what you think! ⬇️​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​

Congrats on the launch, Sandeep and team! 🎉 SimplAI looks like a serious game-changer for enterprises navigating the complexity of AI adoption. Love the multi-agent approach and flexibility across cloud/on-prem—this feels like the kind of infra upgrade enterprises have been waiting for. Excited to see how this evolves! 🙌

Seamlessly integrating AI like this is truly a game-changer for companies!
I’m genuinely excited to see how much it can boost business productivity. Wishing you great success! 🚀

name: Scene 2.0 - Modular AI Web Builder
description: Scene is redefining the way modern websites are created—enabling designers and agency teams to ideate, build, and publish websites from a single canvas, with AI empowering their ideation process without limiting customization or creativity.

node.body:
What I like about Scene is its focus on ease.


There are plenty of AI-assisted website builders, but Scene prioritizes creativity and flow by giving you space to express what you want, delivers a finished product in moments, and then allowed you to conversationally iterate until you arrive at your desired end state.


Many tools are serving Figma and Framer expats — and while Scene will feel familiar to them — is seeking to empower a broader set of web builders and entrepreneurs.
Hi Scene team! Your product looks interesting, especially the modularity and AI approach. Are you planning to expand integrations with other tools, and if so, in what direction? Curious to hear more!

Hey Producthunters! Tomas here, CEO of Scene.

Before Scene, we spent 7+ years designing and building websites as an agency. Over time, the pattern became clear:
Websites had matured. Clients came to us with similar needs. Best practices and repeating modules emerged.
The websites themselves had become a commodity.

But building them still felt like a painful relay race.
Designers moodboarding in one tool, designing in another, building in yet another.
Project managers coordinating feedback across endless threads.
Every project felt like starting from scratch. Every update, a new sprint.

While some websites justify the time and complexity of custom delivery. Many don’t.
A well-structured, on-brand site—focused on clarity and content—can outperform one bloated with unnecessary distractions.

With the advent of AI and the immense value it’s unlocking, at Scene, we envision a new way most websites are going to be delivered from now on—the smart way. One where designers, agency teams, and anyone else come together into one place without switching tools, and one where AI empowers ideation but doesn’t limit customisations nor creativity.

Introducing Scene 2.0 - a modular AI web builder that empowers designers, agency teams, and anyone to ideate, build, and publish from a single shared canvas:

  • One canvas to ideate, moodboard, build, and ship. No silos.

  • AI that ideates and builds website layouts, copy, and images. Designers take it from there.

  • Smart defaults—global themes, auto-layout, responsive modules—so teams focus on intent, not implementation.

  • Ready to be published at all times, fully responsive

We believe websites should be clever—not hard, slow, or stressful. Thanks for checking out Scene 2.0. We’re just getting started.

PS: Massive thanks to our early users who shaped 2.0 with us, and to @chrismessina for helping us bring Scene back to PH!

name: ActionKit
description: With a single API call, ActionKit (by Paragon) equips your product's AI agents with 1000+ integration actions across CRMs, ticketing platforms, email, Slack, and more. Paragon is trusted by enterprise AI companies like AI21, You.com, and Copy.ai.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt! 👋 I’m Brandon, co-founder of Paragon. Today, I’m excited to introduce ActionKit - an API that enables you to instantly add 1000+ integration actions to your AI agent product.


Why ActionKit?


Product builders are racing to build AI agent functionality into their applications, but building every single 3rd-party action takes too much engineering time. Not only do you need to handle the authentication for every integration, but you also need to write custom code for every single action in those 3rd-party applications. These actions also need to have LLM-optimized descriptions and properly documented input parameters so your agent can use them properly.


What makes ActionKit best-in-class?

  • Add 1000+ actions across dozens of integrations with a few lines of code

  • LLM agnostic - plug & play with any AI agent framework

  • AI agent optimized action & input parameter descriptions

  • Load tested for enterprise scale (1M+ requests/day)

  • Designed for multi-tenant SaaS - enable users to seamlessly auth their 3rd-party accounts directly in your application

  • Support your users’ custom objects/fields across every integration

  • Integrated into an end-to-end platform for integrations that can handle every use case, from RAG ingestion to AI agent tool calling

Trusted by enterprise AI companies including AI21, You.com, and Copy.ai, Paragon will save you months of engineering every year on integrations so you can focus on your core product.Try it now and let us know what you think! Drop your questions and thoughts in the comments - we’ll be here all day!

I think it's an amazing addition for a tool that already picks up a lot of the work of companies that are focused on integrations and bringing tools together. I've checked out this product on its initial phases and it's something that should be integrated asap by any SaaS that wishes to enhance their users experience
A game-changer that allows tech team to invest less and less time into custom integrations and makes users free to do whatever action they need/want.
Congrats for the launch of ActionKit!

This highlights a major challenge for AI product builders—integrating third-party actions is time-consuming, requiring authentication setup, custom coding, and LLM-optimized descriptions. Streamlining this process could significantly accelerate AI agent adoption. Curious to see how others are tackling this!

name: Kilo Code for VS Code
description: Kilo AI is an AI-powered extension for VS Code which writes, fixes and improves your code through simple chat. Tuned with the fastest models we could find, it can create and modify files, run command line prompts, and much more.

node.body:
Hey PH!


It’s clear that the closer we’re getting to AGI, the closer we’re getting to a future where all humans are shaping our digital worlds directly. Gone are the days of thinking of code line by line, we’ll have AI agents producing code “by the kilo”. With Kilo Code, we’re humbly throwing our hat in the ring with a new AI agent.

There are already a million AI agent companies out there, why another one? Simple: we’re an impatient bunch. We believe that by an extreme focus on speed (speed of building features, speed of growing our team, speed of experimentation, speed of the product itself), we can quickly add value.

We’ve been living this extreme focus on speed already:

  • Two weeks ago, I dropped everything in my life to build the first version.

  • By now we’ve assembled a team of 10.

  • Day one, we forked the Roo Code VSCode extension (which itself is a fork of Cline).

  • Since then, we shipped 10 small improvements.

  • Made the home page of hacker news.

  • By tomorrow, we’ll have fixed two of your requests.

  • Next week, we’ll do 10 more improvements.

The goal is to create the most user-friendly AI coding agent, as quickly as possible.


Most importantly, we want to build this with you. We would love your continuous feedback (here but also on Github and Discord), and we have a free tier (with $15 in free tokens a month!) in order to thank you—and for the best feedback we’ll give out more free tokens.

Check the homepage for up to date information on how to get access to the free tier.

1. How does it differentiate from existing tools? I checked the substack which has some information but no clear roadmaps. It seems to be you are looking to gather fast feedbacks and see how it goes.

  2. If I switch from Windsurf how will I get the autocomplete and supercomplete features? Which are an essential part of coding workflow.
All the best for the launch @juice10 & team!

name: Redactable
description: Redactable uses AI to find and permanently remove sensitive information from documents—unlike traditional methods that leave data vulnerable to bad actors. Save 98% of time while ensuring protection across legal, healthcare, and financial sectors.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt community! 👋


I'm Amanda, founder and CEO of Redactable. We're incredibly excited to share our AI-powered redaction platform with you today!


The journey of Redactable began when I was working as a loan consultant and realized something alarming – those black boxes I was drawing over my clients' sensitive information weren't actually protecting their data. Anyone with basic technical skills could access what was underneath. This wasn't just a small oversight – it was a massive privacy and security gap affecting countless professionals handling sensitive documents.


We built Redactable to solve this problem once and for all. Our platform doesn't just visually hide information—it permanently removes sensitive data, including hidden data and metadata that most people don't even know exists. And we've made it 98% faster than traditional tools.


What I'm most proud of is that we're democratizing document redaction. Before Redactable, redaction was incredibly time-consuming or required expensive enterprise solutions. Now, professionals across legal, healthcare, finance, government, and other sectors can protect sensitive information efficiently and reliably – from any browser, without downloads or complex training.


I'd love to hear your thoughts and answer any questions about Redactable. And if you've ever struggled with document redaction, I'd be curious to learn about your experience! 🚀
Love how Redactable uses AI to permanently remove sensitive data! Does the auto-redaction support multilingual documents or handwritten text to avoid accidental leaks?

Hi Product Hunt!


I’m Boris - Growth at Redactable. Our users often tell us how they struggled before finding us—spending hours manually blacking out text, only to discover the sensitive data was still accessible beneath those black boxes. Even worse, hidden metadata kept exposing their clients' information.


What drives us is making proper data protection accessible to everyone. We've built Redactable to slash redaction time by 98% compared to the old-school methods, and we've made it super easy to keep track of what's been redacted with a clean paper trail that keeps auditors happy.


When users tell us they've transformed multi-day redaction projects into minutes while eliminating data exposure risks, we know we're solving a real problem. If you're handling sensitive documents, we'd love to hear how we can help you protect data more effectively.


Share your feedback, and help us to make our platform better! 🤗

name: Qwen2.5-Omni
description: Qwen2.5-Omni is an end-to-end multimodal model by Qwen team at Alibaba Cloud, Understands text, images, audio & video; generates text & natural streaming speech.

node.body:
Hi everyone!

You can now use Voice and Video Chat directly in Qwen Chat! Powering these new multimodal interactions is Qwen's latest open-source model: Qwen2.5-Omni.

This "omni" model is a single system that understands text, audio, images, and video, while outputting both text and natural-sounding audio.

Key aspects:

🔄 End-to-End Multimodal: A single "Thinker-Talker" architecture designed for seamless input/output across modalities.
💬 Real-Time Interaction: Built for streaming, enabling smooth voice and video chat experiences.
🗣️ Natural Speech Output: Claims strong performance in speech generation quality.
💪 Strong Across Modalities: Performs well on benchmarks for vision, audio, and text tasks.
🔓 Openly Available with Apache 2.0 license: Released on Hugging Face, ModelScope, and GitHub, with API access via DashScope.

The Qwen team believes this type of omni model is key for the future of AI agents. While this is still just the 7B version, it's impressive to see this level of multimodality in an open model.

Head over to Qwen Chat, toggle the new voice & video chat button, and experience it!

name: Mira Migo

Hey Product Hunt! 👋


I'm Omar, founder of Mira Migo, and I'm thrilled to launch here today!


When a few teachers approached me 5 weeks ago for help transitioning careers, I quickly realized how overwhelming and repetitive the process was:

  • Narrowing down what skills they actually have

  • Finding meaningful, interesting careers they qualify for

  • Making endless resume edits

Honestly, it felt manual and didn't scale at all.

Current solutions rely heavily on generic career quizzes and outdated advice, resulting in people picking the wrong jobs, feeling lost, and wasting years in roles that don't fit their interests or personality.


And here's the bigger problem: the rise of AI means careers aren't about fitting into traditional 9-to-5 roles anymore. Instead, aligning careers with genuine interests and unique strengths is becoming crucial. Yet today, 75% of high school students and 55% of recent university graduates feel completely unprepared to confidently choose a career.


➡️ Mira Migo helps you confidently discover careers you'll genuinely enjoy in just 5 minutes.


Unlike traditional career tests or resume builders, Mira Migo combines the proven Holland RIASEC framework (trusted globally for career guidance) with a smart analysis of your actual resume. This gives you personalized, actionable career paths tailored specifically to your interests, personality, and real experience.


This unique approach allows you to:

→ 🎯Find personalized career matches instantly—no more guesswork or generic suggestions.

→ 🗺️ Map out your actionable skills clearly, highlighting exactly where to focus your career development.

→ 🌟 Stay future-proof in the age of AI, aligning your career path to your genuine interests, ensuring relevance and enjoyment.

→ 💡 Free tier + one-time paid feature, no hidden subscriptions or recurring fees. Clear, simple value.


Our mission is straightforward: help people avoid wasted years, find clarity fast, and pursue careers they genuinely love. I personally felt this pain when I graduated from university, and I've seen so many others struggle—new and experienced alike. Mira Migo is my way of addressing this head-on.


Super excited to launch today and hear your thoughts, suggestions, and feedback! 🔥


(P.S. Big thanks to the early testers who helped refine Mira Migo!)

name: Personas - AI Powered Document Review
description: AI-driven documents, contracts and agreements reviews—fast, personalized, and risk-aware. Save time, ensure compliance, and streamline decisions.

node.body:
We in our professional and personal lives get a lot of documents that we need to sign, from a simple consent form from our kid's school, to a vendor contract or a share holding agreement. However, the access to legal review is time consuming and costly, so majority of the times, we sign agreements and documents based on 'trust'. However, when trust is broken that is where our signed documents do not help us as we did not review them thoroughly. For example, you signed an NDA thinking that you should not talk about any confidential matter, however, you did realise that the NDA stopped you from even taking the name of the company and now they are suing you because you just took their name. Similarly, you signed a consent form for your child's trip but did not realise that you have waived all rights for mishaps happening due to negligence on the part of school.

Personas is an AI powered tool which uses vectors to analyse each document in detail. The AI generates the levers based on each document type, where the levers are key aspects under which the document needs to be reviewed. The system also seeks your preferences for each aspect so that the system processes based on your expectations. Finally, in under 2 mins you get the entire document reviewed with each aspect marked as Red, Green or Amber based on the severity of the issue. The best part, if you review such documents regularly, like NDAs coming from various customers, vendors etc, you can create a persona with your preferences and every time a new NDA comes, you can get it reviewed based on your persona with a single click of a button.

Give it a try and let me know if you think it would help you in being safe from signing documents with clauses which can be detrimental to you in the long run.
Wow, this brings in a lot of help for contracts review across domains.
Looks like an important day to day utility. Best wishes.

name: AI-Powered Crypto Wallet
description: Talk to your AI to handle complex crypto transactions while our MPC technology provides institutional-grade security. Guardian agents scan for threats in real-time, letting you interact safely with web3 through natural conversation.

node.body:
Hi Product Hunt!

I'm Jacob. Me and my team have spent the last 8 years turning academic MPC cryptography papers into production systems that secure digital assets. I/we've come from the largest players in the industry such as Bitfinex, Tether, Binance, FTX, Monzo, Saxo Bank, Deltec bank and more. I've seen firsthand how challenging crypto security can be - even for institutions with dedicated teams.

Our team has spent the last 8 years developing MPC cryptography, turning academic papers into battle-tested security systems. We've also helped companies recover from attacks and implement better security.

The problem we're solving: Crypto remains the wild west. It's difficult to interact with web3 safely without accidentally signing transactions that could steal your funds. We believe AI is the missing piece. IO AI Wallet uses conversational AI to abstract away blockchain complexities while our Guardian agent provides real-time protection against scams and malicious contracts.

What makes us different:
- Institution-grade MPC security (not just seed phrases)
- Cryptographic multi-approval system (not just prompts)
- Flexible key-sharing configurations for different security needs
- Built by a team that has secured billions in digital assets

As we look ahead, we're building this to support fully autonomous AI agents that can operate securely in web3 with cryptographic constraints.

Retweet this tweet and receive a $50 coupon when we go live.

Looking forward to your feedback and questions!

name: Shovel
description: Need to do complicated edits, format conversion, translation, cleanup, summarisation, or analysis on large number of files? Wanna try running it through AI models? But ChatGPT only takes a few files at a time... You need a better tool for the job.

node.body:
Hello Product Hunt!
I'm David — a designer/developer, deeply interested in automation. This is my first launch here, so... be gentle. 😅


So here’s what happened: I had over 300 SVG images that needed background removal. Manually? That’s two days of my life I’d never get back. AI can totally handle it now — but the question was how?

The real problem? How do you actually process the files?
Do you install a model locally? Use what interface? Write a Python script to crawl a folder? What if it’s too slow, or the model isn’t the right one? And what about ChatGPT... do I just feed it 10 files at a time? That would also take forever.

I figured there has to be a better way. A simple, fast and reliable batch tool, that lets everyday people use powerful AI models without the hassle.

So I built it... and called it "Shovel" — a simple tool for a high tech job. Because sometimes, you just want to shovel your problems into the machine and watch them get handled.


Let me know if you have such use cases as well. I can't be the only one with tons of files to edit. 😀

name: Cloudflare AI Labyrinth
description: Cloudflare AI Labyrinth uses AI-generated content to trap and identify malicious AI bots scraping your website. Simple toggle to enable, no configuration needed.

node.body:
Hi everyone!

Check out something very clever from Cloudflare: AI Labyrinth. It's a new approach to fighting unwanted AI scraping bots, and it actually uses their own tools against them!

Here's the idea: when Cloudflare detects a suspicious bot, AI Labyrinth automatically creates a network of fake web pages, filled with AI-generated content. These pages are linked together, but they're invisible to real users and have no SEO value (they're specifically designed not to be indexed).

The goal is to:

⏳ Waste Bot Resources: Make the bots waste time and computing power crawling useless content.
🤖 Identify Bad Bots: Any crawler that follows these links is definitely a bot, allowing Cloudflare to fingerprint it and improve their bot detection.
🙌 Protect Your Site: Without impacting real users or your SEO.

It's all done with a simple toggle in the Cloudflare dashboard – no complex configuration needed.

This is a fascinating example of using AI defensively.  It's a bit like a next-generation honeypot, but instead of just a single hidden link, it's a whole labyrinth of AI-generated nonsense.

name: Solver
description: Solver is an autonomous coding agent that completes software tasks on its own. Give it work, walk away, and return to finished code ready for review. It operates directly in your git repositories, handling everything from bug fixes to new features.

node.body:
👋 Hi Product Hunt community! Super excited to share Solver with you today.


🔍 WHY WE BUILT THIS


As engineering leaders at Apple and Samsung, we faced overwhelming backlogs with more tasks than our teams could complete.


We spent countless hours on routine coding tasks that took time away from higher-value creative work.


That frustration led us to build Solver - an autonomous coding agent that works while you don't.


⚙️ HOW IT WORKS


Solver is a self-driving software development tool that operates directly in your Git repositories.


You assign it a task, walk away, and come back to find a complete solution ready for your review - either as a pull request or a branch you can iterate on.


The experience is like "vibe coding" - you describe what you want in natural language, and Solver handles the implementation details.


Unlike tools that just complete your sentences or make suggestions, Solver autonomously handles entire development workflows.


It understands requirements, writes tests, implements features, fixes bugs, and prepares code for your approval.


📈 WHICH PROBLEMS WE'RE REALLY GOOD AT


Solver excels at tackling complex development tasks, implementing conventional software patterns, bootstrapping new projects, and enabling rapid prototyping.


It's great at fixing bugs when you can point to error logs or describe the issue clearly.


Need to create a quick prototype? Add authentication to your app? Implement a new API endpoint? These are perfect Solver tasks.


We're especially strong with Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, and actively support Go and Rust ecosystems, though we work with many languages.


🤝 WHY WE'RE HERE


We built Solver for developers, but product managers and other team members started using it too.


We're engaging with the Product Hunt community because many of you work across technical and non-technical roles.


Your feedback will directly shape our roadmap as we consider which features to prioritize for different types of users.


🚀 GETTING STARTED


Sign up through our homepage at https://solverai.com or go straight to the app at https://app.solverai.com.


We'll be around all day to answer questions and would love to hear your thoughts!


Special thanks to @chrismessina for hunting us!


- Mark, Dan, and the Solver team

What guardrails does this app have? I mean, this is pretty much the "vibe coding" with some revisions, so it has known issues. How does it ensure it doesn't remove something unnecessary to its CURRENT task yet necessary for the other parts of the code?

Don't let the name mislead you — Solver does far more than answer math problems.


Instead, Solver is more like a set-and-forget agent that will crush your dev tasks in any Git repo you point it at.


Give it a problem, and yo', it'll solve it.


Solver works particularly well on Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, Go and Rust.

name: Needle Knowledge Threader
description: Your work apps united. Needle brings together all your tools in one smart chat, helping you find info, share data, and get things done faster. No more app-hopping, just seamless work across everything you use. Leverage Needle with Zapier, n8n, and Langflow.

node.body:
Hi Product Hunt community 👋


Today, we're introducing the next evolution of Needle. A thoughtful solution to a problem we've all experienced: the disconnect between our knowledge and our tools.


While searching across apps is valuable, we realized something important was missing... the ability to act on what you find. With Needle Knowledge Threader, we've built a bridge between discovery and action.


In a workspace fragmented across Google Drive, Slack, Notion, and Jira, Needle now provides a unified command center. Our new write capabilities allow you to not just find information, but to update, transform, and direct it precisely where it needs to go; All from a single conversation.


What makes Needle Knowledge Threader different:


🔄 Two-way connection: Needle doesn't just read from your apps. It can write back to them, creating a complete information loop.


🧠 Chat-powered automation: Build and execute mini-automations directly in your chat interface. No complex setup required. Just describe what you need, and Needle handles the rest.


💡 Agentic workflows: Initiate sophisticated multi-step processes across your tools with simple conversational commands. Needle works autonomously to complete tasks that would normally require multiple manual steps.


We built this because we needed it ourselves. A quiet but powerful tool that reduces the friction between knowledge and action. No more context switching, just seamless work that adapts to how you communicate naturally.

We're grateful for the opportunity to share Needle with the Product Hunt community and look forward to your thoughts on how we can make it even better.


With appreciation,

The Needle Team - @oeken , @bugraaydingoz , @jaredpolivka & @jan_heimes


Also, shoutout to @rohanrecommends for being a great hunter!

name: Tiptap AI Suggestion
description: Easily integrate secure, customizable AI-driven suggestions into your Tiptap editor. Define custom rules globally or per document and integrate your own AI models. Flexible enough for proofreading, compliance, brand voice, style guides, and more.

node.body:
Hi everyone 👋 Philip here from tiptap.dev! I'm excited to introduce our AI Suggestion extension.

We built this feature because we realized that developers need more than just grammar checking in their editor, they need complete flexibility to build a powerful AI-driven suggestion engine.


Key Features:


📐 Fully Customizable Rules:
Define rules globally, per-document, per-user, or allow your end-users to create their own.


🎨 Fully Customizable UI:
Tailor exactly how suggestions appear in your editor’s interface to match your app’s design and UX.


🔀 Multiple Replacement Options:
Present multiple AI-generated suggestions, letting users choose the best fit for their content.


🔒 Prevent Certain Content:
Lock specific content to exclude it from AI-generated suggestions.


🤖 Custom AI Models:
Effortlessly integrate your own AI models alongside traditional methods (e.g., dictionary-based rules).


🚀 Optimized Performance:
Preload suggestions for minimal latency and improved UX.


🛡️ Security & Privacy:
Secure API-generated suggestions. Your rules and content are never stored in Tiptap Cloud.


🔄 Real-time Suggestion Updates:
Suggestions update automatically as users write, delivering smooth, responsive interactions.


⚡ Easy, Instant Setup:
Get started in minutes using our ready-to-go example code.

We genuinely want your thoughts:

  • What additional use cases can you imagine?

  • What else would make it even more valuable to your workflow?

We would love to hear your feedback and join our welcoming community on Discord: https://tiptap.dev/discord

Cheers ✌️
Philip

name: AI-Powered Email Ticketing - Kommunicate
description: Instantly train and connect your inbox with Kommunicate AI to start resolving repetitive email queries. Use AI to assign, escalate, and deflect tickets, allowing you to focus on complex queries that require human understanding and empathy.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt 👋,

This is Devashish, Co-founder and CEO of Kommunicate. 

We’re excited to introduce Kommunicate's AI-Powered Email Ticketing 🚀—a game-changer for customer support teams looking to automate email responses, handle repetitive queries, and boost productivity!


At Kommunicate, we’ve always strived to make life easier for customer support teams. This product is built with YOU in mind. With AI-Powered Email Ticketing, we’ve taken automation to the next level. Here’s how it works:

  • Automate FAQs: Set up an AI-powered bot that can answer your customers' frequently asked questions right from the email. You can train the bot on your website, documents (PDF, Word, Spreadsheets), and even help articles from Zendesk and Salesforce.


  • Guardrails for Accuracy: No more worrying about AI giving wrong or made-up answers! If the AI isn’t sure, it will escalate the issue to a human agent, ensuring your customers get accurate, trustworthy responses.

  • AI Summary & Insights: Support agents will get an AI-generated summary of the entire email thread—saving tons of time. Plus, managers can get real-time insights into their team’s performance, with AI suggesting areas of improvement.


  • Multi-Language Support: Your support agents can now reply in any language—the AI will translate the response for you! Supporting global customers just got a lot easier 🌍

  • AI Helps Fetch Answers: The AI can fetch answers directly from your knowledge base, documents, and even your CRM, ensuring agents have all the info they need at their fingertips.

Why we built this:

A lot of our customers asked for an easy way to manage all customer queries from one place, and now you can manage support from email, chat, and omnichannel platforms like WhatsApp, Instagram, Messenger, and more—all within Kommunicate. This makes us the one-stop platform for customer support teams everywhere.

Our goal with this product is to empower customer support agents and teams—not just as problem solvers, but as revenue-generating heroes within their organizations. We all know that great service keeps customers loyal and happy—and that’s what we aim to enable with this launch.

We hope this will help elevate customer support to the next level, making your team more efficient, faster, and more impactful. Can’t wait to hear what you think! 👏


Feel free to ask any questions in the comments below!


Cheers,

Devashish Mamgain

Co-founder & CEO, Kommunicate

Kommunicate AI appears to be a game-changer for streamlining email support! The ability to instantly train the AI on your inbox and automate repetitive queries—such as assigning, escalating, and deflecting tickets—could save teams countless hours. It will be especially beneficial for our support team!
@devashish_m Interesting! Can this work with Gmail or Outlook accounts directly?

name: Prompteus
description: Prompteus makes it easy for developers to build, deploy, and scale AI workflows — all through a simple no-code editor. It offers multi-LLM orchestration, adaptive caching, and built-in guardrails for cost-effective, compliant, and robust AI ops.

node.body:
👋 Hey Product Hunt! I’m Bap, Co-founder at Prompteus.


I’m thrilled to introduce Prompteus — a complete solution to build, deploy, and scale AI workflows.


Over the past few years, I’ve built products with my team for governments and Fortune 500s in highly regulated industries. When LLMs exploded, we started integrating them into everything — and the same pain points kept popping up:

  • How do I log requests and track costs?

  • How do I switch models without rewriting my app?

  • How can I make sure the response never says a specific word?

That’s why we built Prompteus.


Instead of hardcoding AI calls all over your stack, Prompteus gives you a visual workflow editor to design, manage, and deploy AI logic — no infra, no spaghetti prompts, no DevOps overhead.


We call these workflows Neurons. You drag and drop building blocks (like model calls, conditionals, and transformations) and deploy them as secure API endpoints. They work from your frontend, backend, anywhere. You can even chain Neurons together.


✨ Highlights:

  • Multi-provider orchestration (OpenAI, Anthropic, Mistral, Cohere, Google…). Change models without changing a line of code.

  • Adaptive semantic caching to skip redundant LLM calls. Save on execution time and request cost!

  • Built-in auth, rate limiting, access controls — call your Neurons from your frontend if you'd like.

  • Detailed per-request logs, and cost analysis down to the microdollar (yup, we had to come up with that one!)

  • Powerful guardrails: catch input/output patterns before they hit the model. A great use case is to remove sensitive information before AI calls.


We’ve designed Prompteus so non-devs can contribute. No YAML. No redeploying a whole project for every config tweak.


There’s a generous forever free tier to get started, and we’re already testing some cool new features like tool calling, MCP server support, and more with early users.


Check out the docs, watch our videos, try it out, and tell us what you think. We’d love your feedback — AMA below!


— bap & the Prompteus team
Love the no-code approach to building stable AI workflows. Looks super helpful for devs scaling fast. Good luck!

@lucasjolley_cloudraker @linjrm 🚀 This is the kind of product I wish existed a year ago.

Every time we built something with LLMs, the same DevOps nightmares came back — caching logic, model-switch rewrites, prompt spaghetti. Prompteus feels like the missing infrastructure layer between raw LLM APIs and scalable AI apps.

🔧 The idea of Neurons is smart — visual, composable, and production-ready.

💡 The semantic caching + guardrails combo alone can probably save a fortune and avoid a PR disaster.

💬 Curious to know how flexible the input/output validation is. Regex? Embedding-based? Some examples would be awesome.

This is not just another wrapper. It's Zapier meets LangChain meets Postman. Great work team — following the roadmap closely! 🔍

name: Dropgala
description: Dropgala helps individuals and teams capture, organize, and protect screenshots with AI-powered search, OCR, tagging, secure cloud storage, password protection, and instant sharing of folders and images. Say goodbye to screenshot chaos for good.

node.body:
👋 Hey Product Hunt!

We’re thrilled to launch Dropgala — a Chrome extension designed to simplify and supercharge the way you work with screenshots.

If you’ve ever taken a screenshot and then lost it in a chaotic folder—or wasted time digging through random filenames—you’re not alone. We built Dropgala to fix exactly that.

🔍 What is Dropgala?
Dropgala is your all-in-one screenshot manager:

📸 Capture full page, visible screen, or selected area in one click.
✏️ Annotate instantly with arrows, text, blur, and highlights.
🧠 AI-powered OCR & search — extract text from screenshots and search using natural language (even if you forgot the exact words).
📂 Organize with folders, tags, and notes that are actually useful.
🔗 Share screenshots or entire folders with short links, perfect for teams.
🔒 Secure your screenshots with optional password protection.
💡 Why we built it:
We were constantly juggling screenshots across tools, cloud drives, Slack, and endless tabs. Dropgala brings everything into one space, searchable and shareable — without any friction.

👥 Who it’s for:
Developers & QA testers
Designers & marketers
Content creators & educators
Freelancers & remote teams
Anyone who takes screenshots regularly
We’ve poured our heart into making Dropgala simple, fast, and genuinely useful. We’re just getting started, and your feedback means the world to us.

💬 We’d love to hear what you think, what we can improve, and what features you'd love to see next.

Thanks so much for your support — and happy snapping! 🚀

— The Dropgala Team

You really upgraded the way of screenshooting, pleased to find this one as most of the Chrome add-ons I used fail from time to time to make the shot without a glitch.

Thanks for the time invested in this app👌🏻🤟🏻

name: Kaiboard
description: Kaiboard turns repetitive AI tasks into shortcut presses. Kaiboard allows you to bind prompts to shortcuts, which will run on your clipboard text.

node.body:
Hey, fellow Makers and Hunters!

This is my first PH launch ever 🎉.

It all started in October last year.


I used LLMs daily for text translations and proofreading. As it usually goes, I found copying text back and forth between my email app and ChatGPT annoying.

What should have been just a small experimental project to explore productivity hacks kept going because people found it interesting when I talked about it. It was a sign that I needed to finish it, and here we are.


How Kaiboard works?

  1. Download the desktop app

  2. Define a shortcut and a prompt that you find useful

  3. Copy text and press the shortcut

  4. The copied text and prompt are sent to the LLM

  5. Wait a bit and paste the result


If you are a productivity freak and you use LLM chatting every day, then give it a shot.
I would like to hear which of your repetitive tasks can be simplified using Kaiboard.


Sandro
Congrats on your launch! I am inspired by how you turned a small idea into a useful product!

name: Zysu
description: Find Zysu.io on Android, iOS, and Web! Configure Zysu to monitor live activities across all your socials. Zysu summarizes everything, everywhere in real time. It alerts Discords and subscribers with an AI notification and links as an alternative to link bios.

node.body:
Zysu is launching our first feature with a much bigger goal of turning content creators into a platform!

How?
We read everything like chat, social media events, and soon we will even make our voice capture available to everyone. We use an AI to summarize and track activity over time. Zysu allows users to request in plain English what it should say or do. The bot will use its memory and recent activity to interact! Followers can even compete for its attention! We had to build a super efficient system to make our free tier possible, this was a much harder problem than it looks.

Who?
We are working to support every social media platform. We listen to our users, and currently have a lot of video game streamers. We support useful features they requested for YouTube, Discord, and Twitch. Anyone can still sign up and try things out!

What's Next?
1) Browser plugin for voice capture during streams
2) AI bot that can be summoned to chats on Twitch and Discord. YouTube if users demand it.
3) AI content creator finder chat

Hello, Product Hunt community 👋
I'm thrilled to introduce AITextChecker.pro - the essential tool for verifying text authenticity in today's AI-dominated content landscape! 🚀

Why Choose AITextChecker.pro?
Our platform uses cutting-edge algorithms specifically designed to identify patterns common in AI-generated content. This level of precision is crucial for maintaining content integrity, improving SEO performance, and ensuring academic honesty.

name: Qwen2.5-VL-32B
description: Qwen2.5-VL-32B is the open-source 32B vision-language model. Combines strong language understanding with image/video analysis. Optimized with RL.

node.body:
Hi everyone!

Qwen2.5-VL-32B is the latest open-source vision-language model from the Alibaba Qwen team! This is a big deal because it's a 32B parameter model that's aiming for top-tier performance in both text and vision, and it's been optimized with reinforcement learning.

Key aspects:

🖼️ Vision + Language: It's not just a language model; it can understand and reason about images and videos.
🧠 32B Parameters: A good balance of power and efficiency – large enough to be capable, but not so huge that it's impossible to run.
🚀 Reinforcement Learning: They've used RL to improve its subjective performance (how well it aligns with human preferences) and its math/reasoning abilities.
🗣️ Instruction-Tuned: Specifically designed for following instructions and engaging in conversations.
🔓 Open Source with Apache 2.0. Freely available for research and commercial use.

It achieves top-tier performance for its size, and the focus on both vision and reasoning is really interesting.

You can already try it out in Qwen Chat.

name: Magicso - AI Note Assistant
description: Brain Overload? Let AI Be Your "Second Brain" ◆ Instant Content Distillation ◆ Smart Classification System ◆ Auto-Tagging That Just Works ◆ Micro-Writing, Macro-Output ◆ Foreign Text? No Problem

node.body:
Brain Overload? Let AI Be Your "Second Brain"

Every day, 60,000+ thoughts flash through your mind, most vanishing instantly... 
Every day, you're bombarded with 1 billion bits of visual information. Information anxiety is real. We all have the same 24 hours—why do some people create so much more value?

In this era of time fragmentation, you need a 24/7 thought manager!

【UNLOCKING GOD-TIER FEATURES】
◆ Instant Content Distillation 
Long articles, links, images, Word, PDF—throw it all at us! Content instantly transforms into pure gold. Say goodbye to "save and forget" syndrome.

◆ Smart Classification System 
Based on the PARA method (Projects, Areas, Resources, Archives), our AI automatically finds a home for your notes. Escape folder hell with our forever-simple, single-tier organization.

◆ Auto-Tagging That Just Works 
The AI reads your content and intent, generating spot-on tags. Searching becomes ridiculously easy—if you can think it, you can find it!

◆ Micro-Writing, Macro-Output 
Casually drop life fragments into the app, and AI generates complete journal entries. Today's "Memory Canvas" is ready—reliving your experiences has never hit different like this!

◆ Foreign Text? No Problem 
Foreign content making your brain melt? Copy → Paste → Send. Foreign text instantly becomes a summary in your language. Barrier-free access to global information—just that simple!

Our philosophy: When AI enters everyday life, everyone can create something extraordinary.

name: Navigable AI
description: Navigable AI lets you create and integrate an AI agent that guides users, automates actions, and answers questions - without the need for complex AI development. Use the power of LLM fine-tuning to train AI to be an expert on your product.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt community! I’m David, a solo developer who’s been building Navigable AI for the past 8 months. Navigable AI is a no-code LLM fine-tuning platform that helps you easily build & integrate an intelligent AI assistant into your product. Here’s what the assistant does:

  • 🧭 AI-Suggested Navigation: Guides users to the most relevant pages in your app using suggestions.

  • 🤖 Automate Actions: Lets the AI perform actions on behalf of your users using LLM tool calling, while re-using existing business logic.

  • 😄 Context-Aware Responses: Let's you create fine-tuned models to understand your product and deliver precise answers, using your product documentation.

With our platform and SDKs, building and integrating a fine-tuned assistant that does all of these things is super easy, all while keeping costs low (more than 80% savings)!

Who’s it for?

  • Products looking to build an AI Assistant to help users find the right features.

  • Websites needing a simple Q&A bot that answers questions with precision.

  • Freelancers and service providers who want to create and integrate AI chatbots with minimal effort and cost.

What's our story?
LLMs became popular, but most products can only do so much with LLMs, summaries & simple content generation mainly. We were looking for other use cases when we realized that LLMs are smart enough to guide users, but only if it knows your product inside-out. For this, we decided to go with the LLM fine-tuning approach. With insights from my partners, we built Navigable AI to simplify the LLM fine-tuning process using a no-code approach, taking care of the heavyweight tasks and avoiding common pitfalls. A side-effect benefit of this process was huge reduction in cost. Because we are able to use a smaller LLM for fine-tuning to get good results, we are saving big on the inference costs.

What do we need?
We’re eager for feedback on both our product idea and execution. If you have any suggestions or questions, please drop them here. And if you like what you see, feel free to share it with others! Also, If you need a customized LLM fine-tuning solution, we can make it happen. Just get in touch and we'll help you out.

Thanks for checking out Navigable AI. We can’t wait to hear your thoughts! 🚀

name: Reka Flash 3
description: Reka Flash 3 is the open-source 21B LLM. You can control the reasoning depth of it! Use tags to adjust "thinking time" for complex tasks.

node.body:
Hi everyone!

Sharing Reka Flash 3, a new open-source language model from Reka that gives you something unusual: control over how long the model "thinks" before answering!

Most LLMs have a fixed reasoning process. With Reka Flash 3, you can use <reasoning> </reasoning> tags in your prompt to tell the model to spend more time on complex problems.

It's like giving it a "thinking budget." And even with this extra thinking time, it's still fast – performance comparable to GPT-4o mini, but with a much smaller (21B parameter) and open-source (Apache 2.0) model.

Explore it yourself in Reka Space.

name: Archaide TradeLab
description: Archaide is an AI agent that turns your trading ideas into fully automated bots—no code needed. Just describe your strategy in plain English, and launch it live or in paper mode. Manage, monitor, and scale across assets, brokers, and accounts in one place.

node.body:
Hey everyone — I’m Tim, founder of Archaide.

A few years ago, I was juggling a full-time tech job, running a business, and managing my family’s $200K retirement account. I had a trading strategy I believed in, but no time to execute it consistently. I started missing trades, making emotional decisions, and realized something had to change.

So I quit everything and taught myself how to code.

The first thing I built was a trading bot — just to solve my own problem.

Then word spread. Over the next 3 years, my team built bots for hedge funds, influencers, and high-income traders who were all facing the same issue: time, inconsistency, and burnout.

Now we’ve packaged that into Archaide — an AI agent that lets anyone automate their trading strategy with natural language prompts. No code. Fully customizable. Hosted, monitored, and backed by real quant devs.

This is for the builders, hustlers, and traders who want leverage. Appreciate your support 🙏

name: Elegant Chat
description: This app instantly corrects your grammar and refines your language before you post. Chat effortlessly like a native speaker - or even better.

node.body:
Hi, I'm Huss.

English is not my first language, and it takes me a long time to respond to messages on Slack—not because I'm slow (ok, that's part of it) but because of the language barrier. Instead of just focusing on conveying my message, I often spend more time making sure it sounds like it came from an educated adult rather than a 3rd grade kiddo.

No matter how creative or brilliant an idea is, people can misunderstand or even ignore it if the message doesn't come across well. It's pretty understandable, right? If your writing sounds like a third grader's, people subconsciously judge your intelligence.

I know there are plenty of products out there that can help with this, but I'm a Slacker -- I mean, a big fan of Slack (not an actual slacker, literally). I love Slack and want a tool that integrates seamlessly with it. I want to improve the experience, type faster, and customize my message tone depending on who I'm chatting with. Sure, you can get a lot of these features for free from ChatGPT or other tools, but constantly switching windows, copying and pasting, and manually prompting every time is a pain. I want to do it quickly with no extra steps. That's why I built this tool—for myself and for others.

I was a Principal Engineer at a Fortune 500 company that takes customer data security seriously by encrypting everything. Working with encrypted data is a PITA, but after dealing with it for so long, it has become second nature to me. Now, I'm addicted to this pain (yeah, it's contagious). All of our products encrypt customer data before storing it in the database, and we rotate keys regularly.

You've probably heard companies brag about encrypting data at rest and in transit. That comes out of the box with cloud-managed services—but it doesn't mean their employees can't access your data. I'm not saying they'll do anything shady (but who really knows? ahem... me ta). With our approach, data is encrypted using AES-256 before it even reaches the database, making it virtually impossible for anyone to extract meaningful information.

One more thing -- this particular product doesn't store your messages permanently. They're encrypted in the cache layer for only a short time before the TTL kicks them out. If you disable the preview feature, we won't even cache them. Your messages will just pass through… like your ex.

name: Inferless
description: Deploy any machine learning model in production stress-free with ultra-low cold starts. Scale from single user to billions and only pay when you use.

node.body:
👋 Hi Product Hunt!

I'm Aishwarya, co-founder of Inferless with @nilesh_agarwal22 . We're thrilled to officially launch Inferless today!

Background Story: Two years ago, while running an AI-powered app startup, we hit a big wall: deploying AI models was expensive, complicated, and involved lots of idle GPU costs. The process simply didn’t make sense, so we decided to fix it ourselves.

Inferless is a Serverless GPU inference platform that helps developers deploy AI models effortlessly:

✅ Instant Deployments: Deploy any ML model within minutes—no hassle of managing infrastructure.
✅ Ultra-Low Cold Starts: Optimized for instant model loading
✅ Auto-Scaling & Cost-Efficient: Scale instantly from one to millions and only pay for what you actually use.
✅ Flexible Deployment: Use our UI, CLI, or run models remotely—however you prefer.

Since our private beta, we've processed millions of API requests and helped customers like Cleanlab, Spoofsense, Omi, Ushur etc move their production workloads to us.

And now, Inferless is open for everyone—no waitlists, just sign up and deploy instantly!

Feel free to ask me anything in the comments or provide any feedback. Your feedback and support mean the world. 🙌

Helpful links:

  • Docs: docs.inferless.com

  • Website: inferless.com

Looking forward to see what you ship with Inferless! Also, thank you @fmerian for hunting us! 💚

Been using Inferless since 1.5 years now. Absolutely seamless product and their support is awesome! They made deploying models to GPUs super easy for small team like ours and are always available incase of any questions or problems. Also their shared GPU pricing is not something I have seen anywhere. Love the product!

Coming from a startup background, I totally get the struggle of managing GPU infrastructure. Super interesting problem - making AI deployments super easy, no more wasted time or money on idle GPUs. Love the instant deployment and auto-scaling features. Kudos to the Inferless team for simplifying this process! Definitely recommending it. 🙌

name: Zapier MCP
description: Zapier MCP gives your AI assistant direct access to over 8,000+ apps and 30,000+ actions without complex API integrations. Now your AI can perform real tasks like sending messages, managing data, scheduling events, and updating records.

node.body:
Agents need access to your work apps. Turns out Zapier is pretty good at working with your apps. 8k+ in fact. So we thought why not get in on the MCP fun by making it easy for devs to hook their agents up to any app.


Would love feedback and to hear more about the use cases you are finding for this!

We hope everyone gives Zapier MCP a try! It's very simple: you generate your URL, configure your actions, and configure your client of choice (eg. Cursor, Windsurf, etc).


This was also a really fun product to build and has a little bit of history: originally, this codebase powered OpenAI plugins, which were based on OpenAPI specs defining APIs. While that didn't quite take off, we rebranded it and reused the stack for AI actions, which was an API-first approach to that same technology. While we saw some usage and excitement, models just weren't great at using tools at the time, and the pattern wasn't really normalized yet. That seems to be changing with MCP, and that's why we're really excited to launch this.

Third time's the charm!

I recently discovered Zapier MCP thanks to @talperetz who reached out to me, and I’m excited to share it with the PH community. :)


Zapier MCP lets your AI assistant connect to over 8,000 apps and perform 30,000+ actions without the hassle of complex API integrations. Now your AI can perform real tasks like sending messages, managing data, scheduling events, and updating records — transforming it from a conversational tool to a functional extension of your applications.


I love it because it transforms AI from just a chat tool into a practical, action-driven extension for your workflows. The setup is super straightforward: generate an endpoint, configure your actions, and connect your AI; it’s secure and scalable.

Whether you’re a builder or just looking to automate at scale, this is worth checking out. Many congrats to the Zapier team for the launch @talperetz @wadefoster @bryanhelmig. It's creating waves already! :)

name: mcpt
description: mcpt by Mintlify is a managed registry for Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers, which act as bridges between AI applications and external tools or data sources. Find and explore reliable, up-to-date MCP servers.

node.body:
Hi Product Hunt community 👋🏻 

I’m Tiffany from Mintlify, and we’re excited to introduce mcpt—a curated registry for MCP servers.

What is an MCP server?

MCP (Model Context Protocol) is an emerging standard that enables AI tools to interact with external data sources, like an API for LLMs. MCP servers act as intermediaries, providing structured data to AI applications.

Why build a registry?

Right now, it’s hard to find reliable servers and explore what’s possible because the MCP ecosystem is so fragmented. mcpt offers a curated registry with official and up-to-date servers, making it easier to experiment with new technology.

Try it out and let us know what you think, or if you have suggestions on servers to add!

One managed registry for quality MCP servers — it's about time.


We value craftsmanship at @Bucket and, as we're currently working on a MCP server (spoiler alert: soon), we were looking for such a place.
Centralized server discovery is super helpful! 👍

node.body:
Hey ProductHunt! I’m Quentin, one of the founders of the open-source search engine Meilisearch. Our goal is to make it easy for developers to ship good search UX, so I’m excited to launch Meilisearch AI today with the builders community here.


Meilisearch started when I was working in ecommerce and felt like the search options were either heavyweight like Elasticsearch or paid solutions with opaque pricing. We thought there was room for something transparent and dev-friendly that just works for most search use cases out of the box. Meilisearch AI is another step in this direction.


Our key features are:

🔎 Full-text search with simple, expressive ranking rules

🧠 AI-powered hybrid, semantic, and multi-modal search

⚡️ Sub 50ms latency, optimized for end user search


We’re excited to stabilize AI-powered search to allow developers to integrate fast and relevant search, retrieval-augmented generation, and recommendations in their apps. Building upon a year of open-source beta, our managed offer comes with the scalability, security, and monitoring you need to stay focused on building, not managing infrastructure.


For the occasion, we’re offering 2 months of free Meilisearch Cloud subscription. Use the ✨ "MeiliAI" ✨ coupon to get started.


We can’t wait to hear your thoughts!


For more details on our launch, check out: https://meilisearch.com/launch-week


Happy building 🚀

@quentin_dq @carolina_ferreira2 @maya_shin2 @gmourier
