  • No-code + API-friendly – Whether you’re an ops team or a data engineering squad, we make data extraction and integration effortless, powerful, and scaleable

  • Built to Scale - upload thousands of pages in batches locally or via API in event driven workflows.

  • Workflow canvas (In Beta for paid users) - Automate full document workflows end to end with over 2500 integrated apps. Speak to our team if you're interested in a demo and early access.

🔧 How teams are using cloudsquid today:
✅ Finance & ops teams use it to automate document verification for customer onboarding.
✅ Renewables companies use it to analyze solar & heat pump offers in seconds.
✅ Insurance companies automatically extract key information from loss runs and claims.

✅ Logistics companies match delivery notes with invoices from messy scanned documents


We’d love for you to try it out and share your thoughts! 🌊🐙

Drop any questions in the comments—we’re here to chat.

Super proud to be launching cloudsquid today!  🚀


We've put in a ton of work to make AI-powered data extraction seamless, and we can't wait for you to try it.
Excited to hear your thoughts! 🙌

Excited to introduce CloudSquid today! 🚀 Transform any document or file into structured data—instantly. cloudsquid uses AI to extract, validate, and transform data with ease, all within a no-code table interface.

With the New Gemini 2.0 pipeline, you can process PDFs, images, sound, and video files blazing fast—and at a fraction of the cost. Whether you're automating workflows or handling complex data extraction, cloudsquid makes it seamless.

Kudos to the team for simplifying data extraction like never before! 🙌

name: Papr.ai
description: Papr is the first AI-native workspace with infinite memory, powered by state-of-the-art retrieval accuracy. Stop losing context across tools—Papr remembers everything from Slack, docs, and meetings. Teams work better, 3x faster. Your AI never forgets.

node.body:
Hi everyone! 👋

I'm Shawkat, the founder of Papr. As someone with ADHD, keeping track of important details and finding the right context when I need it has always been a struggle. When ChatGPT launched, I was excited thinking it might solve this, but it was like hiring a brilliant executive who forgets every conversation they've ever had—even the most advanced AI couldn't maintain context between interactions.

How could it effectively find and remember critical information buried within terabytes of corporate data?

That's why we created Papr — an AI-native workspace that remembers your context and organizes your knowledge so you don't have to.

What makes Papr different?

  • State-of-the-art accuracy: We've achieved 86% accuracy on Stanford's STARK benchmark, securing the number one spot on the leaderboard. STARK represent real-world queries vs. simple needle-in-the-haystack benchmarks.

  • Connected to your data: Your AI instantly recalls context from Slack, docs, and meetings—creating a unified knowledge base that answers complex questions and grows with your team.

  • Document-first workspace: Unlike chat-first platforms, we're building an AI-native document experience with Apple-inspired design. Create and edit documents while AI maintains perfect context—no agent configuration needed. Think Cursor.ai but for collaborative documents with infinite memory.

Here's what teams are building with Papr:

  • 📚 Generate Scientific Research: Transform scattered research papers, meeting notes, and experimental data into cohesive academic papers while maintaining perfect context of your methodology decisions and findings.

  • 🌐 Build a 360° Customer View: Automatically aggregate and analyze the latest conversations, usage trends, and public information to create a comprehensive view of your customers. Teams can make informed decisions, increase revenue footprint, improve revenue retention, and enhance customer relationships.

  • 🔍 Answer Complex Questions: Find the right answers faster by connecting insights across your team's conversations, documents, and decisions - even remembering context from months ago that you forgot existed.

What does this enable?

Imagine being able to extract feature requests from customer conversations and gain insights across all customers instantly. For example, you could easily identify the top problems your customers face or the most requested features during sales calls—tasks that used to take months now take minutes.

Who is it for?

Papr is for anyone drowning in data but struggling to find the insights they need. Whether you're a researcher, a product manager, or someone juggling multiple projects, Papr helps you stay organized and focused.

Why we built it:

We believe that information overload shouldn't hold you back. With Papr, we're creating a future where your AI doesn't just assist—it understands and remembers, so you can focus on what matters most.

We'd love your feedback and support! 🙏

If you have any questions or thoughts, drop them below. We're here to listen and improve. Thank you for checking out Papr, and we can't wait to hear what you think!

Launch Offer (24 Hours Only):

  • Pro subscription: $40/month

  • First 50 users get 50% off for the first 3 month

  • Priority support included

  • 7-day risk-free trial
I thing query context for the AI model has prompt limits?
Love the infinite memory concept for easy retrieval! 👍

name: Camouflage for iOS
description: No more fiddling with the markup tool in the Photos app to hide a face. Redact your favorite photos with emojis on iOS and protect the privacy of your loved ones. Camouflage automatically detects faces and overlays it with an emoji!

node.body:
Hello Product Hunt 👋

A few months back I was having a talk with some teachers and noticed they were complaining about the fact that some parents ask that their children are not included on pictures that are being shared on the social media channels of the school.
They always needed to manually redact the images and they hated the fact that they were losing so much time with this task.

This got me thinking to help them out ... enter Camouflage for iOS!
Camouflage is leveraging the power of machine learning (this is a mandatory sentence these days, right?) to detect faces in a picture and lets you redact them with an emoji of choice.

All the processing is happening locally on your device with *no* photo data being sent to third-party servers.

I hope you like it!
Cheers,
Frederik
What a creative solution well done. Does Camouflage allow you to pick different emojis for different people in the same picture?

What a clever and enjoyable way to tackle privacy issues. The use of emojis adds a fun twist that makes the whole process of protecting privacy feel a lot less boring. Hats off to you for such an innovative idea!

name: Clara - Your Private AI Partner
description: Meet Clara, your private AI on Mac, Windows, and beyond—no cloud, no data sharing, just fast, secure intelligence at your fingertips. From chat and automation to image generation, Clara empowers you to create, innovate, and stay in control—completely offline.

node.body:
🚀 Clara: On-Device AI for Chat, Agents & Images

No clouds. No servers. Just you and open-source AI.


Hey Product Hunt!
We’re thrilled to introduce Clara—a privacy-first AI assistant & agent builder that runs entirely on your device. No cloud dependencies, no big-company servers—just open-source AI models running locally, giving you total control of your data and creativity.

Why Clara?

  • AI Chat: Talk to open-source models—complete with multimodal image support.

  • Image Generation: Craft stunning visuals using Stable Diffusion, all offline.

  • Agent Builder: Visually design AI agents—then export them as apps with ease.

  • Image Gallery: Organize and manage all your generated artwork in one place.

  • 100% Local: Zero tracking, zero leaks—you own your AI experience.

Ready to Chat. Automate. Create.—all off the grid?
Give Clara a try today, and let us know what you think in the comments! We can’t wait to see what you build.

🛣️ What’s Next for Clara?

Clara v1.0 is just the beginning. Here’s what’s coming soon:

🌐 Peer-to-Peer Sharing – Share agents, chats, and creations directly—no cloud, no middleman.

🧠 In-App Model Management – Seamlessly download, switch, and manage local models like LLaMA, Mistral, Gemma, and more—right inside the app.

🔌 Plugin Support – Supercharge Clara with custom tools, APIs, and automation workflows tailored to your needs.

🗣️ Voice Support – Talk to Clara with your voice for a hands-free, natural experience.

📚 Personal Knowledge Base – Bring your own files, notes, or docs—Clara will remember and respond with context.

We’re building this in the open—so tell us what you'd love to see next. Your ideas fuel the roadmap!

name: Notte.ai
description: Notte.ai is a smart meeting assistant powered by AI, crafted to make note-taking easier and boost productivity. It lets you capture key conversations, organize ideas smoothly, and gain valuable insights with ease.

node.body:
Hi everyone!


We built Notte.ai because we’ve all been in meetings where we’re too focused on talking—or too overwhelmed—to take proper notes. We wanted a tool that lets you stay present in the conversation without worrying about missing key points.


🎙️ Just hit “record” in Notte.ai and you’re set. While you focus on the meeting, Notte works in the background—transcribing speech in real-time, identifying who’s speaking with voiceprint recognition, and organizing everything into clean, usable notes.


No more scrambling to write everything down, asking “who said that?” later, or going through hour-long recordings just to find one moment. After the meeting ends, you get an AI-generated summary that’s clear, structured, and ready to share.


Here’s what makes Notte.ai special:


✅ One-click recording – No setup, no fuss.

✅ Real-time voice-to-text – Watch your conversation become text as you speak.

✅ Speaker identification – Know exactly who said what.

✅ AI-powered summaries – Get high-quality meeting notes instantly, with action items and key points.

✅ Multi-language support – Great for global teams.

✅ Instant sharing – Share notes with teammates in seconds.


To celebrate our launch on Product Hunt, we’re offering 3 months free for early supporters! It’s our way of saying thanks for giving Notte.ai a try.


If you’re ready to stop taking notes and start using them, give Notte.ai a spin. We’d love to hear what you think—and help make your meetings way less messy. 🚀

Congratulations on the launch! I love your design and style—it’s excellent.


I have one question: at what distance should people speak from the computer for it to pick up clearly, and can the app separate multiple voices from each other?

name: myDrScout

name: Cline
description: Build applications in minutes using plain English with Cline, an open-source agent. It generates code, runs commands, and debugs in your browser using any LLM of your choice. With built-in automation and extensibility, Cline helps you code faster and smarter.

node.body:
When I first started working with AI coding assistants, I realized something was missing. AI coding assistants weren’t doing the actual work; they instead were just suggesting changes. 

Cline fixes that by generating, executing, and debugging code effortlessly. It’s simply a step ahead of Cursor, Continue, and Codeium.

Use Cline as your personal AI-powered assistant to build applications using everyday English. It doesn’t just generate code; it runs commands, debugs in your browser, and automates your workflow using any LLM you choose.

Why Cline Stands Out:

• Use Any LLM – OpenAI, Anthropic, local models—you decide!
• Run Terminal Commands – Automate everything from builds to deployments.
• Browser-Based Debugging – Test code visually and interact with elements.
• Versioning – Track, compare, and restore code changes effortlessly.
• Cost Tracking – Monitor LLM usage and optimize expenses for every command.
• Extensibility – Seamlessly integrate APIs, tools, and custom automation.

This isn’t just for developers, it’s for anyone with an idea. Whether you're a startup shipping faster, a business optimizing resources, or a creator without coding experience, Cline turns your ideas into reality.

name: Hunyuan3D 2.0
description: Hunyuan3D 2.0 from Tencent, is the open-source 3D-DiT model for high-res 3D asset generation (geometry + texture). Outperforms many closed & open models.

node.body:
Hi everyone!

Sharing Hunyuan3D 2.0 from Tencent, a new fully open-source system for generating 3D assets. It uses a two-stage process (separate models for geometry and texture) based on a 3D Diffusion Transformer (3D-DiT).

Key aspects:

🔓 Open Source: The code, models, and (presumably) data are available.
✨ High Quality: Generates high-resolution geometry and textures.
🏆 Performance: Tencent reports outperforming both open-source and closed-source models on CMMD, FID_CLIP, FID, and CLIP-score.
🛠️ Tools: Includes a Blender addon, API server, Gradio app, and integration with ComfyUI.
📦 Offers various models, including a fast version (Hunyuan3D-DiT-v2-0-Fast) and a smaller version (Hunyuan3D-2mini).

This provides a complete, open pipeline for 3D asset creation from text or images.

name: Eliorai
description: Eliorai brings the power of advanced AI tools like ChatGPT, DALL-E, Udio, Flux and many more directly to your favorite messaging platform. No more switching between apps or learning new interfaces—access everything through natural conversations in WhatsApp.

node.body:
🚀 Eliorai: The "Beast Mode" AI That’ll Hijack Your WhatsApp in the Best Way Possible

Hey Product Hunters! 👋


Buckle up, because I'm about to blow your mind with Eliorai (say it with me: El-ee-or-AI), the most feral, boundary-smashing AI companion ever to storm WhatsApp. This isn't some limp chatbot that spits out canned replies—this is your creative studio, your brainiac tutor, your entertainment overlord, all crammed into the app you're already glued to every damn day. Forget app-switching, forget limitations. Eliorai's here to unleash pure, unfiltered AI chaos—and you’re gonna love every second of it.


The Big "Why" Behind Eliorai

Picture this: the AI revolution's raging—chatbots, image generators, music makers—but WhatsApp, where over 2 billion humans spill their lives, is still stuck in the stone age. We saw that travesty and said, "Nah, we're fixing this." After months of caffeine-fueled coding marathons and relentless testing, Eliorai was born—a beastly AI that fuses cutting-edge tech into your WhatsApp chats. No more hopping between apps to flex your creativity or get shit done. It's all here, right in your pocket, where you already live.


Not Just Another AI—It’s a Freaking Experience

We didn't build Eliorai to be "good enough." We asked: "How do we make an AI so dope, so mind-blowingly fun, that you'll want to chat with it every single day?" The answer? Technical wizardry meets personal magic. It speaks 100+ languages, groks your voice messages, and dishes out thoughtful answers. But that's table stakes. The real insanity kicks in when you flip the switch to "Beast Mode." Oh yeah, shit's about to get wild.


🔥 BEAST MODE: Where WhatsApp AIs Go to Cry

Other WhatsApp AIs? They're sipping weak tea while Eliorai's chugging rocket fuel. "Beast Mode" is our war cry—no more basic text replies, no more yawn-fest features. We've unleashed a creative arsenal that'll transform how you flex, connect, and straight-up dominate your chats. Here's the lineup:

  1. 🎵 Turn Words Into Songs That Hit Like a Freight Train

    Imagine this: you scribble a few sappy lines about your boo, tell Eliorai "make it a soulful R&B jam," and minutes later, you're dropping a pro-grade song in your chat that'd make Drake jealous. This isn't some sci-fi pipe dream—it's live, right now, in WhatsApp worldwide. Weddings, birthdays, anniversaries, or just because—your words become music, and it's personal as hell.

    Early adopters are losing their minds:

    • One dude shocked his wife with an anniversary song about their first date—she bawled, he scored major points.

    • A crew of friends cooked up a birthday anthem that turned a surprise party into legend status.

    • Long-distance lovers ditched boring texts for musical love bombs. "I sent my girl a song from my own lyrics, and she called me sobbing—it said what texts never could," says Michael K., an early beast-mode warrior.

  2. 🖼️ Photos Reborn as Art That Slaps

    In a world obsessed with visuals, Eliorai's your cheat code. Snap a selfie, a pic of your dog, that epic sunset from your last trip—upload it, toss in some direction like "make it a Van Gogh fever dream" or "turn my cat into a steampunk pirate," and boom—Eliorai spits out art so dope you'll question reality. It's instant, it's in WhatsApp, and it's yours to flex.


    Real stories from the trenches:

    • One user turned her dating profile pics into renaissance masterpieces—matches spiked 300%, dates ensued.

    • A dad's been remixing his kids' pics into weekly art drops for the grandparents—new family heirloom alert.

    • "I made my dog a medieval knight and sent it to my group chat. They lost it," laughs a tester who's now the squad's art lord.

  3. 🎨 Dream It, See It, Share It—No App Hopping

    Text-to-image AI is hot, but most tools demand PhD-level prompting skills or a separate app. Screw that. With Eliorai, you type "a punk rock dinosaur shredding a guitar in a lava pit" or "a floating city with rainbow waterfalls," and seconds later, you've got a pro-tier image to sling into your chat. No fuss, no extra downloads—just raw creative power where you already are.

    It's flipping the script on communication:

    • Marketers brainstorm visuals mid-chat, no Slack detour needed.

    • Teachers whip up lesson art on the fly—kids stay hooked.

    • "I'm trash at visuals, but now I’m dropping custom memes in my group like a pro," says Jamie T., a product manager hooked on the juice.


Beyond Beast Mode: Your 24/7 AI Sidekick

"Beast Mode" steals the spotlight, but Eliorai's a full-on companion:

  • 📚 Pocket Tutor: Math, science, history, whatever—get practice problems, breakdowns, and guidance. "Calculus was kicking my ass till Eliorai walked me through it. C to A-," says Sarah L., a college sophomore.

  • ✏️ Writing Wingman: Emails, posts, stories—Eliorai edits, suggests, and sparks ideas. "It's my round-the-clock editor," says Carlos M., a freelance hustler.

  • 🔍 Image Decoder: Upload a plant pic for ID, a screenshot for fixes, a landmark for lore. Privacy? Ironclad—your stuff stays yours.

Fits Like a Glove

Eliorai's genius is its zero-friction vibe:

  • No new app to clog your phone.

  • No steep learning curve—just chat.

  • No subscription hoops outside WhatsApp.

  • No habit overhaul—text it like a friend.

Just message Eliorai, and you're rolling with AI firepower.


Free Beast Mode—For Now

For our Product Hunt debut, we're dropping a 3-day free tier. Click "Open WhatsApp" and unleash the beast in seconds. No strings, just pure chaos to play with.


The Future's Insane

Eliorai's just warming up. Coming soon:

- Set reminders and events—your personal and intelligent scheduler

- Video clips from text—think TikTok meets AI.

- Group chat co-creation with your crew.

- Tune Eliorai's vibe to match your personality.


Why This Matters

In a sea of disjointed apps, Eliorai's a middle finger to complexity. It's not about more tools—it's about smarter integration. AI should live where you do, and WhatsApp's the battlefield. Ready to join the "Beast Mode" uprising? 🔥

#BeastModeAI #WhatsAppRevolution #AIEverywhere #CustomAISongs #NoMoreAppSwitching, #CalAI, #PlantAI


We'd love your feedback and thoughts! Feel free to try Eliorai and let us know what you think. 🙌

Cheers,
Kofi.

name: Enterprise by Silkworks
description: Enterprise by Silkworks is an AI based business modeling tool. No more need for spreadsheets, dashboards or expensive BI systems. Perfect for product managers, execs, etc. who want to maximize their revenue by predicting what will have the most impact.

node.body:
The main inspiration for the product was the product management concept of a KPI tree. The goal of the KPI tree is to connect how your KPIs affect the company's profit (or some other important company-wide metric), which is helpful at directing actions at the individual level to fulfill the company's goals. However, at a quick glance you can see several rather large limitations: 1. the fact that its structure is a tree can be quite constraining, 2. there's usually still quite a gap between the KPI and what you're actually able to directly influence, and 3. It's static which makes even simple updates to the business difficult to handle.

Our product is an attempt at solving these inefficiencies and adding prediction, simulation and measurement of all metrics and KPIs from the bottom up to aggregate metrics like profit, giving the user a true model of their business.

node.body: ### **🚀 AutoVerify – Get AI-Powered Vehicle History Reports for UK Used Cars 🚗** 🔗 **Live now:** [https://autoverify.co.uk](https:... **Hey Product Hunt!** 👋 Buying a used car can be **risky** – hidden issues like outstanding finance, insurance write-offs, or mileage fraud can turn a great deal into a nightmare. Troy here, founder of Epiphany.


If you’re like me, most of your ideas don’t show up when you’re sitting at your desk. They come when you’re walking, driving, or in the middle of something else.

name: RecordAi
description: RecordAi is a friendly WhatsApp assistant you chat with—send texts or voice notes, and it’ll remind you of everything important. Unlike traditional to-do lists, RecordAi understands you naturally, sets reminders, and pings you at exactly the right moment.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt friends! 👋

I'm super excited to introduce **RecordAi**, your new WhatsApp reminders assistant that's as natural as chatting with another friend. Forget clunky commands or robotic interactions—RecordAi truly understands you, using natural language that's tailored specifically to your region, whether you're speaking Argentine Spanish, British English, Colombian Spanish or anything else!

Here's a quick overview of RecordAi's key features:

✨ One-time & Recurring Reminders: Easily set reminders with just a casual text or voice note—RecordAi will ping you exactly at the right moment.

📋 Smart Lists: Create, edit, and retrieve your lists anytime directly within WhatsApp, without ever leaving the conversation.

🗓️ Google Calendar Integration: Receive timely notifications about upcoming events, with full calendar management features coming very soon (stay tuned in the next weeks!)

🌱 Image Recognition: Snap a photo of your plants, and RecordAi creates personalized watering schedules based on their type and current status.

🎙️ Voice Recognition: Simply send voice notes, and LOL effortlessly converts your requests into reminders and tasks.

🔊 Voice Mode: Specifically designed for those with reduced visibility or hands-free convenience—interact completely via voice commands.

At our core, RecordAi is intentionally simple and friendly:
- Feels Like a Friend: No rigid commands, no forced interactions—just talk naturally.
- No Intrusive CTAs: Simply chat, like you would with any friend. This is not just a product embedded into WhatsApp.
- Not Trying to Be Everything: We're focused on doing one thing exceptionally well—making daily life easier, even for people who aren't tech-savvy (my mom loves it!).

We'd love your feedback and thoughts! Feel free to try RecordAi and let us know what you think. 🙌

Cheers,
Juan.

node.body:
Hi everyone!

Canvas – or "Artifacts" as it's known in many other products – has finally come to Gemini! It's a new interactive workspace within Google's Gemini that lets you collaborate with AI on both writing and coding projects. You can generate text/code, iterate, and refine your work in real-time, with Gemini as your partner.

Key features:

✍️ Writing Assistance: Generate drafts, get feedback, use quick editing tools (tone, length, etc.).
💻 Code Generation & Preview: Create/edit code (HTML, React, Python, etc.) with live previews.
🔄 Real-Time Updates: See changes from you and Gemini instantly.
📤 Google Docs & Colab Export: Easily move your work.

There's also a new "Audio Overview" feature that's perfect for quickly understanding lengthy or complex files. It generates a podcast-style summary, so you can get the key points on the go.

It's available now for Gemini and Gemini Advanced subscribers in 45+ languages, globally.

Gemini Canvas is a game-changer for brainstorming and early-stage creation, particularly for writers, UX designers, and developers exploring new ideas. Its real-time AI collaboration and frictionless interface make it a top choice for hackathons, solo creators, or teams needing rapid validation.

However, it’s not yet a one-stop shop. Power users will crave deeper customization (Gems support!) and better scalability for complex projects. For now, treat it as the ultimate sandbox—not the full toolbox.

name: BabelShark
description: BabelShark is a tool for a rapid localization of websites and HTML mobile apps. BabelShark combines the speed of automatic translation with manual correction and AI-based proofreading.

node.body:
Dear BabelShark followers and users! Less than a year after our great launch on ProductHunt, I am glad to present a game-changing feature that takes BabelShark to the next level!

We've supercharged BabelShark with an AI-powered engine to tackle the most challenging part of localization: proofreading.

Now, BabelShark AI acts as a professional team of native-speaking proofreaders of every languages of the world - completely free of charge!


Why AI proofreading is a game-changer


Traditional proofreading is time-consuming and costly. Hiring native speakers for every language you support can be a logistical nightmare. With AI, those headaches disappear:

  • Instant Results – AI checks and improves translations in seconds.

  • Always Available – No delays, no vacations - 24/7 proofreading.

  • Cost-Free – No additional expenses for ensuring translation quality.

With BabelShark, you can localize your website or HTML app (iOS and Android, built with React, @Meteor, @Ionic Framework and similar frameworks) literally in just five minutes. With new AI-powered proofreading, you can check and correct all pending translations blazing fast!


What is BabelShark


BabelShark is a rapid localization tool for your web application. Just add our JavaScript snippet, mark strings to localize with "__" CSS class... and you're done!


We built and develop BabelShark for teams and individuals who need to localize their products right away, or have a rapidly-changing product. Let BabelShark handle your international audience!


---


P.S. We still maintain a human proofreaders community for special cases, but AI proves to be the most efficient solution in 98% of cases. Try it now and experience the future of effortless localization!

How BabelShark works and what's the main idea:


  • Avoid storing strings separately (in i18n JSONs or whatever)

  • Do not translate the whole page (like Google Translate does)


Instead, you mark strings (elements) to localize with CSS "__" class. BabelShark localizes these UI elements to visitor's language on the fly automatically (you choose which target languages you support).


BabelShark uses automated translator once to translate each string. After that, translation goes to the database and you can review and edit it (with the help of AI, too). Edited translations will change for all visitors.


Cons: there's currently one major disadvantage - SEO. We translate strings on client side. If your website has static HTML, Google index the original text. We plan to get this solved, but currently we target to React, Vue, Meteor and similar web frameworks.


Here's the very minimal CodePen example: https://codepen.io/babelshark/pen/pomjMNW
My app uses JavaScript to render half its content. Does BabelShark crawl post-rendered HTML or just scrape static text? Missing dynamic elements could leave chunks untranslated.

name: AgentRPC
description: Connect AI agents to any function without exposing APIs.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt! 👋

AgentRPC is a managed platform and set of developer SDKs for connecting agents to functions (tools) across network and language boundaries.

This allows you to wrap functions and make them available to AI agents using Model Context Protocol (MCP) and OpenAI tool calls (including the new Agents SDK) and makes for easier decoupling of tools and agent implementation. 

Cases for this include registering tools from services with no inbound network access (Local Machines, IoT, Private VPCs, etc).

Some key features:
- Connect to tools in TypeScript and Go with (Python and .NET) (coming soon)
- Attach the tools to Agents (MCP / Open AI tool bindings)
- Long polling SDKs allow function calls beyond HTTP timeout limits and from within private VPCs
- Tracing, metrics, and events for visibility of every tool call
- Call tools from Claude Desktop / Cursor / any MCP client

Thanks taking a look, we would love your thoughts!

name: Pixsso
description: The Pixsso Frame is a stylish E-Ink display for AI-generated art. A living gallery for AI artists, it fills your space with ever-changing digital creativity. Pixsso's hardware is open source, build yours!

node.body:
Hi Product Hunt! Pedro here from Hal9, the creators of Pixsso 🔲 —an eInk frame that brings AI-generated art to your space.

Unlike typical eInk displays, Pixsso features interactive buttons that let you choose the content you love. Simply press a button to shuffle through our gallery of "AI artists" and explore fresh images every day.

Instead of simply just calling a Stable Diffusion model for random content, each "AI artist" is a multi-agent system that generates images based on unique data and behaviors. For example, one artist might paint cities in a specific style using real-time weather—if it's raining there, the image will reflect that. Another artist could turn real-world news into cartoons, while another might remix pop culture into stunning visuals.

Of course, we are using the terms "art" and "artist" lightly. Our goal is to create a digital minimalist experience that sparks the exploration of our relationship with new technologies, particularly AI. We are big fans of the profound role that Art and Artists play in society, way beyond "image generation".

🚀 Open Source & Pre-orders
We've open-sourced Pixsso’s hardware so anyone can build their own! It’s based on Waveshare’s 7.5" monochrome eInk display, the ESP32 microcontroller, and a 2000mAh battery, with custom 3D-printed and laser-cut parts. You can DIY or pre-order a fully assembled frame at pixsso.com —shipping starts in April.

💡 Subscription & Content
Pixsso will always offer free daily content—no subscription required. However, since image generation is resource-intensive, each Pixsso Frame comes with a one-year subscription for access to multiple AI artists and more generative content.

BTW, Pixsso’s AI is powered by Hal9, our startup’s platform—so you’ll see the Hal9 name all over.

Excited to hear your thoughts—AMA below!

name: INSIGHT DOCUMENT
description: Insight Document wraps LLMs around documents and databases, allowing users to ask questions in plain English and get instant insights. It automates data analysis, generating reports, charts, and summaries without coding or analysts, saves time and reduce costs

node.body:
Insight Document wraps LLMs around documents and databases, enabling users to ask questions in plain English and receive instant insights. It automates data analysis by processing reports, PDFs, and structured data sources, generating charts, summaries, and reports without requiring coding or data analysts. This saves businesses time, reduces costs, and accelerates decision-making. 



How Insight Document Solves These Problems
Insight Document eliminates the need for manual data analysis and complex BI tools by wrapping LLMs around both structured and unstructured data, making insights instantly accessible.

Instead of spending hours manually analyzing PDFs, reports, or databases, users can simply ask questions in plain English, and Insight Document will process the data, extract key insights, and generate automated reports with charts, tables, and summaries.

For businesses struggling with complex BI tools, our platform removes the need for SQL or coding by providing a conversational AI interface that understands real-world business queries. This allows non-technical users to access insights instantly, without relying on data analysts.

We also streamline fragmented workflows by integrating with databases, cloud storage, and BI tools like Power BI and Tableau, ensuring businesses can analyze all their data sources in one place. Our AI-driven automation reduces costs, improves efficiency, and accelerates decision-making.

name: nomi.cloud
description: Modern, AI-Powered, CloudOps & HPC Assistant for your Next-Gen Business | nomi.cloud

node.body:
🚀 Hello Product Hunt Family! 🚀

Today, I’m ridiculously excited (and slightly terrified) to introduce you to nomi.cloud — the SaaS we wish existed when our cloud infrastructure bills made us cry.

💡 The Backstory:

It all started on a dark and stormy billing cycle... Well, kind of..
We had spun up some AI workloads, a few dev environments, and that one database, the junior dev swore he’d turned off. Next thing we know, the cloud bill showed up like a bad ex — uninvited and emotionally damaging.

“Where the hell did all this come from?” I yelled into the void (Telegram). 
No answer.

That’s when it hit me — CloudOps and cost management today feels like fighting a boss battle with a wooden sword. And that’s why we built nomi.cloud — your snarky, no-BS cloud sidekick that keeps tabs on your GPU, compute, and AI workload costs before your CFO throws a chair. 

🤖 So, what the heck is nomi.cloud?

In short, nomi.cloud is your FinOps & CloudOps co-pilot for AI, GPU, and compute-intensive workloads.

✅ Real-time cost visibility — so you know exactly what’s draining your wallet.
✅ Smart usage monitoring — alerts when someone leaves an expensive instance running (yes, Chad from ML team, looking at you).
✅ Automated kill-switches — because forgetting is human, but draining budget is dumb.
✅ Budget guards — protect your startup runway like your life depends on it (because it kinda does).
✅ Multi-cloud support — Shadeform, AWS, and others (AWS bill therapy group coming soon).

💬 But why the name nomi?

Because Nomi is your new frugal, pleasant but slightly sarcastic cloud bestie. She doesn’t trust “free-tier” promises and double-checks your cloud spend the way your grandma double-checks every restaurant bill.

🎯 Who’s it for?

    AI researchers tired of explaining costs to finance.
    Founders who thought they were on a budget.
    Teams running GPUs or AI workloads.
    Anyone sick of unpredictable cloud bills and spreadsheet hell.

📈 Our mission:

Modern Infrastructure management, in the age of AI, should be simple. We try to make cloud compute affordable, accountable, and kinda fun — or at least less rage-inducing.

🔥 We’re live today on Product Hunt!

👉 nomi.cloud - Your AI cloud spend's new worst enemy (and best friend)
We’d love your feedback, your horror stories, or just show some love in the comments.

Let’s make cloud costs predictable, accessible and transparent, one snarky notification at a time.

P.S. First 100 signups get early access and free credits — because your wallet deserves a break.

—

😎 Cheers,
SDG
Founder @ nomi.cloud
Does @nomi.cloud offer predictive budgeting

I built a chrome extension that lets me reference files and apply changes directly from chatgpt or claude.

Many people pay for ChatGPT pro and Claude pro, sometimes you just want to use the website for AI code assistance (maybe to use gpt-4.5 or opus, or deep research), copying and pasting back and forth is a pain.

name: Vaultrio
description: Vaultrio is a pioneering Web3 platform that empowers users to securely tokenize both physical and digital assets— transforming them into “Relics”, a.k.a. NFTs, that provide immutable proof of ownership, authenticity, and value on the blockchain.

node.body:
🚀 Vaultrio - Proof of Ownership & Authenticity, Secured on Blockchain

Hey Product Hunt!

My vision with Vaultrio is to make blockchain-powered proof of ownership and authenticity as simple and accessible as possible. Instead of overcomplicating things, we allow users to securely verify anything by saving a Keccak256 hash of a file directly in the state of an NFT smart contract (which happens to be patent pending!).

This means that any file’s authenticity can be verified anytime, by anyone, without storing the actual file itself—just its immutable hash, tied to a unique NFT ("Relic") on-chain.

What’s Next?

🔥 Developer SDK – We’re actively building an SDK that will allow seamless Vaultrio API integration into other apps.

📝 Vaultrio Blog – Launching soon and syndicated on Medium! ubscribe for news and articles: https://medium.com/@vaultrio.
🌐 Multi-Chain Expansion – Bringing Vaultrio to more blockchains for flexibility & interoperability.
💎 VRIO Token – Continually Building Value – Expanding use cases & utility for deeper ecosystem integration.

The Future 🚀

I would like to see Vaultrio become the trivial & seamless backbone for proving ownership in content creation, legal contracts, digital identity, real-world assets, and beyond.

Would love to hear your thoughts, feedback, and suggestions! A few follows on X (@Vaultrio), to get us started, would be greatly appreciated. Hope you find Vaultrio useful!

Thanks!
Hugo

name: ZORI
description: Find, Vet and Reach Out to Industrial Suppliers in Minutes not Months

node.body:
🚀 ZORI is LIVE on Product Hunt: AI-Powered Procurement for Industrial SMBs

I’m @louis_mukolwe, and with my co-founder @misato_kotera, we’re working to solve one of the biggest challenges for industrial SMBs—finding, vetting, and connecting with reliable suppliers.


💡 TL;DR → ZORI uses AI to help global SMBs source, vet, and connect with Japan/U.S based industrial suppliers—much faster.



Why We’re Building ZORI


We’ve spent years in procurement and manufacturing, working with SMBs, suppliers, and supply chain teams. The same frustrations kept coming up:


🔍 Finding industrial suppliers (especially outside China) takes forever.

📂 Vetting suppliers is chaotic and incredibly time consuming—scattered across too many tools.

📑 RFQs are slow, repetitive, and full of delays.

💰 Most procurement tools are built for enterprises—expensive, complex, and locked behind ERPs.


We knew there had to be a better way!



What Can You Do With ZORI Today?


We’re starting simple to see how ZORI fits into your workflow. Right now, you can:


💬 Chat with ZORI to gain general procurement insights.

📄 Generate RFQs & supplier emails instantly—no more starting from scratch.

🚢 Estimate shipping & import costs on the spot.

📑 Summarize supplier contracts—so you don’t have to read 50 pages.


📌 This is just the beginning. We’re launching early access to gather real feedback from real users—so we can make ZORI even better.



What’s Next? (With Your Feedback!)


🔹 Find the right industrial suppliers with a simple prompt—we’re training ZORI to make this seamless.

🔹 AI-powered procurement workflows—sourcing to delivery, significantly faster with actionable insights


🛠 ZORI is 100% FREE for early access users, but spots are limited to 10 businesses.


📩 Try it now → https://www.zori.io


🔥 What’s the most frustrating part of procurement for you? Drop a comment or email me at [louismukolwe@zori.io]—we’d love to chat!

name: Tablepilot
description: Tablepilot is a CLI/API/WebUI tool designed to generate/autofill tables using AI. - AI-Native - Flexible column data generation strategies - Cross-table context - Easily switch between different LLMs and models - Seamless API & WebUI

node.body:
Hi,

I wanted to share my open-source (Free & MIT licensed) AI table generator with you all. It’s not a fancy tool, it focuses on just one thing: generating tables using AI.

You can easily define different LLM models and switch between them. It also supports batch generation of thousands of rows and allows you to use existing tables or CSV files as context. As the title suggests, you can use it via CLI, API, or WebUI!

Here’s a quick demo of the WebUI:

There are also some interesting examples of how to use Tablepilot:

  • recipes_for_customers This example illustrating how to use another table as a reference. The customers.json file is used to generate a customer table, and then the recipes table is generated based on customer data. Each customer will receive a unique recipe tailored to their information.

  • pokémons This example demonstrates how to create a table, import an existing CSV of 1000 Pokémons, and autofill column data. Tablepilot will generate ecological information for each Pokémon based on the existing row data.

  • imdb_movie_haiku This example takes an IMDb movie CSV table and generates haiku poems inspired by movie titles and overviews, blending structured data with artistic expression.

If you're interested, check it out here: https://github.com/Yiling-J/tablepilot

Stars, suggestions, and feature requests are all welcome! 🚀

What makes Grokade unique:

* Resources for developers exploring the intersection of AI and game creation

We're building both a player destination and a professional network for developers working in this emerging space.  If you're interested in playing innovative browser games, showcasing your AI-built creations, or potentially finding dev work in this field, I'd appreciate your feedback on our early platform.

name: Sider 5.0: Deep Research with Wisebase
description: Sider 5.0 Deep Research mimics human research by auto-scanning 100+ sources, reflecting, noting and highlighting insights. It crafts expert-level, interactive reports in mintues. All findings are auto-saved to Wisebase—AI knowledge base that evolves with you.

node.body:
Hey PH Family! 👋


2 years ago, to make AI accessible for everyone, we created Sider—an AI sidebar extension that weaves AI into daily workflows, serving 10M+ users from novices to tech pros with a 4.9-star rating. By integrating leading AI models (ChatGPT, Claude, DeepSeek, Gemini) and multi-modal tools for broad understanding, followed by enhanced content processing for instant comprehension, we evolved to transform how users interact with and grow with AI.🤖


Now, Sider 5.0 goes further, helping you dig deeper into any subject and gain knowledge, no matter the question. 🌟Let’s meet Sider Deep Research with the AI knowledge base—an AI-powered tool that mimics how humans search, analyze, and synthesize, with multi-turn reflection. It automatically scans sources, highlights key information, takes notes, and crafts detailed, cited, interactive reports in minutes, while intelligently organizing notes and sources in Wisebase—your personal AI knowledge base for continuous learning and research.


Deep Research Agent: 

🔍Auto-discover 100+ web pages and filter the most relevant sources tailored to your needs.

✨Auto-highlight key information from sources and generate inspiring notes.

📄Auto-generate expert-level, cited and interactive reports with side-by-side source checks.

📥Auto-save all research takeaways in Wisebase, for deeper chats and exploration.


All Research Findings in Wisebase:

📍Collect data from anywhere, including Deep Research reports and manually captured web content via Sider extension.

💡Chat with information saved in Wisebase for further understanding, and turn it into insightful notes.

📋Convert notes into personalized content formats, from outlines to drafts.


Through this pioneering collaboration between human insight and autonomous AI research tools, you attain not only thorough reports but also deeper understanding on any topic. 🎯


Not least, Deep Research is a tool for every curious mind. Whether you’re looking into buying a car, comparing insurance plans, or diving into academic research, we’ve got you covered.


I’m genuinely excited to share this with you, and I’d love to hear your thoughts. Drop your feedback below—let’s geek out over this together! 🙌
Yo! Sounds really like a something interest!

Wow, this is next-level AI research! The ability to auto-scan 100+ sources and generate structured, cited reports sounds like a game-changer for deep research.

I especially love the integration with Wisebase — having an evolving AI knowledge base that saves and structures insights makes this more than just a research tool; it's like having a second brain!

Congrats on the launch! 🎉 This looks like a huge step forward in AI-driven research.

How does Sider 5.0 prioritize sources? Does it weigh credibility based on domain authority, user preferences, or some AI-driven relevance model? Also, how does it handle potential biases in the selected sources? Would love to hear more!

name: timeOS 3.0
description: timeOS summarizes your entire workday: Phone calls, WhatsApp, Google Meet, and Zoom, all without a generic bot joining the call. Designed for multilingual and ambitious teams. What's new? timeOS for macOS・Invisible AI for Zoom・Team Workspace

node.body:
Hey there 🤙🏼 Super excited to bring timeOS Mac App to the Product Hunt community today!

When Tommy shared the initial version of the app with me I was blown away by the accuracy of the summaries timeOS generates post meetings!

Now, I've tried many AI notetaker apps but timeOS impressed me more than any product out there - I particularly love how it generates incredible summaries without a bot joining my meetings 👀

On top they support more than 60 languages + you can chat with the summaries + more incredibly powerful features 🪄

Try it out and let Tommy and the team know if you have any feedback!

🚀 Hey folks, Tommy here from timeOS! 👋 Thank you @5harath for hunting us!


There are 900 million non-native English-speaking knowledge workers, yet AI isn’t designed for them. In meetings, most AI notetakers force them to compromise.

Here's where others fall short:

  • One-Language Limitation – They work fine in English, but multilingual teams struggle to share and understand meetings in different languages.

  • Awkward AI Bots – You either get a generic bot that disrupts calls or no bot at all, leaving you with no visibility into recordings.

  • Rigid Templates – They make you work hard to make your notes useful, instead of just reading your mind.

  • Lack of Charm – Sharing meeting notes externally feels boring and lifeless.

timeOS is much more than an AI notetaker.

We built timeOS 3.0 to go beyond notes—to give you more time, more clarity, and more control over your work. Never miss a key moment again—whether in meetings, phone calls, or voice memos.


💻 The new macOS desktop app—Fast, Seamless, and Bot-Free
Capture and record Zoom meetings effortlessly, without a bot joining the call. Fast access, real-time recording, and instant summaries—right from your desktop.


🌍 A system that speaks every language
Real-time transcription, translation, and summaries keep global teams perfectly in sync.


🎥 The only bot-free solution with full recording
No bots? No problem. timeOS captures and infuses full recordings into your summaries—with hover-over playback for instant recall.


🛠️ Workspace for multi-language teams
A shared AI workspace for seamless team collaboration, where meetings, insights, and decisions come together effortlessly.


⚡ More than notes—a thinking partner
timeOS reads your mind—so you don’t waste time on templates, formatting, or generic AI responses.


🔗 A smarter way to share & collaborate
Generate instant shareable meeting links and let guests chat with your AI agent.


We’ve been using timeOS 3.0 internally, and it has fundamentally changed how we work. It’s not just about taking notes—it’s about making your meetings work for you.


The future of meetings isn’t just about remembering—it’s about making you smarter, faster, and more present.


👉 As a special thank you to the Product Hunt community, we’re offering 20% off all plans with the code PHLOVE20! Sign up at timeOS.ai. 👈



I’m excited to hear what you think! Drop your thoughts below. 🙌 🚀
Congratulations on the launch!

name: Superlines
description: Track and measure your brand’s visibility across AI Chats like ChatGPT, Gemini, Perplexity, Mistral and Claude. See where your brand is mentioned, compare against competitors, and understand how to improve your visibility in AI Search results!

node.body:
Hi! 👋


I’m Kimmo, co-founder of Superlines.


Our team has spent years working in digital marketing, AI, and automation, and we started building Superlines on top of OpenAI already before ChatGPT was released.


We’re especially proud to launch our hottest and newest feature: The Generative Engine Tracker, which systematically tests prompts across ChatGPT, Perplexity, Gemini, and other AI chat engines to show you:

  • How these AI models and AI chat engines recommend your company

  • Your brand's share of voice in AI search

  • Detailed AI responses and link citations from different AI Chat engines

  • How you rank against competitors and who holds the top positions


So how does Superlines work?


  1. Signup and create your organization/website

  1. (Optional) Connect your Google platforms (Google Analytics, Search Console, Google Ads) to use Superlines’ other features like Superlines AI chat and to get the most out of the AI powered recommendations

  2. Confirm and tweak your brand data. Superlines will use this information to better understand your market and competitors.

  3. Superlines analyzes and tests your AI search queries (generated automatically based on the brand analysis and SEO data) across AI chats to give you insights on your brand’s share of voice in LLM search. This process takes anywhere from a few minutes to an hour. Once completed, you can review the data and refine your prompt queries.


We’re a team of three people, and we’d love for you to try Superlines, share your feedback, and connect with us!


Best,

Kimmo & The Superlines Team

Congrats on the launch, Kimmo & the Superlines Team! 🎉 This is such a timely tool — AI search visibility is becoming crucial, and having a way to track brand mentions across ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Gemini is a game-changer.

Also, I have to say, your website design is super clean and intuitive! 🔥

Quick question: how often does Superlines update brand visibility data? Is it a real-time tracking system, or does it run at scheduled intervals?

Congratulations on the launch @ihmissuti @hannes_superlines @jeresuperlines !


I love how you have tackled the black box of AI search and turned it into something measurable and actionable. I was recently researching on LLM optimization (LEO, as some call it) and am so glad to come across this product! It is obvious that in this age of AI, we need to optimize our SEO for LLMs, and to see that you have actually made it easy for us is amazing.


I am curious; have you considered incorporating features that would allow users to forecast how changes to their SEO or content strategy might impact their 'AI share of voice' before they actually implement those changes? I am thinking of something like a simulation environment showing real-time metrics being affected by changes being considered by a brand for their visibility.

name: Predibase Reinforcement Fine-Tuning
description: Predibase has released the first Reinforcement Fine-Tuning platform, promising a groundbreaking approach to customizing LLMs using reinforcement learning. Use RFT to train open-source LLMs that outperform GPT-4, even when labeled data is limited.

node.body:
Tuning LLMs just got 100x easier—no massive datasets, no endless prompt engineering. With Predibase RFT, you can fine-tune models to outperform GPT-4 with just a dozen labeled examples. Yes, really.

💡 Why is this game-changing?
✅ No More Labeling Bottlenecks: Get performance that beats commercial LLMs without massive datasets.
⚡ Rapid Iteration: Go from idea to deployment faster than ever.
⚙️ Turbocharged Inference: See up to 3x faster performance for reasoning models using Turbo LoRA speculative decoding.
🔒 Enterprise-Ready: Deploy in your VPC or on our cloud with full security.

Inspired in part by the GRPO framework behind DeepSeek-R1, we built RFT because we were tired of seeing teams unable to fine-tune models due to a lack of labeled data. Now, AI teams can customize models faster and with higher accuracy without requiring 1,000s of rows of labeled data—and it's already delivering 20%+ better performance than GPT-4 in specialized tasks.

Curious to see it in action?
👉 Join our launch webinar: https://go.predibase.com/introducing-first-reinforcement-fine-tuning-platform-on-predibase
👉 Request a demo and see how fast you can deploy your own models! https://predibase.com/request-a-...

We’re super excited to hear what you think! Drop your questions, feedback, or just say hi. 🚀🔥
This tool makes fine-tuning LLMs so much easier! It's a game-changer for improving model performance. 👍
Predibase Reinforcement Fine-Tuning's AI platform simplifies fine-tuning LLMs. Great job! 👍

name: Codegen
description: Our AI assistant helps engineering teams analyze, modify, and improve codebases through natural language directly in Slack. Ship faster with fewer errors and create production-ready PRs in minutes.

node.body: Hey all! Jay here from Codegen. We're incredibly excited to launch our generalist SWE agent today for general availability! 🎉 2 years ago, we set out to build an agentic developer. With Claude 3.7, it's now possible like never before - and it's absolutely killer. It's essentially Claude Code tightly integrated with Github, Slack, Linear and more - the modern developer toolkit. This is not a contrived demo. We're constantly merging PRs in enterprise repos. It's often faster to kick off Codegen in a Slack thread than to open VSCode, push up a branch, etc. We've found it *especially* useful in scenarios where multiple humans are collaborating real-time. Fastest way to push collaborative dev initiatives forward. I've been at the bleeding edge of code generation for years now and it's incredible to me how far we've come. Claude 3.7 is shockingly resilient, resourceful, and will go for *hundreds* of iterations even in the face of ambiguity, broken tools, etc. It just finds a way. Accelerate your development today! Install at https://codegen.sh/install And as always, we love feedback from the community. I'm here to answer questions and chat ideas with anyone who's curious. Thanks!
Oh my gosh, I can't believe this is possible in Slack. I understand modifying the code on Github, but do I have to check manually that it actually works without errors?
This AI tool is a game-changer for developers! It helps ship code faster and with fewer errors. 👍

name: Zeus
description: Zeus is the fastest way to build AI agents. Build powerful text & voice agents, integrate them with 40+ apps, and deploy them in seconds.

node.body:
Hey there! 🤗

I'm Grant, co-founder of Zeus! I'm excited to share our product with the PH community.


🚀 What is Zeus?
Zeus is the fastest way to build AI agents. We let you build powerful text & voice agents that integrate with 40+ apps. You can deploy them in seconds as a chatbot, phone number, regular schedule, or an API. Use Zeus to automate your customer support, personalize marketing campaigns, qualify sales leads, answer inbound phone calls, or even build your own personal assistant.

🧐 Why did we build this?
2025 is meant to be “the year of the agent” but it’s already March — why aren’t we using agents every day? We believe it’s actually quite hard to build production-ready agents. You have to set up logging and evaluation tools, integrate with all of your apps, set up deployment infrastructure, and stay up to date with the newest models…

Why isn’t it just unbelievably easy to build and deploy AI agents? That’s what we’re building at Zeus: a platform that integrates with all the tools you use, handles all the boilerplate of testing and deploying, and integrates with the latest text and voice models. You focus all your energy on building your agent, we handle the rest.

⚡ How does Zeus work?
Zeus makes it dead simple to build AI agents:

  1. Build: Write your prompt, connect your tools and knowledge, and play in our playground

  2. Test: Simulate real world test-cases to make sure your agent stays accurate on every change

  3. Deploy: Deploy your agent as a chatbot on your site, a phone number anyone can call, a cron job, or connect to it through our API.

  4. Observe: Review every agent run with granular message history, spans, and traces


☎️ Can you do voice agents?
Absolutely! Every agent can be connected to a phone number. You can also configure the voice.

🙋 Can you have humans in the loop?
Yes! We called these “handoffs”. They can be configured in 1-click.

🔥 We'd love to hear what you think!
- Join our Discord community
- Join the conversation on Twitter
- Comment below!
Creating powerful AI agents quickly is amazing but what measures does Zeus have in place to prevent unintended AI behavior or harmful responses during customer interactions?
Amazing tool. Does Zeus support multi-language capabilities for building agents that can effortlessly switch between languages during conversations?

name: Summizer
description: Intelligent decoding of menu content on the page, comprehensive analysis of text/images/videos/attachments on the page, supporting DeepSeek/GPT-4o/Claude 3/Llama3 multi model deep summarization

node.body:
🔥 Summizer is finally here! 🔥

👋 Hey Product Hunt! I’m Min, Co-Founder and CEO of Summizer

Imagine that when reading long documents, there is no longer a need to click and fold content layer by layer, and when researching papers, there is no need to switch between text/video/image tools repeatedly. On the contrary, Summizer can deeply mine hidden information on pages, intelligently integrate multimodal content, and generate summary reports for different models such as Deepseek/GPT/Claude, making information acquisition as easy as dialogue.

❤️ Why did we build Summizer?

In the spring of 2023, late at night at Stanford Library, I witnessed a doctoral student crash-pounding her laptop - she had just discovered that the industry report she had spent three days organizing had missed reading 30% of the folded content. At that moment, I realized that in the era of information explosion, humanity was being overwhelmed by the data flood it had created

This kind of thing seems to happen every day. Industry researchers switch tools repeatedly in different texts, videos, images, and other contents, trying to fight the complete industry truth. Law firm partners miss key disclaimer clauses in 3000 nested files......

This drives us to gather top developers and researchers in the field of AI to help people solve how to effectively identify various content types (text/video/images/files, etc.) in massive web information and quickly generate comprehensive analysis conclusions. As our Chief Architect and former Tiktok engineer Michael said, "True intelligence is not about generating content, but about X-rays that penetrate the information cocoon

When those young people who are obsessed with academia regain confidence by comparing three AI models and summarizing their papers with Summizer; When marketers use Summarizer to quickly analyze marketing strategies from multiple channels and content types; When institutional investors use different large models within Summizer to analyze industry reports from multiple perspectives, I see the temperature of technology

When we created Summizer, we hoped it would be a cognitive lever dedicated to every ordinary person, and we also believed that the real information revolution would only come when cleaners could easily understand medical reports and single mothers could instantly comprehend legal provisions.

🚀 What makes Summizer special?

✅ Page Folded Menu Content Penetration Analysis
✅ Multi-modal Content Intelligent Fusion Analysis
✅ Multi-model Analysis Result Comparison
✅ Customize Page Information Summary Prompt

We are constantly improving our Summizer to provide stronger information retrieval and AI model analysis capabilities

Whether you are a student, researcher, market analyst, or any professional, when you need to quickly and comprehensively find what you need from a massive amount of information, then Summizer is reshaping the experience - the best is yet to come!💪

Would love to hear your thoughts!

Drop a comment below!

Summizer has been in use for half a year, so did your team only release it to PH today? It's really shocking. Summizer is irreplaceable in summarizing page content, but we just hope the price can be cheaper.......
Page Folded Menu Content Penetration Analysis looks wonderful~

name: EasyFindAi
description: EasyFindAi helps you deploy an AI-powered customer support chatbot on your website in under 5 minutes. Instantly reduce support costs and delight your visitors with accurate responses.

node.body:
Hello, my name is Anton Wiklund, the founder of EasyFindAi. Initially, my goal was to build a legal tech platform called DocumentFlow to help law firms efficiently manage their documents using AI. name: pg_search on Neon
description: We’ve teamed up with ParadeDB to bring pg_search to all Neon users, making full-text search in Postgres faster and more powerful.

node.body:
Neon is a Postgres company. And we have always been fans of what ParadeDB built, especially the pg_search extension. So when we had the chance to work with them to offer this extension we were super excited. Not only can you easily index text for creating your own search engine but this takes AI RAG pipelines to a much higher level. When your RAG workflow goes to use any kind of text search you'll see much faster and better results thanks to the pg_search BM25 index. 

If you don't know much about pg_search here's a breakdown:

pg_search is a high-performance full-text search extension for Postgres. It fills Postgres’ gaps in speed, ranking quality, and advanced search capabilities, bringing Elasticsearch-grade features inside Postgres. 

The gaps are this. Postgres has native full-text search (FTS) via tsvector and tsquery, but this is not best-in-class—for example: 

* Postgres’ GIN index on tsvector is not optimized for ranking, making queries slower when sorting by relevance.
* The built-in ranking method (ts_rank) is not as effective as modern search algorithms like BM25, which pg_search supports. 
* Native FTS requires exact matches (no fuzzy search). pg_search can handle approximate matches and typos.
* Faceted search (the ability to quickly count occurrences of values within search results) is either missing or inefficient in native Postgres. This is a critical feature for real-world search applications and a major reason developers stick with Elasticsearch.
* Other advanced features like prefix search, highlight snippets, and JSON-aware search are also limited or inefficient in native Postgres FTS.

name: NVIDIA Isaac GR00T N1
description: NVIDIA Isaac GR00T N1 is the open foundation model for humanoid robots. Multimodal input (language, images), generates actions. Includes SIM frameworks and data pipelines.

node.body:
Hi everyone!

Check out something truly groundbreaking: Isaac GR00T N1 from NVIDIA – they're calling it the world's first open foundation model for general-purpose humanoid robot reasoning and skills! The goal here is to democratize Physical AI.

What's so special about this? It's a single neural network that goes from "photons to actions" – taking in images and language, and outputting continuous control signals for a robot. And it's designed to be general, not just for one specific task or robot.

They've trained it on a massive and diverse dataset:

  • Real humanoid teleoperation data.

  • Synthetic data generated in simulation (they're open-sourcing 300K+ trajectories!).

  • "Neural trajectories" – using video generation models to create even more training data with accurate physics.

  • Latent actions extracted from in-the-wild human videos.

  • They've even developed new algorithms to extract "action tokens" from videos.

The architecture is also interesting: it's a "System 1, System 2" setup. System 2 (a Vision-Language Model) understands the scene and the instructions, while System 1 (a Diffusion Transformer) handles the fast, precise motor control.

NVIDIA is now empowering the next generation of humanoid robots with these open foundations, don't underestimate the impact of this.

  • Analyze: Simply write things down and PALs analyze what you've captured.

  • Suggest: Movies get streaming info, products get shopping links, phone numbers get added to your contacts, and more. If no smart suggestion is available, nothing happens!

We’re a small team obsessed with building the best place to write things down, and we’d love your feedback. Try PALs today and let us know what future examples you'd like us to incorporate!


Thank you all so much! We’ll be here all day answering questions and chatting. ✌️

- Joe and Parker

Thank you for hunting Twos @kevin!


Hi everyone, I'm Parker, the creator and developer of Twos ✌️.


When I was a freshman at Vanderbilt, I struggled with depression. As an introvert, I wrote my thoughts/feelings/experiences in a Google Doc, which helped me offload my mind and feel better.


I was writing things down, but the systems were slow and disorganized, which led me to write down far less than I wanted.


Twos was designed around three core principles:


1. Speed ⚡️: To quickly capture and remember things


2. Ease 💆‍♂️: So it's simple, enjoyable, and a long-term solution


3. Shareability 🎁 : So you can create meaningful connections with the people you care about


In order to make all three a reality, I built a new technology we call "things."


Things are the individual, actionable pieces of information you capture in Twos. They can be notes 🗒️, to-dos ✅, reminders ⏰, and events 📆 and are easily reordered ↕️, moved 🚚, and shared 📤.


Today, we're publicly launching our new AI functionality we call Twos PALs.


Personal Active Lists (PALs) uses AI to make smart suggestions based on the things you write down to help you get things done automatically.


Soon we will launch "Chat with Twos" (I have it working in my personal workspace) and "Self-organization" which will help you organize your things in Twos automatically.


With Twos, you can save time, remember more, and share any*thing* in a simple, yet powerful way.


Use Twos in the browser by visiting https://www.TwosApp.com and access your things anywhere with our free apps at https://www.TwosApp.com/download.


Thank you all for reading and happy Twosday! ✌️
I appreciate the simplicity and the clean design.

name: Shorty
description: Automate Your Distribution. Create viral TikTok and Reels for your product with our AI Avatars and Hooks. Enter product link or description → get 300+ viral videos at once. Our iOS app is dedicated to founders, indie hackers, business owners, and more.

node.body:
Hey everyone 👋


🚀 I am very excited to share our new project!

First, some context: we recently built @Spellar AI and @Subtitly – solid products with great quality and good metrics, but...

Like many founders, we faced the classic distribution challenges:

We make apps fast.
Usually in 6 days.
They make money.
Let's make something cool.

Key points: idea, onboarding, @adapty magic.

While promoting other products through TikTok creators, we noticed some patterns:
• They're expensive 💸
• Miss deadlines ⏰
• Deliver inconsistent quality

• Success stories
• Relatable content

Also, amount of posting is crucial – lost count of our accounts on platforms. Imagine – each account needs 2-3 daily videos.

🤖 So here's what we're building: Imagine 300+ AI avatars ready to represent your product 24/7, generating hundreds of videos in minutes without production!

Cheers 🥂

🎉 Congrats to the Shorty team on the launch! 🔥

I’m blown away by the simplicity and elegance of your solution — turning long links into memorable short URLs in just a few clicks is genius!

💡 Love that you’ve added customization and click analytics — perfect for those who value efficiency and attention to detail.

The interface is sleek and intuitive, and the speed is seriously impressive. Shorty is definitely going to be a must-have tool for so many! 🚀

Wishing you a skyrocketing journey to the top of Product Hunt and beyond! Keep the awesome features coming! 👏

name: Bebop.ai
description: Bebop.ai is for B2B growth warriors - relationship or consultative sales, business development professionals, entrepreneurs and owners who need smart, super easy and effective finding and connection of prospects. Just enter your website for great prospects.

node.body:
Hi Product Hunt Fam

I'm Sam Daish, CTO for Blackpearl and I am stoked (that's New Zealand for "excited and happy") to share Bebop.ai with you.

What is Bebop.ai? 🤔
Bebop.ai is designed for solo, small and medium sized businesses, and makes finding customers who are a great fit as easy as entering your website. 📈💰

Bebop creates three magic moments for B2B:🪄
1) Find new customers – just enter your business name or website
Bebop understands what your business is about – your products and services, your values and attitude and uncovers contacts who need you.
Bebop takes a buyer-first approach to finding who is looking to buy and matches that to who you want to sell to curate a set of strong opportunities. 😀

2) Get to know them before you contact them
Knowing your customer before a meeting is the key to success — the challenge is it's time-consuming. Bebop is like a team of research analysts at your command, delivering a comprehensive customer profile, including:
a. Firmographics & contacts
b. Tech stack insights
c. Company values
d. Key decision-makers
e. Lookalike customers

Even better, just chat with Bebop to work out how to best pitch to them taking into consideration recent company news and events, industry trends and anything else you can think of. Our beta customers LOVE this feature.❤️

3) Build GTM action plans
I’ve avoided mentioning AI so far because it’s become far too common to present it as an answer in itself. But it can’t really be avoided when talking about this magic moment.
Bebop understands your business, who needs those products, the unique elements of those companies and draws on the combined intelligence of the leading LLM’s. Using this information and generative AI, Bebop works with you to build GTM plans and materials. 👟

Why Bebop stands out?
Sales reps and GTM professionals still spend 70% of their time on non-core tasks like, research, personalizing communications and documenting plans—a figure virtually unchanged since 2022.
Bebop.ai directly addresses these pain points by:
✅ Save time—30 minutes of company research in seconds
✅ Tailored sales scripts so you can connect deeply with your customer, understanding their specific needs
✅ Optimized, high-value lead data to uncover hidden customer opportunities
✅ Seamless lead exporting for a smooth sales workflow (coming soon)
✅ Use Bebop to discover revenue streams you never knew existed

You can check out some videos here:
https://youtu.be/37nDsmhLm9o
https://youtu.be/pWzPMl4L2-o

We'd love your feedback – share your thoughts at: feedback@bebop.ai

A perk for the Product Hunt community, use the code PHUNT25 to get 25% discount for 3 months subscription. Offer available until March 24th, 2025.
Check out Bebop here and we'll automatically apply it: https://get.bebop.ai/

I'm super excited to launch on Product Hunt today. I’m looking forward to your feedback (good, bad and ugly) and sincerely appreciate your support. 🙌

Sam

It's really a smart lead generation tool! Effortless prospecting. 😄 Upvoted and congrats for the launch!

Hi hunters! 👋

I'm Cameron, Head of Growth at Tinybird.

Here's what we love about Tinybird Forward:

» You can run Tinybird on your machine

name: Unify
description: Lightweight, hackable, fast, and flexible AI observability. Focus on the data, plots and metrics that matter to you, and nothing else 🎯 Sign up now!

node.body:
Hello ProductHunt 👋 - really excited to be launching today! 🚀 😁


First of all, I know… Another (AI) observability tool... 🫠 To be honest, we wish we didn’t have to add to the pile, but in our view AI observability is broken, and it needs fixing.


When building AI apps ourselves, we were often left fighting against the observability tooling, trying to strip things back to the bare minimum. 


Unify interfaces addresses this, by being very:
🪶 lightweight
🔧 hackable
⚡fast
🧱composable

We hope that it makes it easier to go from zero to one on your products (with or without LLMs), letting you focus on the metrics that matter to you, and nothing else 🎯


The core building block is simple, just `unify.log`. This lets you store any kind of data to your console for easy visualization, grouping, sorting, and plotting etc.


You can then hack together your own custom interface, for whatever you want using three basic tile types: Tables 🔢, Views 🔍 and Plots 📊

You can use these three primitives to:

➕create + visualize your datasets in a new tab (with or without LLMs)

➕monitor and probe production traffic in a new tab (with or without LLMs)

➕start an evaluation flywheel in a new tab (with or without LLMs)

📉optimize your product for your users (with or without LLMs)

🧠whatever else you can think of (with or without LLMs!)


We’ve created a case study (with LLMs 😁) showing how you can compose these basic concepts to get clear view of the data + metrics that matters to you (and nothing else 🧘), and ship at lightning speed ⚡


Feel free to check it out and let us know what you think. We’d love all kinds of feedback (especially criticism and suggestions)!


Thanks so much everyone ❤️
Happy prompting ✌️
Congrats on shipping Unify! Love the "Notion for AI observability" concept simple, focused, and exactly what teams need to track meaningful metrics without the clutter.
Congrats on the launch, Dan and the team! This looks great.

name: DeepLetter
description: DeepLetter: Transform newsletter chaos into one personalized summary. Get a dedicated subscription inbox, analysis through your own perspective, and a send cadence you set. Built by newsletter lovers to save your morning and ensure you never miss what matters!

node.body:
Hey Folks,

As an avid newsletter subscriber(er?), I found myself quickly getting annoyed at the tens of emails that would flood my inbox every morning. I knew there was helpful information in there, but I wasn't quite sure of the what or where, and finding that would eat quite the chunk out of my mornings.

to fix this, I unsubscribed from everything with my personal email, made a new email address, and wrote a little script that turned the tens of emails into a single one that told me what was covered in each newsletter, and what it meant for me from my perspective.

I passed this script to a few friends, and long story short I "vibe-coded" an app out of it. DeepLetter gives you three things:

first, an inbox generator, giving you an email address you can use to subscribe to any and all email-based services.

second, a perspective, where you can describe your career/hobby that you want the script to look at all the emails from.

Finally, a newsletter, where you can incorporate the two and set a send cadence for how frequently you want to receive these summaries.

Would love it if the folks here can check it out and let me know what you think! this isn't a VC-backed whatever where I'm trying to 10x this or 100x that, just trying to reach people this may be helpful to :)

DeepLetter is 'writing' a new chapter in personalized content delivery! 📝 Its ability to aggregate newsletters and tailor them to individual perspectives makes staying informed both efficient and relevant.

How does DeepLetter's AI interpret and adapt to the unique 'perspectives' users set, ensuring that the curated content aligns precisely with their specific interests or professional needs?
I love this idea! Every time we register an account on a new platform, we’re forced to receive a bunch of subscriptions emails or advertisements emails. We really need a tool to handle them.

name: GRID spreadsheet API
description: Power your AI projects, workflows and software with the spreadsheets you trust. GRID turns your spreadsheets into fast, scalable RESTful APIs to integrate Excel and Google Sheets business logic into your applications - no need to rewrite spreadsheets as code.

node.body:
As the founder & CEO of GRID, and I’m thrilled to introduce the GRID Spreadsheet API!

At GRID, we believe spreadsheets are in many ways the world’s most successful low-code platform - but they’ve been stuck in files and silos for too long. We built the GRID Spreadsheet API so you can turn your spreadsheets into fast, scalable RESTful APIs, unlocking trusted business calculations for AI applications, software, and workflow automation.

  • Use what you already have: No need to rewrite business logic from Excel or Google Sheets into code.

  • Reliable & verifiable calculations: AI tools struggle with math, but spreadsheets don’t.

  • Natural language references: GRID analyzes spreadsheet labels and context, enabling calculations driven by natural language instead of Excel-style cell references.

We’re excited to see what you’ll build! Check it out, and let us know what you think. I’ll be here all day answering questions! 💬
As someone who likes to rapidly prototype  ideas, this is game changing. Spreadsheets can be used as a backend which lowers the barrier for anyone else to work with me and shortens time to value.

Hey Product Hunt community! 👋🏻 I'm Marín, Product Manager at GRID.


I've always loved spreadsheets—they're powerful, flexible, and help business users get shit done. Their accessibility means a huge amount of critical business logic and calculations live in spreadsheets today—built and managed by millions worldwide.


A quick backstory: GRID is a spreadsheet technology company founded in 2018. For nearly 7 years, we’ve been building what’s now the most sophisticated spreadsheet engine outside Microsoft and Google. Today is a big day for us because we’re officially launching our spreadsheet API!


Why? We wanted to make it possible for our users to make use of what they’ve already built — in Excel or Google Sheets — and use the logic elsewhere. With our spreadsheet engine running behind the scenes, our spreadsheet API is a huge enabler for projects that need fast, reliable calculations. 


How? Simply go to grid.is, add your spreadsheet and we’ll turn it to a RESTful API in seconds - ready to be queried. We have code examples, SDKs, a sandbox and all kinds of good stuff to help you get off to a great start.


Early customers are already integrating their complex spreadsheet models into AI agents and automated workflows. Your feedback today could hugely impact our product development moving forward, and I'd absolutely love to hear your thoughts 🙏✨ Try it out today for free! 🚀
