name: VidGen
description: VidGen is an AI-driven platform that transforms your ideas into stunning images and videos with just a few clicks—no design expertise is needed.

node.body:
Hey PH fam,

I’m excited to share VidGen – our latest experimental playground for video creation. It’s not a full-fledged video editor (yet!), but rather a fun way to see your ideas come to life in a whole new light.

How It Works
Describe Your Vision
Just type in what you imagine. Our AI picks up on the nuances and translates your words into visual concepts.

Generate Images
In a blink, your description transforms into high-quality images. It’s a bit like magic—watch your ideas materialize in unexpected ways.

Create Videos
Finally, our tool stitches these images together with cool motion effects and transitions, giving you a dynamic, playful video.

A Little Backstory
We built VidGen out of a personal itch to explore creativity in a less conventional way. Instead of getting bogged down with complex video editing software, we thought: why not experiment? We wanted a tool that’s more about exploring creative possibilities than producing a perfect final cut. It’s been a journey of trial and error, lots of late-night tinkering, and a whole lot of fun.

I’d love for you to check it out at vidgen.leanai.ventures and join me in this creative experiment. Your feedback will be invaluable as I continue to refine the tool.

Cheers

name: Doola: Pregnancy Safety Scanner
description: Doola Scans helps pregnant women shop safely by instantly analysing food or cosmetic ingredients. Take a photo of any label to identify what's safe or unsafe for your baby bump. Born from a personal journey, now helping mums-to-be make confident choices.

node.body:
The Story Behind Doola ❤️

Like many great innovations, Doola was born from a deeply personal experience.

I met my wife through Hinge. What caught my attention wasn't just her profile - it was a photo of her jumping that stood out from the typical dating app poses. I liked that photo, and miraculously, she liked me back. ✨

Our connection was instant. From late-night conversations spanning culture to tech, waiting up until 10 PM just to chat with her became my new habit. Two weeks in, we had our first date at a café in a shopping mall, talking until closing time. ☕


Our relationship moved at lightning speed. ⚡ Within weeks, we were discussing meeting parents and marriage. Two months after our first message, we were planning our wedding in a beautiful chapel in Bali. 💍

Life had other plans, though. My wife got pregnant, I lost my job, and shortly after, we experienced the devastating loss of our first baby. 💔 During those dark days, we leaned on each other, growing even closer through our shared grief. Despite the odd timing, I proposed with a custom ring I'd been waiting for.

We had our wedding in Bali as planned, and soon after, my wife got pregnant again. 🤰 That's when the idea for Doola began to take shape.


From Personal Need to Product 💡

During her pregnancy, my wife became increasingly concerned about ingredient safety in everyday products. The stress from deciphering complex ingredient lists and the clutter of menu items, to constantly researching what was safe became overwhelming. I watched as she spent hours researching ingredients, taking photos of products at stores to look up later, and feeling anxious about making the wrong choice. There had to be a better way! 🔍

Drawing on my background in technology, I created Doola Scans - an app that instantly scans photos of ingredient labels and within seconds tells pregnant women what's safe, questionable, or potentially harmful. What started as a personal solution for my wife evolved into something that could help millions of expecting mothers worldwide. 🌎


What Doola Does 📱

Doola uses advanced image recognition to scan ingredient lists on food and cosmetic products, instantly analyzing them for pregnancy safety. With a simple photo, expecting mothers can:


• Get clear safety indicators for each ingredient ✅❓🚫

• Understand complex scientific names in plain language 📖

• Save product history for future reference 📝

• Make confident decisions while shopping or dining 🛒🍽️


The premium version offers unlimited scans, cosmetic product analysis, and AI-powered scanning for any type of product or menu. ⭐


Why It Matters 💪

Pregnancy can be stressful enough without worrying about hidden ingredients. Doola gives expecting mothers peace of mind, helping them protect their babies from unknown risks of harsh chemicals. 👶

This app launches on March 21st - my wife's 38th birthday - as my gift to her and to all the other expecting mothers who deserve simple tools for making safe choices. 🎁

I'd love to hear your thoughts and feedback. Doola was born from love and shaped by loss, creating something meaningful from our journey. I hope it brings peace of mind to expecting mothers everywhere. 💕



The Bigger Vision 🚀

While developing Doola, a grander vision began to take shape. What started as a personal solution has evolved into something more ambitious. The journey continues at https://doola.ai — still under construction, but growing steadily into a comprehensive platform enhanced with AI capabilities to support expecting parents and families in each of their own unique experiences. ✨ I'm incredibly excited to watch this seed of an idea, born from love and necessity, blossom into something that could transform how expecting mothers navigate their pregnancy and parenting journey. This is just the beginning... 🌟
Great idea and a very touching story behind the app. ❤️

Wow, what a beautiful story behind Doola! ❤️ As someone with several friends navigating pregnancy right now, this app sounds like exactly what they need. The anxiety around product safety during pregnancy is real, and having an instant scanner to decode those complex ingredient lists is brilliant.

I'm curious - does Doola provide any educational content about why certain ingredients are flagged as unsafe during pregnancy? It would be amazing if users could learn about the "why" behind the recommendations as they use the app.

Can't wait to see how this grows. Wishing you and your family all the best, and congratulations on turning a personal challenge into something that will help so many expecting mothers!

name: RevvRally AI Career Assistant
description: Next-gen AI resume and cover letter generator that learns about you and asks you questions to improve your user profile so that it can generate the most customized resume and cover letter for every job application.

node.body:
I've tried dozens of AI resume and cover letter generators and all the ones I found have one or more of these shortcomings:

1.  They help you write one perfect resume, like a human coach would, but you still basically submit the same resume to every job even though the requirements and qualifications are different.
2.  They tweak the resume for every job, but just for ATS purposes and doesn't actually make you stand out more.
3.  They don't truly analyze the job description to understand where you fit well, and more importantly, qualification/skill gaps that you have.

As a result, I went ahead and wrote my own AI resume and cover letter generator with these requirements in mind:

1.  Start by uploading your resume to create your base "user profile"
2.  Analyze each past role and ask you questions to expand on what's already in your resume
3.  Compare your user profile with the job description you're applying to and tell you exactly where you match and where you don't
4.  You update your profile to "train" the AI, expanding your background info
5.  Generate the best TRUTHFUL resume and cover letter based on your user profile
6.  The custom resumes and cover letters are ready to "Save as PDF" and submit with your application

This is the first tool out there I know of (there are probably hundreds so I can't be sure) that actually generates better resumes and cover letters over time.  The more jobs you apply to and the more AI feedback you incorporate into your user profile, the better it gets.

This is my first app ever on Product Hunt so be nice and I appreciate your constructive feedback.
The "Aha" moment for me was when I realized I had accomplished so much more than what I had written in my original resume, but I didn't think they were important.  The app pointed out the
I would like to organize a weekend product demon to a group of new immigrants/refugees from Arabic speaking countries.

name: LoreMate - AI Character Chat
description: Engage in immersive AI character chats with Loremate AI. Be the main character in your own story. Create plots, scenarios and Characters with Unique Personalities.

node.body: 4 months ago I was talking to my best friend ( my co-founder) about AI, I always thought AI to be very professional and its way of writing and talking easily detectable but he pointed out a product called Chai and when I tried it I was blown away seeing AI can also be so good at understanding human emotions. So my friend joked about making something similar I got an idea ( I was walking while talking to him and always got good ideas while walking ). I just decided to learn more about how LLMs work, what is Lora, what fine-tuning is, and how to do all these things. I remember fine-tuning my first Mistral 3b model on my Mac it blew me away that something like this was possible I played around dataset a little and tweaked some settings, I quickly called and asked my friend if he remembered his suggestion to create an AI model that's very good at understanding complex human emotions, I somehow convinced him to work on this idea together, so 3 months now the web app is in beta version already 500+ people have tried and returned after 24 hours with avg time spent per person on the platform are 15 minutes. I got a lot of feedback ( really a lot from Reddit and Discord). I only did a few Reddit posts and people loved it so much that it fueled me to work on it more so for the last 2 weeks I have been going insane working on it. It feels tiring but I get a sense of accomplishment because it's my first time working on my own idea so hard.

name: Necto AI for iOS
description: Ask and do anything using your personal AI powered by infinite AI agents. Sync your favorite apps to let Necto automate your life, so you can focus on what truly matters.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt Community! 👋
My name is Francesco, and I'm the co-founder of Necto AI.

What if you could have all the models and agents in a single place, with full context of who you are, and pay a single subscription? This was the idea that started our journey.

A couple of months ago, @lorenzocoacci and I were doing some research using ChatGPT, Grok, Perplexity and Claude. We found ourselves jumping from one platform to another to compare the results, refine it and then save it on a document. Each time the process was: copy, paste, get response, compare, refine, repeat. Boring right?

The same goes with AI Agent companies. We found some cool solutions to help us complete our research but every time we still had to jump from one website to another and waste our time.

This is why we built Necto. Your personal AI powered by plug-and-play Agents that let you ask anything and do anything.

What Necto AI does: 🚀

  • Ask Anything in Chat Mode: Easily ask your personal AI to search on the web, get insights, send emails (with Necto proxy), write reports, and more.

  • Agent Store: Add the agents you like from the store and start using them either by mentioning them (@ to mention) or let your personal AI choose them.

  • Do Anything in Agent Mode: Activate the agent mode, sync your apps (Oura, Google Calendar, Google Docs, etc.) and ask your personal AI to get a task done.

  • All the Models: Use all the models you like to complete your tasks.


What Necto AI will do: 🔜

  • Scheduled/Recurrent Tasks: Start complex tasks that run while you sleep

  • Necto Web Version: Bringing Necto to your browser

  • Necto Agent Developers Portal: A place for developers to distribute their agents

  • No-code Agent Builder: Letting anyone build their own agents and start earning money

  • Social Agents: More updates coming soon 🦾


Thanks for your support! We’d love to hear your feedback

✉️ Contact: info@necto.co
🌐 Website: necto.co
📱 iOS App: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/necto-ai/id6737813945
🟣 Discord: https://discord.gg/uZA3kUQP

I’ve been following Francesco and Lorenzo’s journey. They thought of something no app on the market can do today - an executive assistant not only capable of switching between different AI platforms (super useful btw), but the HUGE thing is that the Agent Mode it can actually perform sequences of task for you, based on the agents you have downloaded.

Bye App Store, welcome Agent Store era.
Very excited to help everyone being more productive and create on our platform @francescocoacci!

Hello Product Hunt,


I’m thrilled to introduce Ghost University – where education meets entertainment in an entirely new way.

What is Ghost University? Ghost University is an AI-powered learning platform that transforms traditional education into an engaging, interactive experience. We’re reimagining how students explore knowledge by blending cutting-edge technology with inspiration from history.


How It Works:

Interactive AI Guidance: Students learn through dynamic chat sessions with our AI, making every lesson feel like a personalized conversation.


Unlockable Courses: Access unique courses curated by handpicked historical figures, with both text and audio responses that bring the past into the present.


Community-Driven Content: Users vote on future “ghosts” to unlock, ensuring our curriculum evolves with the interests of our community.


Flexible Pricing: Our credit-based, pay-as-you-go model means you only pay for what you use – no wasted subscription fees.


Why It Matters:

After experimenting with a Q&A site for free knowledge sharing, we realized that students needed more engaging and impactful learning experiences. Ghost University is our answer: an edutainment platform designed to inspire curiosity, foster engagement, and make learning both fun and effective.


Future Plans

We will update our content with the latest models as they become cheaper and better. We are also exploring the agent space.


Thank you for checking us out – we’re excited to see how Ghost University can transform education one conversation at a time.


Best,

name: AI Notifications (on Android)
description: 🚀 AI Notifications – Smarter Alerts! AI-powered summaries for SMS, WhatsApp, Telegram, Slack & more—no more clutter! ✅ Smart summaries ✅ Suggested reply ✅ Auto-dismiss old notifications ✅ Ultra low cost (ChatGPT-4o-mini) Requires a free OpenAI API key.

node.body:
I built AI Notifications because I was sick of 20+ group notifications messages. FB Messenger, WhatsApp, Telegram, Slack, Discord, SMS—every app constantly pings you, but most of the time, you just need a quick summary, not reading every single messages.

AI Notifications solves this by summarizing messages intelligently into short, clear updates. It runs in the background, suggests replies, auto-dismisses old alerts, and keeps your notification bar clutter-free. It’s also super cheap—ChatGPT-4o-mini makes thousands of summaries cost just cents.

We all know that Apple tried, but it sucks—the summaries are often wrong or useless. And on Android? There’s nothing as good as this. I wanted to build something unique, not just another boring, inaccurate summarizer. That’s where personalities come in—they let you customize how your messages are summarized, adding a fun twist that no other app offers. Try Cowboy, UwU, Valley Girl, Pirate, or Haiku. A personality not there that you want? Create your own personalities using AI to summarize your message in that style.

Would love to hear what you think!

name: Mochido
description: Mochido is an AI-powered Task List that you can talk to like a friend. With the help of Projects, give Mochido already knows the context of your task and automatically assigns it to a project, without you needing to think too much. Costs less than a coffee!

node.body:
Hey everybody!

A couple days ago, I got fed up with Notion. I genuinely couldn't stand waiting 10 seconds for it to load each time I opened it, just to set a todo in my Kanban board as done.

I tried exploring existing solutions, but all of them were either:

- Overkill
- Too expensive
- Shitty UI

So I got to work and built my own todo app in 2 days.

I named it Mochido, after the Japanese Sweet, Mochi 🍡.

This really was just a side-project at first, but then somebody else said they wanted to use it as well on X, so I decided to just make it public.

The best thing about this is, you can treat it like a friend and speak to it in Natural Language, instead of having to perfectly think about what you're going to name the ToDo, which was quite an issue for me when I was still using Notion.

I also added Projects so that specific task information can be inferred from the Project Context.

I am looking for genuine feedback and to see whether people would actually enjoy using this or not.

Currently supports Gemini 2.0 Flash Lite and OpenAI o3-mini.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt community! 👋 I'm genuinely thrilled to introduce Study AI, a project born from my own student frustrations. You know that feeling when you're studying for an exam, and the resources you find online give you these broad, textbook answers that barely scratch the surface of what your professor actually taught? Yeah, me too. 😅 That's where Study AI comes in.

I envisioned a study tool that felt less like a robotic search engine and more like a supportive, knowledgeable friend. So, I built a chatbot that acts as your personal AI study partner, designed to focus exclusively on your lecture content. Imagine having a tutor who's not only incredibly patient but also knows your lectures inside and out, because, well, that's their entire knowledge base!

Study AI is about making learning personalized and efficient. It's about getting those 'aha!' moments where everything clicks, because you're getting answers directly tied to what you were taught. It's about ditching the generic and diving deep into the specifics. Whether you're reviewing complex concepts or just need a quick refresher, Study AI is there to help you grasp the material quickly and confidently.

I believe learning should be an enjoyable experience, not a stressful one. With Study AI, I hope to create a space where students feel supported and empowered to excel. I'm eager to hear your thoughts and feedback! Let's make studying smarter and more fun together. 📚✨ What are your biggest study challenges, and how do you think Study AI could help?

name: R1-AQA
description: R1-AQA, inspired by DeepSeek-R1, is the open-source audio question answering model from Xiaomi, Achieves SOTA performance on MMAU using reinforcement learning (GRPO).

node.body:
Hi everyone!

Sharing R1-AQA, a new open-source audio question answering (AQA) model from Xiaomi – and it's taking a really interesting approach, inspired by DeepSeek-R1!

What's cool:

🎧 Audio Question Answering: It goes beyond simple transcription, allowing you to ask questions and get answers based on the audio's content.
🧠 Reinforcement Learning (GRPO): They used a technique called Group Relative Policy Optimization (GRPO) – a type of reinforcement learning – to train the model.
🏆 State-of-the-Art: Achieves top results on the MMAU Test-mini benchmark, beating models like GPT-4o and Gemini Pro.
🌱 Small Data: They did this with only 38,000 training samples, and based on Qwen2-Audio-7B-Instruct.
🔓 Both the code and the model weights are available.

The use of reinforcement learning is particularly interesting. It seems like a very effective way to train these kinds of models, even with limited data.

To try it yourself, upload an audio or video file here.

node.body:
I was earlier employed as a Litigation Assistant in a Law Firm. It was my responsibility to add bookmarks in PDF files such that it becomes easier for court and attorneys to navigate through PDF file easier. 

Creating bookmarks in PDF has always been a slow process. Though there are few extensions or PDF tools which can outline PDF based on headings but in most cases, one has to do things manually. 

Who doesn't love hierarchy bookmarked PDFs? That's why I have have built this tool to ease the PDF bookmarking process. One has to just enter an AI prompt, which could come from anywhere. One can copy paste from any index or anywhere.

AI would read through the prompt, fix typos (if opted), and return back a PDF file with well-structured bookmark.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt fam! 👋🏻 I'm Lea, co-founder of TalkMe AI.

Years ago, I found myself in a situation where I had studied a language for ages, but when it came time to actually talk to someone, my brain just…froze. It felt like all those hours of studying were locked behind a door I couldn't open. And I realized, it wasn't just me. So many people face this – the gap between textbook learning and real-world conversation.

That's why we built TalkMe AI. We wanted to bridge that gap, to create a space where language learning isn't just about memorizing rules, but about having real conversations.

So, what does TalkMe actually do?
📚 Personalized Study Plan: We craft lessons based on your interests, language level and needs. Everything is made to suit you!
⌚️ Real-Time Feedback: Our AI doesn't just talk; it listens and guides, helping you nail pronunciation and grammar.
👩🏻 Ultra-realistic AI Avatars: TalkMe's Al tutors come from all over the world, with diverse backgrounds, personalities, and accents, and can respond according to the context.
💬 Everyday Scenarios: From ordering coffee to pitching a business idea, we've got you covered. You can even create your own scenarios.
👑 Track Your Wins: See your progress, review what you've learned, and compete with users in leaderboards.

We're all about making language learning adaptive, effective, flexible, and affordable.

🎁 To celebrate our launch here on Product Hunt, we're offering a special deal for our new friends: Use code 【999999】 for a sweet 52% off on our annual plan.

Please support us and let's make language learning an adventure, not a chore!

- Website: https://talkme.ai/

- Contact Us: business@talkme.ai
Great alternative to existing language learning apps. Talking to a realistic AI buddy makes learning the language fun and authentic

name: People Search GPT by Redrob
description: Redrob is a LinkedIn alternative that skips the noise with a high-signal people search engine. Describe who you want to meet, and People Search GPT scans 700M+ profiles to find them—perfect for sales, fundraising, recruiting, and a much more.

node.body:
Hello Product Hunt Community!

I’m Bob Newman, Head of Sales at Redrob, and I’m excited to introduce People Search GPT—a high-signal, AI-powered people search engine that makes finding and connecting with the right professionals easier than ever.


Why We Built It:

For startups and SMBs, one meaningful connection can change everything—whether it’s finding the perfect investor, hiring a unicorn candidate, or closing a big deal. But the search process isn’t always simple:

  • 🤔 You may have a general idea of who you need, but narrowing it down takes time.

  • 🦄 Manually reviewing profiles can feel like searching for a needle in a haystack.

  • 💰 Tools like ZoomInfo and LinkedIn Recruiter are expensive, putting search behind a hefty paywall.

That’s why we built People Search GPT—an AI-powered search engine that helps you instantly find and connect with the

right people using natural language.


How It Works:

No complex filters. No endless scrolling. Just type who you’re looking for, and People Search GPT scans 700M+ profiles to deliver a refined list of matching professionals—complete with verified phone numbers, emails, social links, and AI-powered insights—at a fraction of the cost.


Who It’s For

Founders, recruiters, sales teams, fundraisers—literally anyone who relies on professional connections.


What’s Next?

We’re working on:

node.body:
Hi everyone!

Sharing a major update to Gemini in Android Studio: it's now multimodal! You can attach images directly to your prompts, opening up a whole new world of possibilities for Android developers.

This means you can:

🖼️ Generate UI Code from Images: Show Gemini a wireframe or mockup, and it'll generate Jetpack Compose code. This is huge for rapid prototyping.
🗺️ Explain Diagrams: Upload an architecture diagram and have Gemini explain the components and data flow.
🐛 Debug with Screenshots: Attach a screenshot of a UI bug and get suggestions for fixes.

It's like going from "describing" your problem to "showing" your problem – much more intuitive and efficient. From napkin sketches, to a real UI, is now much faster. The only limit is your imagination.

The Gemini integration has notably improved Android development efficiency, especially the feature that generates layout code from screenshots, which reduces a lot of repetitive work. It's quite a practical tool.
Android studio is continuously improving!

description: NitoAI lets you query multiple AI models at once, eliminating the need to manage several accounts or repeat questions. Receive aggregated, de-duplicated, and summarized responses in one view—saving you time and money while maximizing insights.

node.body:
Hello ProductHunt community! Founder of NitoAI here.


While fascinated by the potential of AI, we faced challenges like "which AI is best for my specific question?" and "subscribing to multiple AI services is expensive." So we built a platform that gives you access to multiple AIs simultaneously.


During NitoAI's development, we discovered:

  • Combining multiple AI responses provides more comprehensive information

  • Users want to choose the optimal AI for each question, but switching between services is inefficient

I'd love for you to try NitoAI, especially if you are:

  • An educator or AI researcher wanting to compare AI responses

  • A business professional looking to use multiple AIs cost-effectively


We're eager to hear your feedback!

Please share your thoughts and questions in the comments to help us make NitoAI even better.

name: DocumentLens
description: Transform how you extract data with AI-powered precision. DocumentLens automates tedious manual work, turning any document into structured insights instantly. Boost accuracy, eliminate inefficiencies, and unlock smarter workflows — seamlessly and at scale.

node.body:
Hi Product Hunt community!

We're excited to introduce DocumentLens, an intelligent document solution suite by the TurboLens team! Today, we’re launching our first feature — Document Extraction (Preview) — and it’s free for you to try!

What is DocumentLens?
DocumentLens automates data extraction from any type of document, including invoices, receipts, handwritten notes, medical forms, academic records, and multilingual reports. Using advanced AI, it intelligently extracts structured data, streamlines your workflow, and enhances efficiency.

Why We Built It?
Manually extracting key information from documents is slow, error-prone, and inefficient. We built DocumentLens to solve this with:

  • Fast & Accurate Extraction – AI-powered precision reduces manual errors.

  • Seamless Workflow Automation – Extract structured data like tables, key-value pairs, and layouts effortlessly.

  • Chart & Figure Analysis – Extract data points and insights from figures, charts, and visual elements with precision.

  • Multilingual & Handwritten Support – Works with various document types, including handwritten and multilingual texts.


Key Features:

  • Key-Value Extraction – Extract key-value pairs from documents with precision.

  • Structured Data Extraction – Capture related fields as structured data sets, perfect for invoices and tables.

  • Layout Extraction – Detect and extract structured layouts, including figures, forms, and checkboxes.

  • Chart & Figure Analysis – Convert visual elements like charts and figures into actionable insights.

  • Stamp Detection – Identify and extract data from official stamps or seals.

  • Watermark Cleanup – Remove watermarks and background clutter to enhance readability.


Who’s It For?

Finance & Operations – Automate invoice and receipt processing.
Legal & Compliance – Extract key clauses from contracts effortlessly.
Healthcare & Research – Digitize patient records and academic papers.
Developers & Enterprises – Integrate customized document intelligence via API.

We’d Love Your Feedback!
This is just the beginning — DocumentLens will continue expanding with new capabilities. Your insights will help shape the future of AI-powered document intelligence!

Try It Free Today!
Check it out at document.turbolens.io and start using Document Extraction now. Let us know what you think!


Have questions or feature suggestions? Drop us a line at support@turbolens.io — we’d love to hear from you!


Let’s redefine document processing together! 🚀

name: Melio
description: Melio analyzes your content’s style, colors, and rhythm to create custom, royalty-free music that perfectly fits your video or image. No more endless searching. Melio saves you time, boosts creativity, and cuts costs.

node.body:
Hey, Product Hunt! 


Today marks a huge step for me and my team

We’re launching Melio, a tool we’ve built from the ground up to solve a problem every video creator knows too well: finding the perfect music, fast. 


Why did we create Melio?

As a video creators, we know firsthand how music can make or break a video.

We've spent countless frustrating hours searching for the right track, digging through libraries, dealing with licensing issues, or settling for something that’s just “okay.”

We wanted a better way: a tool that doesn’t just give you random stock music, but creates the perfect track for your video in seconds. That’s why we built Melio.


How does it work?

  • upload your video

  • Melio analyzes its visuals and mood

  • Instantly, it creates a custom soundtrack perfectly synced to your content.

That’s it. Music done.


What are the benefits for your?

  • No more endless searching: just upload your video, and Melio analyzes it to generate the ideal soundtrack.

  • No more generic stock music – Every track is unique, made for your content, and fully yours

No need for a music degree – No complex settings or confusing prompts—just click, generate, and go.

We’ve poured our hearts (and many, many late nights) into Melio because we believe creators deserve a faster, simpler, and more intuitive way to get great music.
If you’re tired of spending hours finding the right track, or worse, settling for one that doesn’t quite fit, Melio is here to change the game. We’d love for you to try it out, share your thoughts, and help us make it even better. Your feedback means the world! 


Let’s make video creation smoother, faster, and way more fun with Melio

name: GitReleaseNotes
description: GitReleaseNotes helps streamline your deployment process by allowing you to easily and quickly generate structured, well-written release notes simply from your GitHub repository's commit history.

node.body:
👋 Hey everyone!


I'm excited to share GitReleaseNotes, a small passion project born out of a common struggle I've faced while trying to keep my communities updated with the latest product changes: writing proper release notes. 📝


Every time we shipped a new version, we'd end up making tons of changes, and someone (usually me 😅) would have to stay behind, track everything, and write it all down for our audience. Not exactly the most fun thing to do after a full day of coding and managing servers.


So, I built a solution! 🚀


GitReleaseNotes is a simple website that connects to your GitHub account and lets you select the commits you'd like to build a release note from. The tool relies on your commit titles being descriptive enough (but don't worry, you can manually tweak them before sending them to the AI for processing 🤖). With just one click, you get a well-formatted, detailed release note in multiple formats like Markdown, XML, JSON, and more.


✅ No need to manually track changes ✅ No ads, completely free ✅ Supports up to 10 generations per day to prevent API misuse ✅ Just copy and paste the result to your community platform of choice 🎯


I'd love to hear your thoughts on what you liked, what could be improved, and any features you'd love to see in future updates.


Your support means the world to me as this is my first proper website release. An upvote would be greatly appreciated! 🚀✨


Thanks for checking it out! 🙌

name: Simplest Agent
description: A simplest AI agent framework. Drop this into Claude Project and you can generate your agent with one sentence prompt - Wonderfon/Simplest-Agent

node.body: This is not clickbait. It’s possible as at its core, an agent really is this simple. A loop, a state machine, and some external preset functions. That’s the entire structure of our framework. If you’ve ever called an LLM API, you can easily understand what our source code does. Find our open source project here: [https://github.com/Wonderfon/Sim... Quick Start Guide: 1. Drop `agent.py`, `agent_config.toml`, and `run_agent.py` into Claude's project knowledge. 2. For better results, also upload `SimplestAgent_documentation.md` and paste the content of `Project Instructions.txt` into Claude's project instructions. 3. Go to the chat window and tell Claude what agent you want to build. 4. Download the generated Python files, follow the AI’s instructions, and run it—your agent is now up and running. We’ve tested this—Claude Project can generate an AI agent with just one sentence. It should also work if you upload the files to Cursor and call Claude, or use Cline/Roo-Cline. (However, ChatGPT Canvas won’t work!)

name: DynaRoute
description: Dynaroute, AI based Dynaroute optimization algorithms automatically provide you with the most time-efficient and cost-effective routes, taking into account vehicle capacities delivery windows, skills, visit priority, as well as size, weight and restrictions

node.body:
Dynaroute's route optimization software enhances operational efficiency and cost-effectiveness through several key mechanisms:

Fuel Efficiency: By calculating the most direct routes and minimizing unnecessary mileage, Dynaroute reduces fuel consumption. Real-time traffic avoidance further prevents idling, cutting fuel costs and emissions.

Time Savings: Optimal routes enable faster completion of deliveries, allowing more jobs per day. This boosts productivity and reduces overtime expenses, as drivers finish shifts on time.

Maintenance Reduction: Fewer miles driven mean less wear and tear on vehicles, lowering maintenance frequency and costs, and extending vehicle lifespans.

Dynamic Adaptability: Real-time rerouting around traffic, accidents, or road closures minimizes delays, ensuring timely deliveries and resource efficiency.

Labor Cost Optimization: Efficient routing may reduce the number of vehicles or drivers needed, aligning resources with demand and avoiding overstaffing.

Customer Satisfaction: Reliable on-time deliveries enhance customer trust and retention, indirectly saving costs associated with lost business or redelivery attempts.

Administrative Efficiency: Automation of route planning reduces manual scheduling efforts, freeing managers for strategic tasks and reducing labor hours.

Data-Driven Insights: Historical data analysis identifies trends, enabling proactive adjustments to routes and schedules for long-term efficiency gains.

Environmental Compliance: Lower emissions align with sustainability goals, potentially reducing carbon taxes and enhancing corporate reputation.

Example Impact: Companies using Dynaroute report significant savings, such as a 15-20% reduction in fuel costs and a 10-30% decrease in drive times, translating to direct financial benefits and scalability.

By integrating these features, Dynaroute not only cuts operational expenses but also drives strategic improvements, fostering a competitive edge through smarter logistics.

name: Plynt
description: Plint is your personal AI news radio that reads news to you and connects news stories, helping you see the bigger picture beyond isolated headlines. Stay informed effortlessly, even on-the-go!

node.body: Hey Product Hunters! 👋 We're excited to introduce Plynt—a personal news radio that brings clarity, context, and connection to news consumption. 🚀 What is Plynt? Plynt, short for "plenty of hints", is a revolutionary news app designed to combat fragmented news consumption. It not only reads the news to you but visually connects stories, helping you understand how different events impact each other, so you always see the bigger picture. 🗞️🔗 Key Features: 1. Voice-Powered News 📢: Effortlessly stay informed as Plint reads news aloud, perfect for busy commutes or multitasking. 2. See the Bigger Picture 🕸️: Clearly see how news stories interlink, providing deeper insights beyond isolated headlines. A one-stop solution for getting informed about the latest news. 3. Real-Time Updates ⏳: Stay ahead with timely updates, especially crucial during critical periods like elections or global events. 4. Curated Context 🧩: Every story is paired with contextual information, making complex issues easy to grasp. Who's It For? Plynt is perfect for professionals, students, and anyone seeking deeper clarity in news consumption. Whether you're commuting, exercising, or simply looking to stay informed efficiently, Plint is designed to enhance your understanding without the overload. 📚🎧 Why Plynt? Unlike traditional news apps, Plint isn't just another source of headlines—it's your guide through the complexity of today's world: 1. Narrative Clarity: Transforms scattered news bits into cohesive, understandable stories. 2. Audio Convenience: Offers hands-free news consumption tailored to your schedule. 3. Critical Context: Equips you with insights, particularly valuable during high-stakes events like elections, enabling smarter, more informed decisions. We envision a future where instead of saying, "Let's look this issue up," everyone says, "Let's Plynt this issue." 🌟 We'd Love Your Feedback! We're passionate about evolving Plynt to better meet your needs. Share your thoughts, suggest improvements, or let us know about features you'd love to see. Your feedback helps us make news consumption smarter and more connected. 🔥 If you want to access the beta version of the app: 1. Join this google group https://groups.google.com/g/syne... 2. Then download the app from the Play Store https://play.google.com/store/ap... Thanks for checking out Plynt. It's only Android-only for now. If you encountered any problems contact me at nephi@synecsoftware.com. We can't wait to hear what you think! Cheers, Nephi Barrera Founder & CEO Synec Inc.

name: OpenJobs AI
description: OpenJobs AI revolutionizes job search with a chat that makes it easy to find your dream job. We pinpoint your needs through natural language, delivering everything from matching to smart optimization, for a faster, exciting career move.

node.body:
🔥 OpenJobs AI is finally here! 🔥


Looking for a job has always been time-consuming and sometimes downright frustrating—until now. OpenJobs AI is changing the game.


Imagine a job hunt without filling out endless applications or a hiring process without wading through hundreds of resumes. Instead, you simply chat with an AI that truly understands what you’re looking for and handles all the heavy lifting.


❤️ Why did we build OpenJobs AI?


In fall 2024, over coffee, a product manager friend grumbled that his job felt like “ticking boxes.” “It’s just a job,” he muttered with a shrug. But I couldn’t help but smile, because to me, it was anything but ordinary.


For six years, I had poured myself into building job platforms, guiding over two million young job seekers each year toward their first professional opportunities. My inbox overflowed with stories from young people who hadn’t just found jobs—they’d discovered purpose, passion, and new beginnings. One story lingered in my mind: a young woman who had nearly given up after over 50 rejections. Then she found a role that felt tailor-made for her. In a heartfelt note, she wrote, “You’ve given me more than a job—you’ve given me hope.”


That fueled me. With Jerry, a brilliant young PhD, and Kin, an investor and seasoned entrepreneur in the HR industry, we shared one mission: creating a fairer job market. Now, I was ready for our big swing—an AI Agent to revolutionize job seeking. More than just a matching tool, it would connect the right people with roles that could truly change their lives.


This wasn’t merely a product; it was a movement. A chance to harness technology to dismantle barriers, empower individuals, and reshape the very landscape of work. As I embarked on this journey, I carried the stories of those we’d already lifted up—and the limitless potential of those still waiting to be reached. This was my calling, and I was ready to pour every ounce of myself into making it real.


🚀 What makes OpenJobs AI special?


✅ No tedious forms – just natural conversations.

✅ AI-powered job hunting that finds for you.

✅ Perfect match recommendations – no more guesswork, just tailored opportunities.

✅ Personalized cover letters & applications.


We’re continuously improving our AI Job Agent, delivering enhanced search results, real-time job updates, and smarter notifications.


Whether you’re seeking your dream job or the ideal candidate, OpenJobs AI is reshaping the experience—and the best is yet to come! 💪


Would love to hear your thoughts!

Drop a comment below!

Congratulations to the OpenJobs AI team on your launch!

you’re helping people find purpose, confidence, and life-changing opportunities. The personal stories behind this project make it even more meaningful.

One question: How does OpenJobs AI ensure that job recommendations remain high-quality and aligned with a candidate’s long-term career goals, rather than just immediate job openings?

This story is so touching. I agree – job should be about some purpose (but not only about that company's purpose but also about the purpose of an individual). Hope that this project will help many people out there to land their dream career. :) Good luck, team!

name: Naoma
description: Meet Naoma - AI-powered sales conversation analytics that reveal what makes top reps succeed and help scale it. Naoma connects to your CRM, analyzes sales conversations, highlights key moments, and provides actionable recommendations for each sales rep.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunters! 👋


We’re thrilled to introduce Naoma.ai—your new secret weapon for supercharging sales conversations. 🚀


What is Naoma.ai?

Naoma connects directly to your CRM and evaluates each sales conversation against your custom sales scripts. It automatically highlights key moments—like client objections, competitor mentions, and critical questions—while serving up actionable recommendations to help you refine your pitch and boost revenue. 💡


Key Features:

• Seamless CRM Integration 🔗: Automatically pulls in your sales data to ensure every conversation is analyzed.

• Custom Sales Script Analysis 📝: Compares your calls against tailored scripts to pinpoint what’s working (and what’s not).

• Key Moment Detection ⏰: Flags client objections, competitor mentions, and pivotal questions in real time.

• Actionable Recommendations 🎯: Offers personalized tips to improve your sales interactions and close more deals.


Who’s It For?

Naoma.ai is built for sales teams, account executives, and revenue ops pros who want to gain deeper insights from their conversations without spending hours on manual analysis. Whether you’re a startup or an established enterprise, our tool is designed to empower you with data-driven strategies for success. 📈

Why Naoma?

Unlike other revenue intelligence solutions, Naoma is designed to develop sales representatives. Here’s how:

• Deep Communication Analysis – Naoma evaluates sales reps’ interactions with clients, not just at a high level but by thoroughly assessing their alignment with the company’s approved scripts.

• Personalized Client Engagement Recommendations – Naoma generates tailored recommendations for each client interaction, helping sales reps optimize their approach.

• Individual Development Plans – Naoma identifies each sales rep’s strengths and areas for growth, providing actionable insights and structured development plans.


By prioritizing sales reps’ growth, Naoma goes beyond revenue intelligence—it empowers teams to sell smarter and perform at their best.


We’d Love Your Feedback:

We’re here to learn from you! Let us know what works, what could be improved, or if there’s a dream feature you’d like to see. Your insights will help us evolve Naoma.ai to better serve your needs. 🔥


Thanks for checking out Naoma. We can’t wait to hear your thoughts! 😊


Cheers,

Dmitry Zakharov

Co-founder & CEO, Naoma
Great project and execution! Best of luck!

🔥 I am thrilled with Naoma.ai! 🤖

This project has really changed the way I approach my work. With their AI solutions, I was able to automate routine tasks and focus on what's most important. The speed, accuracy and ease of use are all top notch! 🚀

If you haven't tried it yet, I highly recommend it. It's well worth it! 💡

Hey Product Hunt! 👋

I’m so excited (and a little nervous!) to finally launch IllustraAI here!

A little backstory — I’m an indie hacker who loves design. Over the past few years, I’ve built several projects, and one thing I kept running into was the struggle to find good, custom illustrations. This project has been a labor of love, and seeing it go from a simple idea to a real product people actually use has been incredible. I’d love to hear what you think! If you have any feedback, ideas, or just want to say hi, drop a comment — I’ll be here all day.

name: Buildform - AI Form Builder
description: 🚀 BuildForm is the AI-powered form builder that’s limitless! Create unlimited forms, capture AI-driven insights, track drop-off rates, partial submissions, integrate with Google Sheets, Zapier & more. Sign up today with code PH0316 for 3 months free Pro! 🎉

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt! 👋 We’re thrilled to introduce BuildForm, a game-changer in online form builder that makes it insanely easy to create powerful forms. If you’ve ever felt held back by clunky form tools, limited freebies, or lack of insights, this is the platform you’ve been waiting for. BuildForm combines no-code simplicity with AI-driven intelligence and seamless integrations, so you can build forms that not only collect data but also learn and improve from it.

Whether you’re a marketer, startup founder, product manager, or creator, BuildForm is built for you. In minutes, you can whip up beautiful forms (or even conversational form experiences) that engage users and boost conversions. We’ve packed in everything we always wanted in a form builder: unlimited forms and responses, real-time analytics that actually make sense, and even an AI assistant that nurtures your leads right on the form. It’s like having a growth hacker and data analyst baked into your form tool.


🔥 Highlights & Features

  • Unlimited forms & submissions – No more worrying about quotas. Create as many forms and collect as many responses as you want, even on the free tier. Your creativity shouldn’t have limits, and neither should your form builder.

  • ✨ AI Statements & lead nurturing – BuildForm uses AI to generate personalized statements on the fly from your users’ inputs, so you can engage and nurture leads while they fill out the form (think tailored messages or recommendations shown instantly!). It’s like having a smart sales rep inside your form, boosting user engagement and conversion rates.

  • 📊 Analytics & insights – Get built-in analytics that tell you the story behind your form. Track submission trends over time, see drop-off rates for each step/question, and learn which devices or browsers your audience prefers. These actionable insights make it easy to tweak your forms and skyrocket completion rates. No more flying blind—know exactly what’s working and what isn’t.

  • 🔗 Easy integrations – Connect BuildForm to your workflow in seconds. Google Sheets and Zapier integrations are ready out-of-the-box, so your form data flows to wherever you need it (CRM, email, Slack—you name it). Prefer webhooks or other tools? We support those too. BuildForm plays nice with your entire tech stack.

  • ⏱️ Partial submission capture – Ever wonder how many people started your form but didn’t finish? BuildForm captures partial submissions, so you can see exactly where users drop off and even what they had input before leaving. It’s a goldmine for optimizing forms—find the pain points and fix them to recapture those lost leads.

  • 💬 Conversational forms, embeds & pop-ups – Go beyond static forms. BuildForm lets you create interactive conversational forms (think Typeform-style chat), or embed forms seamlessly on your website, or even launch them as pop-ups to grab attention. Meet your users where they are and make form-filling feel like a friendly conversation, not a chore.

  • 🎨 Custom branding & design – Make every form truly yours. Customize colors, fonts, and add your logo; craft welcome screens and thank-you pages that reflect your brand. There’s zero BuildForm branding on your public forms (even on free plans), so your brand shines through every time.

  • 🛡️ Rock-solid reliability !!! ⚠️ – BuildForm runs on a hybrid multi-cloud infrastructure for 99.99% uptime, because mission-critical forms can’t afford to go down. In plain terms: your forms stay up 24/7 globally, with no random outages or lost submissions—just peace of mind that every response is captured securely.

We’ve been building BuildForm with a passionate community of beta users and iterating like crazy. The result is a platform we genuinely love to use, and we hope you will too. It’s not just a product, it’s a little movement to reinvent how we collect and use data (and have some fun doing it!).


🎁 Product Hunt Launch Offer: Sign up today (11.59 PM PT) using code PH0316 and get 3 months of the Pro plan free! We can’t wait for you to try BuildForm, break our limits, and share your feedback. Let’s build better forms together! 🚀

Let’s Go!! 🚀🚀
and hey Product Hunters, try Buildform - It’s Amazing!!
Congrats on the launch!!! I love the idea!!! Best of luck🍀

name: Snippfy
description: Snippfy automates tedious dev work while keeping teams in control. It connects to task management tools like Jira & Trello, pulls tickets, writes high-quality code using AI, and creates PRs—so developers can focus on problem-solving, not busywork.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt! 👋

I’m Alan, Founder of Snippfy, and I built Snippfy to solve a problem that has frustrated me (and countless other developers) for years.

As a Shopify developer, I found myself doing the same repetitive tasks over and over:
✅ Pulling tickets from Jira
✅ Writing similar code for every project
✅ Manually creating PRs
✅ Reviewing for minor fixes that AI could easily catch

It wasn’t just time-consuming—it was soul-crushing busywork that took away from what really matters: solving meaningful problems.

That’s why I built Snippfy—an AI-powered automation tool for developers. Snippfy connects directly to task management tools, automatically pulls tickets, writes high-quality code, and generates ready-to-review PRs.

Why Snippfy?

🚀 Eliminates tedious tasks—so you can focus on actual problem-solving

🗂️ Full repository context and understanding—leverages OpenAI’s file search for vector-based retrieval-augmented generation (RAG)
🤖 Multi-agent AI system—GPT, Claude, and Gemini work together for accuracy
📌 Integrates with Trello—automatically pulls tickets (Jira integration coming soon!)
👨‍💻 Keeps developers in control—AI helps, but you approve the final code

Snippfy isn’t trying to replace developers—it’s here to supercharge them. Think of it as your AI coding assistant that removes the annoying parts of your workflow so you can ship faster without the grunt work.


🚨 Early Access Notice 🚨

Snippfy is still in early access, which means we’re actively improving things and squashing bugs along the way. If you run into anything unexpected, let us know—we’re here to make this the best automation tool for devs!

I’m thrilled to finally launch Snippfy on Product Hunt! Would love to hear your thoughts—how do you handle automation in your dev workflow? Let’s chat in the comments! 🚀🔥
Looks really great! Congrats with your launch!

Dear Product Hunt community!
We are happy to launch Iteraite, our toolkit for Product managers and anyone who is doing product work.
After many years in startups and big companies, we noticed Product management has lost its way, making it anywhere between a glorified project manager and a typist. 

Product Management starts with talking with people - your customers, your business team, your stakeholder, customer success, and basically - everyone. If you are stuck in your office writing a 20 pages PRD nobody will read, you're not doing your job properly.

We want to reclaim the time spent on writing documents AND making them better while we are at it. 

How do we do it? 
By using best practice frameworks you learn about in Product Management courses and AI to skip the blank page problem.

Using Iteraite, you will get from properly crafted User Persona, User journey, User stories with their Acceptance Criteria, and PRDs. Done in minutes instead of hours. Always in the right context. Prompt engineering - NOT REQUIRED.

name: Storytelling Wizard (n8n)
description: LLMs suck at writing good stories. If you want coherent stories - you have to plan characters, plot, timeline, and package it all together. This n8n workflow automates the process for you. With 5-10 iterations, you can write good stories with AI. Try it.

node.body:
Hey you

You like stories?

Me, too. 

I had an old PipDecks storyteller tactics deck and turned it into an n8n workflow.

It uses about 12-15 steps to plot a good, interesting story with rich characters, clever plot twists, and congruent storyline,

The cost: 
It's $100 for the template.
gpt-4o total run cost is around $0.12-0.15
gpt-4o-mini run cost is ~0.01

You are more than welcome to modify to your specific needs.

Why should anyone spend $100 on it?

1. It's funny as fuck. You start getting your creative juices flow, you modify your prompt 5-7 times, next thing you know - you spent 2 hours just writing funny shit. 

2. If you are parent - it writes pretty cool kids stories. Imagine sitting with your kid just writing awesome stories together, bonding, laughing and creating some inside jokes for later, 

3. Character creator step is very very interesting. It gives a great breakdown of a character - you can really discover some cool angles to your characters you never noticed before. 

4. You can turn it into money. Stories sell very well. This thing can write you product descriptions, emails, and other business crap - just ask.

At this point, you might be thinking... Let me guess....

"waaa I cAn Do It AlL wItH cHaT GeEppPeeEttTeEe"

well, you cant really. you either have to work on all the same steps yourself in a chat interface (how scalable this is), or you will end up with stories written by transformer model that has no clue how the story will end since it's always just blindly predicts the next token without planning anything,

In other words, you want to write the stories on the scale? Come buy this template.

Worst case scenario - you will learn from the template how a prompt engineer with 6 years of experience chains llm calls, structures the prompts and builds systems.

Happy Sunday

name: BrainLink
description: BrainLink helps AI developers get more users, eliminate inference costs, and monetize apps based on usage without signup forms or paywalls. Users can link their portable brain to any app with a single click, providing inference, identity, payments, and more.

node.body:
Hi! I'm Miguel, creator of BrainLink.

As a developer, I have experienced firsthand the issues that many fellow developers suffer when building AI apps. We are forced to include paywalls to support AI costs. Many devs add limited subscriptions, which annoy users and create huge friction, reducing conversion. There is a big segment of AI apps/agents/tools that people are interested in using a few times a month, but not paying a subscription. For these cases, the best alternative is to let users bring their AI and charge per usage. However, the current popular approach of requesting API keys is broken due to many reasons.

I created BrainLink so that users automatically pay for the inference they consume on the apps and developers can monetize based on usage, without paywalls, not even a signup form is required. This removes friction significantly on the user side, bringing more new users to try your app.

Every user has a portable brain that links to the apps with a single click. This brain provides the apps with identity, inference (200+ models available), usage-based monetization, and soon more features that we are adding.

Once a user has a portable brain, they are just one click away from using any app, they don't have to pass extra paywalls or signup forms, just one click on the app.

I would love to hear your feedback!

name: Expanse
description: Our dot-relationship-configuration model enables AI to generate custom software experiences on demand. Effortlessly transform your knowledge base into a community, apps, websites, or content in a unified ecosystem where curiosity naturally becomes reality.

node.body:
Hellllooooo!

I'm Jibran, and I've built Expanse – not just another tool, but a fundamentally new way of bringing ideas to life.

The problem: Today's creative process is artificially fragmented. We think in note apps, share in communities, and build in development environments. Each transition costs us context, possibilities, and momentum.

Expanse dissolves these boundaries through a revolutionary architecture that mirrors the fundamental nature of awareness itself:

  • Everything connects to everything – Like awareness that perceives without separation, any entity can relate to anything else through customizable relationships

  • Structure without restriction – Just as awareness can hold both form and formlessness, our dot-relationship-configuration model maintains structure while allowing infinite flexibility

  • Seamless flow from thought to reality – As awareness naturally manifests what it focuses on, Expanse enables a continuous journey from curiosity to creation

This is all based on the fundamental philosophy of awareness itself: it has no bounds, no blocks, no artificial stopping points. It flows seamlessly from one thing to the next because it does not define things as "different".


This is what we have done in Expanse. Your fleeting thoughts flow seamlessly from your captured thoughts area to the community to being manifested into the world through AI manifesting and deploying it to the world - all without you even having to DO any of that (yes, "effortless effort", "effortless action" is indeed a core philosophy our our software), it just HAPPENS.


Speaking of AI...


That's what truly sets Expanse apart: it's the first truly AI-native platform. Unlike systems where AI is bolted on, our architecture is designed specifically for an AI-human partnership:


Competitors:

  • Notion's databases remain isolated – Expanse allows infinite connections

  • Tana's supertags add structure but lack relationship depth – We build a true graph at both entity and relationship levels

  • Development tools like Cursor help build what you explicitly request – Expanse enables AI to discover connections you never imagined and implicitly build without limitations

With our uniquely flexible architecture, AI doesn't just operate within predefined constraints – it generates entire software experiences on demand:

  1. Explore & Capture thoughts through an interface that adapts to your needs

  2. Understand & Discover connections that would remain hidden in siloed systems

  3. Share & Build Community around emergent insights

  4. Manifest Ideas into tangible reality – apps, websites, products, businesses

This is a meta-platform where the boundary between human curiosity and AI implementation disappears. You're not commanding AI – you're dancing with it on an infinite canvas where thoughts naturally become reality (yes I wrote that lol I was on some profession-type beats when I was writing this up lol).

The name "Expanse" isn't arbitrary – it embodies our philosophy that software should mirror the expansive nature of awareness itself: undefined until defined, capable of infinite configurations, continuously expanding through curiosity.

Join our waitlist to help shape a system where humans become more human, and the human-AI partnership dances in perfect harmony through the singular interface that bridges it all: awareness.

name: WordGPT PRO
description: WordGPT is a plugin that integrates ChatGPT’s corrections directly into Microsoft Word in track changes mode, eliminating the need to switch between applications or using any third party software.

node.body:
The biggest issue I had when proofreading with ChatGPT was the endless copy-paste cycle. I'd write everything in MS Word (because let's face it—Word's Track Changes mode is unbeatable!), then I'd paste chunks into ChatGPT for proofreading, wait, and afterward I'd find myself stuck comparing two texts side-by-side, manually hunting for edits to move them back into Word. It was messy, frustrating, and definitely not efficient.

I searched everywhere for a solution—something to seamlessly integrate ChatGPT’s suggestions directly into Word’s Track Changes—but everything I found was external, separate from Word itself. I just wanted simplicity: proofreading right within the Word document where my original text already lived.

Eventually, out of sheer frustration, I decided to build exactly what I needed: a tool that lets ChatGPT proofread directly inside Microsoft Word, with edits clearly visible as tracked changes.

I figured I couldn’t be the only one struggling with this, so I decided to create WordGPT.Pro to allow myself to proofread effortlessly within MS Word, keeping all edits organized neatly in Track Changes without ever needing to switch applications again. It solved my copy-paste headache, saved me tons of time, and now I'm excited to see if it can help others too!

name: Interlify
description: Connect your APIs with LLMs in minutes. - No Extra Coding Required - Flexible API Access Management - Lightning-Fast Client Setup Save weeks on integration, reduce development costs, manage API access to LLM with ease, faster time to market.

node.body:
🚀 Hey Product Hunt! I’m Eric, Founder of Interlify!

I’m thrilled to introduce Interlify—a platform that lets you connect your APIs to LLMs (Large Language Models) in minutes, not weeks!

💡 The Inspiration

Back in July 2024, while working on side projects, I faced a frustrating challenge: integrating backend APIs with LLMs was time-consuming and complex. Instead of focusing on building great AI experiences, I was stuck handling tedious integration work.

I asked myself:

“What if developers could skip the boring setup and focus on what truly matters—building and innovating?”

As a software engineer who values efficiency over effort, I envisioned a platform where developers could seamlessly connect their APIs to LLMs without extra coding. That idea led to Interlify.

🛑 The Problem

Integrating your APIs with LLMs is a hassle:

❌ Too much development work just to make APIs accessible to LLMs.

❌ Managing API access is complicated and time-consuming.

✅ What Interlify Offers

✨ Instant API Integration – Our AI-powered tool understands your APIs and prepares them for LLMs with just a few clicks. No extra coding required!

🔑 Easy API Access Management – Seamlessly manage how your APIs interact with LLMs.

⚡ Lightweight Client SDK – Just a few lines of code (Python & TypeScript) to connect Interlify to your project.

🆓 Free Plan Available – Explore our features without any cost.

💬 Your Feedback Matters!!

I’d love to hear your thoughts! What features would make Interlify even better for you? Let’s build something awesome together. 🚀

name: Inscreen (v2)
description: Technology is here to stay, so instead of blocking access, Inscreen helps users build a healthier relationship with their devices through recurring, mindful screen time alerts.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt! 🚀

We have built an app that helps you take control of your screen time without the guilt trips or strict blocks.

Why?
Because I was sick of losing hours to mindless scrolling. Picking up my phone for “just a second” always turned into a deep dive I never planned. I wanted a way to pause, reflect, and choose how I spend my time—without feeling like I failed when I didn’t stick to a limit.

How Inscreen works:
📱 Recurring, mindful screen time alerts – Instead of blocking, we give you a chance to pause and decide.
⏳ Use Focus Sessions – Need a distraction free deep work session? We got you.
🔒 Privacy-first – Your data stays on your device.
🌍 Financial aid available – Because better habits should be accessible to everyone.

Why does this work?
Because awareness changes behavior. Inscreen doesn’t force you to quit, it helps you notice your patterns, reflect on them, and make better choices over time.

I built this because I needed a realistic solution for my own screen habits, turns out, a little self-awareness goes a long way.

Try it out and let me know: What’s the one app you spend way too much time on? 👀

Best,
Vaibhav and Preet

PS: Get a 1-month free trial on our annual plan using this link! 🎉
https://dub.sh/usaredeemcode

Congrats on your launch.🎉

I've never used an app to block apps. Because I use twitter or discord like social networking apps not only for my hobby but also for business, I would be inconvenienced if they were to be regulated uniformly. However, Inscreen is different. It offers very flexible options and is designed to be simple and easy to continue, and I have been using it since it was launched.

Good luck team!

name: Stylo News
description: Stylo News is an AI-powered, multi-source news platform designed to deliver accurate, unbiased, and comprehensive news analysis from around the world. Stylo News searches, analyzes, and provides current news updates of global events.

node.body:
Product Hunt Friends – Enjoy 35% off all subscriptions!  Use code PRODHUNT at checkout (expires 29 March at 08:00 UTC).

Get Stylo News for home and office and download the mobile Android app for on the go!


Hello all of you wonderful people of Product Hunt!


Today I’m excited to announce Stylo News – the first AI-powered, multi-source news application that provide you breaking news and current events at work, home, and on the go!


Stylo News is innovative! Stylo News' AI agents search and analyze the news for you at work, home, and on the go!


The world’s challenges are growing more complex, or maybe the news of current events is growing more complex.  It can be tough to know how accurate news and what it means when there are hundreds of news sites and social media trying to get your attention and fill your screens with advertising. 


My friends at ProWave AI combined their experience as professional U.S. military intelligence and AI software development to create Stylo News.  It’s the first of-its-kind software application to use AI to find, analyze, and report (in your language) the news you want to read about.  

   

Key Features of Stylo News

  1. Global News Coverage – News is automatically updated every hour across 7 regions, plus cyber and space domains, ensuring real-time insights.

  2. Customizable News Updates – Users can select topics, keywords, and sources to receive personalized news tailored to their interests.

  3. AI-Powered Analysis – AI examines news articles and social media to identify key facts, decision-makers, locations, and source perspectives.

  4. Professional Report Formats – News is presented in a consistent, structured format, including an interactive map for better readability.

  5. Multi-Language Translation – AI automatically translates news articles into the user’s preferred language, providing seamless access to global news.


What are the Use Cases? 

If you read the news on your computer, smartphone, or tablet – you are ready for Stylo News! 


The world is vast and full of complexities. With Stylo News, you can navigate the challenges shaping our generation—both globally and right in your neighborhood.


Looking forward to your feedback & thanks for dropping by.

This application is a game-changer, both for staying updated daily and for consulting any source in real time for work purposes. I have tried many national and international research sources, and none of them have ever been as comprehensive and up-to-date as this one. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a high-quality application!
This looks like such a needed addition for such a complex space!

name: MIDI
description: MIDI is an open-source model for generating 3D scenes from a single image. Simultaneously generates multiple 3D objects with correct spatial relationships in ~40 seconds.

node.body:
Hi everyone!

Found something cool – MIDI, a new open-source project that generates a complete 3D scene from a single image!

What's special:

🖼️ A single image (with objects segmented) creates a full 3D scene.
🧩 Multi-instance diffusion generates all objects simultaneously, ensuring correct scene layout.
🤝 A new multi-instance attention mechanism handles interactions between objects.
💨 It's fast – generating a scene in as little as 40 seconds.
🔓 Code, model, and a demo are all open-source.

This significantly advances single-image 3D generation. A collaboration between VAST and university researchers made it happen.

Try MIDI here to see the magic happen!

name: Difr
description: Difr helps automate your job search. Manage your applications, get deep insights, and use AI to create custom-tailored resumes for every role. We offer a free plan, and feature-packed premium plans that are up to 5x more affordable than competitors

node.body:
👋 Howdy, PH Friends! I’m Dan, founder of Difr.


Like so many people these last few years, I found myself laid off and stuck in a job market that feels impossibly broken. 


Faced with the stress, uncertainty, and persistent thoughts of "when this is over, I never want to see the stupid f*cking Linkedin logo another day in my life!,” I experienced personally just how competitive & exhausting job search can be. 


That's why we built Difr. We help you manage your job search, get deep insights, and generate resumes tailored to every job. All to make your job search better, and help set you apart.


🤨 So, what’s it do? 


💼 Job tracking: Use our chrome extension to auto-save jobs and track status on a kanban-style board


🔤 Keyword Optimization: We identify critical keywords and suggest ways to tweak your resume to help you stand out


🤓 Fit Check Analysis: We dig deep to identify the skills required for each role, and provide scores and detailed feedback to help give you an edge


✨ AI-Powered Resume Improvements: We use our learnings to suggest resume improvements that can be added with just a click


📆 Interview & Contact Management: Research companies, track interview notes, and manage the hiring process


🎨 Resume Templates + Customization: Use ATS-ready templates, or design and save your own with a huge range of customization options


📊 Data Visualization: Zoom out and analyze your overall search with over a dozen charts and KPIs


⚡⚡⚡Watch our 90-sec demo at difr.me and grab a 14-day free trial!⚡⚡⚡


💸 What's it cost?


During our PH Launch, we're offering 40% off our normal rates, with plans starting around $12 and dropping to about $6.50, making us up to 5x cheaper than competitors.


💭 There's a bunch of resume tools on the market. What make Difr... different?

  1. Depth of Insights: Our Fit Check tool it built for the age of skills-based hiring, and goes far beyond keyword-plugging to crack the ATS. We start by extracting, inferring, and weighting key skills from every job description, and using those as the foundation for downstream recommendations. The result is actionable advice for every skill based on context, fit and evidence. You'll not only craft great resumes, you'll get great insights for interview prep as well!


  2. We Go Beyond the Bullets: Difr does more than offer you resume tailoring and one-click recommendations. We also provide tools for managing your applications, interviews, research, contacts and more. We offer highly-customizable resume templates, rich data visualizations, and an innovative roadmap that will continue to add tons of value to your experience. Plus, we're laser-focused on the people using our platform, not just maximizing revenue.


  3. Affordability & Value: Most competitors are focused on attracting as many free accounts as possible then converting a small fraction of their users to premium plans. In these scenarios, premium users disproportionally supplement free accounts, resulting in premium plan pricing that can be up to $50 per month (seriously!). That just feels like too much. At Difr, our business model is a little different: Instead of targeting volume, we offer a free trial that lets you test our full set of premium features, then price our plans to be affordable for everyone.

I'd be so honored for you to give it a spin and let us know what you think! 🌪️


-Dan

name: Sensible-VR
description: Sensible-VR transforms classrooms with immersive, distraction-free learning.Our easy-to-use VR headset enhance engagement, boost retention, and bring lessons to life, making education more interactive, accessible, and effective for students and teachers alike.

node.body:
The idea behind Sensible-VR was born out of a simple but powerful realization: traditional classroom learning often struggles to keep students engaged. As educators and technologists, we observed that distractions, lack of real-world interaction, and passive learning methods were limiting students’ ability to fully grasp and retain complex concepts.

We started by exploring how immersive technology could bridge this gap. VR had already shown promise in specialized fields like medicine and engineering, but most VR solutions were expensive, complex, or not designed for everyday classroom use. We asked ourselves: How can we make VR practical, affordable, and accessible for teachers and students everywhere?

Through research and collaboration with educators, we identified key requirements: a lightweight, distraction-free, and easy-to-use VR system that wouldn’t require constant internet access or complicated setups. The result was Sensible-VR, a 3 DoF headset preloaded with educational content, designed to work seamlessly in schools while addressing real-world teaching challenges.

Our goal was not just to introduce VR into classrooms but to make it a practical tool for enhancing engagement, improving knowledge retention, and fostering interactive learning, all without breaking school budgets. Sensible-VR is the product of innovation, common sense, and a deep commitment to the future of education.

description: Give your videos a high-quality finish with the Video Upscaler. Upscale to 4K resolution and increase frames per second to 60 fps. Available now in the Freepik AI Suite.

node.body:
I’ve been testing the Freepik video upscaler with both AI-generated videos and old footage from my camera roll, and the results have been impressive.


It runs on Topaz under the hood (the best video upscaler in the market). I’ve used the Topaz desktop app for a while, but having this in the browser is way more convenient—especially when I’m already on Freepik generating AI videos. I also give talks where I show videos, and when you’re blowing up footage on a big screen, quality upscaling makes all the difference.


The 60 FPS option can add a high-speed camera effect to any shot, but you can also upscale to 60 FPS and then slow it down to 50% for instant slow motion. Super handy!


Big kudos to the team! 🚀
Every cameraman or photographer's nightmare is having a poor quality shot. You just solved the problem. 🥹🫶

Omar Pera here, I lead product at Freepik. We’ve been working hard on making the best all-in-one creative AI Suite for marketing teams and design professionals, and in terms of Video Generation and editing, there was only one direction we could go.

So, we are officially presenting our AI Video Upscaler paired with Topaz. This tool lets you upgrade any video up to Ultra HD 4K and 60 frames per second. Now, it’s your turn to grab your best AI video creations or dust off your old, low-quality videos, they’ve got a second life with the AI Video Upscaler.

💎 Up to Ultra HD 4K
Upscale AI-generated or uploaded videos to HD, Full HD, 2K, or 4K (2160p) with up to 60 fps for ultra-smooth playback.


🎬 Ideal for any clip
This tool works for both your AI video generations and clips from your gallery.
