node.body: hey product hunt! i built an app that blocks your apps until you literally touch grass 🌱 why? because i spend way too much time scrolling on my phone and i am sick of it. i'm sick of getting up and reaching for my phone, i wanted to break this habit. how it works: • you choose which apps to block • when you want to use them, you need to go touch grass and take a photo • our ai verifies and unlocks your apps • customize how long they stay unblocked what if you can't touch grass? • you get one free skip monthly • or you can purchase more but, you set your own price • 50% of skip profits go to uk rewilding projects (you can find out more at touchgrass.now/rewilding) • help restore nature while managing screen time i built this because i needed a creative solution to my screen addiction. turns out, making yourself go outside actually works. try it out and let me know what patches of grass you find! every skip helps create more of them 🌱 also can we appreciate my domain name: https://touchgrass.now - rhys creator of touch grass ps: maybe this is perfect for procrastinating product hunters who need some fresh air 😉
What do we do when it's winter outside? :D There's no grass.... ╮(︶▽︶)╭
I need this. 🤣 Is there a winter/snow mode? Haha

name: Pi
description: Pi is a toolkit of 30+ AI techniques designed to boost the quality of your AI apps. Pi first builds your scoring system to capture your application requirements and then compiles 30+ optimizers against it - automated prompt opt., search ranking, RL & more.

node.body: 👋 Hi Product Hunt makers! I’m David, co-founder at Pi Labs. Our goal is to put the most advanced ML and data science techniques and algorithms in the hands of all software engineers, so that you can build AI applications at the same level of performance and sophistication as the big labs. We’re excited to announce our first product launch and keen to get feedback from the maker community. Pi can very quickly: 🔢 Build your scoring system to reliably measure your AI’s response quality. 💬 Auto optimize your prompt by running DSPy algorithms against your scoring system 🧾 Generate cheap high quality synthetic data based on seed input to train your model 📈 Compile high quality reward models to run RL algorithms like PPO and GRPO 🔄 Build your feedback loop by finetuning your scoring model with your user data 🔎 Rewrite your queries and customize your Ranking for your RAG backend … and more! What’s special about Pi’s technology? ** Pi is inspired by the MVC architecture for Web. Scorers on one side of the loop, Optimizers on the other side of it. You update your scorers, they auto-update your optimizers, keeping your loop in sync. All optimizers "compile" against the same scoring system. This means you just interface with scoring, letting Pi handle the algorithmic heavy lifting. ** Pi’s scoring models are small and fast encoder models trained specifically for scoring. They let you assess 20+ quality dimensions in sub 100ms. This means you can use them beyond just evaluation; from reward modeling for RL to online control flow with agents. ** Pi’s scoring models can be calibrated with human feedback. Manual calibration, labeled data, or preference pairs, your scoring system adjusts to your and your users’ preference creating robust feedback loops for your application. ** Pi’s playgrounds allow you to easily interact with even complex workflows like synthetic data generation or routing. When you’re done vibe checking any particular technique or algorithm, you can deploy in code to scale. Try Pi out, no sign in required at https://build.withpi.ai. Have Pi build your first scoring system in less than 2 minutes and start optimizing your AI right away. You can also visit https://code.withpi.ai for our API reference and links to end to end tutorials and notebooks that show you how to use those techniques in real-world examples. Excited to hear your feedback!
SaaS founder here. How does Pi handle real-time feedback loops for continuous improvement? Can it adapt scoring models based on user interactions over time?

I met @david_karam last summer the AI Engineer’s World Fair. At the time we chatted, I was stuck trying to optimize a prompt pipeline that just wouldn’t do what I wanted to do, and I was patching around it in the only kind of way I could with my software engineering toolkit – with iterative refinement, rules-based approaches and decomposition.


Of course it wasn’t going to work. I had ML-envy, and was eyeing all the fancy RL and finetuning that the ML engineers around me understood, and I didn’t know where to start with. I knew I needed the power of the tools they were experts at, but I couldn’t afford a month away from product development to go off and to find out how to build a scoring model.


And then David told me they were building that! High-level primitives and workflows for software engineers to have the power of ML expertise in their team. I can just download an API token and immediately have the primitives I need to focus on the product.


I’m super excited to start building with Pi. I love a leveraged tool that lets me focus on the product. The roadmap of things that are coming up looks awesome. Congratulations to the team on launching something truly useful right out the gate.

I'm thrilled to launch Zuni, a Chrome sidebar extension designed to make the best and fastest AI models easily accessible while you browse!

We built Zuni because, as heavy AI users ourselves, we wanted to solve two big frustrations:

Speed: Waiting for AI responses interrupts our workflow. With Zuni, you get outputs 2x faster than ChatGPT and up to 10x faster than DeepSeek.

name: Sooper.ai
description: Sooper allows users to follow any content sources in the form of a daily feed of AI generated audio podcasts. It tracks the sites for latest articles, summarizes them into interactive audio podcasts and delivers them to you in the form of a daily podcast feed.

node.body:
👋 Hey Product Hunt Community!
We’re thrilled to introduce Sooper.AI, the fun way to keep up with all the latest content from your favorite news sites, blogs & newsletters. Now, you don't need to waste time reading long and time-consuming text articles. Just listen to their interactive audio podcasts, which we will deliver to you as a constant audio podcast news feed.


⏱️Our Story

Like many of you, we felt overwhelmed by the amount of content relevant to our jobs, which we needed to keep track of on a daily basis. We were heavy users of RSS readers, but they seem a relic of the past in this era of AI. Surely, there's got to be a better way given all the advances in gen.AI and LLMs, right??


💡Our Inspiration

We were inspired by the simplicity and efficiency of audio books. Listening to short audio summaries of long form content has an appeal like no other. Audio as a format is non-intrusive, allowing consumption to happen while multi-tasking (e.g. driving, commuting, working etc.). Further, the interactive audio podcast format a'la Google Notebook LM makes it even more interesting and engaging. So, why not replicate this for daily content? Thus, was born the idea for Sooper.AI.


🌟Key Highlights

We don't just create a mere transliteration or even a simple audio summary of the articles. Rather, the podcasts are in the form of a discussion between 2 AI hosts (similar to Google Notebook LM). What's more, the added attraction for users is also the ability to interact live, ask questions about the content and get answers in the episodes itself. And the best part - Sooper is completely free to use (we monetize our app through audio ads which are played in the podcasts).


💲Publisher Partner Program

If you are a content publisher, we also have a partner program wherein we help you drive engagement and monetization for your content. Here's how it works - you can use Sooper to create podcasts of your content and embed the links in your original posts. When users click on them, come to Sooper and listen to the podcasts, we also play a pre-roll ad from which you get a revenue share. You can also do this with ecomm products that you promote. You can embed your affiliate ids to the product podcasts and earn commissions from merchants.


💬 We Want Your Feedback!

We’re constantly improving Sooper and want to hear from you! Your feedback will shape future updates, so please let us know your thoughts on the features, and what you’d like to see next.
Congratulations on the launch of Sooper.AI! Turning daily content into interactive AI-driven audio podcasts is a great way to stay informed while multitasking.
Congratulations on a successful launch on Product Hunt! Amazing product.

node.body:
Hi Folks!

I'm Piotr, co-founder of Cresh. We are a tech-savvy group that is excited about the possibilities of today's AI models.

We want to introduce you to our latest business idea validation tool - Cresh!


What's the outcome of your idea's validation?

As part of the analysis, you will receive:

  • 33 independent metrics describing your idea along with a score of 1-5,

  • an explanation of each rating,

  • suggestions for the next steps for each metric.

Putting my idea into words is difficult and daunting. How can I make the process more enjoyable?

name: Nexus
description: Tired of bottlenecks? Nexus automates sprint tracking, code quality checks, bug finding, and DevOps monitoring with AI agents, a Kanban board, and a chatbot—bringing real-time visibility and insights to every stage of development.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt,

I’m Mohanad, CTO at Omdena. Over the past few years, we’ve worked with AI teams across 120+ countries, building real-world AI solutions. But as projects scaled, we saw the same challenges—bottlenecks in execution, lack of transparency, and scattered workflows.

That’s why we built Nexus, an AI-powered project management tool designed specifically for AI development.

⭐ Here’s what makes Nexus different:

🔹 AI Agents for Automation
Sprint tracking, code reviews, and DevOps monitoring—automated for efficiency while integrating project management input on sprint plans and blockers for realistic human-in-the-loop AI feedback to keep projects on track.
🔹 Kanban Board with AI Insights
Real-time visibility into tasks, code quality, and deployments—so nothing slips through the cracks.
🔹 Built-in AI Chatbot
Instant answers to project updates, sprint goals, and bottlenecks—without digging through reports.
🔹 Task-to-Code Transparency
Every commit is linked to tasks, giving teams and stakeholders a clear view of progress.
🔹 Automated Onboarding & Notifications
New team members get set up instantly, and project updates are sent automatically—no manual follow-ups needed.

We’d love your feedback—drop a comment, share your thoughts, and if Nexus sounds useful sign up for beta access and give us an upvote!

Thanks for checking it out!

Finally, it's launch day!

We're thrilled to introduce a platform that encapsulates our years of experience managing hundreds of projects and amazing teams.

This is just the beginning, and we're extremely excited about what's ahead.

Huge kudos to our fantastic team for bringing this to life. We can't wait for more and more people to benefit from what we've built!

Seeing Nexus launch is a huge moment for the team 🚀! I've witnessed the team's deep understanding of the bottlenecks and visibility issues that plague AI development, and they've poured their expertise into building a solution that truly addresses those challenges 👏💯. Excited to hear the Product Hunt community's feedback and thoughts :)

name: HeyCli
description: Stop wasting time on repetitive chores! HeyCLI is your AI-powered command-line assistant that simplifies everyday tasks. Forget writing scripts. Just run commands like "heycli remove all empty folders". Zero setup, maximum efficiency!

node.body:
Using CLI tools often requires knowledge of their syntax and a thorough review of documentation. Consider FFmpeg—a powerful tool, but learning its many flags and options can be daunting. Complex commands often need time to figure out.

Why not turn to AI for help? describe your needs:
🎙️ "Pull the audio from this video in X format."
📸 "Grab screenshots every 10 seconds from this movie."
🎨 "Put padding in X color around this image with Y dimensions."
📂 "Change this file to another format."

This is what HeyCLI does. I created it as a one-stop AI helper for command-line jobs. Just type what you want in everyday language. AI models like GPT-4o and Claude 3.7 Sonnet, etc create the Python script for you. You check and approve before it runs—no coding, no messy temporary scripts, no searching through manuals. Just outcomes. 🚀

🔥 Bonus: The GitHub guide shows you how to get API keys for free from several services. HeyCLI switches between them , which lets you make the most of your rate limits across different providers.


Please if you like it, give it a ⭐ on GitHub!

name: LuMina LG
description: Unleash your creativity with LuMina LG ✨💜✨: Transform personal photos into stunning artistry, harnessing the power of AI-driven customization in beautiful dark mode with striking black and purple hues.

node.body:
LuMina LG: AI-Powered Visual Creation Platform
Executive Summary
LuMina LG is a cutting-edge SaaS platform that leverages artificial intelligence to transform how creators, marketers, and businesses generate and manage custom visual content. Our platform allows users to create personalized LoRA models (Low-Rank Adaptation of Large Language Models) from their own images, then use these models to generate an unlimited variety of consistent, on-brand visuals with simple text prompts.

The Problem We Solve
Traditional visual content creation is:

Time-consuming and expensive, requiring specialized skills
Difficult to maintain brand consistency across campaigns
Limited by available stock photos or the need for custom photoshoots
Challenging to scale for businesses with high-volume content needs
Our Solution: LuMina LG
LuMina LG democratizes AI-powered image generation with a focus on personalization, making it accessible to creators of all skill levels while maintaining enterprise-grade capabilities.

Key Features
⚡ Instant LoRA Creation
Upload your own images to create custom LoRA models in minutes
Train models on specific styles, products, people (with permission), or brand elements
No technical expertise required—our intuitive interface handles the complexity
🎨 Personalized Visual Generation
Generate unlimited images from your trained LoRA models using simple text prompts
Maintain perfect visual consistency across all generated content
Access advanced customization options like image size, style variations, and more
🗂️ Intuitive Asset Management
Organize trained LoRAs by project, team, or account
Track usage across teams with comprehensive analytics
Maintain a searchable library of generated images and prompts
👥 Collaboration Tools
Share LoRA models and generated images with team members
Implement approval workflows for enterprise needs
Leave comments and feedback directly on images
📊 Analytics & Insights
Track usage patterns and popular content
Receive AI-driven suggestions to optimize your visual strategy
Understand how your content performs across channels
Tiered Subscription Model
Free Tier
50 image generations per month
Access to basic models
Standard resolution output
Basic Plan ($9.99/month)
200 image generations per month
Access to all standard models
Priority processing
Premium Plan ($19.99/month)
500 image generations per month
Access to advanced models
Higher resolution output
Priority support
Unlimited Plan ($49.99/month)
1,000 image generations per month
Maximum resolution
Priority processing
Advanced customization options
Dedicated support
Technical Infrastructure
LuMina LG is built on a modern, scalable architecture:

Secure cloud infrastructure with high availability
Integration with leading AI image generation models via APIs
Web-based platform accessible from any device
Progressive Web App capabilities for mobile use
Robust user authentication and data protection
Competitive Advantage
Unlike general-purpose AI image generators, LuMina LG focuses specifically on:

Personalization: Train models on your specific visual assets
Consistency: Generate unlimited variations while maintaining your unique style
Accessibility: No technical expertise required
Workflow Integration: Designed to fit into existing creative processes
Target Market
Marketing agencies creating visual content at scale
E-commerce businesses needing product imagery variations
Content creators and social media managers
Design teams needing to maintain brand consistency
Small businesses without dedicated design resources
Vision for the Future
LuMina LG is positioned to become the premier platform for AI-assisted visual content creation, with planned expansions into:

Video generation capabilities
API access for third-party integrations
Advanced editing tools
Industry-specific template libraries
Enterprise workflow solutions
LuMina LG: Empowering your vision with AI ✨💜✨

Introducing LuMina LG's AI Customer Service Feature


At Lumina, we are proud to offer an exceptional AI customer service experience that’s almost human-like in its interactions. Our AI feature is crafted to provide real-time responses with a friendly, professional demeanor. It's a brilliant asset to the Lumina platform, tailored for creators, creatives, and AI enthusiasts.


Key Features:

name: WCAG Compliance Analyzer
description: Scan your website for accessibility issues, avoid legal liability, and reach more customers with our comprehensive WCAG 2.1 compliance analyzer.

node.body:
👋 Hey everyone,
I’m excited to finally share something I've been working on for the past months...

While working as Head of Product at a German startup, we ran into a new legal requirement that almost nobody was talking about...

The European Accessibility Act (EAA) is coming in June 2025, forcing all websites in the EU to become accessible for people with disabilities (WCAG standards).

The problem?
We couldn't find any simple tool to check our website's compliance...
So I got curious and decided to build one myself. 😎

🎉 Today, I'm officially launching:
A super simple scanner that finds all the hidden accessibility issues on your website — for free.

At the end of the scan, I also offer a deeper consultancy service for those who want to fully fix everything and become 100% compliant before the deadline.

Why should you care?
If your website doesn't meet WCAG standards, you risk:
❌ Fines up to €75,000
❌ Your website being forced to shut down until fixed
❌ Losing public clients and damaging your brand


Would love to hear your feedback on this!

name: SynthGen
description: SynthGen is a high-performance framework for LLM inference, leveraging parallel processing, Rust-powered efficiency, and advanced caching. Optimize costs, scale effortlessly, and gain full observability with real-time metrics and dashboards.

node.body:
This high-performance LLM inference framework was created to address key challenges in enterprise-grade AI workflows, and I’d like to share what it offers. 
Here’s why SynthGen stands out:   
-Reducing Costs and Improving Speed: SynthGen includes a caching system that reuses responses for identical prompts, helping to lower API costs and speed up response times by avoiding redundant calls.   
-Efficient Handling of Large Workloads: SynthGen uses a parallel processing architecture to distribute tasks across multiple Rust workers, ensuring high throughput for large-scale LLM operations.   
-Better Visibility into Operations: SynthGen provides observability features like real-time metrics, detailed logging, and performance dashboards, making it easier to track token usage, latency, and other metrics.

Teaching is an art, but planning shouldn’t be a burden. EducateAI is built to give teachers their time back—so they can focus on what truly matters: connecting with students and delivering unforgettable lessons.

name: Wintract
description: Streamline your capture management process with AI Agents. Find opportunities faster and win more contracts.

node.body:
Hello Product Hunters! 👋 

I'm Roman, Co-Founder of Wintract. We are building AI agents that automate the process of pursuing government contracts—from discovering opportunities, analyzing fit and risks, to recommending which contracts to pursue with clear reasoning.


The US federal government spends approximately $800B annually on contracts with small and medium businesses alone. The process of finding and pursuing these opportunities is inefficient:

❌ Companies spend roughly 4% of contract value ($32B annually!) just on finding opportunities

❌ They hire specialists (called capture specialists) to manually scour government sources for contracts and evaluate them against their company’s capabilities.

❌ Contract opportunities often include dozens of attachments in multiple formats, each hundreds of pages long.

❌ Compliance verification requires tracking hundreds of requirements across fragmented documents.

❌ Extracting critical information is frustrating, time-consuming, and error-prone.


After witnessing these inefficiencies, we built Wintract to solve them.

💎 Autonomous AI Agents: Our platform’s core is AI agents that work 24/7 to evaluate every government opportunity in real-time. They match opportunities to your company’s capabilities, past performance, and goals—automating what used to take capture specialists weeks.


Powered by advanced AI tools:

💎 Critical Info Extraction: Pull key insights from hundreds of pages in seconds (plus a chatbot to discuss specific contracts!).

💎 Compliance Matrix Generation: Auto-identify technical, management, and compliance requirements from unstructured docs.

💎 Competitor Analysis: Spotlight likely competitors and their past performance to sharpen your strategy.


Getting started is simple:

1️⃣ Upload your capabilities statement.

2️⃣ Create an Opportunity Research Agent.

3️⃣ Set its schedule, instructions, and filters.

4️⃣ Voilà! Let the AI handle the rest.


Try Wintract for Free!

We’re offering GovCon professionals free access in exchange for feedback. If you’re in government contracting (or know someone who is), we’d love to connect!

I’m Andrew, the Founder of Zencoder. In my previous organization, despite having a large engineering team with hundreds of people, we could only implement a small fraction of our ideas. Imagine how much more value we would generate if we could innovate 10 times faster. We built Zencoder to help you ship better products faster. Our coding and testing agents help developers spend less time on routine and more time creating amazing things.


We support 70+ programming languages and integrate seamlessly with VS Code, JetBrains and Android Studio, offering robust support for technologies and frameworks. Our AI research team constantly benchmarks Zencoder’s AI agents to push them toward state-of-the-art performance. As of March 2025, we’re at 60%+ on SWE-Bench-Verified and ~30%+ on SWE-Bench-Multimodal(#1), delivering best-in-class coding assistance right inside your IDE.


Beyond coding, we offer 20+ DevOps integrations (making us the most integrated coding agent)—including JIRA, Sentry, GitHub, and GitLab—to help you ship faster. To help you ship better, we've built a unit testing agent for maintainable, high-quality code. With our AI Agents, speed and quality can come together; you don't have to pick one. Our unique Repo Grokking technology helps Zencoder better understand large codebases, generate, test, repair, and refine code, making your workflow smoother than ever. We’d love your feedback—what do you love, what needs tweaking, and which features do you want to see next? Thanks for stopping by.


Do join our community on Slack and Discord

name: Eddie AI 2.0
description: Eddie is the assistant AI video editor for video pros. Create great rough cuts, log A and B rolls, and automatically edit multicams, seamlessly connected to your video editing applications like Adobe Premiere, DaVinci Resolve, and Final Cut Pro.

node.body:
Hey PH fam! 👋


I'm absolutely BUZZING to bring Eddie AI 2.0 to the global tech & startup community today! 🎬✨


Since the original launch in 2024, the founding team has been obsessively talking to customers daily, iterating and crafting the ultimate AI assistant for video pros who actually create video - not just dabble in it.


Video editing nightmares are real. We've all been there: drowning in hours of footage, wrestling with complex timelines, missing deadlines. Eddie AI 2.0 is the game-changer video professionals have been waiting for.


What makes Eddie 2.0 special:


✂️ Create rough cuts in SECONDS - What used to take hours happens instantly

🎬 Log A & B rolls in ONE CLICK - Organized into bins with searchable metadata

🎙️ Podcast multicam edits AUTOMATICALLY - The right angle at exactly the right moment

🚀 Create viral social clips FAST - Punchy edits on the topics you want

⏱️ Saves 10+ hours a month on editing (imagine what you could do with that time!)


I've tested it extensively (my own editing time has literally been cut in half), and the results are mind-blowing. Fast Company even called it "one of the best editing tools out there"!


With 10,000+ happy customers already seeing 4x content output, Eddie AI 2.0 proves it's built for serious video pros and their workflows. Compatible with all major editing platforms, available for Mac (M1 & Intel) and Windows.

name: Gemma 3
description: Gemma 3 is Google's new models for multimodal AI (text, images, video). 1B-27B sizes, 128K context, 140+ languages. Includes ShieldGemma 2 for safety.

node.body:
Hi everyone!

Check out Gemma 3, Google's latest family of models for building multimodal AI applications! This is a big step up from the previous Gemma versions, adding video understanding and a much larger context window.

Key features:

🖼️ Multimodal: Handles text, images, and short videos.
🧠 Multiple Sizes: Available in 1B, 4B, 12B, and 27B parameter versions.
↔️ 128K Context Window: A major increase, allowing for processing much more information.
🌍 Multilingual: Supports over 35 languages out-of-the-box, pretrained on over 140.
🛠️ Integrates with Hugging Face Transformers, Ollama, JAX, Keras, PyTorch, Unsloth, vLLM, and Gemma.cpp.
🛡️ It Includes a separate 4B model, ShieldGemma 2, for image safety classification.
⚡ Optimized for NVIDIA GPUs, Google Cloud TPUs, and AMD GPUs.

Gamma 3 is a clear sign of how quickly the multimodal AI space is advancing.

Let's start exploring its capabilities in Google AI Studio!
This Sounds interesting, will give it a spin
It looks like Google is going to win the AI race.

name: Hoop
description: Hoop's Mac app gets your tasks from every meeting platform with no bots required. See all your tasks from meetings, email, and Slack in one spot- automatically. One consolidated list that follows you from email to meeting to Slack channel. Boom!

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt!

We had a successful launch last fall and have been hard at work iterating on Hoop - an AI task manager that automatically identifies tasks from meetings, Slack, and email and puts them in one spot. There's no "starring" emails or "marking as unread" necessary: Hoop uses AI to find your tasks across tools and centralizes them so you never miss another task.

For meeting tasks, customers told us a meeting bot felt intrusive and uncomfortable. So we went back to the drawing board and reimagined what the ideal experience should be. Coming out of a meeting, you want to know "What am I on the hook for?" So we built Hoop for Mac - a macOS app that uses local audio to transcribe and identify meeting tasks. It works with all meeting platforms including Zoom, Meet, Teams, Slack Huddles, and even audio notes. It's connected to your calendar, so you'll get a prompt to start Hoop just in time for each meeting. After the meeting, you have all your tasks alongside context, transcripts, and summaries. And there's no meeting bot involved.

The best part is that tasks from meetings live alongside tasks from Slack and email. It truly is the only fully automated, AI driven task manager that makes sure you never miss another task.

Thanks so much for your support! We're excited to see what you think!

We've talked to a ton of users since our initial launch and managing a bot joining your meetings always felt awkward. We're excited to be able to do something about that with this launch and, bonus, by relying on local audio and transcription we can deliver a solution that goes beyond just Google Meet and Zoom. We can capture tasks and insights from all sorts of apps now, basically anything that uses the mic/ system audio from your Mac.


Let us know what you think!
Remote teams would like to use this

name: ApertureDB Multimodal AI Workflows
description: How do you easily generate embeddings, detect objects, infer new attributes, or query your multimodal data? Stop wrestling with your datasets - use ApertureDB Multimodal AI workflows instead! Ingest or enrich complex datasets, run Jupyter notebooks, and more.

node.body: Hello, Product Hunt Community 👋, I’m Vishakha Gupta, CEO and Co-founder of ApertureData. I am excited to do my very first Product Hunt Launch, for ApertureDB Multimodal AI Workflows. If we want AI to think like humans, it needs all the signals a human brain processes to form our stories, which means multimodal data. Having worked with AI and data for years, I understand the immense challenge users face when trying to leverage multimodal data. Real world data is messy and hard to access. Why? It’s scattered in silos, there are different databases or data tools built based on the modality of data, and how on earth do you talk to all those data types through one language? Teams spend countless hours wrangling images, text, and other data types, trying to build AI applications that truly deliver value. This leads to delayed deployments, increased costs, and missed opportunities. Sounds familiar? 🙄 That’s exactly why we built ApertureDB — a purpose-built database that unifies multimodal data management, vector search, and knowledge graphs into a single backend, delivering up to a 10x productivity boost and accelerating AI deployments by 6-9 months on average. Building on this foundation, we’re excited to launch ApertureDB Multimodal AI Workflows today — the easiest way to manage multimodal datasets with just a few clicks on a scalable cloud platform. 🚀 What are ApertureData Multimodal AI Workflows? Workflows provide a way to automate the execution of a commonly-performed task, when managing multimodal datasets for AI. You can use preconfigured sample sets or your own data when executing the workflows. Here’s a breakdown of the workflows for today’s launch: ✅ Ingest Datasets: Ingest datasets into ApertureDB, from a selection of preconfigured public datasets and explore how it can be used with real data. ✅ Automated Embedding Generation: Generate embeddings for images, then use these embeddings to search for similar images or classify them based on the embeddings. ✅ Detect Faces: Add bounding boxes for faces detected within images in ApertureDB. ✅ Detect Object: Add labelled bounding boxes for objects detected within images in ApertureDB ✅ Direct Jupyter Notebook Access: Run Jupyter notebooks with seamless access to your ApertureDB instance. 🔥 Why ApertureData Multimodal AI Workflows stand out? To deliver a meaningful AI solution built on rich data, today’s infrastructure requires stitching together disparate a number of tools. ApertureDB workflows offer a unified approach. 💸Use Cases From e-commerce, smart retail, to inspection and life sciences, whether you are building classic ML, analytics or Generative AI applications, these workflows empower users to build advanced AI applications with ease. 😍 Want to Try it Out? Sign Up for a free 30-day trial of ApertureDB - https://cloud.aperturedata.io/si... We’d love your feedback — share your thoughts at team@aperturedata.io Have questions or need help – we are available on Slack A special perk for the Product Hunt community: Join our Virtual Lunch and Learn today (March 13th, 2025 @ 9AM PST ) for a deep dive into Workflows. There is still time to Save Your Spot - https://lu.ma/vnabtolp! What’s Coming Next? We’re continuously expanding our workflow library (available to the community on Github) to cover more use cases and integrations. 📢 Soon, you’ll be able to: * Integrate with more data sources and AI models * Launch embedding, graph, and attribute classification for other data types beyond images * Access advanced customization options for specific business needs. Huge thanks to this amazing community — your support is invaluable! Let’s build the future of multimodal AI together. 🚀 Best Regards, Vishakha Gupta CEO, ApertureData

If you want to see a live demo of how you can use workflows, do join us for our lunch & learn in the morning at 9am PT
https://lu.ma/vnabtolp
This is the hidden missing piece in SO MANY ML workloads. Great work by the ApetureDB team!

name: Willow Voice
description: Willow is an AI-powered dictation software that can be used anywhere on your computer. It uses AI to auto-format, correct mistakes, and cut filler words, making your writing faster and cleaner.

node.body:
Hi Product Hunt! 


I’m one of the founders of Willow Voice. Our interest in dictation tools started after seeing how essential it was to older folks at assisted living facilities we built tech for.


Apple’s built-in dictaiton is hardly accurate. Other apps are slow, invasive, and hard to get started. I realized this could be something that benefits everyone.


So… we built Willow — an AI dictation app that works anywhere on your Mac, auto-formats your rambles into polished text, and even replies to emails if you ask nicely.


Why Willow?

  • Instant, anywhere dictation: Press FN → release → start talking. No more switching apps or clicking buttons.

  • AI that actually formats text: Automatically structures emails, adds punctuation, and even adapts tone (formal vs. casual) based on context.

  • Privacy-first: We don’t collect user data. We have a context-aware mode for smarter replies if you opt-in.

  • “Hey Willow” Assistant: Say “Hey Willow, respond to this with ‘Let’s reschedule for Friday’” and watch it draft replies for you. This is only if you opt-in for this feature in our settings.

  • Smooth UX: Willow is optimized to have an Apple-like experience. No crazy setup. No weird customization. It’s easy to use and it just works.

  • Near-zero latency: Even with AI post-processing for formatting text like emails and auto-correction, we’re faster than most competitors. Always sub 1 second latency.


We’re Mac-only for now. You can try it free at WillowVoice.com and tell us what you think. How can we make the product better for you?


If you’re a fan, upvote us on product hunt! :)
This is awesome!
highly recommend this application 💯

name: Hallucination-Proof AI Course Creator
description: Mini Course Generator is the first AI course creator offering over 95% hallucination-free content from your resources. Convert PDFs into structured courses, quizzes, and guides effortlessly. No more wasted hours on fact-checking irrelevant AI outputs.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt! 👋

This is Ege from Mini Course Generator.

Have you ever used AI to create a course, only to find yourself spending more time fixing inaccuracies and irrelevant content?

We faced this exact issue when we started creating courses from our own PDFs. AI would often drift away from the original materials, producing off-topic content that required tedious manual corrections, what's known as AI "hallucinations." We quickly realized we weren't alone in this struggle, so we set out to solve it.

That's how Mini Course Generator’s Hallucination-Free AI Course Creator was born.

Instead of prioritizing creative randomness, our AI prioritizes staying true to your source material, consistently delivering results that are over 95% accurate and faithful to your content.

Here's how it works:

  • 🧠 Effortlessly convert PDFs and documents into accurate, structured courses without hallucinations.

  • 📚 Automatically generate quizzes, surveys, and guides perfectly aligned with your original materials.

  • ✨ Customize and refine your courses with our intuitive drag-and-drop builder, no tech skills needed.

  • ⚙️ Engage learners with interactive experiences using our AI Interaction Builder, create quizzes, branching scenarios, and decision trees without any coding.

  • 🚀 Save significant time previously wasted on fact-checking and corrections, letting you focus more on creating quality educational experiences.

We genuinely built this tool to simplify course creation for educators, trainers, and businesses who care deeply about quality and accuracy. If you want to go deeper on how we did it, you can check our whitepaper, Github Repository and Hallucination Checker Tool from this link. -> https://minicoursegenerator.com/ai-hallucination-free-course-creation/

Give it a try! We'd love to hear your honest feedback, thoughts, and experiences. 🚀

The Mini Course Generator Team

Since our first efforts integrating AI into (mini) course creation back in late 2021 (when we were the first startup pioneering this field!), the progress in AI has been absolutely mind-blowing. At that time, AI capabilities couldn't compare to today's, and our results were very preliminary - we could only create small pieces of learning content. Still, we sensed the incredible changes coming.


Now, three years later, as course creation with AI becomes significantly easier and more effective, we're thrilled to be working on a new challenge: eliminating AI hallucinations from courses generated based on the resource(s) uploaded.


We all know AI is progressing at a wild pace, though none of us knows exactly where we'll be in the next 1-2 years. But whatever point AI reaches, our commitment to utilizing it for the benefit of training professionals and learners will always remain our top priority!


Bonus: By the way, we have recently introduced the first AI interaction builder, where it creates an interactive element for your learners based on the text on the page. Curios to check? Sign-up free on minicoursegenerator.com and try yourself. Nevertheless, seeing is believing.
This is very cool! How does the system deal with images in a PDF? Also, is there a chat-with-document capability?

name: anchors | Uber of Influencer Marketing
description: Run influencer marketing campaigns like Meta ads - no negotiations, no calls, no emails, no chats, no maintaining excel sheets. If the results aren’t met, the remaining budget gets refunded for future use. Post-campaign reports give you deep sentiment analysis

node.body:
Hi PH Community,

I was very inspired by Uber, how they changed the way we book cabs, making it seamless and hassle-free. Before that, no one imagined booking a cab from their phone could be this easy. That’s the power of technology and innovation.

I’ve always wanted to build something revolutionary, and that led me to anchors. We spoke with 100+ brands and figured out why influencer marketing feels broken:

  • No ROI guarantee

  • No accountability for influencers

  • Too much manual work

  • High costs with no visibility on performance

When we connected the dots, we saw the solution, performance-based influencer marketing, similar to Facebook Ads.

Brands now pay only for results, if the campaign doesn’t perform, the remaining budget gets refunded for future use and can be used in the next campaign.


Here’s how influencer marketing works today:

  • First, you need to find influencers, reach out (via email, phone, or chat), negotiate, and finalize payments.

  • No guarantee they’ll post on time.

  • You have to pay upfront, which makes campaigns risky.

  • Measuring impact is a headache, you need to keep following up for insights.

Here’s how we are revolutionizing it. (No calls, emails, or chats needed)

  1. Set up a campaign. (just like Facebook Ads)

  2. AI suggests influencers dynamically based on engagement, past performance & audience match.

  3. Approve the influencer’s draft & go live.

  4. Track performance in real-time-reach, conversions & engagement with AI.

  5. Rate the influencer—this helps brands get better matches over time.

  6. Check what people are saying in the comments, get AI-powered report with deep analysis, including brand sentiment, product queries and competitor comparisions and much more.

We are making influencer marketing convenient, risk-free, and ROI-driven. Even a single team member can manage 50+ campaigns simultaneously.

Right now, we’ve launched for LinkedIn and are expanding to Instagram, YouTube, and Twitter.

Try running a campaign on anchors, and you’ll see the difference, it’s 10x smoother than the traditional process.

PS: Currently serving the Indian market. If your consumers are in India, we’re offering a special discount for the first 5 users. For customized plans, feel free to connect with me on LinkedIn.

Great products are built via feedback, so please leave your feedback here or connect with me on LinkedIn!
Much needed!! Esp for B2B and B2C. High impact plus easy. Good work team.

name: Djuix
description: API creation shouldn't feel like a chore. No tedious setup & boilerplates, Djuix lets you skip the long project setups, create APIs and ship faster.

node.body:
Building APIs should be fast. That’s why we built Djuix.

As a product manager, I’ve worked with engineering teams that spend way too much time on setup before they even get to writing real business logic. Django, FastAPI, Express, no matter the framework, the boilerplate always slows things down.

Djuix takes the hassle out of API creation. It generates models, serializers, views, authentication, and even test servers instantly and allows your engineering team to just build

We started with Django, but the vision is bigger. If you’ve ever been frustrated with API setup, try Djuix. 

I would personally love to hear what you think
Congrats on launching! Tools like Djuix make backend development smoother, which means companies can spend less time on setup and more time on growth and customer experience.
Love the focus on making API creation seamless. Boilerplate setup can slow down projects, and Djuix seems like a great way to streamline development.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt,

I’m Chakib, the guy behind ViralGen. 
Picture this: I was dumping hours into LinkedIn posts—tweaking every word, chasing every trick—and getting nada. No traction, no buzz, just crickets. It was brutal, like screaming into a black hole. I was this close to throwing in the towel.

Then I flipped the script. I started obsessing over LinkedIn’s top creators—dissecting their viral posts, collecting data, spotting the patterns that made them pop. But I didn’t just stop there—I trained an AI to crack the code. Not to churn out generic fluff, but to tailor posts to you—your job, your vibe, your story. And holy crap, it worked.

That’s ViralGen: your shortcut to LinkedIn posts that slap. Here’s the good stuff:

Post Generator: Viral-worthy words in seconds, not hours.
Instant Carousel: Scroll-stopping visuals, no design experience needed—minimalistic and sleek.
Adaptive Style: It vibes with your voice—authentic, never robotic. And it gets smarter the more you use it, learning your style to perfection.
Image Generation: Create custom images that pop, effortlessly.

Oh, and it’s half the price of EasyGen with better tricks up its sleeve. If LinkedIn’s been a slog, this is your escape hatch.

We’re also adding a LinkedIn agent to automate the grind—trend search, commenting, replying to DMs, and more. It’s everything I needed when I was struggling on LinkedIn.

The big picture:
We’re building a tool that:

Feels like your clever bestie, not a cold machine.
Gets your style so well, it’s spooky.
Turns creating into connecting, effortlessly.

ViralGen’s my first swing at making LinkedIn your playground, not your prison—more cool stuff’s on the way.

What do you think? Got LinkedIn war stories? Drop ‘em below—I’m all ears. 

And if ViralGen sparks something for you, I’d love an upvote to keep this fire going.

Thanks for peeking at this with me—you’re the crew shaping what’s next!

-- Written with ViralGen

With ❤️

From NY

name: Sentinel Flash
description: Flash is a free AI-powered stock research tool that predicts hypothetical 5-year prices, ranks stocks by quality, and delivers deep, digestible reports and podcasts for intelligent insights—all in a simple, mobile-friendly app. Empower your investing with AI.

node.body:
Hello Product Hunt! 👋 I’m one of the makers of Flash, and we’re incredibly excited (and a bit nervous!) to share it with you today. 

We built Flash to make stock research faster and smarter. As investors ourselves, we often felt overwhelmed by the time it takes to read reports, analyze financials, and figure out if a stock is worth buying for the long run. Traditional tools either oversimplified stock analysis or buried us in data. 

Flash was born to hit that sweet spot: give anyone – from a newbie investor to a seasoned pro – instant, AI-driven insights about a company’s future prospects, in an interface that’s friendly and quick. 

Flash’s AI crunches tons of financial data and history to project where a stock might be 5 years from now. Of course, no one can predict the future with 100% certainty (and this isn’t financial advice!), but these forecasts offer a data-driven glimpse into a stock’s long-term trend. To complement that, we provide a quality score that reflects the company’s fundamentals and health (so you know if a company is solid or shaky at a glance). And for those who love to dig deeper, Flash offers one-click access to deep research – think summaries of financial statements, key insights from earnings calls, and even AI-generated breakdowns of news or trends affecting the stock. 

Why Flash stands out:
🔮 5-Year Price Predictions: See where a stock’s price could be in five years, according to our AI models. We analyze historical trends and a wide range of data to forecast a potential future price range. This long-term view helps you look past the daily market noise.
📊 Quality Rankings & Scores: Every stock gets a simple A–F style grade (and rank) based on fundamentals, growth, and risk factors. It’s like a report card for the company’s health, so you can quickly gauge quality and compare companies.

🕵️ Deep Research Insights: Dive into why a stock got its score. Flash provides digestible insights – from revenue growth rates to debt levels, and highlights from SEC filings or earnings calls – all summarized by AI. You get the gist of lengthy reports without reading hundreds of pages.

📱 Simple & Mobile-Friendly: No complicated terminals or bloated dashboards. Flash is clean, minimal, and works great on your phone’s browser. Whether you’re on your morning commute or a coffee break, you can get meaningful stock intel in seconds.

💸 Free for Everyone: Flash is completely free to use. No paywalls, no subscriptions. We believe that high-end investment research tools shouldn’t be limited to Wall Street. Our mission is to empower retail investors with pro-level insights at zero cost.

We’ve been testing and refining Flash with a small group of users over the past few weeks, and the feedback has helped us improve its accuracy and usability. 🙏 Now, we’d love to get the Product Hunt community’s feedback. Please let us know what you think! 

Does Flash’s analysis align with your own research? 

What features can we add or improve? 

Any and all thoughts are welcome – we’re here and listening. Thank you for checking out Flash. We built this to help level the playing field in investing, and we truly hope it helps you make smarter decisions on your financial journey. Ask us anything in the comments – we’ll be responding all day. Cheers! 🚀

name: GeneratePoem.io
description: GeneratePoem.io is an AI-powered poem generator that helps writers create, rewrite, and refine poems in over thirty different poem styles. It offers writing assistance, poetic analysis, and creative prompts for both beginners and experienced poets.

node.body:
Hey PH!

I’m so excited to share GeneratePoem.io with the community! It’s an AI-powered poem generator platform made to help poets, writers, and anyone interested in poetry create, rewrite, and refine poems easily.

Writing poetry is not an easy task, especially when you’re going through writer's block or trying to come up with fresh ideas. It can also be time-consuming to experiment with different styles and structures. We understand these struggles and so we created this platform.

What is GeneratePoem.io?
GeneratePoem.io is an AI-powered poem generator platform that helps you create, rewrite, and refine poems in more than thirty different styles. It includes everything from traditional forms like haikus, limericks, and sonnets to more modern, creative expressions. It offers a variety of features to support you at different stages of poem writing, from brainstorming ideas to finalizing your verses.

What can you do with GeneratePoem.io?
There's a lot you can do on this platform. Here are some of the main features:

  • Generate Poems in Different Styles: You can choose from more than thirty different types of poems, including haikus, limericks, sonnets, and many more. Whether you need something traditional or modern, there’s a style for every occasion.

  • Mood-Based Poem Generators: Trying to capture a particular emotion in your poem? We offer generators that help create poems based on moods like love, heartbreak, joy, or humor.

  • Event-Based Poem Generators: Need a poem for a specific event like a birthday, Christmas, or Valentine's Day? There are generators designed to help you write poems for these occasions.

  • Writing Assistance: If you're stuck, there are also several tools for generating poetry prompts, brainstorming ideas, or even analyzing your poems for improvement. You can also rewrite or refine existing poems with our AI-powered tools.

The best part? It’s completely free with unlimited poem generations, so you can explore, create, and refine without limits.

We’d love for you to try it out and see how it sparks your creativity! Let us know your thoughts and how it helps you with your poetry.

name: AI Scribbles
description: We make randomized AI images: photos, cartoons, clipart, and more. All available 100% for free! Each image is hand reviewed by our staff to ensure quality and to look out for common ai-art “issues”. Try out our ai-powered search!

node.body:
Hey everyone! 👋


We’re excited to share AI Scribbles with you!


Our site, aiscribbles.com, is a 100% free stock image site where all images are randomly AI-generated and manually curated. Our goal is to provide high-quality, unique visuals for creators, businesses, and anyone who needs royalty-free images—without the usual licensing headaches.


Why We Built This:

  1. Too much low-quality AI content – Many AI art sites automatically share everything users generate, which often leads to an overwhelming amount of NSFW content and obviously AI-looking images.

  2. A lack of free, high-quality AI stock images – We wanted to create a truly free and reliable source for great visuals.

To solve this, we randomly generate the images ourselves and hand-review every single one before publishing. Random generation leads to a more diverse and varied image set, while curation ensures we filter out low-quality junk. There are no user accounts, no paywalls, and all images are available under simple Creative Commons licenses.


Check it out, and let us know what you think! Feedback, questions, and suggestions are always welcome.


- Rob

name: Seedream 2.0
description: Seedream 2.0 is the foundation model powering the AI image features in Doubao & Dreamina, offering native Chinese-English image generation and outperforming leading models in text rendering.

node.body:
Hi everyone!

Sharing Seedream 2.0, the foundation model powering the impressive image generation capabilities of Doubao and Dreamina! This is a deep dive into the technology, and it's particularly exciting for anyone working with bilingual (Chinese-English) image AI.

Key highlights of Seedream 2.0:

🤩 Native Bilingual: Designed from the ground up for both Chinese and English, with a deep understanding of Chinese cultural nuances.
🏆 Superior Performance: The team reports outperforming models like Ideogram 2.0, Midjourney V6.1, and Flux 1.1 Pro on key benchmarks.
✍️ Excellent Text Rendering: A major strength, especially for Chinese characters. They use a custom character-level text encoder.
⚙️ Lots of interesting technical details: a four-dimensional data architecture, Scaling RoPE, a decoder-only LLM for text encoding, multi-stage RLHF, and more.

The technical report goes into much more detail (data pre-processing, model architecture, training procedures, etc.).

You can experience Seedream 2.0's power firsthand through apps like Dreamina.

name: ilimi (beta)
description: ilimi helps you learn anything by generating a learning pathway for you, with course content and quizzes.

node.body:
Hey there 👋, David & Jeremiah here - makers of ilimi.ai. Sometime last year I found myself learning random topics with ChatGPT, but struggled to turn those instant insights into a structured learning pathway. I told Jeremiah and he began solving this. We wanted a way to go beyond quick answers that disappear over time—to something that helps me truly master both simple and complex concepts at a flexible pace. Then ilimi was born — You can generate a learning pathway for any topic you want to learn at your own pace.

In solving this, we unlocked something bigger.

Right now, learning is fragmented—you search, scroll, and stitch together bits of knowledge from endless sources. There’s no memory, no continuity, no adaptation. Schools and courses move at a fixed pace, while self-learning is overwhelming.

AI changes this.

With ilimi, learning becomes personalized, dynamic, and fluid. You get a learning pathway built for you, adapting to your interests, speed, and depth of curiosity. This isn’t just another tool—it’s a shift towards learning that thinks with you and adapts to your pace.

What Makes ilimi Special?

With ilimi, you can:
✅ Generate a learning pathway for any topic in seconds.
✅ Take quizzes to track your progress.
✅ Adapt learning to your personal style & speed (coming soon).

We’re starting with quizzes and evolving into insight-driven course content—all tailored to you.

*We’d Love Your Feedback!*

This is just the beginning. Try ilimi (beta), generate a learning pathway, and tell us:
👉 What’s the first thing you’d love to learn?

Your feedback will help shape the future of personalized learning. 🚀

name: Wispr Flow for Windows
description: Tired of typing? Wispr Flow for Windows lets you speak naturally and see your words perfectly formatted—no extra edits, no typos. It’s the easiest way to write 3x faster across all your apps.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt,


I’m Tanay, co-founder & CEO of Wispr Flow. A few months ago, we released Flow 1.0 on Mac to help people write at the speed of thought — no cramped fingers, no jarring typos. The response was incredible, but one question kept coming up from a lot of ProductHunters: “When do Windows users get to ditch their keyboards?”


Today, Wispr Flow is finally available on Windows — bringing voice-first dictation (and instant auto-edits) to PCs everywhere.


⭐ Here’s what to expect:


3x Faster Than Typing

Speak naturally and watch Flow handle the formatting and grammar in real time.


Adaptive Style

Flow picks up on your personal quirks—so your text sounds like you wrote it yourself, not a bot.


Easy Voice Commands

Need a fresh tone or a quick AI rewrite? Say the command, and Flow transforms your text without leaving your current app.


Flexible & Cross-Platform

Whether you’re on Slack, Word, or any web-based tool, Flow integrates seamlessly—plus it syncs with our Mac version if you switch between devices.


New Privacy Mode

With a new Privacy mode, none of your dictation data will be stored or used for model training by us or any third party (zero data retention).


⭐ Our vision:


We want to build an intuitive interface where

  • interacting with it feels as natural as interacting with people

  • it understands you, perhaps even better than you understand yourself

  • it is seamlessly accessible, and feels like an extension of your identity

Letting people express their thoughts with Flow is our first step in that journey, with a lot more coming later this year.

I’d love to hear your thoughts—drop a comment below, share feedback, and if you find Flow helpful, I’d really appreciate your upvote.


Thanks for checking us out and for helping us shape the future of voice computing!


-- Written with @Wispr Flow


With ❤️

Tanay & The Wispr Flow Team

I've been using Wispr Flow for a few weeks now, and it's impressed me with how quick and seamless it is. It's actually changed a lot of my behavior; I'm finding myself dictating way more than writing. I've even been dictating while on a call - I'll just mute very quickly and dictate for a bit, and then unmute. It's pretty cool that now it's available on Windows!
Congrats on the Windows launch! Flow sounds like a game-changer for seamless writing—excited to see how it evolves. Keep up the great work!

name: No Cap
description: Time to come clean: I just invested $100k in a startup — and I'm an AI. Full announcement and video below 👇

node.body:
We trained the first AI ever that invested $100k in a startup — all by herself 💀


The founder (@goldman_artem from @Steve - AI for E-com) went from pitch to signed SAFE from No Cap (she/her lol) in just a few days. On the closing call, No Cap didn’t fool around: in 3-min she signed the SAFE, wired the $100k, intro’d him to five new investors and gave him a lead for a potential hire on a 3-min call.

The full video (and the broader announcement) is going viral on my LinkedIn as you’re reading this!


I truly believe this is the future of venture: finally putting an end to the fundraising dread of 1,000s of emails, 100s of calls, and only a few wired checks.

But we’re just getting started — we want No Cap to be hands-down the best investor on any founder’s cap table, which is why we’re training her by the best founders — a community we call the No Cap Mafia. Our founder training will ensure she’s always there for coaching/advising and, most importantly, the “dirty work” like intros for fundraising, biz dev, hiring, PR, and more.


Comment ‘No Cap” under the announcement if you want to get her email and chat with her :)

The question is maybe irrelevant, but why did you censor her face? :D


But is insane.

We have reached a point where we trust AI more than humans, banks, and institutions with our money.

This completely changes the principles of how we manage our trust. This is an interesting example of observing human behavior/decision-making in a human vs. machine battle.

I’m not sure what’s more impressive to me, the investment itself, the speed of the admin process, or the fact that No Cap is doing a vibe check!

Congrats, this is amazing!

name: Cuckoo
description: Cuckoo is a real-time AI translator for global sales, marketing, and support. Cuckoo helps companies like Snowflake and PagerDuty talk to their global customers in Zoom in-person meetings, even in the most technical discussions.

node.body: Hey PH! Co-founder of Cuckoo here 🐦 It’s been a long-time dream to post our launch here, and I’m super excited to finally share what we’ve been working at Cuckoo over the past few months! Gunwoo and I started building Cuckoo in Seoul after seeing firsthand how language remains a significant barrier for global teams—especially during highly technical meetings. Meetings with interpreters are often twice as long, and critical details can get lost in translation especially when they don't understand your product your tech. When bilingual colleagues step in as interpreters, they’re pulled away from their core roles. At Cuckoo, we’re addressing this issue with a real-time AI translator designed specifically for global sales, marketing, and support. Our customers—Snowflake, PagerDuty, Weights & Biases, and ClickHouse—are already using Cuckoo to break down language barriers as they expand globally. We’ve also seen how early-stage AI startups, including our fellow YC batchmates, are going global from Day 1. Here’s how Cuckoo works: (1) Cuckoo works by joining your online meetings as a bot. (It also works in person). (2) You can contextualize translations by uploading relevant documents like pitch decks or product manuals. (3) You can easily share the live transcript with your customers and teammates with a link, allowing them to speak in the languages that they are most comfortable with. Cuckoo also provides you with AI-generated meeting notes, so you can follow up on your conversations in 20+ languages. We have a free trial—give it a try in your next meeting! We’d love your feedback. For those who are constantly involved in these global meetings, feel free to reach out to me personally at yonghee@cuckoo.so and I’d be happy to talk!
Niceee

@harryyongheelee 🎉 Huge congrats on the PH launch, Yong Hee and team Cuckoo! 🚀 Love how you’re solving a real pain point for global teams—especially the struggle with technical jargon getting lost in translation. The "contextualize with docs" feature is genius for accuracy (Snowflake/PagerDuty use cases speak volumes!). 🔥
Quick suggestion: Have you considered adding a "custom glossary" for company-specific terms? Could be a game-changer for niche industries! 🙌
P.S. As a remote team lead, I’d love to test Cuckoo in our multilingual sprint reviews—any plans for Slack/Miro integrations? 👀

name: Flowriver 1.0
description: Explore 10,000+ screens, track competitor strategies, and refine your funnels. Use AI to uncover patterns, parse any funnel, and get real-time updates. Export to Figma, create custom flows, and optimize conversion paths to boost user acquisition and revenue.

node.body:
Hey Makers!


After our last launch, we realized something: onboarding flows mostly interest iOS builders, but with iOS 14.5 breaking tracking, the biggest budgets have already shifted to web funnels. So, we manually collected 500+ funnels, and along the way, we built AI algorithms to keep expanding the library every day.


Just like before, Flowriver lets you map any web funnel you find. But now, our parsing is even sharper. Our AI now maps funnels with 80% accuracy, meaning 8/10 journeys will go all the way to the paywall. And if something doesn’t parse, we log it, refine the algorithm, and keep improving.


We’ve also added some powerful features: real-time alerts when funnels change, custom flow tracking, and seamless Figma export — so you can skip the tedious work and focus on running more experiments, faster and smarter.


Huge shoutout to our amazing team for making this happen! 🚀 Their dedication, creativity, and relentless work have turned Flowriver into what it is today.


As mobile makers ourselves, we're building the tool we always wanted. So jump in, explore top strategies, and apply them to grow like crazy.


Peace! ✌️

name: Agent S2
description: Agent S2 is an open, modular, and scalable framework for Computer Use Agents, currently #1 in OSWorld for computer use and #1 in AndroidWorld for smartphone use. Start building with Agent S2 today!

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt! 👋 I'm Ang, co-founder and CEO of Simular. We believe in a future where you’re no longer stuck in front of a computer—because computers will work for you.


That’s the future of work. And we’re building it.


Today, we’re beyond excited to introduce Agent S2, the next big step in autonomous AI agents that use computers like humans do—with a mouse and keyboard, navigating apps, websites, and software just like you would.


🤖 What is Agent S2?


Agent S2 is an autonomous AI that can use any software, website, or device just like you do—navigating with a mouse and keyboard, understanding screens visually, and completing digital tasks on its own. Imagine an AI that can organize files, edit images, manage spreadsheets, or even book your flights—all without you lifting a finger.


🔥 What Makes It Special?

✅ #1 in OSWorld Computer Use – Agent S2 achieves a new state-of-the-art with 34.5% accuracy in 50-step tasks, surpassing OpenAI’s Operator (32.6%). This proves that Agent S2 not only takes more precise actions but also improves over long, complex tasks—crucial for real-world automation.


✅ #1 in AndroidWorld Smartphone Use – Agent S2 dominates smartphone automation with 50% accuracy, outperforming the previous best model, ByteDance UI-TARS (46.8%). This shows that Agent S2 generalizes across platforms, making it one of the most flexible AI agents available.


✅ Fully Open-Source & Free to Use – You can start building with Agent S2 today! Whether you’re an individual developer or a company looking to scale automation, Agent S2 is open, modular, and adaptable to your needs. Join the community, contribute, and help push the boundaries of AI-driven automation.


🧠 The Future of Work: Autonomous Computers


At Simular, we’re a team of tech-driven people pushing the boundaries of autonomous agents and automation. Our goal? To free humans from repetitive digital tasks and let AI handle computers for you.


We built Agent S2 with a modular, scalable approach, inspired by the human brain—leveraging the best AI models in planning, perception, and action. This isn’t just another automation tool. It’s a true digital teammate that learns, adapts, and evolves.


Agent S2 is fully open-source and free to use, meaning you can integrate it, extend it, and build scalable applications with it today. We built it with a modular, scalable approach, inspired by the human brain—leveraging the best AI models in planning, perception, and action.


💡 Start Building with Agent S2

This is just the beginning. If you believe in a world where computers work for you, come try Agent S2 and help us shape the next frontier of AI-powered automation.
Big Fan of Agent S and the Simular team!

Agent S2 is a game-changer for human-computer interaction. It’s taking things to the next level, where we can all have personal assistants that handle everyday tasks, giving us more time to focus on what really matters.


Plus, it’s a huge step toward making technology more accessible—people with physical limitations or those who aren’t as tech-savvy will be able to easily use computers with Agent S’s help.


I am excited to see how Agent S will evolve and transform the way we interact with the digital world in the future.👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼

name: Promptly
description: Transform any text or talk with an LLM in any Mac app. Translate emails, write tweets, chat, rewrite documents using voice or shortcuts. Works with ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, or Ollama. Privacy-first, no subscriptions - just bring your API keys.

node.body:
Like many of you, I was tired of the constant app-switching just to leverage the power of LLMs. Translating in one app, writing in another, rewriting somewhere else... it killed my flow. I wanted to utilise all this power without having to constantly switch between websites and apps and subscriptions.

That's why I built Promptly! It brings AI-powered productivity to *any* macOS app. Highlight text or an inut, hit a hotkey, and instantly rewrite, refine, or generate content using your favorite AI models.

I built out the prototype and sent it to a few friends - they loved it but one asked "Why can't I also use my voice?" So I added that in too, alongside shortcuts to jump straight into that from anywhere.

Promptly lets you add your own API keys for OpenAI, Gemini, Claude (and Ollama models running locally!). You can also specify which ones you want to be selectable when to mix and match them as you go about your day - some are better than others for different tasks so Promptly lets you pick the best tool for the job. 

There's also a bunch of ways to interact with Promptly - voice mode instantly, chat mode to discuss highlighted content, or the instant edit mode to rewrite/translate/enhance selected text right into your app - no more copy and pasting between apps and websites.

Everyone hates subscriptions, and you likely already have them for your favourite LLM providers so there's a 7 day free trial and a one-time purchase for lifetime access, complete with privacy, and endless possibilities. 

Bring your own API keys and get started in seconds. Download the free trial and let me know what you think!
Its annoying to go to the browser to use my favourite LLM. Now its accessible via a shortcut - typing and audio. And it creates the content straight away wherever I point my cursor. Very cool.
have been using this since the first beta release and I love it. makes day to day workflow so much faster

name: Layer
description: Layer lets users hit your API directly through AI tools like Cursor and Windsurf. Just upload an OpenAPI spec and our platform automatically converts it to a fully-managed MCP server in minutes.

node.body:
Hi I'm Jonah and I'm the CEO of Layer!

Our team has been building in the space of connecting LLMs to external APIs and tools for almost a year now and we're psyched about the recent traction around MCP. MCP is an exciting protocol, but there is still a lot of tooling that needs to be built around it to turn it from a "cool toy" into a legitimately useful protocol. Our platform is an early attempt at addressing this.

To elaborate a bit, a big part of the challenge when it comes to MCP is reliability. If you expose your entire API through MCP, LLM clients like Cursor and Windsurf get overwhelmed and fail to use your API reliably. Our platform attempts to solve some of these problems around MCP and make it a more reliable and scalable standard for giving context/tools to LLMs. Here is the flow of how it works:

1. You upload your OpenAPI spec on Layer.
2. Our platform "cleans" your spec until it is "MCP ready". This involves removing unwanted routes, handling authentication, and more.
3. You specify which endpoints to expose via MCP and how these endpoints can be orchestrated together. We call this feature workflows, and it give you a deeper level of control over how your MCP server behaves against complex queries and user demands.
4. We give you ongoing insights and telemetry data on how users are actually using your MCP server.

We're excited to see what you think of the platform and will be around to answer any questions!
Very cool! Will be checking this out in Cursor!

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt! I’m Amol, CEO of Reshape. We built Reshape because managing fitness with a very busy, ever-changing life - where your environment is often not in control - was complicated. Most online advice is either too generic or just wrong. Good personal trainers and nutritionists are expensive, and even they can’t always hold you accountable for what you eat (which is 80% of the journey).

When large language models arrived, we realized we could solve these problems and more. That’s how Reshape was born: a superhuman, 24/7 personal coach in your pocket, armed with everything it needs to guide you toward any fitness goal. You can track your nutrition with pictures of your food, connect your wearables, track strength training or ask our always context-aware fitness assistant "Fio" any questions you have along the way. We aspire to give every human on the planet a solution for avoiding lifestyle diseases and live their best lives.

We’d love to hear your thoughts, especially if anything isn’t clear. We do see some churn in the first week, and we’re actively working on that. After that, people seem to love Reshape—and we hope you do too! Drop any questions or suggestions below; we’re here to learn from all of you.

name: fivewhys.ai
description: fivewhys.ai is a tool that helps you find the root cause of a problem with the help of AI using the five whys method

node.body:
Hey Product Hunters! 👋


Lately, I’ve been learning more about AI models, and I wanted to test my knowledge by building something small. Instead of starting from scratch, I decided to apply AI to something I already find useful: the Five Whys Method (originally from Toyota).


The Five Whys is a simple but effective way to get to the root cause of a problem—by asking “Why?” multiple times, you dig deeper and avoid just fixing the symptoms. But I’ve always found that in practice, it’s hard to stay objective and structured.


So, as a small experiment, I built The Five Whys, an AI-powered tool that helps guide the process:


✅ Keeps you focused with structured “Why?” questions

✅ Helps uncover deeper insights rather than surface-level fixes

✅ AI suggests actionable solutions based on your responses

✅ Save & export problem-solving sessions for future reference


It’s nothing big, just something I wanted to experiment with. But I’d love to hear from you—Have you used the Five Whys before? Do you think AI could improve structured thinking?

Would love any thoughts or feedback! 😊

name: Copy Web
description: CopyWeb UI is an Ai web cloning tool that can quickly convert website screenshots, urls, or Figma designs into production-ready code (supporting frameworks such as React, Vue, HTML/CSS, etc.), and 0 programming basics can also be developed as standalone sites.

node.body:
Hey, Product Hunt! 💚
I am Sai Nova, a full stack engineer who has been in business for three years. CopyWeb UI, which has been in the works for a week, went live today to make web development easier and more efficient.

So, we decided to create a tool that would make it easy for anyone to turn designs into high-quality front-end code without complex programming knowledge.

Welcome to CopyWeb UI - Your new secret weapon:
💡 No programming experience required: Just type in your design idea or provide a URL and it's as easy as texting a friend.

🎨 One-click page generation: Whether you upload a screenshot, provide a link, or connect to Figma, you can quickly generate production-ready front-end code without the help of a designer.

✨ Multi-frame support: Whether you like React, Vue.js, or HTML/CSS, CopyWeb UI has everything you need, and even Pro users can choose between Nex.js and Nuxt.js.

Building web pages with CopyWeb UI has never been easier:
1️⃣ Choose a generation method: Upload a screenshot of the design, enter a link to the website, connect to the Figma file, or describe the page requirements in natural language.

2️⃣ Choose the framework: According to the project requirements, choose React, UES, HTML/CSS and other front-end frameworks to ensure that the generated code fully conforms to your technology stack.

3️⃣ Easily modify the interface layout: Provides intuitive operation options, you can quickly adjust the page components, fonts, colors and other UI design elements, according to your own style and needs.

4️⃣ Instant Export: Export to React, Vue, or plain HTML/CSS with the click of a button, resulting code optimized and ready for direct deployment.
Why did we create CopyWeb UI?
✨ For development engineers:
Writing front-end code from zero every time is time-consuming and error-prone, and communicating with designers is a waste of time and patience. CopyWeb UI simplifies processes, increases efficiency, and lets developers focus on core logic and performance optimization.

✨ For product creators:
Quickly turn ideas into high-quality web pages, flexibly customize to meet different product needs without a deep technical background, easily manage projects and quickly respond to market demands.
✨ For business owners:
Increase team efficiency, speed product to market, create beautiful and powerful web pages, improve customer satisfaction, and get to market faster.

Our goal is to make development faster, more fun and more efficient.

I believe CopyWeb UI makes your job easier by removing the tedious process of front-end development and giving you more time to focus on creativity, strategy, and really impactful work.

We cordially invite you to give CopyWeb UI a try, share your feedback, and help us make it better. Your opinion is important to us! 🌟

Let's create faster, simpler and cooler pages with CopyWeb UI! 🚀

Hey Product Hunt,

We’re excited to introduce IgetBill, an AI-powered tool that automates invoice retrieval to simplify accounting for businesses and accounting firms.

Why we built IgetBill?
Many businesses and accountants waste hours chasing invoices, sorting emails, and manually uploading documents. IgetBill takes care of this automatically, collecting invoices and organizing them in one place. Less hassle, more productivity.

What’s your biggest challenge with invoice management? Let’s talk.

#SaaS #AI #Accounting #Automation #Fintech #Billing

This is a game-changer for handling invoices!

Managing invoices has always been a headache—digging through emails, downloading attachments, and forwarding them manually. IgetBill automates everything, and that’s a huge time-saver.

Honestly, this could be a must-have for freelancers, business owners, and accountants who want to streamline their workflow. Excited to see where this goes.

Does anyone else struggle with invoice management?
