name: Skarbe
description: Sales flexing platform built specifically for SMB - people who sell and hate CRMs. Unlike legacy CRMs made for spreadsheet lovers, Skarbe is for closers. Automates deal tracking, email follow-ups, call recordings and meeting insights to save you 2 hours a day.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt! 👋

My name is Mikita, CEO and co-founder of Skarbe. We built Skarbe for founders and small sales teams - people who have been ignored by most sales tools.

If you’re a micro-business owner, solo founder or part of a small sales team, you know the struggle:

-> Big CRMs are overkill. Too complex, too much admin, and built for managers.
-> Spreadsheets work… until they don’t. Important follow-ups slip through the cracks.
-> Sales tools are either too rigid or force you into a workflow that doesn’t fit.

We wanted something better - a system that helps you sell more, not just track deals. We built Skarbe for the people doing the work - not for sales managers looking for reports. Whether you're a startup founder juggling a dozen things at once or a small sales team trying to close more deals without the CRM headache, Skarbe is for you.

---

✅ What Skarbe Does

Here’s how we make sales simpler:

✅ Tracks deals automatically – No need to log every interaction manually.

✅ Suggests next steps – AI nudges you when it’s time to follow up.

✅ Captures every call & email – Auto-syncs meeting notes and follow-ups.

✅ No setup, no hassle – Just connect your tools and let Skarbe work for you.

---

What’s Next

We’re working on:

  • AskAI – AI assistant to answer deal-related questions instantly.

  • Mobile App – Manage deals on the go with a simple, action-first design, log in offline meetings.

  • Smart Calendar – Auto-schedule meetings, suggest best times with meeting link, and generate agendas.

  • AI-Powered Lead Scoring – Prioritize deals/ leads and get suggested next actions.

  • Deeper Integrations – Zapier, Microsoft Outlook, LinkedIn messaging, Lemlist and more.

    ---

    🙌 We Need Your Feedback

    Would love to hear your thoughts - try it out and let us know what you think!

    👉 Try Skarbe for Free

    👉 Book a Demo

    Thanks for checking us out!

    – Mikita & Skarbe Team

Hey Product Hunt community!


I'm Ilŷa, COO and co-founder of Skarbe. We have done an incredibly difficult job to make life easier for startups and founders like us! After countless late nights, we have created the sales tool we wish we had when starting out 😊


Skarbe is the sales assistant that eliminates busywork!

  • 5-minute setup - Connect your calendar and email, and you're ready to sell

  • Zero manual data entry - Skarbe automatically captures and organizes all your deals

  • Meeting & email sync - Notes, action items, and communications all captured automatically

  • AI follow-up coach - Get timely suggestions on when and how to follow up with prospects

Small teams shouldn't need ENTERPRISE budgets to have great sales tools!

We'd love your feedback on how we can make Skarbe even more helpful for founders and small teams.


Try it out and let us know what you think in the comments, we are realy appreciate it!

Thanks for checking us out!


Ilŷa

name: Qodo Gen
description: Qodo Gen, part of Qodo's code integrity platform, embeds AI agents into IDEs to improve coding, testing, and quality workflows. With deep context awareness, agents help devs solve complex coding and write cleaner, more efficient code with less manual effort.

node.body:
Hi Product Hunt,

I’m Almog, the lead product manager of Qodo Gen ✨.

We first released Qodo Gen, our IDE plugin for AI coding, in 2023, we focused on not just helping developers use AI to write more code faster, but to give them AI-powered tools that would enable smoother workflows and higher-quality code.

We started with test generation and context-aware code suggestions, and over the past two years, we’ve been working hard to build our multi-agent code integrity platform. We expanded context-awareness to entire codebases, made it easy to integrate the latest AI models, and refined how AI fits into real-world development.

Two years since the first version of Qodo Gen, a lot has changed in the AI landscape.

New, more powerful models have entered with strong reasoning capabilities. Meanwhile, developers increasingly expect AI to feel native in their workflows.

With Qodo Gen 1.0, we’re excited to offer agentic workflows, elevating AI coding from auto-complete and single prompt answers to agents that work autonomously through complex coding tasks.

That means Qodo Gen’s coding agent can make decisions, ask questions, use external tools, and execute multi-step tasks on its own. We built in extensible tooling using Anthropic’s Model Context Protocol (MCP), enabling our code and test agents to call external tools to carryout workflows inside the IDE, from web search, to Jira, to gits and more.

Test generation has always been at the core of Qodo Gen, driving our mission to help developers push high quality code.

With Qodo Gen 1.0, we introduce a new semi-agentic test generation workflow, helping developers create better, higher quality tests faster.

It’s an exciting moment for us Qodo, and we hope by using Qodo Gen you can generate confidence, not just code.


Try it out — Qodo Gen is available for VSCode and Jetbrains—we’d love to know what you think in the comment!

Installed the Qodo extension for VS Code and it just one-shotted a feature from a pull request, all code, along with tests, even with some cases I hadn't specifically called out. Really cool work, especially the new agentic mode that has the MCP tools usage built-in (there are other commands that make it more obvious like GitHub list issues integration etc that are useful).

Kudos on the launch! 👏
All you need from your coding assistant in the IDE you already love using. Can't beat this experience! (I'm biased. My super talented team of engineers built this thing <3 <3 <3)

name: Embra
description: Embra is a powerful AI operating system. Accelerate sales & product development with your team of AI agents that know your business. The AI OS includes meetings, CRM, email & research capabilities to simplify your stack and save 5+ hours each week.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt! I'm Zach, founder of Embra. 👋


18 months ago, we pivoted to build "An AI that knows the business better than the CEO." After a lot of grinding and late nights, we're excited to share Embra with you!


⚡ Recent win: I asked Embra to plan our Q2. It deep-searched through our call notes, customer emails, roadmap, and product specs, delivering a 90% accurate 12-point plan in 2 minutes. This would have taken us days.


Surprisingly, Embra wasn't designed for strategy! It evolved naturally as we focused on saving product & sales people an hour/day. The more it handled their busywork, the faster it learned their business. The holy grail was a tool where we could just talk to customers/leads, and get PRDs out the other end. We're there now.


Embra can do a lot for your business:

  • Take perfect notes and make them easy for you (and Embra) to use later

  • Draft follow-up emails, in your tone and with the right content

  • Update the CRM

  • Track all the work: action items, projects & decisions

  • Log feature requests, bug reports, and user feedback

  • Coach team members after every important call

  • Create personalized nudge emails with a click

  • Replace cold, robotic sequences with natural emails that keep you in the relationship


What makes Embra an AI Operating System:


🧠 All the work, in one place: Meeting notes, AI chat, CRM, research, and scheduling all in one. Building the best brain for an AI meant it needed to ingest all communication data. One user's development team in Turkey sends notes that arrive automatically translated!


🤖 Interconnected agents: In other tools, agents run when you ask them to. In Embra, agents react to changes in your business. When a customer mentioned a competitor, Embra extracted, researched, and created a report—with a full sales report coming Monday.


🏋️ Humans in the loop: Embra agents let your team review work before it goes out, sending drafts to your AI inbox for approval. Friends don’t let AI friends do dangerous tasks alone…


Try Embra free today! Our team is here all day to answer your questions below! 🚀💡

It’s not often that you get to build a product where you’re your own ICP. But using Embra every day and seeing its impact firsthand makes it easy to talk to users—I’m just sharing what I already do to save time.


If you have any questions, I’ll be around and happy to chat!
Huge congrats on the launch! You guys are really going places 🚀

name: Eraser AI
description: Generate live diagrams from your codebase that stay up to date automatically. Visualize your infrastructure, system architecture, data models, and application logic with minimal manual effort. Set it up once, and let Eraser AI keep your documentation in sync.

node.body:
Hi Product Hunt! 👋


Every technical team wants great diagrams for their codebase, but they take forever to create and quickly become outdated. With Eraser AI, you can generate diagrams directly from your live codebase and keep them automatically updated.


Over the past two years, Eraser AI has generated 2.5 million+ AI diagrams, and today, we’re launching again with deep codebase integration and CI automation to make documenting your code easier than ever.


Here's what's special about Eraser AI:


⚡️ Codebase diagram generation – Create infrastructure, system architecture, data model, and app logic diagrams directly from your codebase. Eraser AI finds relevant files and generates accurate diagrams.


🤖 Eraserbot (CI action) – Automate your diagrams! Eraserbot monitors your codebase and updates diagrams whenever a PR is opened, keeping everything in sync without extra work. Set it up once and Eraserbot handles the rest.


💬 PR comments with visual diffs – Eraserbot adds visual context by commenting directly on PRs with the updated diagram. Speed up code reviews with visual references that instantly communicate changes.


Here are some prompt ideas for codebase diagrams:

  • "Draw a cloud architecture diagram using .tf files in the /terraform/dev folder."

  • "Draw a high-level flowchart of the new user signup process."

  • "Draw a data model using the schema.prisma file."

  • "Generate a sequence diagram for API calls in the handlers/ folder."

  • "Generate a service architecture diagram for the payment-processing service."

Try Eraser AI for free! www.eraser.io/product/eraserbot

Eraser is my goto tool to explain in depth concept in all of my coding bootcamps. 
Whole of our team as well as students love eraser ❤️

name: Mantle
description: Tired of spreadsheets or overpriced cap table software? Enjoy a modern, AI-native cap table management platform with unlimited stakeholders. Free cap table setup. Hands-on support. One flat fee.

node.body:
For 15 years, our tight-knit team of 9 co-founders has lived and breathed the startup life, from those exhilarating ideation days to the heart-pounding moments of exit. We’ve seen it all, and through it all, one constant thorn in our side was the cap table. 


Remember those late nights, hunched over spreadsheets that seemed to have a mind of their own? Or the ‘modern’ platforms that promised simplicity but delivered a maze of confusing interfaces? We’ve been there. We’ve felt the dread of a miscalculated option grant, the frustration of investor updates taking days instead of minutes, and the sheer time drain that stole us from our true passion: building. 


That’s why we built Mantle, an AI-native cap table management platform designed for modern founders. We envisioned a world where founders could focus on their vision, not their spreadsheets. Where legal precision wasn’t a luxury, but a given. 


With the incredible support of Eniac Ventures, Craft Ventures, Sierra Ventures, and other visionary investors, we’ve poured our experience and passion into creating Mantle. We’ve built a platform that founders, investors, and law firms can actually trust - a platform that feels like it was designed by founders, for founders. 


Join us in exploring Mantle, dive into its capabilities, and share your unfiltered feedback.


This is for you, the founders who dare to dream big and build the future. Let’s build it together.

This looks like an incredibly useful tool! I started using Mantle last year and it’s been a game-changer—couldn’t be happier. The support from the team has been fantastic too. Once I get my own project up and running, I’m definitely jumping on this. No more losing track of changes—finally a way to capture the full story. Congrats on the launch!

congrats on the launch!
Thank you for building Mantle on top of the open cap table format (OCF) and being on the board of OpenCapTableCoalition.com

name: Reworkd
description: Reworkd is your scraping co-pilot. Reworkd understands website structures and auto-generates Playwright code to take actions, visit subpages, scrape, and save data based on your custom schema. It's time to do data different.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt! 👋


We’re super excited today to announce that we're launching Reworkd: your AI scraping co-pilot.


Our company journey first started with AgentGPT which hit 1M users and 30k GitHub stars in just a few months. From there we went through YC and spent many, many months talking to users and iterating in the LLM agent space. Many micro pivots later, we eventually discovered that many companies were struggling with the same problem: managing the engineering burden of building and maintaining scrapers across hundreds of sites.


So we build the platform specifically for companies that need to regularly scrape the same 10s if not 100s of websites to power their products.


Here are some of the things that make us different:

  1. Our platform automatically generates Playwright code to extract website data into your custom schema.

  2. You have full autonomy over this code: you can provide additional guidance in chat and even update the code in our built-in IDE

  3. We handle all of the proxy and antibot measures for you.

  4. You can schedule scrapers to run at your desired frequency, choose between full or incremental scraping, and deduplicate data based on a primary key.

  5. Easily ingested all of your scraped data via an API

We've been working with power users who scrape 100s of sites, and they've helped us refine the platform over the past year. Use cases we're seeing include:

  • E-commerce product data for AI shopping solutions or price monitoring

  • Government sites for bids, rules, and regulations

  • Company career pages for job postings

  • Real estate listings from brokers and MLS systems

If you're scraping 10+ sites regularly, we’d love your feedback—try our platform and let us know what you think. Product Hunters: enjoy 50% off your first month!


Looking forward to your thoughts on how we can make this better 🫡

Hey Friends 👋

name: Selene 1
description: Selene 1 is an LLM-as-a-Judge that evaluates AI responses with human-like precision. Get eval scores and actionable feedback via our API to boost your AI's reliability. Measure what matters to you by building custom evals in our Alignment Platform.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt! Maurice here, CEO and co-founder of Atla. 


At Atla, we’re a team of researchers and engineers dedicated to training models and building tools that monitor AI performance. 


If you’re building with AI, you know that good evals are critical to ensuring your AI apps perform as intended.

Turns out, getting accurate evals that assess what matters for your use case is challenging. Human evaluations don’t scale and general-purpose LLMs are inconsistent evaluators. We’ve also heard that default eval metrics aren’t precise enough for most use cases, and prompt engineering custom evals from scratch is a lot of work. 

🌖 Our solution

  • Selene 1: a LLM Judge trained specifically for evals. Selene outperforms all frontier models (OpenAI’s o-series, Claude 3.5 Sonnet, DeepSeek R1, etc.) across 11 benchmarks for scoring, classifying, and pairwise comparisons.

  • Alignment Platform: a tool that helps users automatically generate, test, and refine custom evaluation metrics with just a description of their task, little-to-no prompt engineering required.


🛠️ Who is it for?
Builders of GenAI apps who need accurate and customizable evals—whether you’re fine-tuning LLMs, comparing outputs, or monitoring performance in production. Evaluate your GenAI products with Selene and ship with confidence.

You can start with our API for free. Our Alignment Platform is available for all users.

We’d love your feedback in the comments! What challenges have you faced with evals?
Love the thought and effort behind this. Hope it finds its audience and makes an impact!
Reliable AI evaluation is a huge challenge, and Selene 1 looks like a major step forward in making AI performance more measurable and scalable.

description: Intelligent workspace to combine latest AI LLM models with tools to search and scrape the web, parse PDF's, create tables and documents, and more. Easily jump into a thread and start collaborating with agents to accomplish more tasks.

Hi Folks!

Super excited to share our latest product where we've built a single chat interface to access tools and manage your data. Building upon our agent framework, the workspace provides a simpler way to use AI for work directly while still maintaining the features and capabilities of fully customized workflows.


What does this do?


Workspace is a single chat interface to access multiple LLM models, integrated tools, advanced and custom workflows, and your knowledge and data directly in a side panel. All of these elements work together to provide you with a smooth experience to work on any project. Tools include web scraping, web search, send email, documents, tickets, and data tables.


What are the use cases?


Any level of AI adoption for work will benefit greatly from a centralized platform. It can be as simple as managing your threads and knowledge base as well as saving your often used prompts. There's also advanced tools like web search, deep research, document parsing and data analysis along with the ability to customize workflows using a drag & drop builder for more advanced usage.


How do I get started?


Sign up for free and immediately start accomplishing tasks through chatting with workspace threads!


What's next?

I've personally learned a ton from seeing users play around with the tools as well as dogfooding it myself for general tasks. I'm hoping to refine and polish specific use cases to fully automate and provide more agentic, autonomous behavior.


Specifically, implementing:

  • Scheduled workflow executions to run in background

  • Better insights and analytics

Having everything streamlined into one chat interface feels like a relief from bouncing between 20 different tabs just to get stuff done. node.body:
We’re thrilled to be here and grateful for the warm support from this community.

Cenote was born from a personal experience. When my co-founder Kristy faced a medical emergency, she struggled to find an outpatient clinic that could process her records, work with her insurance, and actually treat her. The three of us were members of a bookclub (yes, also started by Kristy!) and quickly turned into a research team—we called clinics to understand why processing referrals was so hard.

Turns out, specialists spend a ton of time manually handling referrals—confirming medical necessity, securing insurance approvals, and coordinating care. This admin work delays treatment and drains clinic resources.

name: Reranker by Contextual AI
description: This is the first reranker that can follow custom instructions about how to rank retrievals (e.g. recency, source, metadata, etc.). Our reranker is the most accurate in the world, outperforming competitors by large margins on the industry-standard benchmarks.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunters 👋,

We’re the team at Contextual AI.

We've built something we think is pretty cool—a reranker that can follow natural language instructions about how to rank retrieved documents. To our knowledge, it's the first of its kind. We’re offering it for free as part of our product launch, and would love for the Product Hunt community to try it and share your feedback!

🎯 The problem we were solving:
RAG systems constantly run into conflicting information within the knowledge base. Traditional rerankers only consider relevance, which doesn't always capture use case-specific preferences.

🛠️ What we built:
Our reranker lets you specify ranking preferences through instructions like:
- "Prioritize recent documents over older ones"
- "Prefer PDFs to other sources"
- "Give more weight to internal-only documents"

This means your RAG system can now make prioritization decisions based on criteria that matter to you, not just semantic similarity.

📊 Performance details:
We've tested it extensively against other rerankers on the BEIR benchmark and our own customer datasets. It achieves state-of-the-art performance and consistently outperforms alternatives. The performance improvement was particularly noticeable when dealing with ambiguous queries or conflicting information sources.

👉 If you want to try it:
We've made the reranker available through a simple API. You can start experimenting with the first 50M tokens for free by creating an account and using the /rerank endpoint.

There's also documentation for the API, Python SDK, and Langchain integration:

  • /rerank API

  • Python SDK

  • Langchain package

  • Code samples

We've been working on this for a while and would love to hear feedback from folks building RAG systems. What types of instruction capabilities would be most useful to you? Any other ranking problems you're trying to solve?
This looks super powerful — love the idea of instruction-based reranking. Huge win for anyone building serious RAG workflows. Congrats!
Instruction-following reranking sounds intriguing! Does Reranker work with any search system, or is it tailored for specific platforms?

name: Live3d Vtuber Maker
description: Vtuber Maker is a multifunctional software that integrates virtual avatar creation, live streaming interaction, AI-generated avatars, and more. It is especially suitable for content creators who wish to interact with their audience through virtual avatars.

node.body:
Live3D Vtuber is a website designed specifically for virtual streamers, allowing users to interact with their audience through virtual models. It is widely used for live streaming and video content creation.

Virtual Avatar Creation and Upload:

Users can choose from a variety of built-in virtual avatars or upload 3D models (such as VRM format) or customize their own virtual characters in the official store to make their streams more personalized. The platform supports importing existing models and provides simple adjustment tools to ensure smooth use during live broadcasts.

Live Interaction Features:

Users can live stream in real-time using virtual avatars, with support for multiple platforms like Twitch, YouTube, and others. The software captures facial expressions and motion tracking in real-time, allowing virtual avatars to respond to the streamer's facial expressions and movements with the help of a camera or specialized tracking equipment. It also features various fun effects, unique poses, expressions, and dance moves to enhance interaction.

Character Customization:

The platform offers a wide range of props, accessories, stickers, and custom designs, allowing users to easily change the appearance of their virtual characters and personalize their design. Users can freely combine different styles of props and outfits to create unique looks.

AI-Generated Avatar Art:

Using AI, users can generate various styles of avatar art. This allows Vtuber fans to create fan art based on their virtual characters. By inputting a description of the Vtuber’s appearance, users can obtain free artistic illustrations. AI generates a variety of styles and types to meet different needs.

Virtual Space and Scene Setup:

The platform provides a variety of backgrounds and 2.5D scenes, allowing users to set different virtual environments during their streams, such as virtual rooms or stages, to add more fun to the interaction. Custom scene imports are supported to further personalize the live streaming experience.

Emotes and Live Streaming Materials Support:

The built-in store allows users to customize or purchase emotes, badges, panels, and more, which can be uploaded and used on live streaming platforms to enhance interactivity and aesthetics.
Avatars is on the boom for everything across every social media, all the best for becoming new space in media.

node.body: Thrilled to launch our Free RFP Generator today, a tool we’ve poured our hearts into at Eugeniuses! As a web and mobile agency, we’ve seen firsthand how time-consuming and tricky it can be to craft a solid Request for Proposals—until now. This AI-powered gem simplifies the entire process: just answer a few guided questions about your project, review the smartly generated content, and download a professional RFP in Word format, ready to send to vendors. Whether you’re scoping out software development, marketing campaigns, construction bids, or consulting services, it’s built to help businesses of all sizes articulate their needs clearly and consistently. name: Dhenara
description: Dhenara is a powerful, flexible, and truly open-source Python framework for interacting with AI models from various providers. Similar to LangChain but with a focus on simplicity and performance, Dhenara provides a unified interface for models across providers

node.body:
We built Dhenara after finding existing libraries either too complicated (with circular dependencies and unnecessary abstractions) or too simple (lacking proper resource management and proper streaming).

Key differences from alternatives:
1. **Clean Architecture**: No circular dependencies, clear separation of concerns
2. **Proper Context Management**: Works perfectly with Python's async/await patterns
3. **Full Streaming Support**: Unified streaming interface across all providers
4. **Usage Tracking**: Built-in token counting and cost estimation
5. **Developer Experience**: Typed, documented, and designed for IDE auto-completion

We'd love to hear your feedback! What AI providers are you currently working with? Are there any features you find missing in existing libraries? Join the discussion and let us know your thoughts!

name: AppDNA AI
description: AppDNA.ai: The app growth OS that costs less than one agency meeting. Our AI builds custom marketing funnels using strategies that worked for similar apps. No more $5K/mo retainers—just data-driven growth tools in one platform.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt community! 👋

I'm Michael, founder of AppDNA.ai. After 7+ years running an app growth agency, I noticed a consistent problem: most subscription apps fail to hit revenue targets because effective growth expertise is locked behind expensive agency retainers.

That's why we built AppDNA.ai - to democratize app growth. Our AI analyzes what's working for successful apps in your category to build customized marketing funnels and growth strategies at a fraction of traditional agency costs.

We're especially proud of our funnel builder that helps you visualize your entire user journey from acquisition to monetization, with specific recommendations for each stage based on what's working in your app category. Our system also creates ready-to-implement A/B test experiment cards, complete with hypothesis, success criteria, KPIs, and full deployment instructions using the PDCA (Plan-Do-Check-Act) model, so you can continuously optimize your funnel.

Our ultimate goal is to fully automate the work of an app growth marketer and marketing team through this tool. We want to empower solo founders and medium-sized apps to create and implement sophisticated growth and marketing funnels just like big brands do, allowing them to scale their apps without the massive overhead of a specialized team or agency.

I'd love to hear your feedback and answer any questions! What growth challenges are you facing with your app?

name: NiceStory
description: **NiceStory** turns reading into an adventure! Each story is unique—you choose how it unfolds. After every chapter, pick from three AI-generated paths or create your own. Fiction, non-fiction, history—endless interactive storytelling! 🚀

node.body:
My kids love reading and playing, just like their nerd dad. Inspired by classic text adventures and their passion for books, I had an idea on a winter day in the Alps—what if we could truly combine reading with interactivity?

Four weeks ago, this idea turned into a project, and suddenly, an app emerged. I'm not a developer, but thanks to my AI full-stack dev team, we built something I find really exciting: true interactive storytelling without limits.

So, are there others out there who love this kind of experience as much as we do? 🚀📖

🚀 Massive Update: NiceStory.app Now Lets You Create Your Own Interactive Story! 📖✨

We just unlocked a game-changer: Anyone can now create their own story! 🎉 Just enter your idea, and our AI will generate a unique interactive story for you. The best part? You can choose to make it public or keep it private!

What makes it special?
✅ Fully customizable interactive stories
✅ AI-generated chapters with multiple choices
✅ Available in English, German, French, and Traditional Chinese
✅ Early access: Only 10 new users per day!

Not just another story generator!
Our system doesn’t just throw together words—it builds a deeply interactive and immersive narrative. Every story is crafted with a complex metadata structure, ensuring a unique starting point every time. The AI generates background information, character depth, and dynamic branching choices to make each story feel fresh and original.

🔹 Important: This feature is currently not advertised on the landing page. It is only available inside the user library within user accounts.

⚠️ Quick heads-up: Generating your story takes about 2 minutes. During this time, the language might momentarily shift (like it’s on a world tour) before stabilizing, and the thumbnail might take a second to find its way (let’s call it AI fashionably late). Consider it part of the creative magic. 😉

Try it now and start crafting your own adventure! 🚀
👉 https://nicestory.app/
I think this is a good idea and we love it. The kids like the interactive part and are enthusiastic.

Hey everyone, I’m Anders, co-founder of Voxiberate. We built this platform to transform digital dialogue by bringing the citizen assembly model online. 

Voxiberate leverages AI to automate facilitation—from summarizing key points and managing time to grouping similar opinions—ensuring every voice is heard fairly.

Flowqy is built with love in Luxembourg. We’re on a mission to make web scraping effortless for everyone.

Try Flowqy & let us know what you think! 🚀

Renato & the Flowqy Team ❤️

Excited to launch NICH on Product Hunt!

AI tools are powerful, but sharing sensitive data with them can be risky. NICH protects your privacy by automatically detecting and anonymizing personal and confidential data before you use AI, and lets you restore it when needed.

🔒 Why use NICH?
✅ Secure AI interactions – Anonymise you ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and other AI prompts without exposing private data
✅ Local processing – No cloud, no tracking - your sensitive data never leaves your machine
✅ Instant anonymization & deanonymization – Mask names, emails, locations, and more, then restore them easily
✅ GDPR-compliant & business-friendly – Ideal for researchers, businesses, and privacy-conscious users

We built NICH to give you full control over your data while using AI. Let us know your thoughts—feedback is always welcome! 🚀

name: BannsAi
description: Made by designers who are tired of grinding ad banners. BannsAi makes 100% unique and awesome banners fast. Cheap, copyright-free, and on-brand with logo and reference upload. No hassle—just brief BannsAi like a designer, and it handles the rest!

node.body:
Hey, Product Hunt! 💛


I’m Sergey, today’s a huge milestone for me and my team. We’re launching BannsAi, a tool that we’ve poured our hearts into. It’s an AI that truly understands marketers like us, no fancy prompts or tech wizardry required.


So, why did we build this?

✨ As a marketer, I’ve been in the trenches. I know how much the right banner can make or break a campaign.

✨ I’ve lost countless hours (and patience) going back and forth with designers — not their fault, but still, it’s exhausting.

✨ And as someone who believes in keeping things simple, I wanted to create something that works without you needing to “speak AI.”


Enter BannsAi. This is your new secret weapon:

💡 No-prompts needed: Just type what you’re thinking, as if you’re texting your design team.

🎨 No-designer stress: Tweak the banners yourself, at your own pace, in your own style.

✨ No-templates here: Every banner is unique, tailored to your needs, and 100% yours.

BannsAi is designed to save your time, your money, and — let’s be honest — your sanity.


It’s fast, fun, and ridiculously easy to use:

1️⃣ Brief BannsAi about your project (just a few words).

2️⃣ Add your headline and, if you like, your logo or design ideas.

3️⃣ Just chill while BannsAi does its magic.

4️⃣ Customize if needed or just hit download.

That’s it — banners done.


We’ve spent countless late nights and early mornings perfecting BannsAi because we believe in making your life easier. Generative AI shouldn’t be intimidating — it should just work.


So here it is. A tool that takes the hassle out of banner creation and gives you more time to focus on the creative, strategic, and impactful work you love.


We’d love for you to try it out, share your thoughts, and help us make it even better. Your feedback means the world to us! 🌟


Let’s create faster, simpler, and cooler banners together with BannsAi. 🚀
If I had this a few months ago, I wouldn’t have had to call my friend three times to schedule dinner!
Code, design, backend—BannsAi was a wild ride. 🎢 Proud of what we built!

name: Duck.ai
description: Duck.ai, from DuckDuckGo, is a free, private AI chat. Uses models like GPT-4o mini, Llama 3.3, and Claude 3 Haiku. Chats are anonymized and not used for training.

node.body:
Hi everyone!

DuckDuckGo brings Duck.ai, a free and private AI chatbot! It's now out of beta and offers a really interesting alternative to other AI chat services.

What makes it different:

🛡️ Privacy-Focused: Chats are anonymized and not used for training the AI models. DuckDuckGo proxies the requests, so your IP address isn't shared.
🤖 Multiple Models: You can choose from a selection of models, including GPT-4o mini, o3-mini, Llama 3.3, Mistral Small 3, and Claude 3 Haiku. The list is growing!
💾 Local Chat History: Recent chats are stored locally on your device, not on DuckDuckGo's servers.
🆓 It's free to use, with a daily limit on queries.
✅ And no account required. No need to log in.

DuckDuckGo is clearly positioning this as the privacy-respecting alternative to other AI chatbots. They're leveraging their existing reputation for privacy to offer a unique value proposition.

When it comes to AI chat and privacy, you know DuckDuckGo is going to take it seriously. Privacy is literally what they're built on.
Is this private?

Congratulations on the launch of Duck.ai! Love seeing DuckDuckGo bringing their privacy-first approach to AI chatbots. The multi-model selection and local storage for chat history is a brilliant touch that privacy-conscious users will appreciate. Free access without login requirements? That's exactly the kind of frictionless experience we need more of in this space. Looking forward to watching Duck.ai take flight!

name: AI Traffic Analytics
description: ChatGPT, Gemini, and other AI systems crawl your site daily, yet Google Analytics shows NOTHING. We reveal this invisible traffic, showing exactly which AI systems visit your content, which pages they value most, and how to optimize for those. 100% free.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt!


Sam from Writesonic here. We just launched something I'm really excited about.


Did you know up to 10% of your website's server requests could be coming from AI systems like ChatGPT? And these AI visits actually drive human traffic to your site that traditional analytics completely miss.


We built AI Traffic Analytics to solve this blind spot. It's the first tool that shows you exactly when ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, Gemini and other AI systems visit your site, which pages they read most, AND how many human visitors come to your site through AI citations.


Here's why this matters: When someone asks ChatGPT a question about your industry and it reads your content to answer, you've provided value twice—once to the AI and potentially again when the user clicks through to your site. Yet Google Analytics captures none of this journey.


Setting it up takes just minutes through Cloudflare, Wordpress or Vercel—no code changes needed on your site. You'll instantly see:

- Which AI platforms visit you most AND drive the most human traffic

- Your most popular pages for AI crawlers and which convert best to human visits

- Complete AI-to-human conversion funnel with click-through rates by platform

- When these visits happen and how patterns change over time


Teams are using this to:

- Discover which content formats AI systems prefer and cite most frequently

- Track if optimization efforts are increasing both AI crawler visits AND human traffic

- Measure the actual ROI of their content through the AI channel

- Build strategies for what we call "Generative Engine Optimization"


This is just the beginning. Soon we'll provide deeper citation analytics, optimization recommendations, and more advanced conversion metrics.


It's completely free during our public beta. We'd love your feedback on which metrics matter most to you!


Because in 2025, ranking on Google is only half the battle—visibility to AI systems and the human traffic they drive is an entirely new dimension of digital presence.

With easy setup via Cloudflare, Wordpress, or Vercel, you can see which AI platforms visit your site most. This tool let's you discover your most popular pages for AI crawlers and human visits, and helps track if optimization efforts increase both AI crawler visits and human traffic. It's all about "Generative Engine Optimization". Kudos to the team for building this!

Proud of what we've built with AI Traffic Analytics! Finally closing the analytics blind spot between AI systems and human traffic. This is just the beginning of the Generative Engine Optimisation era! 🚀

description: Your website works. But do all its features work? Flowtest AI agent will regularly browse & monitor your website as a real visitor and will send you alerts when things don't work. Monitor all your website’s key flows & features 24/7 beyond general uptime.

node.body:
👋 I’m Antanas, co-founder of Flowtest.ai, super happy to introduce you to our product!

In our previous company we had an issue, that traditional uptime monitoring tools only tell if your website is up. We were missing 80%+ of actual user-facing issues. QA tests didn’t cover all critical functionality, especially for growing product where priorities are growth-oriented.

As a result, customers were abandoning the website, losing trust, and complaining publicly about broken features until we find out and fix them. ⚠️

So we built an AI agent to do all this work directly on your website or web app!

✅ Instead of just pinging a website, you can now prompt an AI agent to visit and interact with a website as a real user. Even if the website is up, agent can identify issues and immediately alert you when certain elements aren't functioning correctly e.g. 3rd party app crashes or features fail to load.

We built an agent and gave it tools like keyboard & mouse control. We parse the website and agent does actions you prompt it to do. This means: 👇

⚡ Launch in minutes - No coding, no selectors, no element tagging. Just tell our agent what to do in plain English (or any other language!)
🔄 Set up & forget - Zero maintenance when your website changes. Agent adapts like a real user would e.g. recognizing that a search icon serves the same purpose as a search box previously.
💎 Enterprise testing, startup price - Finally afford both website uptime monitoring AND end-to-end QA testing in one no-code solution.
🔔 Catch issues that traditional monitoring tools miss: broken forms, payment flows, 3rd party integrations

🎯 Here are a few examples of how our early customers are using it:

1. Agent visits your site --> enters a keyword in a search box --> verifies that relevant search results appear
2. Agent visits your login page --> enters credentials --> confirms successful login into the correct account
3. Agent completes a purchasing flow by filling in all necessary fields --> checks if the checkout process works correctly

150+ websites are now monitored by Flowtest AI agent. Teams can finally sleep better knowing their sites aren't just up but actually functioning.

We'd love to hear all your feedback and opinions, ask me anything in the comments! 🙏

name: RLAMA
description: Retrieval-Augmented Local Assistant Model Agent

node.body:
Hey!

I developed RLAMA to solve a straightforward but frustrating problem: how to easily query my own documents with a local LLM without using cloud services.

What it actually is
RLAMA is a command-line tool that bridges your local documents and Ollama models. It implements RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) in a minimalist way:
RLAMA extracts text from the documents and generates embeddings via Ollama. When you ask a question, it retrieves relevant passages and sends them to the model.
The tool handles many formats automatically. For PDFs, it first tries pdftotext, then tesseract if necessary. For binary files, it has several fallback methods to extract what it can.
Problems it solves
I use it daily for:
Finding information in old technical documents without having to reread everything
Exploring code I'm not familiar with (e.g., "explain how part X works")
Creating summaries of long documents
Querying my research or meeting notes
The real time-saver comes from being able to ask questions instead of searching for keywords. For example, I can ask "What are the possible errors in the authentication API?" and get consolidated answers from multiple files.
Why use it?
It's simple: four commands are enough (rag, run, list, delete)
It's local: no data is sent over the internet
It's lightweight: no need for Docker or a complete stack
It's flexible: compatible with all Ollama models
I created it because other solutions were either too complex to configure or required sending my documents to external services.

If you already have Ollama installed and are looking for a simple way to query your documents, this might be useful for you.

In conclusion
I've found that in discussions on r/ollama point to several pressing needs for local RAG without cloud dependencies: we need to simplify the ingestion of data (PDFs, web pages, videos...) via tools that can automatically transform them into usable text, reduce hardware requirements or better leverage common hardware (model quantization, multi-GPU support) to improve performance, and integrate advanced retrieval methods (hybrid search, rerankers, etc.) to increase answer reliability.

The emergence of integrated solutions (OpenWebUI, LangChain/Langroid, RAGStack, etc.) moves in this direction: the ultimate goal is a tool where users only need to provide their local files to benefit from an AI assistant trained on their own knowledge, while remaining 100% private and local so I wanted to develop something easy to use!
It's always great to see more open-source solutions pushing the boundaries of AI training. Looking forward to testing this out!

This sounds like such a useful tool, especially for anyone who deals with lots of documents and needs to quickly find specific information without the hassle of cloud services! I love how simple and lightweight it is. Do you plan to add any more document formats or expand its capabilities for more complex queries?

name: Instella
description: Instella, from AMD, is the high-performance 3B language models. ResearchRAIL license for model weights, MIT license for code. Trained on MI300X.

node.body:
Hi everyone!

Check out Instella, a new family of 3B language models from AMD. These models are interesting because they're achieving performance comparable to larger, open-weight models, but with a smaller footprint.

Key points:

📈 Strong Performance: Outperforms other 3B models, and rivals some larger open-weight models like Llama-3.2-3B and Gemma-2-2B.
✨ Reasoning Focus: Second stage of pretraining focused on math/reasoning.
📦 Multiple Versions: They've released pretrained, SFT (supervised fine-tuned), and DPO (Direct Preference Optimization) versions.
🔥 Trained from scratch on AMD Instinct MI300X GPUs.
🔑 Research License: The model weights are under a ResearchRAIL license, so check the terms for your specific use case. The code is open-source (MIT).

It's a great example of how much can be achieved with efficient training and a focus on specific capabilities (like reasoning). The fact that they've released multiple versions, is also a plus.

Youtube | (https://youtube.com/@scifocusai?...) Let’s make academic research efficient, accessible, and truly transformative.

I've been using Scifocus for a while now, and it's been an absolute game - changerFirst off, the literature search feature is top - notch. When I was prepping for my research on "Sustainable Catalysts for Green Chemistry," I typed in the topic. Scifocus didn't just throw a bunch of random papers at me. It scoured through a ton of academic databases and pulled out the most relevant ones, complete with summaries. This was a massive time - saver. Before, I'd spend ages looking through journals, not even sure if I was on the right track.The note - taking function is super convenient. As I read through papers, I can quickly jot down key points, and the app even lets me organize them into different folders. It's like having a personal research assistant. I can highlight important passages in the papers themselves and add my own thoughts right there.The writing assistance is another big plus. When I'm drafting my research reports, Scifocus helps me clean up my grammar and also suggests more scientific - sounding words to use. It makes my writing look much more polished.

I've recommended Scifocus to all my classmates, and we're all impressed. It's an essential app for anyone doing academic research. Whether you're in the sciences, social sciences, or humanities, this app has something to offer.

I recently started using Scifocus, the AI-powered academic toolkit, and it has truly transformed my research experience! Initially, I was curious but a bit skeptical about how an AI could enhance my academic work. However, Scifocus has exceeded all my expectations. The intuitive interface makes it incredibly easy to navigate, allowing me to seamlessly generate ideas and refine my research topics. One of the standout features for me is the AI-driven suggestion tool, which not only provides relevant literature but also offers insights I hadn’t considered before. This has significantly streamlined my workflow and boosted my productivity, making the entire research process feel more like an exciting journey rather than a daunting task. If you’re a student or a professor looking to elevate your research game, I wholeheartedly recommend giving Scifocus a try. It’s a game changer that will undoubtedly ignite your academic genius!

name: PawPal
description: Discover PawPal - the ultimate software solution for pet care businesses. Streamline daycare, boarding, walking, pet sitting, and home visit services with our user-friendly app. Boost efficiency, improve client satisfaction, and grow your business with PawPal.

node.body:
🚀 PawPal is Live on Product Hunt! 🐶🐾

Hey Product Hunt! We’re thrilled to introduce PawPal, a software solution designed to make running a pet care business effortless. Whether you manage a pet daycare, boarding facility, dog walking, or pet sitting service, PawPal gives you the tools to streamline operations, automate admin work, and keep pet parents engaged—all in one place.

🐕 Why We Built PawPal
After working with pet care professionals for years, we saw how much time was spent juggling bookings, payments, and customer updates. Many businesses were using spreadsheets, messaging apps, and manual invoicing—leading to missed appointments, delayed payments, and a ton of stress.

We knew there had to be a better way, so we built PawPal to handle it all.

🛠 What You Get with PawPal
✅ Branded Mobile App – Your own app on the App Store & Play Store (no generic platforms!)
✅ Automated Bookings & Payments – Customers can book & pay in seconds, reducing cancellations.
✅ Live Updates & Notifications – Keep pet parents in the loop with real-time updates.
✅ Business Management Dashboard – Track revenue, schedules, and customer details with ease.
✅ Multi-Service Support – Handle daycare, boarding, walks, and more from one dashboard.

🏆 Our Goal
We want to help pet care businesses spend less time on admin and more time caring for pets. Our mission is to bring professional-grade tools to an industry that deserves them!

💬 We’d love to hear your feedback! Whether you’re a pet business owner, a pet parent, or just love supporting innovative tools, let us know what you think. Drop a comment, ask a question, and if you like what we’ve built, your support would mean the world to us! ❤️🐾

name: Focusminny App
description: This isn't just a typical timer app—it’s your study/work companion. It helps blocks distractions, uses AI to set and break down goals, and checks in to keep you on track. Stay motivated, refocus, and take breaks when needed—all based on your progress.

node.body:
I initially built this app for my niece to help her stay focused while studying, but after receiving donations from users who found it valuable, I decided to improve it further.

Unlike typical timer apps that just help you focus for a set amount of time, I wanted to create something that actually guides you throughout your study or work session — like having a little companion by your side.

The app not only helps you block distractions but also uses AI to set and break down your goals into smaller, actionable steps. During your session, the app checks in with you, motivates you, and reminds you to refocus or take breaks when needed — all based on how you’re progressing.

You can also schedule sessions in advance and track how many productive hours you’ve completed in the last 30 days.

Built with Expo React Native, NativeWind, Supabase, OpenAI API, and more.

Would love to get your feedback! What do you think?

name: ANUS Autonomous Networked Utility System
description: ANUS is a revolutionary AI agent framework entirely designed and coded by Manus AI. In less than 25 min, AI created this complete system with architecture, documentation, and tooling—proving AI can build AI

node.body:
I wanted to share something truly mind-blowing with the ProductHunt community. This project represents a significant milestone in AI development: I simply prompted Manus AI to create its own open-source alternative, and it built ANUS (Autonomous Networked Utility System) entirely from scratch.

My role? Just writing the prompt and using Cursor to push to GitHub. That's it. Manus designed the architecture, wrote all the code, created documentation, even made the logo—100% AI work.

While people are paying up to $20K for Manus invites, we're making this completely free and open-source. The project combines single and multi-agent capabilities with a comprehensive tool ecosystem and model flexibility.

I'm especially grateful to @eugeneshilow for the brilliant idea!

Would love to hear your thoughts on what this means for the future of AI and software development. Are we entering an era where humans are primarily prompt engineers?

Check out the repo: github.com/nikmcfly/ANUS
A product can create its own from scratch if once created, quite impressive with rise in AI technology.

description: Tailor CV instantly customizes your resume for any job. Just upload your CV and job description, and our AI highlights your most relevant skills, optimizing it for recruiters. Land more interviews effortlessly!

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt! 👋 I'm thrilled to introduce Tailor CV, your ultimate AI-powered tool for customizing resumes!

Using the same resume for every job application is a recipe for rejection—nearly 70% of resumes get discarded by Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) due to lack of personalization. Tailor CV solves this problem by instantly adapting your CV to precisely match each job description, ensuring you highlight the skills and experiences recruiters care about most.

Why Tailor CV is a game-changer:

✨ Instant Resume Personalization: Upload your CV and job description, and our AI customizes your resume in seconds, no manual edits required.

✨ ATS Optimization: Tailor CV identifies essential keywords from job listings and seamlessly integrates them, dramatically increasing your visibility to recruiters.

✨ Skill Highlighting: Clearly emphasizes your most relevant achievements, making your CV concise, compelling, and highly targeted.

✨ Save Hours: Automate tedious resume editing, freeing you to apply to more roles confidently and efficiently.

✨ Proven Results: Tailored resumes have significantly higher chances of landing interviews—our users consistently report increased response rates from recruiters.

We built Tailor CV to streamline and revolutionize your job search experience. I'd love to hear your thoughts, feedback, or suggestions!

Happy job hunting! 🚀

Cheers!

name: Fresh SEO
description: Search through each of your articles to find the specific places you need to update. Save yourself hours of tedious work and improve SEO performance.

node.body:
👋 Hey Hunters!

I got tired of spending hours and hours manually inspecting each of our SEO blog posts to find places that we needed to update. Fresh SEO now does it for me.

This tool has already saved me dozens of hours, and I’ve only had it for two months.

Fresh SEO has two modes:
1. Quick Search: Straightforward string matching. Great for “find and replace” situations like updating mentions of an old price or an old product name.
2. AI Search: More sophisticated. You give Fresh SEO a set of directions explaining what you need to update. Then, Fresh SEO analyzes each page, assigns it a score out of 100, and provides a rationale for the score. Great for situations that require more judgement about what needs to be updated. (We’re using DeepSeek V3 to power the analysis.)

Looking forward to hearing what you think!

name: Magicam
description: Magicam redefines real-time AI face swapping. It features Voice Clone for dynamic voice modulation, LivePortrait to animate images, enhanced video face swap, and a Customization Panel for fine-tuning—ideal for creators and professionals.

node.body:
🚀 Magicam 2.0 is Here – Bigger, Better, and More Magical! 🚀

Hey PH community! 👋 Ethan here, and I couldn’t be more excited to share Magicam’s second launch with you all! Being back on Product Hunt feels like coming home, and we’re beyond grateful for the support and feedback that helped shape this new version.

For those new to Magicam, it’s an AI-powered face-swapping app that works in real-time—perfect for video calls, live streams, and more. Plus, it allows you to swap faces in pre-recorded videos with just one click! Whether for work, fun, or creative projects, Magicam brings a touch of AI magic to everyday life. ✨

What’s New in Magicam 2.0?
🔊 Voice Clone – Don’t just look like them—sound like them too! Upload a voice sample, and Magicam will transform your voice to match. Pair it with face swap for the ultimate transformation.
🖼️ LivePortrait – Ever wished a photo could come to life? Now it can. Upload any image—whether it’s a real person, a painting, or a 3D model—and bring it to life with your own movements.
🎬 Next-Level Video Face Swap – Upload a video, let Magicam detect faces, pick a new face, and swap instantly. No complex editing, just one-click magic.
🎛️ Advanced Customization Panel – We’ve kept our signature one-click seamless swaps, but now you get full control. Fine-tune the details to get the exact look you want.
🎭 More powerful real-time face swapping function – Through the upgrade of ai technology, the ability to swap faces in real-time scenarios such as meetings or live broadcasts has become more natural and smooth.

We built Magicam 2.0 to make AI creativity more fun, accessible, and powerful—whether you’re a creator, a tech enthusiast, or just someone who loves experimenting with AI.

💡 Special Launch Offer: From March 9 to March 16, use PHXMAGIC20 at checkout to get 20% off any paid plan!

We’d love to hear your thoughts! Drop a comment, test it out, and let us know what you think. Your feedback helps us improve and innovate! 🚀💜

Congratulations on the launch,  the Magicam team! 🚀✨


Magicam 2.0 looks incredibly impressive—real-time face swapping paired with voice cloning is a total game-changer. The LivePortrait feature sounds especially magical, turning static images into interactive, lifelike animations is just mind-blowing! 🤯 The simplicity of one-click video face swaps combined with advanced customization truly makes Magicam stand out as both powerful and user-friendly.


Can’t wait to try it out and see all the creative possibilities! Kudos on this exciting upgrade! 🙌

name: Aya Vision
description: Aya Vision, from Cohere For AI, is the open-weights, multilingual, multimodal models (8B & 32B). Outperforms larger models on multilingual vision tasks. Available on Hugging Face and Kaggle.

node.body:
Hi everyone!

Check out Aya Vision, a new set of open-weights models from Cohere For AI, and this is a significant step towards making AI truly global! Most vision-language models are heavily biased towards English. Aya Vision tackles this head-on by supporting 23 languages spoken by over half the world's population.

Here's why it's important:

🌍 Multilingual by Design: Excels at understanding and generating text and processing images/videos across a wide range of languages.
🖼️ Multimodal: Handles both images/videos and text.
🚀 Outperforms Larger Models: Cohere claims Aya Vision (8B and 32B versions) outperforms models many times their size (like Llama 3 90B!) on multilingual multimodal tasks.
🔓 Open Weights: Available on Hugging Face and Kaggle.
📱 Free on WhatsApp: You can even try Aya for free on WhatsApp!

They're also releasing a new benchmark, Aya Vision Benchmark, specifically for evaluating multilingual multimodal performance. The goal is to build AI that understands the nuances of different cultures and languages, not just add more languages.
The concept seems interesting, but I’m not sure how practical it is for everyday use. maybe a demo video would help exxplain it better
What does Aya Vision do differently from other similar tools? Would love to understand how it stands out

name: HunyuanVideo-I2V
description: HunyuanVideo-I2V, from Tencent, is a open-source image-to-video generation model. Up to 720p resolution, 129 frames. Supports custom LoRA training for unique effects.

node.body:
Hi everyone!

HunyuanVideo-I2V is a new open-source image-to-video model from Tencent, and it's a significant addition to the growing AI video space! This builds on their previous HunyuanVideo project, but focuses specifically on turning still images into videos.

Here's the detail:

🖼️ Image-to-Video: Give it an image and a text prompt, and it generates a video.
🌅 High Resolution: Can generate videos up to 720p resolution.
⏱️ Up to 129 frames (around 5 seconds).
✨ Customizable Effects (LoRA): This is huge. You can train your own LoRA adapters to create custom visual styles and effects. This gives you a lot of control.
🔓 Open Source: Code and model weights are available.

It requires a pretty hefty GPU (they recommend 80GB), but they have optimized inference scripts.

Check out the video above of a lil cuttie penguin's journey!
The idea is interesting but I wonder how well it handles complex details in images. Some AI tools struggle with accuracy in motion.

I tested it, and I like how easy it is to turn images into videos. The processing speed is good but i think having more control over frame rates and effects could make it even more useful for creators.

name: BeHooked
description: BeHooked is an AI content creation agent that makes video production effortless. Just chat, and it handles everything, from scripting to editing, delivering high-quality videos in minutes. No learning curve, no complicated UI, just seamless creativity.

node.body:
Hello Product Hunt,

I’m Yash, founder of BeHooked.

Today, we’re officially launching BeHooked.co
The easiest way to create short video content.

I’ve been an aspiring creator since I was 16, but I could never stay consistent.

In December 2023, I decided to give content creation another shot
This time, with full dedication.

I was consistent for two months, but then my sister’s wedding happened, and my streak broke.

That’s when I thought:

Why isn’t there an app that can create a fully edited video of me talking, ready to post on social media?

And that’s how BeHooked started in May 2024.

The Problem:

To create content, we need consistency.
But with everything else in life, spending hours researching, shooting, and editing just isn’t practical.
Plus, existing tools are either too complicated or too expensive.

Most creators juggle:
1. ChatGPT (or any LLM) for research and scriptwriting
2. AI avatar tools like HeyGen or Synthesia
3. Editing software like Premiere Pro
4. Auto-posting tools

All these add up, both in cost and complexity.

The Solution:

BeHooked is a fully autonomous AI content creation agent.
No timelines, no complicated software

just chat with it like you would with an editor, and it handles everything.

From idea to a fully edited video in 15 minutes.

What BeHooked Can Do (V1):

- Write scripts
- Generate custom avatar videos
- Edit with transitions & AI-generated B-rolls

And we’re not stopping here. Coming soon:
- Auto-posting on all social platforms
- Better B-rolls (directly from YouTube)
- Moving from a Telegram bot to a full-fledged app

Check out the trailer video, it’s made with our own tech.

And if you’re curious, we offer 3 free videos, so try it out!

All upvotes & feedback are massively appreciated.
No learning curve? That’s exactly what I need for quick content creation.
Creating content just got way easier. I love how seamless this process is.

name: iLLUSTRATiONS AI
description: Get on Brand illustrations - only FASTER and FRESHER. Ones that you can't just download from the internet.

node.body:
Hey 👋!!

lets Make.Marketing.Faster.Again.

IllustrationsAi.com is the fastest illustrator for your Brand's landing pages, presentations and blogs. Not just the fastest but also the most consistent one, who loves your Brand Guidelines.


The Idea

IllustrationsAI was born after constantly struggling to keep our own websites fresh and consistent. Consistency, Speed and On-Brand - were the problems we to solve for this. Designers are great in coming up with new brand styles and illustrations. illustrationsAI.com help brands use the Brand Guideliness and stay fresh, consistent and move fast.


Direct Use Cases

  • Landing Pages & Websites: Quickly generate tailored visuals that grab attention while staying true to your brand.

  • Marketing Campaigns: Create unique illustrations for social media, email newsletters, and digital ads that pop.

  • Presentations & Pitches: Impress investors and stakeholders with custom graphics that underscore your narrative.

  • Content Creators: Enhance blogs, ebooks, and other digital assets with visuals that maintain a consistent look and feel.


Market Landscape


There are plenty of stock illustration sites and template libraries out there, but none that leverage AI to create truly brand-specific visuals on demand. While competitors offer generic assets or require heavy manual tweaking, IllustrationsAi.com is laser-focused on delivering tailored, on-brand content. I see a huge opportunity among startups, digital agencies, and solo entrepreneurs who crave efficiency without compromising their identity.


Who Will Use This?


My current hunch: digital marketers, design agencies, startup founders, freelance designers, and creative teams at small-to-medium businesses. Even content creators and social media managers could benefit from their signature visuals that resonate with their audience.


Customers & Go-To-Market


Here’s where I’m still navigating uncharted territory. How do we get initial traction? I’m considering targeted digital campaigns, partnerships with design agencies, and leveraging real-world case studies to demonstrate our value. I’d love your insights on how best to reach out and ideal users.


Feature Roadmap

  • Coming Soon : ✅ Figma and Canva plugins


Please share which features you like or DONT LIKE and those that you want us to build new.
Not everyone has the skills or budget for custom illustrations. This looks like a great way to bridge that gap.

name: Tailor AI
description: Input your objectives and receive a uniquely crafted curriculum designed specifically for you.

node.body:
Howdy hunters! 👋

I’m excited to share Tailor with you all!

The idea came from my own frustration with traditional coding courses—they’re often too rigid, too generic, and rarely align with what I actually want to build. Most courses follow a fixed curriculum, assuming every learner has the same goals. But in reality, some of us want to build web apps, others want to dive into algorithms, and some just need to learn one specific skill for a project. Instead of wasting time on irrelevant lessons, I wanted a way to generate a course that adapts to me—not the other way around.

With Tailor, you don’t get a pre-made course—you generate your own. Just enter your goal or a simple prompt, and we’ll create a custom learning path tailored to your needs. No fluff, no unnecessary detours—just focused, practical learning.

Would love to hear your thoughts! What’s the biggest challenge you’ve faced when trying to learn to code?

As a developer, I often found myself getting distracted by social media, news, or other content that wasn't relevant to my current tasks. I wanted a non-intrusive tool that would gently remind me when I was straying off course - but I couldn't find exactly what I was looking for.

name: MakerTime AI
description: MakerTime tracks your deep work like a fitness app for productivity. It runs in the background, captures your screen activity, and uses AI to score your focus level. You can tailor it for the nature of your work, set daily goals, and track your progress.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt community! I'm excited to release MakerTime, a tool to accurately measure your Deep Work.


The world is full of distractions and tools to help avoid those distractions. But how do you accurately measure if your system is actually working?


I've tried out many existing tools like Rize and RescueTime, but for the most part they can only tell you what apps or websites you're using, which doesn't tell you the whole story.


Take YouTube for example. You can either be watching coding tutorials (productive) or comedy sketches (unproductive), so just giving a metric of "two hours of YouTube" is fairly meaningless. An effective tool has to be able to understand the semantic content of what you're doing.


Fast forward to 2025: LLMs and Vision Models are great at that! MakerTime takes screenshots of your active application window and feeds them into a local LLM/VLM to categorize your activity.


🎯

- Build consistent deep work habits with weekly hour targets

- Creating behavioral awareness without disrupting workflow


⚙️

* At any time you can view how much deep work you have performed for the day, tracking against your daily goal

* You can customize your definition of deep work to match your particular use case


🔒

- Local LLM processing - by default, no data leaves your device

- Screen captures are analyzed then immediately deleted


🚀

- Free during alpha

- Requires Mac with Apple Silicon (M1 or later)


Check out the interactive demo (15s) or download it and give it a test drive!
Love the tag-line!

description: No more struggling to create the perfect resume! Just chat with AI, answer a few questions, and build powerful resumes within minutes that pass ATS filters and get you an interview call.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt! 👋 Rohith here.


I’m thrilled to announce the launch of ResumeUp 2.0 today!


"Using the same resume for different job applications is like using the same key for every lock. Each job is unique, and your resume should be too. Nearly 70% of resumes are rejected by ATS due to lack of personalization." ResumeUp.AI helps you tailor your resume for each job description in seconds.


Also, we've added a few powerful features that make it even easier to craft the perfect resume:


👉 Chat with AI to Build Resume: Chat with our advanced AI in a conversational format to craft your resume step-by-step, ensuring ATS friendly resume.

👉 Improved ATS checker: Check your resume against the job description and our ATS checkers scan resume against 25+ checks

👉 LinkedIn to Resume: Seamlessly convert your LinkedIn profile into a polished resume with just a few clicks.


ResumeUp.AI continues to improve with deep understanding of resume creation and ATS systems to offer tools that are not only user-friendly but also highly effective in today’s job market:


🤖 AI Resume Builder with Instant Preview

📄 Over 20 ATS-Friendly & Modern Resume Templates

✅ Advanced ATS Resume Checker with Detailed Scoring & Suggestions

✍️ Cover Letter Generator

📊 Job Tracker to Keep Track of your Applied Jobs

🚀 Convert LinkedIn Profile into a Polished Resume


We’re eager to make job searching smoother and more successful.


I'd love to hear your thoughts and feedback.


Cheers, Rohith.

I'm Sparsh, the founder of Tometo, and I'm thrilled to be launching the MVP of our AI engineering manager application here on Product Hunt!


💡 Why Tometo AI?

What makes us different at Tometo AI?

name: AICruiter
description: AI-powered ATS recruitment tool automating candidate pre-screening, scoring, interviews & scheduling. Our cutting-edge algorithms and LLMs will optimize your hiring process with precision, speed, and fairness—helping you build smarter teams faster!

node.body:
Hi Product Hunt, Andre here, Co-founder of AIcruiter and I am pleased to show you what we have been building🚀

From start ups to large corporates Recruitment can be time-consuming and inefficient. Repetitive tasks take up valuable time, great candidates get overlooked due to bias, and poor feedback impacts the candidate experience. AICruiter is designed to address these challenges by leveraging AI to make hiring smarter and more efficient and ensure that Talent and Time are not neglected!

Key Features:
✅ Smart Job Posting – AI-powered suggestions help craft clear, engaging job descriptions to attract the right talent.
✅ AI Candidate Matching Score – Our cutting-edge algorithms combined with LLMs objectively evaluate all CVs and rank candidates based on skills & experience, by generating a detailed score report for each candidate application - ensuring the best matches and helping reduce unconscious bias in the hiring process.
✅ Automated Screening – Customizable pre-screening bots efficiently filter candidates, allowing recruiters to focus on top top prospects.
✅Streamlined ATS flow - Provides recruiter and candidates with clear visibility into the recruitment progress. The detailed score reports will help recruiters to offers valuable feedback to each candidate, enhancing the candidate experience and increasing the likelihood of future applications

We are offering a limited time special launch promotion where prices start at 15$/month per 5 users and a 7-Day Free Trial available to all new joiners, so would be great also to have your feedback on our tool.

We’d also love to hear your thoughts—what challenges do you face in hiring? Do you see AI improving recruitment processes?

This is such a game-changer for recruitment! The AI-powered candidate matching and automated screening features sound like they’ll save so much time and reduce bias. Love the focus on improving the candidate experience too—it’s often overlooked. Excited to try out the free trial! 🚀

name: FirstRowChat
description: Stop copying code between your browser and IDE. FirstRowChat is IDE-agnostic, applying LLM-powered code edits directly to your files, streamlining your workflow with seamless coding assistance—all from your browser.

node.body: 👋 Hey Product Hunters! I made FirstRowChat to solve a frustrating problem I kept running into while coding with LLMs. 🤔 Problem Most AI coding assistants require copy-pasting between the browser and your IDE. This disrupts your workflow and makes it harder to keep track of changes. On top of that, LLM chat tools don’t work seamlessly with every dev environment—but we’re already used to working in a browser. So instead of changing your IDE or workflow, FirstRowChat enhances the browser-based LLM experience, removing the tedious task of copy-pasting and losing track of what changed. ⚡ Solution FirstRowChat lets you: ✅ Attach files from your local system and edit them with an LLM. ✅ Apply changes instantly, no copy-pasting. ✅ Use multiple LLMs like OpenAI, Claude, and Gemini. ✅ Try it for free, bring your own API keys, or subscribe and use our managed API keys. ✅ Works in your browser, but edits your actual files—IDE-agnostic. 💬 What people are saying Dax on Twitter said: 📢 "This is a very good flow and every LLM app needs to copy it." 🔗 Read the tweet here: https://x.com/thdxr/status/18944... 🚀 Try it out! Would love to hear what you think! What LLMs do you use the most? How do you integrate AI into your coding?
Wow this looks amazing

name: Orson
description: Current coupon-finder extensions hide the best coupons from you (due to partnerships they have with the stores). Orson independently scours the internet for the absolute best deals and automatically applies them for you!

node.body:
After learning that the top coupon-finder extensions hide the best deals from you due to partnerships with retailers, I haven't been able to keep it out of my head. I hate missing out on good deals!

I built Orson to ensure I don't miss out on any deals. The tool searches the internet to find the best coupons and then automatically applies the best codes at checkout.

It works on most smaller sites, but not the giant marketplaces like Amazon. I wanted to check if people found this app useful before sinking a bunch of time into enabling that. So if you find this useful or have anything additional features that you'd like, let me know!

description: PetPic AI turns your pet’s photos into unique, custom portraits. Just upload pictures of your cat or dog, and the AI creates detailed images in different styles and settings. Bring out your pet's character in a fun and creative way.

node.body:
Hi! I built PetPic AI not just to create portraits, but to capture something deeper that words and even regular photos sometimes can’t.

I’ve seen people laugh, cry, and feel an unexpected connection when they see their pet’s portrait. The AI isn’t perfect, but it brings out the little details that make it your pet.

For many, these portraits become more than just images. They’re memories, love, and a reminder of how much these little souls mean to us. Seeing the reactions from pet owners has been the most touching part of this journey. 
I’d love to hear what you think and see the portraits of your furry friends.

node.body:
I'm excited to introduce Call AI, your 24/7 virtual call assistant designed to revolutionize the way businesses handle calls and appointments. With a natural, human-like voice, Call AI ensures you never miss an important call while efficiently managing your schedule.

Key Features:

  • Dedicated AI-Powered Number: Enhance customer interactions with a unique virtual phone number that professionally represents your brand.

  • 24/7 Smart Call Handling: Utilizing advanced language models, Call AI greets callers, provides real-time information, and manages conversations around the clock—even after business hours.

  • Instant Appointment Booking: Seamlessly integrate with Google Calendar for automatic appointment scheduling, eliminating the hassle of back-and-forth communications.

  • Effective Spam & Robocall Blocking: Filter out unwanted calls, telemarketers, and spam, ensuring you only engage with valuable customer inquiries.

  • Business-Ready Integration: Sync your business details—like operating hours, services, pricing, and FAQs—so callers receive accurate, up-to-date information every time.

  • Multilingual & Multi-Accent Support: Cater to a global audience with support for multiple languages and accents, ensuring a smooth and personalized caller experience.

  • Comprehensive Call Logging & Insights: Monitor every call with detailed logs and actionable insights to continuously enhance your customer service and operational efficiency.

We've designed Call AI to be scalable, catering to solo entrepreneurs and growing teams alike, maintaining professionalism and boosting productivity. Our mission is to empower businesses by ensuring they never miss important calls while effortlessly managing their schedules.

We'd love for you to try Call AI and share your feedback. Your insights are invaluable as we continue to enhance the app to better serve your needs.

Thank you for checking out Call AI!
