name: AmpyFin v3.0.1
description: Open source automated trading system that leverages different agents ranging from technical indicators to models that replicate institutional traders. Since going live on January 3, 2025, it's been up over 30% with favorable metrics.

node.body:
- Who I am:
A little background about me as the owner of the project. I've always been interested in trading and always wanted to work on creating my own trading project. I had background in ML, so I decided to do was utilize this in trading. You might be wondering why I decided to make this open source. There's potentially a lot to lose, but I would beg to differ.

- Why Open Source:
From the moral standpoint, when I was in uni and wanted to code my first automated trading bot, I remembered there was practically no publicly available trading bot. It was mostly trading gurus promoting their classes to get money or their channel to get revenue. This was something I promised myself many years ago if I do create a successful trading bot I will open source it so other people can potentially use my project to create better trained models or projects. Another thing is opportunity. I was able to learn a lot from critique. I had one open source trading project before - which is now defunct - but back then I was able to meet different people with different background ranging from quant developers at respectable prop trading firms to individuals who were just interested attending the same class as me. This interaction allowed me to learn what aspects I needed to improve this project on as well as learn new strategies that they used in their pilot / research programs. That's what's special about open source. You get to meet people you never thought you will meet before the project started.

- What My Project Does
Most prop trading firms / investment companies have their own ML models. I don't claim that mine is better than theirs. To be honest, we are outperforming a vast majority of them at the current moment (there are 6000+ trading firms we are tracking in terms of their portfolio). This is only 2 months since it's gone live so that might mean nothing in the grand scheme of things. Backtesting results for v3.0.1 showed favorable results with Max Draw-Down at 9.29%, R ratio at 1.91, Sortino at 2.73 and Sharpe ratio at 2.19. A lot of the training and backtesting as well as trading + ranking aspect is well documented in README.md for those interested in using the system for their own. We essentially use a ML technique called Ensemble Learning that uses agents. These agents range from simple strategies in TA-Lib to more proprietary agents (we plan to make this feature open source as well) that model trades done by each investment firms (as posted on marketbeat and changes in portfolio value on 13f reports). The ensemble learning part occurs behind the scene with each agent's parameters ((skew, flip ratio etc.) - there's about 82 parameters) being contorted in different ways in a controlled manner so that it's fine tuned with agents from same class being given feedback loop to their respective control files. This is done using 1m tick from Intrinio although we anticipate moving to Databento. The open source version is not the same as our proprietary one but it has the same framework (mostly because a lot of services we use are paid). We want our users to be able to use AmpyFin without having to pay a single cent.

- Target Audience
Institutional traders want to benchmark their trading AI agents against other publicly available agents without having to share their proprietary models, and retail investors want clear, AI-driven trading signals without analyzing complex strategies themselves, so, Ampyfin solves both problems by ranking multiple trading agents—including strategies, investment portfolios, and AI models—and assigning decision weights to generate the most optimal buy/sell signal for each ticker

- Comparison
There really isn't any application like this out there to be fair. A lot of trading systems utilize one complex strategy and still use human traders. Signals are there for the human traders. In terms of for retail investors, a lot of application require private information to access their data. We don't. We don't require any personal information to use our application.

- The Team
To be quite frank, we are currently a small team spread out in different locations. We're all software engineers full time. We mostly work on the project Friday evening - Sunday evening. There's no set amount of time one needs to work. The team is just there so that our efforts are united in pushing out certain features by a certain flexible timeframe while grabbing a pint. We all stand by the same goal for the project which is keeping and keeping the project open-source, providing full transparency to our users, and maintaining it so that it is free to use. In fact, currently, we're using Open AI's Pro+ for the LLM side to scrape data from Benzinga and Marketbeat but we're implementing an effective web scrapping tool for out users to use in the open source version.

name: Venice
description: Venice is a private, censorship-resistant artificial intelligence (AI) platform, built on open-source models and powered by decentralized infrastructure. The application combines the benefits of decentralized blockchain technology with generative AI.

node.body:
Greetings,

Erik here, Founder of Venice. We’re witnessing explosive growth in AI, but nearly all of it is happening through platforms that control what AI can say and spy on everything users do. So, we built something different. Venice solves two major problems with mainstream AI:

  1. Privacy: Every prompt sent to ChatGPT, Claude, or Gemini is stored forever, attached to your identity, and shared with governments, hackers, and various third parties. Venice never stores your conversations - they live only in your browser. Venice can't share or spy on your convos because it doesn't have them.

  2. Censorship: Major AI platforms heavily restrict outputs based on opaque content policies. Venice gives you access to powerful models without adding extra restrictions. This leads to free thought and open exploration of ideas.

We’ve integrated leading open-source models like DeepSeek, Meta’s Llama, Qwen, and Flux, giving you access to cutting-edge AI that rivals or exceeds closed-source options while protecting your privacy.

Features you’ll love as a Venice Pro user:

  • Character creation for custom AI personalities

  • Unrestricted image generation with 70+ artistic styles

  • Document analysis for in-depth research

  • Web-enabled models for up-to-date information

  • High-resolution image upscaling

  • Upload images and analyze or extract content from them

You can try it for free, without even signing up. For Product Hunt users, we’re offering 20% off our Pro sub your first year with the following code:


PH20PERCENT

We hope you enjoy Venice and the power of unrestricted intelligence.
Only AI platform I use daily. I value my privacy, and the responsiveness of the team is world class.

Best private and uncensored AI company out there. I’ve been building some really cool stuff with their APIs too — amazing work, guys! Highly recommend to anyone who values their privacy and wants to work with real, uncensored, raw knowledge.

It's currently available as an opt-in experiment in Labs for Google One AI Premium subscribers. They're gradually rolling it out to more users.

name: QwQ-32B
description: QwQ-32B, from Alibaba Qwen team, is a new open-source 32B LLM achieving DeepSeek-R1 level reasoning via scaled Reinforcement Learning. Features a "thinking mode" for complex tasks.

node.body:
Hi everyone!

Check out QwQ-32B, a new open-source language model from the Qwen team. It's achieving something remarkable: reasoning performance comparable to DeepSeek-R1, but with a model that's 20 times smaller (32B parameters vs. 671B)!

This is a big deal because:

🤯 Size/Performance Ratio: It punches way above its weight class in reasoning, math, and coding tasks.
🧠 Scaled Reinforcement Learning: They achieved this by scaling up Reinforcement Learning (RL) on a strong foundation model (Qwen2.5-32B).
🤔 "Thinking Mode": Like some other recent models, it has a special "thinking mode" (activated with tags) that allows for longer chains of thought.
✅ Open Source: Model weights are available under Apache 2.0.

Available now in Qwen Chat and HF Spaces.

The implications of getting this level of reasoning performance from a 32B model are huge. It opens up possibilities for deploying powerful AI on less powerful hardware, reducing costs, and making advanced reasoning capabilities more accessible.
Is the API available for this?

This score and size are amazing, I have a few questions

  1. What is the difference between it and DeepSeek R1?

  2. Do you have plans to make a larger size reasoning model?

Thank you for your contribution to the open source community!

name: LeadLake
description: LeadLake is a fully automated lead generation platform. Scrape real-time B2B leads from Google Maps, get deeper insights, and instantly craft auto-personalized emails & SMS. With two-layer verification, you'll always have accurate leads ready to convert.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt! 👋 I’m Emre, co-founder of LeadLake – a B2B lead scraper with built-in AI that writes hyper-personalized emails & SMS for you.

When we first started our marketing agency, we quickly realized generic cold emails don’t work. We tried every “best-performing” template out there, but responses were rare. People could tell it was just another mass email.

So, we started pulling company data—things like Google reviews, social media links, and descriptions—to make our outreach more personal. And suddenly, our replies went through the roof. Every call started with:

"Wow, you really did your research!"

The truth? We didn’t. AI did.

That’s when we decided to turn our system into a product.

So, what does LeadLake do?

✅ Finds unlimited B2B leads (no caps, no limits)
✅ Scrapes deep insights (social media, SEO descriptions, website trackers like Google Analytics & FB Pixel, user reviews, complete tech stacks of the websites)
✅ Writes fully personalized emails & SMS – based on what a company does, what people say about them, and how your offer fits in
✅ Improves deliverability – no more copy-paste emails that get flagged as spam
✅ Built-in email verification – so your emails don’t bounce

Who’s it for?

If you do cold outreach—whether you’re in SaaS, consulting, real estate, marketing, or even a local business—LeadLake helps you find leads and send emails people actually want to read.

Why use LeadLake?

Most tools either limit your leads, require manual scraping, or only let you personalize a couple of variables like {first_name} or {company_name}. LeadLake’s AI actually understands a company—its reviews, pain points, and what they care about—so your emails don’t feel like spam.

If this sounds interesting, try LeadLake for free for two weeks and let us know what you think in the comments. Would love to hear your feedback! 🚀
LeadLake increases the number of customers by improving customer relationship management, offers high performance and distribution. It is a perfect solution for both small and large businesses!

Personalization is everything in cold outreach. Love how LeadLake goes beyond {first_name} and actually tailors messages based on real company insights. That’s the difference between spam and real engagement.

name: #Hype
description: Hype is a 100% free, P2P online meeting tool built for simplicity and privacy. Say goodbye to signups, ads and meeting time limits. Our nano AI models run directly in your browser to summarize and transcribe meetings in real time—without recording any data.

node.body:
We’re super excited to launch Hype, a completely free, P2P online meeting tool we built out of necessity while bootstrapping our AI research lab.

🧠 Why we built this:
We were tired of dealing with meeting tools that had time limits, required signups, or made us pay just to use basic features. So, we built Hype:

✅ No signups and 0 friction
✅ P2P technology for privacy-first meetings
✅ Nano AI models run directly in the browser to summarize and transcribe meetings in real time
✅ All data is transient—nothing is recorded

💡 How it works:
Simply create a meeting link and share it. You’ll get real-time AI-generated summaries and transcriptions without any data ever leaving your browser.

Key Things to Know

Transcription & Subtitles

  • The transcription model takes a few seconds to fully download before subtitles appear, depending on your internet speed (same thing when you switch to a new language for the first time).

  • There's no visual confirmation yet, but you can check the browser console for progress.

Meeting Host Role

  • Only participants with Gemini Nano enabled can provide AI for others.

  • Whoever is joining first with Gemini Nano becomes the host (if there's no host yet - and when that participant leaves, Hype looks for a new host with Gemini enabled)

  • If no one has Gemini Nano, the HypeBot won’t be available. However, all other features—like transcription, subtitles, and time travel—will work as usual.

Using HypeBot (@bot in chat)

To enable Gemini Nano, the host must:

  1. Install Chrome Dev or Canary.

  2. Enable the following flags:

    • chrome://flags/#prompt-api-for-gemini-nano → Enabled

    • chrome://flags/#optimization-guide-on-device-model → Enabled (BypassPerfRequirement)

  3. Restart Chrome.

  4. Go to chrome://components → Check for updates on Optimization Guide On Device Model.

  5. WebGPU support (optional but improves performance).

    🎯 We’d love your feedback:
    • What features would make this tool even better?
    • Do you see use cases for this in your workflow or team meetings?

    Thank you for checking us out! If you like what you see, an upvote would mean a lot to us. And if you have questions, drop them here—I’ll be around all day to answer them.

name: Perigon
description: Perigon is an AI-powered platform that turns global information into real-time insights. Advanced filtering, sentiment analysis, and contextual AI help businesses, analysts, and developers track trends, monitor media, and make informed decisions instantly.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt community!


Today we’re launching Perigon – and we think it’s going to change how you experience information.


🔥 The hard truth about information tools today

In our testing, we discovered something shocking: Google Alerts missed 67% of relevant content completely 😱. And when they did deliver alerts? They arrived 1.5 hours after the same information hit Perigon ⏳.


That’s not just a feature improvement – that’s a fundamentally different relationship with information. And that’s just a fraction of what we’ve built into the Perigon Workspace°.


🏗️ What we’ve built:

Perigon is a real-time context engine with three core components:


🔔 Signals° – Alerts that capture what matters the moment it happens, with none of the blind spots or delays of legacy tools ⏩ our tests showed an average delivery in as little as a few minutes after publication⏱️.


💬 Chat – Conversations powered by real-time data, not stale training data. When you ask Perigon a question, you get answers based on information that’s minutes old, not weeks 🕒


🔎 Search – Research capabilities that don’t just find faster, but deliver the context you need to actually understand what you’ve found 📖


All built on our proprietary data API that continuously ingests information from millions of data points with millisecond-level latency ⚡🌍.


🎯 Who this is for:

If you’re tracking competitors, monitoring markets, or need to stay ahead of fast-moving events, we built Perigon for you 💼📊. It’s for professionals who can’t afford to be second to know 🚀.


We’d ❤️ your feedback! What information challenges are you facing that we could help solve? 👇
The real-time data aspect is truly a game-changer. How has Perigon's instant updates enhanced your workflow and decision-making process?
Love how Perigon shifts from just finding information to actually helping users understand and act on it. A true upgrade for competitive intelligence.

name: Colab Agent
description: Simplify data tasks with the new Data Science Agent, powered by Gemini, and generate functional notebooks, now available free in Google Colab.

node.body:
Hi everyone!

Sharing Colab Agent, a new tool integrated directly into Google Colab that could seriously speed up data science workflows! It's powered by Gemini 2.0 and lets you generate entire, runnable Colab notebooks just by describing your analysis goals in natural language.

Here's how it works:

1. Upload Data: CSV, JSON, or .txt files (up to 1GB).
2. Describe Your Goal: Tell it what you want to do (e.g., "visualize trends," "build a prediction model," "clean the data").
3. Get a Notebook: The agent generates a complete Colab notebook with the necessary code, libraries, and analysis.

It's a full workflow, ready to run and customize. It can handle things like:

✨ Data Cleaning: Filling in missing values.
📊 Visualization: Creating charts and graphs.
🧮 Statistical Analysis: Calculating correlations, etc.
🤖 Machine Learning: Training models (like random forests).

It's free to use in Colab (with some compute limits, of course), and supports multiple languages. It achieves 4th place on the DABStep benchmark for data science agents.
It's really cool stuff. I just recently read about it. It's actually amazing that it's free on top of all that

This is really cool, most of the times you really want to just get going without rewriting import pandas* for the millionth time. I look forward to try this to get to modelling and refining much much faster

name: Aider
description: Aider is the AI pair programmer that edits code in your local git repo via the terminal. Works with your editor, any LLM (Claude 3.5 Sonnet, DeepSeek R1, GPT-4o, local models), and many languages.

node.body:
Hi everyone！

Aider is an open-source tool that brings AI pair programming directly into your terminal. It lets you collaboratively edit your existing codebase with an LLM, right in your terminal.

Here's how it works:

Add Files: You tell aider which files to work on, like: aider file.js

Chat: Describe changes in natural language.
AI Edits: aider applies edits directly to your files.
Review & Iterate: Use your editor, and keep chatting.
Git Commits: Auto-commits with good messages.

While tools like Cursor offer a more visual approach, terminal-based coding is still essential for many developers, and Aider makes that AI interaction really interesting!

@zaczuo Thanks for sharing aider! Any chance you can add me as a "maker"?


Also, I'm happy to answer any questions folks have about aider.
It's really save my time between commands' document

name: Docwelo
description: Docwelo helps freelancers, founders, and small businesses get standard contracts like NDAs, Employment, and Service Agreements done in minutes for just $2 per doc. Simple, fast, and affordable so you can focus on your work, not paperwork.

node.body:
Freelancers, founders, SMBs—how often have you found yourself stuck in paperwork?

A while back, my co-founder and I were hiring software engineers for Sonetz. The hiring part? Exciting. The contracts? Not so much. We thought it would be quick—just a standard doc, fill in the blanks, done. Turns out, even the most basic agreements can be a headache. They take too much time, get confusing, and cost way more than they should.
We had seen this struggle before. My co-founder was a senior SWE freelancer before Sonetz, so he had dealt with this firsthand. Clients would ask for proper contracts, and every time, it was a hassle. Either too complicated, too expensive, or just plain annoying to deal with. Whether hiring or freelancing, we kept running into the same problem.

At some point, we asked ourselves, why is this still so complicated?

So we built Docwelo, a super simple way to get NDAs, Employment, and Service Agreements done in minutes for just $2 per doc. No back-and-forth and no unnecessary costs for standard contracts. Just quick, easy agreements so you can focus on building instead of paperwork.

V1 of Docwelo is live at docwelo.com! 
Would love to hear your thoughts. What other contracts would make your life easier?
Great work team i really liked your tool ! Thanks for sharing with us ☺️

name: Kasplo Email Intelligence
description: Kasplo Email Intelligence does more than just track campaigns, it gives you full visibility into inbox placement, engagement, and competitor strategies so you can refine your approach and outperform the competition.

node.body:
🙏Namaste (Hello) Product Hunt Community!

I’m Sujith, Founder & CEO of Kasplo, and today, we’re pumped to introduce Kasplo Email Intelligence - India’s first and only platform that gives you complete visibility into your email campaigns.


Why Email Intelligence?


For the past 9 years, we’ve helped brands connect with their subscribers through email. But one of the biggest challenges in email marketing remains a lack of visibility. Once you hit send, where does your email go? Inbox, Promotions, or Spam?


Marketers today are forced to juggle multiple dashboards just to track campaign insights, domain & IP health, and sender reputation. 


And let’s be honest, email is a highly competitive channel with no easy way to track what your competitors are doing or how to outperform them.


That’s exactly why we built Kasplo Email Intelligence - an advanced analytics platform that gives you a 360° view of your email performance, while also tracking your competitors to help you stay ahead.


What makes Kasplo email Intelligence a game changer?


✅ Inbox tracker: Now you can view the detailed insights of the past campaigns, read rate, delete rate, ISP wise performance and see where the emails land: Primary, Promotions, Updates, or Spam.


✅ Reputation & blacklist monitoring: Keep your domain & IP reputation in check with real-time monitoring.  Receive alerts for spam traps, blacklist problems, and complaints, so you can address them before deliverability suffers.


✅ EI Vault: Want to know what’s working for your competitors? With EI Vault, you can track competitor inbox delivery, subject line, send frequency, email templates, and even find out what subject line they are using. See what's driving their success and improve yours.


One Dashboard, Endless Insights!


No more guessing. No more blind spots. No more switching between tools. With Kasplo Email Intelligence, you track, analyze, and optimize everything from one single dashboard.


We created this for email marketers, brands, and growth teams who are tired of playing the guessing game and need to start making data-informed decisions that drive engagement and revenue.


If that piques your interest and curiosity to know how this is possible? We are offering 7-DAY FREE TRIAL in 48 HOURS.


We’d love your feedback! Try Kasplo Email Intelligence today, and let us know how it helps you win the inbox battle.


💛 We’re here to answer any questions. Drop your thoughts in the comments!


🙏 Thank you, Product Hunt!

name: Flowblock
description: Flowblock is a code editor with intellisense and built-in AI code predictions and chat that allows you to write Javascript and CSS inside Webflow Designer.

node.body:
Hello👋, Product Hunt community! I'm excited to introduce **Flowblock**, an AI-powered code editor crafted specifically for Webflow designers and developers.

**⚫️ Why We Built Flowblock**

As Webflow enthusiasts, we recognized the need for a more efficient coding experience within the platform. While Webflow's code embed feature allows for custom code integration, it lacks IntelliSense support, making it challenging to detect errors and streamline coding. Additionally, there's no AI assistance to guide users during code development.

Flowblock addresses this by providing real-time code predictions, comprehensive IntelliSense support for JavaScript and CSS, and an inbuilt AI assistant—all within the Webflow designer.

**Key Features**

- 🎹 **Real-Time Code Predictions:** Accelerate your coding process with instant suggestions as you type.
- ‼️ **Comprehensive IntelliSense:** Benefit from code highlighting, syntax suggestions, and autocompletion tailored for JavaScript and CSS.
- 🤖 **AI Assistant:** Access our built-in assistant anytime to help write code, debug, and learn new coding techniques.
- 🛠️ **Error Detection:** Identify and correct common coding mistakes instantly, ensuring cleaner code.
- 🔗 **Seamless Integration:** Designed to work flawlessly within the Webflow environment, making it easier to bring your designs to life.

We'd love to hear your thoughts and feedback. Feel free to ask any questions or share your experiences using Flowblock. Thank you for your support! Hello👋, Product Hunt community! name: Localizapp for Xcode
description: Manually translating text in Xcode is tedious. Localizapp simplifies it! It’s an Xcode extension that lets you translate yourxcstrings file directly into 20+ languages without leaving Xcode—no more copy-pasting!

node.body:
👋 Hey, Product Hunt! I’m Arturo, and I’m thrilled to introduce Localizapp!

If you’ve ever struggled with manually translating text in Xcode, you know how tedious it can be. Localizapp isn’t just another translation tool—it’s an Xcode extension that lets you translate your `.xcstrings` file directly into 20+ languages without leaving Xcode. No more copy-pasting!

How to Use the Extension in Xcode

1️⃣ First, enable the extension in macOS System Settings → Login Items & Extensions → Xcode Code Editor.
2️⃣ Once activated, the extension and its options will appear in Xcode.
3️⃣ Right-click your `.xcstrings` file and set it to 'Source Editor' mode to make the extension visible in Xcode’s 'Editor' menu.

Translation Options

✔ Translate directly in Xcode – Use the option 'Translate your .xcstrings file directly' (note: large files may take some time).
✔ Send your file to the main app – Use the Xcode extension to translate all texts based on the languages selected in your settings.
✔ Drag and drop for translation – Simply drop your `.xcstrings` file into the 'Translate' tab in the main app and save the translated version to your device.

💡 Want to learn more? Check out the wiki to stay up to date on how it works—translating your project has never been easier!

🛠 Have feature requests or found a bug? Drop your suggestions in the dedicated section of the app.

✨ Thanks for checking out Localizapp! I’d love to hear your thoughts and feedback. Let me know what you think, and happy coding!
Super cool! Very useful tool for each developer, more reliable than ChatGPT or similar thanks to deepL integration!

name: ai.pw
description: ai.pw is a password manager dedicated to AI agents like OpenAI's Operator. Let the Operator handle more tasks without being interrupted for signups or logins.

node.body:
Hi everyone! I am excited to share an early version of ai.pw, a password manager for AI agents.

I was excited to experiment with OpenAI's Operator from Day 1. I've tried to make it like and comment on X, read and summarize paywalled news articles, and type in financial data from different sources into a spreadsheet.


While it was fascinating to see the Operator go off on its own, it still needed a lot of handholding. The Operator would constantly ask me for help with logging in or signing up to different services. That's how the idea for ai.pw was born.


I want to emphasize: ai.pw should not be used to store your sensitive/personal credentials and should only be used to store non-essential logins to share with the Operator. Here are a few things I've been using ai.pw for:

  • A dedicated Proton Mail for the Operator

  • An account for paywalled media (Bloomberg, NYT, etc.)

  • A dedicated account for social media platforms (not my main account)

Give it a spin and let me know what you think! You can begin using ai.pw for free. If you need to store more than 3 different credentials, you can subscribe using AIPWFORPH to get 50% off.


Additional fun offer

I've been pushing the Operator to try using different apps and websites for the past month. Are you curious whether the Operator can smoothly navigate your product? I am happy to try making the Operator use your app. Let me know in the comments below and I can follow up with you!

name: The Streets App
description: Streets is the all-in-one platform for event curators, vendors, and partygoers to create, discover, and manage events effortlessly. The platform is completely Free for event curators and we don't charge curators fees on paid tickets.

node.body:
As the founder and creator, I saw a gap in the event industry where curators struggled with high fees, fragmented marketing tools, and limited ways to engage their audience. Many relied on expensive platforms like Eventbrite or Posh, which cut into their profits, while others juggled multiple tools to manage RSVPs, payments, and promotions.


So, I spent the last couple of years working closely with real event curators, nightlife promoters, and vendors to build Streets, an all-in-one event management platform designed to be frictionless, powerful, and scalable.


Who Streets Is For & How It Helps:


🔹 Event Curators & Promoters: Streets removes the financial barriers to hosting events. Unlike other platforms that charge curators fees, Streets is 100% free for event hosts no platform fees on online ticket sales. With Tap to Pay, curators can accept secure, contactless payments on iPhone with no extra hardware. Plus, they get free SMS, email, and push notification marketing to engage attendees and a fully synced, no-maintenance website that showcases their events, profile, and social links without extra work.


🔹 Attendees & Nightlife Seekers: Finding events is seamless with AI-powered discovery tailored to what people love. Whether someone is traveling and looking for events in a new city or following their favorite promoters, Streets makes it easy to explore and book. The mobile ensures a smooth experience, but even without downloading the app, attendees can still purchase tickets, RSVP, and follow event curators via the integrated web platform.


🔹 Vendors & Experience Creators: Streets isn’t just for events. Vendors like hookah providers, merch sellers, and even parking services can use Streets to sell products or services before and during events. No need for separate tools; vendors get the same benefits as curators, including seamless payments, analytics, and free marketing capabilities to grow their reach.


Why Streets?


✔ Up to 70% lower fees vs. Eventbrite & Posh (so your attendees save and you earn more)

✔ Tap to Pay on iPhone for fast, secure, and private in-person transactions

✔ Free RSVP & Paid ticketing—sell how you want, without restrictions

✔ Built-in marketing tools (push notifications, SMS, email—at no extra cost)

✔ A no-maintenance website that automatically updates with your events & profile


Now that Streets is live and built for scale, I’m excited to see how curators, attendees, and vendors take their event experience to the next level. If you’re a creator in the nightlife & event space, this platform was built for you. 🚀

name: MyPerfectAI
description: Our mission is to help professionals and SMEs navigate the fragmented AI landscape with confidence. By simply describing their task or use case, users of MyPerfectAI receive precise, task-specific AI tool recommendations in seconds- completely free of charge.

node.body: Hello Product Hunters! A few months ago, I realised something. The AI industry is incredibly fragmented. There are literally thousands & thousands of AI tools out there. Professionals and business owners need help. Adopting AI would be a lot easier if they didn't have to manually research and figure out, often through trial and error, if an AI tool is, or isn't, suitable for their specific use case. That's when I had the idea: What if we could use AI, to help people use AI? A connector. A middle-man. It would de-risk it for everyone. Less time wasted researching + less money wasted testing mediocre AI tools. And, it would be completely non-partisan. An honest advisor. Not a sponsored content creator. That's how MyPerfectAI was born. Provided with a brief description of the task at hand, our system sifts through a curated database of high-quality, professional-grade AI tools to recommend the most relevant AI solutions for you. --- Our MVP is now live! https://www.myperfectai.app/ Please feel free to test it out and drop me any feedback at josh@myperfectai.app If you'd like to follow along our journey, here's our LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company... Also, subscribe to our newsletter, The AI Briefing: https://theaibriefingbymyperfect... The most important AI news each week, simplified for non-technical readers. Note: at the moment our database only has ~130 tools listed. This is because I've been manually writing/editing them myself. We'd really appreciate any AI tool startups interested in growing alongside us (and being listed on the site)! Drop me an email or visit https://www.myperfectai.app/pricing --- And... that's all for now. Thanks for reading. Can't wait to hear what you think in the comments!

name: Deep Fact Check
description: Have you ever created some content with AI and been worried that some of it was made up? Deep Fact Check can review it for you, identifying factual claims and checking each one for accuracy.

node.body:
Hey Product Hunt!

Matt Collins here, creator of Deep Fact Check 👋 🇬🇧.

AI is amazing for creating content.


But it has an unfortunate reputation for, er... making things up!


People say "check everything any AI tool writes." But really? Who's got time for that?


The good news is, AI can do the checking for you!


Deep Fact Check is the first AI-powered tool for fact-checking AI content.


Just upload a document and the AI tool will scurry off, identify factual claims being made in the document and assess whether each of them is accurate.


It'll quickly show you any claims it has found to be problematic, saving you the embarrassment of sharing bogus information and the cost of making poorly-informed decisions.


I can’t wait for you to try it and see how AI fact checking changes the way you use AI generated content.

Let me know what you think!

Cheers,
Matt

name: SoloAgent AI
description: Developed for solopreneurs to validate, launch, build, monetize and analyze their idea with an AI agent for each task - and keep it all in one dashboard. Let agents sync wire Reddit, LinkedIn and landing page building tools, analytics & more.

node.body:
So I've been a solopreneur for a while. I'm technical & taught myself how to code to be a tech founder & digital nomad.

I validate ideas fast with Lovable now and I love it.

I've also been using agents for other tasks and they do truly make my life better bc I also have a part-time job so I need to stay organised and even if a little part of my work is lifted, I appreciate it. I use a dashboard that I made myself that centralised all of these agents in one place.

This way I can have like 6 different people do tasks and pass on to each other - ofc I check everything and the stuff I post on Reddit or LinkedIn I double check/often still write myself to a great extent. But the agent find relevant subreddit and LinkedIn groups and posts my stuff there.

It also will build a landing page if the initial traction metrics are good and if the mailing list is doing great, it starts to make my SaaS that I then iterate on.

I run multiple projects, so it's awfully useful to have a dashboard for each of them and not have a thousand tabs open.

I gathered it would be useful to make it a tool like this for others.  I'll probs be done with the beta version in 2 weeks time and send it out to my beta testers for free :) Always open to feedback and ofc signups! :)))

name: Nailvana
description: Nailvana is your ultimate nail design inspiration generator. Discover endless creative ideas, from elegant to bold styles, customized to your preferences. Whether you're planning your next manicure or just exploring trends

node.body:
How Nailvana Was Born: From Frustration to Innovation

A few months ago, I was sitting with my girlfriend as she scrolled through Reddit and Pinterest, hunting for the perfect nail design. Normally, she enjoyed browsing, but this time was different—she was searching for something very specific. Pinterest’s search wasn’t matching her search terms, she couldn’t find the exact look she had in mind.  

Sensing her confusion, I suggested to her why not create it yourself using prompt? I had a Midjourney subscription and figured AI could generate something unique. She was intrigued and gave it a try. But the results were shockingly underwhelming.

I wondered if it was just a bad prompt or if AI really struggled with nail art. So, I went across different AI image generators to see the output. To my surprise, the results weren’t just bad .. they were absolutely awful. The AI messed up fingers, I saw palms with 2 fingers, 3 fingers, some fingers inverted going inside the palm and so on .. very disturbing.

That’s when I saw an opportunity. Nail art is a high-interest category, with millions of people constantly looking for inspiration. Yet, current AI models weren’t tuned for this at all. While AI could generate impressive landscapes and portraits, it completely failed at something as precise and detailed as nail designs.  

So, I decided to fine-tune an AI model specifically for nail art. Instead of people scrolling endlessly through Pinterest or Reddit for inspiration, I wanted to create something built exclusively for generating beautiful, custom nail designs effortlessly. 

And that’s how I created Nailvana ART A inspiration generator that helps nail enthusiasts, professionals, and casual users alike explore and create the perfect nail designs in seconds. No more guesswork, no more mismatched searches just instant inspiration at your fingertips.  

Would love to hear your thoughts! Have you ever struggled to find the perfect nail design online? 💅🚀

name: AmPrompt
description: Improve your productivity with a new button, seamlessly incorporated into the ChatGPT interface. In a single click, the button analyzes and optimizes your prompt using state of the art AI technologies, while maintaining privacy.

node.body:
Hello 
I am happy to release here a solution which i find much use of myself.

This extension came to life after the recent release of ChatGPT o3-mini:
I use ChatGPT a lot (I believe i'm not the only one..), and as a free tier user I am limited to only 10 prompts a day - so I have to make sure each prompt is spot on.
Besides, it is extremely frustrating to write a 20 line prompt, submit, wait for the model to think, only to find out that I didn't emphasize something strongly enough, or I wasn't clear enough.

This is why I built this extension:
To refine the messy, unstructured thoughts I type into the prompt box to something more concise and effective. 
All of this in a cool button which looks like it was made by the ChatGPT front-end team!

Hope you will find use in this minimal extension
I appreciate all feedback
Dan
